112.title: He wants to be gigantic! [Giant Growth]

choices: Aaron works with the mad scientist.
Aaron wants to grow more before he makes a decision...
Aaron betrays the scientist and takes full control!
1121.content:
Aaron found himself in dark basement, with his body strapped to a large table from his chubby waist. It looked easy enough to escape, but he struggled and strained as much as he could to break out. Seems being a fat bully makes you easy to get stuck. He pondered as to how he got himself into this mess. The last thing he remembered was grabbing an ice cream sundae from an ice cream truck. The driver was someone new, but it didn't matter as long as he got his sundae. But after finishing off the ice cream, he blacked out and found himself where he is now.

"Hello," he yelled, "Is anyone here?"

Soon, he heard footsteps from a far corner of the room. From the shadows emerged the same person who was in the ice cream truck. The man was middle aged, with thinning white hair, large glasses, and a large black overcoat. The white ice cream man outfit was suspicious earlier, but now it's downright apparent as to what kind of person Aaron was about to deal with.

"Well well," the man began, "Looks like fatty's waking up..."

"Who are you," demanded Aaron, "Where am I?"

"My name is not important to you," the man replied, "But what is important is that you are in my secret location and you're going to be my little guinea pig."

"What are you gonna do to me?"

"Oh nothing major," he replied as he made his way to a light switch on a nearby wall, "We're gonna have some fun..."

The man flipped the switch, which caused the room to light up, revealing numerous articles of machinery and technology, some looking advanced while a few looked a bit ancient. But the biggest feature was a large weapon that was hooked to the ceiling; a large ray that looked like something out of science fiction from the 50s. Aaron began to feel nervous.

"Well fatty, I'm going to be blunt," said the man as he began to turn on the machinery, "I have a very special experiment that I have been working on for a long time and you will be my latest test subject."

"Like I have much of a choice," groused Aaron.

"You should be happy about what this ray will do to you. It's supposed to make you grow bigger!"

Aaron began to look at the man with curiosity.

"Bigger?"

"As in turn you into a giant. Make you huge! Enormous! A human being of colossal proportions!"

"But wait," interrupted Aaron, "If I'm your latest test subject, were there any others before me?"

The man sighed as he walked over to a desk and pulled out a large shoebox with holes on the top. He opened it up next to Aaron, revealing about half a dozen tiny children huddled all around inside, scared for their lives.

"Failed experiments," replied the man with defeat in his tone, "Each one shrunk until they were the size of bottle caps. Each experiment made them shrink no matter what I did. Now they're just snacks..."

"Yeah, and they look delicious," replied Aaron as he smacked his lips with hunger.

The man looked at Aaron, who was beginning to drool over the sight of the shrunken failures. He knew they didn't have much time and didn't want to reverse the shrinking process as to avoid any form of blackmail or prosecution. So, what better way to destroy the evidence?

"So, how many do you want before we begin," asked the man as he picked up a tiny young girl.

"You're a mad scientist, aren't you," asked Aaron as a grin began to grow on his face, "I'm thinking I can eat them all..."

"Mad? Hardly. I'm certifiably insane!"

The scientist began to dangle the tiny girl over Aaron's mouth, who opened wide enough to eat her whole. With a release of his two fingers, the tiny victim fell to her imminent demise inside the boy's mouth. With a hefty GULP, the girl was sucked down into his stomach.

"Mmmm, that was so good... Keep them coming..."

The scientist beamed with anticipation as he picked up two more and dropped each of them into Aaron's mouth like peanuts. He sloshed the two inside his mouth, savoring the taste, then swallowed them instantly.

"Now the rest... I want them..."

Almost like a servant, the scientist followed his orders and grabbed the last of them, each screaming with fear as they were fed to this bully with a bloodlust. Swishing and swashing their tiny figures inside his mouth, he took the rest in and ate them in a heartbeat. The scientist patted his belly gently, hearing faint screams from the inside.

"Well that's one way of getting rid of some bad experiments," he said with a wicked grin.

"Yeah, but they were pretty tasty..."

"But now it's time we begin!"

The scientist made his way to a control box, which controlled the giant ray on the ceiling. He maneuvered a switch, which would shift the ray into Aaron's direction. He made sure everything was up to power and flicked a few switches to begin the process.

"Are you ready, my boy?"

"Is this going to hurt," asked Aaron.

"Not really, you should feel a slight tingle."

With that, the scientist pressed a big red button, which caused the ray to glow in a bright red color and shot a beam into Aaron's chest. The beam began to affect his whole body, as he began to feel a tingle within his system. It was like a slight shudder that crept within his skin, more intense than goosebumps. The feeling spread throughout his body as it began to feel a little intense.

As the beam lingered on, Aaron felt his body begin to grow. His skin stretched and his body inched higher. The straps around his waist began to feel tighter as he grew. Eventually, his body grew too big for it and the straps snapped off instantly. Aaron could have easily left by now, but the feeling of the beam was too good to pass up, as he laid on the table and let the beam do its work.

"This is so good," he moaned as he grew bigger.

"That's good," replied the scientist, "Bigger is always better!"

Aaron smiled as he grew taller, as his head began to hang off the table. He sat up and continued to let the beam make him grow, as he inched higher and higher, slowly getting to the ceiling. The feeling of growth gave him an overwhelming and invigorating sensation. And eating the shrunken victims made him feel so much better than he ever felt before. His mind began to wonder how it would be to eat normal sized people at such an enormous height. The mere thought excited him as he chuckled to himself.

Suddenly, a loud CRACK was heard as the table finally gave way from Aaron's growing figure, causing him to fall on his ass. But the beam was still making him grow taller, so it didn't bother him at all. But soon he was reaching the ceiling as he was sitting on the floor.

"Alright, time to take a break," said the scientist as he pressed the button again.

The beam from the ray evaporated and the machine was instantly turned off. Aaron's growth slowed down, but not before he hit his head on the ceiling, arching his head down slightly. Aaron felt the quivering cease as he regained his senses and looked down at his new surroundings. If he had to guess, he had to be about 15 feet tall. He was cramped inside the small room with the mad scientist standing right between his legs, looking up at him with admiration and accomplishment.

"My boy," he began, "You are just one step towards total control. With my technology and guidance, along with your ever-growing figure and hunger for weak prey, we'll have those beneath us under our thumbs, figuratively and literally!"

Aaron smiled at the idea as he looked over his new gigantic form, then looked back down at the mad scientist.
1121.title: Mad Science

choices: Avoid the risk: swallow the scientist
Take the risk: keep him as a devil on Aaron’s shoulder
11212.content:
Aaron did his best to stretch in the tight space and then rubbed his pudgy belly. After a few seconds, he realized with disappointment that he couldn’t really feel the shrunken people he’d swallowed moving inside him anymore. Even if they were still alive, they were specks inside his cavernous stomach now. He jutted out his lip, pouting.

“Well, shall we, my boy? I have a loading dock in the back that should be big enough for you to squeeze out through. Then we’ll take a little walk, so you can stretch your legs a bit – among other parts of your body, if you’re hungry enough,” the scientist chuckled nasally.

“Hmm,” Aaron said loudly in the tight space, rubbing his chubby chin. “I don’t know. You said we need to use my hunger for weaklings as part of the plan, right? I don’t want to sell myself short, but I’m not sure I’m quite big enough to gulp people down, and I’d love to keep doing that now that I got to try it for real. How about you make me a bit bigger before we begin?”

As long as he’s got that ray Aaron thought he could shrink me back down to size anytime he wants. He seems to want me to eat people, but I don’t trust this guy as far as I can throw him – though I guess that’s pretty far now Aaron smiled to himself.

“Well,” the scientist began hesitantly, “I suppose I could. It will be pretty damaging to my lab, but my lab’s insured well enough, and that that sort of thing may not matter if we’re headed towards world domination.”

“Then let’s get back to the growing! It felt great, doc.” The scientist saw Aaron lick his lips to clear up excess drool. He grinned evilly, knowing that Aaron was thinking about more than how good growing feels.

The scientist shrugged, adjusted some dials on his shrink ray, and aimed at Aaron. “Very well, a little more height. But then you have to agree to start wreaking some world-terrifying havoc for me.”

“Absolutely. I can’t wait!” Aaron responded. “You could say I’ve got an appetite for destruction.” Aaron laughed at his own joke, but the humor was made more unsettling as it was punctuated with a deep growl from his belly.

“A few more feet coming up, then,” the scientist said as the beam his Aaron. Aaron moaned and nearly giggled in delight as he felt his body ripple and stretch when the mean consumed him. He braced against the roof of the lab and used the force of his growth to break through it, leaving him plenty of room to expand.
After a few moment, the scientist stopped the beam and Aaron stood an even more impressive 25 feet tall. He rubbed his hands all over his body, taking great pleasure in feeling his immense form: confirming that it was all real. Then Aaron looked down at the scientist (who seemed quite excited, too) and Aaron faked a yawn. He hoped it seemed like a harmless enough gesture, but what he was really testing was how wide his mouth could open at this size. Covering his mouth with his hand, he was pleased to see he could open nearly as wide as the height of his hand. Then, content to appear a little more menacing, he snatched up the scientist and brought him up to eye level. Compared to the size of Aaron’s hand, he was confident he was big enough to fit this full-grown adult in his mouth is he so chose. He was a bit bigger than the shrunken people he had gulped down earlier, but Aaron was confident the scientist wouldn’t prove to be too challenging.

But now the question was, should he really swallow the scientist? Aaron couldn’t wait to feel a full-grown human inside of him, but the scientist seemed to have no objections to him going out and experiencing that: he seemed to welcome it, even. On the other hand, the scientist was the only one who would know how to shrink him back down – or even shrink him smaller than his original size. Could he take the risk of that stopping his gluttonous, dominating enjoyment? He had to weigh the scientist’s worth against his risks (and against Aaron’s impatience to try swallowing a normal human for the first time). After a moment of consideration, Aaron decided to…
11212.title: Aaron wants to grow more first

His dream goes into a completely different direction, making things interesting.
The dream is fading away. He's waking up.
113.content:
Aaron's hand lied on top of his big belly, which was super full from the massive amount of eating he has done all day. A big carb-loader of a breakfast, numerous sandwiches for lunch, a big pasta dinner, and numerous amounts of snacking in between each meal. All that made his stomach look large and globular. And it just made him feel more accomplished with his gluttony.

But as he slept, he began to toss and turn. His belly was a tad uncomfortable with his massive glutting. As he rocked back and forth, his belly sloshed and rolled with him. Even as he slept, he heard voices in his head, almost like his subconscious was full of people talking to him.

You have to stop eating, Aaron

You're turning into a fat pig

You're gonna explode if you keep eating

You're gonna grow too big to fit into anything

The voices began to stop once he woke up. But instead of waking up in his bed, he found himself in the kitchen, sitting at the table. He saw his mother, who certainly had an obese figure, walk up to him with a plate full of breakfast; pancakes, toast, bacon, sausages, and eggs. She placed it right in front of him, allowing him to feast.

He began to devour the meal, almost like it was nothing. Crumbs and grease were all over his lips as he ate, until he licked them off. Every bit of food began to disappear into his fat belly, which began to look bigger and tighter. But it hardly stopped him, he wanted to enjoy his meal.

He held his belly in satisfaction, as he had practically and literally licked the tray clean. But deep down, he still felt hungry. Before he could even say anything, his mother came back out with a large jug of orange juice and a cup. He grabbed the jug from her and began to chug it down. As he drank, his belly began to swell out further, his navel fully exposed with his belly slowly following.

After a loud burp, he finally finished the whole jug of juice. He held his belly again, feeling how much larger and tighter it was than before. But he still wasn't satisfied... In fact, he was still hungry...

"Mom," he said, "I'm still hungry."

His mother leaned down and rubbed his belly gently.

"Oh sweetie," she said, "you've certainly got a good appetite. After all, you're a growing boy."

Before she could say anything else, Aaron felt his body shake and shudder slightly. His body began to stretch from his belly and all over the rest of his body. He rose slightly higher in his seat, while his belly began to push out further, moving the table in the process. He was shocked at first, but then he began to smile at his new figure. His mother had barely noticed his changes and continued to speak.

"And growing boys need to grow bigger..."

Soon, his body began to grow bigger and fatter...

"And bigger..."

His belly rose outward as his head rose up higher...

"And bigger and--"

A loud THUD was heard, as Aaron's mother looked to see her son looking fatter and taller than before, his head now bumped up against the ceiling while his belly was completely exposed. And all he had to show for it was a big smile across his fat face.
113.title: Nighty Nightmare? Not Likely!

choices: Aaron's train of thought is broken as he wakes up
1131.content:
Aaron's grin was momentarily broken by a loud belch. Aaron then gave his towering belly a couple loving, forceful pats. He looked down at his mother, who now only reached his waist.

"Oh my special little guy!" his mother exclaimed, "I knew you'd be the one to be able to grow! I just knew you'd be the one who could do all the things I wish I could!" The machinery behind his dream was clearly drawing inspiration from his inflated sense of importance.

Aaron's face pinched in confusion, "Huh?" was all the fat boy managed to get out.

"Well, baby, you've seen that momma likes to eat," she punctuated this by smacking her own obese middle. "but my belly just can't hold everything I want to put in it. I used to imagine all the fun things I would eat if I could just grow bigger, and here you are, able to live out my fantasies!"

His mother reached up and caressed the underside of the massive belly that jutted out above her. "I'm so proud, sweetie! It couldn't have happened to a more deserving, more perfect boy!"

Aaron knew he was special, and he loved being doted upon (not to mention he loved to eat). He liked where this was headed. His bulbous gut growled in agreement.

"Sounds like you wanna eat some more," his mother noted, proudly. "You want momma to keep getting you food?"

"More food," Aaron said, quietly at first, before demanding more loudly: "more food!"

"Whatever my baby wants!"

His mother then hurried around the kitchen, scooping up every piece of food she could find. In this dream, their cabinets and fridge seemed to hold far, far more food than they really could. His mother dumped armful after armful (mere handfuls to Aaron) into the fat boys waiting palms. The instant he had food in hand, it was shoved into his eager mouth. Soon, to accelerate his growth even more, he leaned over and had his mother drop food into his mouth between each handful he shoved in himself. As Aaron grew, he stopped bothering to chew and just swallowed anything that entered his mouth. Soon, they were scrapping together the last few pieces of food from the kitchen (a large turkey, which Aaron swallowed whole - including the bones and the metal pan it came in) into his smacking lips.

Each morsel of food fueled his growth, and Aaron continued to expand upward and outward. The ceiling groaned and cracked as he kept growing and pressing against it. Finally, with one major spike of growth, Aaron broke through not only the ceiling, but the roof, too. When the growth finished, his head and shoulders rose above the roof, and his belly and backside had expanded so much that they were nearly the width of the house.

Aaron's stomach rumbled angrily. "More food!" he demanded again.

"I'm sorry, baby," his mother said, "that's all the food we have. And anyhow, a measly turkey wouldn't fill you up now, would it?" She smiled up at him adoringly. "That means you'll have to get creative, baby. Now's your chance to eat all the things I wish I could!"

Aaron drummed his fingers on his giant girth for a moment. Then, on an impulse, he leaned over and ripped the oak tree out of their yard. Aaron stuffed it deep into his mouth and pulled it back out, stripped of all its leaves. He munched the leaves for a moment, and gulped down the pulp. That seemed to do nothing for his voracious belly, so he shrugged and slid the rest of the tree (branches and all) down his throat, whole. Its rigid, lumpy shape hurt his stomach, but Aaron also found himself enjoying the feeling of having something large and obviously not-normal-food shaped in his tummy.

"That's it, baby!" his mother cheered. "Eat everything you'd like, honey. It's all for you. Eat to your heart's contents and keep getting bigger like the growing boy you are."

Aaron let out another small burp and massaged his stomach, nodding in agreement with his mother. He then bent over, searching for more food, and licked his lips with excitement as he thought about eating...
1131.title: Dream Aaron outgrows the house

11312.content:
So many new options were open to Aaron. So much to eat. Driven by his demanding, expanding middle and his mother's encouragement, he knew he was going to keep eating and growing. But, normal food was too puny for him now. He'd have to try something new.

Aaron glanced around their yard and the house with a fierce, hungry glint in his eye. He was debating what to eat first. In the end, his stomach answered for him. As his eyes swept back over the house, his belly let out an eager groan when his gazed stopped momentarily on his mother.

Not stopping to think just yet, Aaron bent down and (with some difficulty in navigating around his round tummy) picked up his mom and brought her to face level.

I would eat her he thought with rabid excitement. But should I? She's been feeding me all morning; she helped this happen. He then took a strong sniff of his mother; she felt a rush of air sweep from below and upwards towards her little boy's nostrils. Well, there is one way she could keep feeding me.

"Baby," his mother began, nervously, "what are you-"

She was cut off as Aaron's massive, slimy tongue ran across her body. When his tongue retracted and she was pulled away from his mouth, she watched her son lick his lips and again heard that demanding growl from below. At least in this dream world, she tasted delicious.

"It's okay baby. You can do it. It's a momma's job to help her little boy grow up big and strong. And this way I'll always be with you, right?"

Aaron was half-listening. Ever since he'd embraced his bully side, what other people wanted didn't matter much to him. Still, he lover his mother; she'd been so good to him. But not it sounded like she wanted him to do it. Who was he to refuse his mother?

His mind made up, and his stomach cramping from hunger, he lifted her back to his slips and slid her inside. She was still relatively big; it was like cramming a 6" candy bar in his mouth. Thankfully, he'd done exactly that before, and in the dream all restrictions seemed to be gone anyhow.

Aaron rolled her around in his mouth, savoring her meaty, salty flavor. From inside his mouth, he faintly heard his mother say, "That's it! Eat up, baby! Become the strong boy you are meant to be!"

That was all the encouragement he needed. Aaron tilted his head back and rolled his tongue towards the dark pit of his throat. Once she hit the back of his mouth, Aaron gave a strong gulp. A painful, massive lump slid down his fat neck. He could clearly feel its descent, and he could even tell it was moving. After a few seconds, she landed in his stomach. Aaron watched it jiggle with her arrival, and it was accompanied by a cartoonish BOING.

He rubbed over his doughy stomach, digging his fingers deep into his fat flesh to find some sign of his mother. When his mother felt his fingers poke against her from the outside, she eagerly moved to the stomach walls and began rubbing back, not unlike how she rubbed his belly less than an hour ago before his first growth spurt. Aaron murred with pleasure as he felt his mother move inside of him, and his pleasure increased when she began to rub his stomach walls.

Having swallowed a whole human being - and his mother of all people - Aaron's first thoughts weren't guilt, or love, or even gratitude for her sacrifice. No, his first thought was I can't wait to show everyone at school! His stomach grumbled in agreement.
__

Outside the dream, Aaron's fat (but not truly gigantic) belly was hard at work breaking down all of the food he had stuffed himself with. However, Aaron sweated more than usual, and his stomach rumbled more forcefully, after this dream's most recent shift. He was definitely going to wake up hungry.
__

Back in the dream, Aaron...
11312.title: Dreams about swallowing his mother

choices: Aaron wants to have more fun with her.
Aaron decides to eat her, but slowly enjoys it.
113121.content:
Aaron's belly grumbled again, giving him the sign to eat again. And with his newfound figure, it was inevitable that he was going to eat whatever he wants. No one was going to stop him, no one could ever stop him. He was larger than life and he was going to enjoy every minute of it.

As he looked around his neighborhood, he stopped to smell something. An enjoyable aroma from his neighbors. He sneaked over and briefly took a glance to see a party going on in his neighbors' backyard. And not just any party; a barbecue pool party.

Numerous children and adults were lounging and playing all around the backyard. Most of the kids were playing in the above-ground pool having fun, while the adults were lounging around the patio, relaxing and eating.

And in Aaron's eyes, it was his own personal smorgasbord.

He hoisted his fat belly and began to walk into the backyard. He made his presence known by knocking over the large oak tree that was by the gate of the backyard. Everyone stopped what they were doing and looked at the towering, obese child that stood before them.

"Howdy neighbors," Aaron said as his mouth began to water, "Having a barbecue without inviting me? You should know better... But that's alright. I have plenty to eat right here!"

Without hesitating, Aaron grabbed the pool filled with children and began to chug it all down like it was a bowl of soup. Try as they could, but they couldn't hold on long enough to survive the boy's giant hunger, as they all fell into his mouth and swallowed whole. And it only made Aaron happy, as his belly began to expand from the kids and the water, distending out further. And just for good measure, he even munched away the pool itself like it was a taco bowl.

The people that were still below the boy's girth were scrambling and screaming, trying to run from the monstrous kid. But even they couldn't escape his gluttonous wrath, as he began to grab one person at a time.

Chelsea Carmichael was the first to be taken by Aaron. The 30-something blonde was once a proud mother of four children, with a sexy hourglass figure to boot. But now with her children and even her nieces and nephews all guzzled down by the giant, she is at his mercy.

Aaron looked over this blonde bombshell with admiration. He always thought she was a sexy woman. And seeing her in his own fat hand made him more intimidating and powerful. He held her close to his face, her cleavage bouncing on his fat thumb.

"You know, I always had a crush on you," he said as his fat cheeks blushed.

All Chelsea could do was stare up at him with fear. She could die just for saying the wrong things to him, so she held her tongue.

________

Back in reality, Aaron's belly was slowly shrinking, digesting everything he ate. But during the digestion, his body began to change slightly. His body shuddered slightly and began to stretch out slowly.

His legs and feet began to reach towards the end of the bed, while his head began to fill up his pillow while reaching more of the head of the frame. His comforter could hardly cover his fat frame before, now it seems to struggle to keep his developing figure.

Despite the changes, he was feeling more relaxed as he continued to dream on.

________

Back in Aaron's dream, he was still holding onto Chelsea in his hand, still ogling her.

What will happen next?
113121.title: Family Barbecue For a Big Boy

choices: The dream continues and Aaron makes his way to a grocery store
Aaron's belly is too insistent and he wakes up to find he had grown
1131212.content:
Aaron always got excited when he got to admire Chelsea's curvaceous body, but now that excitement was taken to a new level. Ever since he got fat and started using it to push other kids around, his arrogance and sense of power had grown. Now, he towered over even the adults, and they couldn't do anything to stop him. Neither could Chelsea as Aaron used his thumb to massage her breasts, ripping off her skimpy bikini in the process. His other hand idly rubbed his bloated stomach, feeling the water and children inside it slosh around.

As he had with his mother, not long ago, Aaron brought Chelsea up to his face and took in a strong sniff, absorbing her scent. She had the same meaty, salty scent, but there was something more there, too. Chelsea had used a cocoa butter-scented sunscreen; she smelled like chocolate. It was like she wanted him to eat her. Until he smelled her, he wasn't sure whether he wanted to eat her, but now his mind was made up.

Aaron slid his hand further down her hourglass body until one of his fat fingers was in place to snap off her bikini bottom with virtually no effort. Now his biggest crush was naked, gripped in his hand, and completely at his mercy. He was already drooling.

Aaron extended his tongue and began licking all over Chelsea's body. Particularly when he had a crush on her, he was eager to lick and taste her in ways he wouldn't have licked his mother. His slimy tongue was now so big that it was nearly 2/3 as big as Chelsea's entire body. He used the tip of his tongue to circle around her sizeable breast, playing with each one, even though they were only the size of blueberries compared to him. She tasted wonderful, just how he hoped: it was like chocolate-glazed bacon.

Chelsea's world was tilted on its side as Aaron positioned her to start sliding into his mouth. He opened wide and extended his tongue, ready to accept his tastiest meal yet. As she was placed onto his warm, wet tongue, she could smell the gurgling pit of his stomach wafting up his throat. It smelled like meat and sugar and chlorine. Aaron slid his hand down her body as his tongue took over, though he made sure to stop to squeeze and knead her meaty butt. Chelsea screamed and struggled in terror, but she could do nothing to overpower the massive, hungry boy.

Once he had her just by her ankles, Aaron began dragging her in and out of his mouth, feeling her breasts and butt rub back and forth throughout his mouth. He couldn't help but moan around the blonde woman's body. This was the most pleasurable experience of his life - at least in the dream: he had a bloated belly, he was bigger than anyone had ever been, he was getting to have his way with his biggest crush (and she tasted and felt amazing), and he had an incredible rush of power knowing that the sloshing in his belly was due to having greedily devoured other kids, and that they would soon be joined by their mother and so, so many others.

Soon, his belly rumbled, demanding the delicious morsel that was trapped in his mouth. He was never one to refuse his hunger. So, with a last swirl of his tongue around her body, he began pushing her to the back of his mouth. He wanted to savor this part of the experience, too, so he pushed her in slowly, giving only small swallows as she began to enter his throat. He nearly gagged on her breasts as they sank into him, but he was determined to have this blonde beauty in his belly. He kept pushing and swallowing as her inevitable descent brought her deeper and deeper into the titanic bully. The hardest part of swallowing her was her wide hips, but Aaron was not one to stop eating, particularly when it was a morsel he craved so deeply.

Finally, Aaron pushed Chelsea's feet deep into his mouth and he took the final swallows, pushing her sexy body down into his gut. Aaron moaned in pleasure, and the moans intensified when he felt Chelsea splash into his belly, joining her kids, his mother, piles of food, and a munched up pool.

"Oh god, Mrs. Carmichael!" Aaron exclaimed as he salaciously rubbed his bloated middle, "That was amazing! You taste so good, and I just love having you inside of me."

Aaron took a few moments to play with his belly: rubbing it, poking it, patting it, and lifting/dropping it. As his belly sloshed and glorped, he could feel hard shapes collide with this stomach walls while the people inside were tossed around.

The other adults at the party were already panicking and trying to escape. Many took this opportunity to flee from the yard. When Aaron noticed this, he went after them. The giant boy could travel much fast than they could, and he scooped up person after person, gulping them down with no hesitation. He didn't savor these adults like he had savored Chelsea. Now all he wanted was food. More food! Wiggling, weeping food!
__

In time with the gulping in his dream, his stomach gurgled and groaned: it seemed to be taking as much pleasure in this dream as the rest of Aaron's body was.
He continued to stretch outward, getting taller and fatter as his body broke down his binge.

As his stomach began to empty, it also began to growl more desperately. Dream food was all well and good, but not it needed more. More than ever, in fact. His stomach was bigger than it had ever been, and it wanted to be stuffed with more food - and more kinds of food - than ever before. The grumbling would soon demand Aaron's attention.

What happens next?

Aaron continued to gobble down everyone in his sight. People who were trying to escape found themselves caught within the fat boy's grasp. While his mother and Chelsea were slightly troublesome to swallow before, everyone else he had swallowed were a little easier to devour. One by one, their screams faded into his throat, plummeting down into his big belly.

Unfortunately for Aaron, the rest of the party-goers ran off before he could finish them off. All that was left was the deluxe grill cooking the food. He picked it up and swallowed it whole, as well as the rest of the food within the backyard. They were tiny morsels to him, but they still tasted good.

Despite the stuffing and his belly getting larger, he was still hungry...

"More food," he bellowed as he held his belly, "More food!"

He stomped away from the neighborhood and began to walk around town. The surviving party-goers ran out and tried to warn everyone about the giant obese kid coming down the street, but Aaron made his presence known from his bellowing belly sticking out and his heavy footsteps getting closer to the busy town.

He marveled at the sight of the town from his large height. So many stores to devour, so many people to eat as well. But the one place that caught his eye was the super market dead center of it all. He always enjoyed visiting the store, grabbing every piece of fattening goodies to stuff himself with when he was smaller. Now he was going to clear out everything inside.

The people inside Save 'n Shop were casually shopping or working, not knowing the impending doom making his way onto the store. Suddenly, the crowd began to feel short quakes getting closer and closer. Before they knew it, a fat hand began to tear off the roof of the market, revealing to be an obese boy, who began to eat the roof like large graham crackers.

Aaron munched away the roof like it was nothing but a snack, then began to reach inside to eat to his heart and gut's content. Even if the food was too small for him now, they certainly wouldn't be put to waste. Snack foods, baked treats, deli meats, fresh fish, even fruits and vegetables were gobbled up by the fat giant.

And in between his snacking, he grabbed various amounts of people in his fat hands, sucking them down for his insatiable belly. Much like his neighborhood, the people ran screaming in terror. But they were still no match for Aaron and his appetite. One by one, people vanished into his gut, as it began to grow bigger and fatter. Men, women, children, it was all fair game.

As he grabbed the last few he could grab onto, he swallowed each of them one at a time, treating them like candy rather than people. After swallowing the last man he could grab, his belly began to gurgle and groan. Before he could do anything else, he felt his body begin to grow again.

His body looked slightly fatter, but his height was the most noticeable change, as he grew taller and higher. The feeling of growing higher was sensational, he couldn't help but enjoy the feeling as he grow larger.

__________

In the real world, Aaron's figure was still growing bigger and fatter, as his bed was creaking from his new mass. Between his fat figure and growing height, he looked like a new person; fatter and more intimidating.

And all he could do was smile, as his dreams made him feel good.

"Mmm... bigger," he moaned in his sleep, "I wanna be bigger..."

Bigger is what he got...

His stomach, however, needed to be satisfied as well. With everything digested, his larger figure needed to be refueled. It growled loudly like a wild animal, begging and demanding for more food.

113121211.content:
In his dream, Aaron was now so tall that the supermarket only came up to his waist. He rubbed over his large belly with pride. Despite the layers of fat, he could feel the squirming mass of people, struggling inside his gut amidst the piles of food. Despite the pleasure he felt, his stomach's growling was more painful than before. It was almost like his belly was empty, not full. Aaron shrugged it off and stomped away from the supermarket, scooping up and swallowing a couple cars (one with people still inside) as he left the parking lot.

Just across the street, Aaron saw a camera crew and a reporter. The first thing he heard was "Oh no! He's coming this way. Quick, get a shot of his stomach. Can you see it moving? My god, are they still alive in there?!"

But that was the last thing the reporter ever said. With surprising speed (aided by his immense size) Aaron stopped over and scooped both her and the cameraman up. First, he turned to the cameraman, "Watch this!" Aaron announced, eagerly. He then opened his mouth wide, aiming it towards the camera, and shoved the reporter inside. At his increased height, it was a simple matter to swallow her whole, and the camera caught it all.

Aaron patted his belly lovingly as the reporter slid into it. To the cameraman, the gentle pats were boomingly loud.

"Well," Aaron said, matter-of-factly, "that's what's going to happen to you all. Thought I'd give you a preview. Everyone belongs to me now, and there's nothing you can do. You're all going to end up in here." Aaron moved the cameraman down to his belly, where the camera's mic could clearly pick up screaming and begging underneath all the fat, occasionally eclipsed by a menacing gurgle as the people were digested alive.

"Oh, I can show you even more than that," Aaron said excitedly. Then, in an instant, Aaron tossed the cameraman and camera down his throat. He then burped, sucking most of the oxygen out of his stomach. "Make sure to keep that camera rolling."

Aaron then began to walk off when he was suddenly struck with a huge hunger pang. It made him double over and nearly fall to the ground. Then -

__

Then Aaron woke up.

It had all been a dream. He shouted in anger. Why couldn't it be real?! Growing and eating like that felt so wonderful, so right. And the dream was so realistic, it was like he could still feel himself growing.

Then he stopped. He could feel himself growing! It was a tiny growth at the moment, but he saw that he had grown a lot as he slept. He had to be at least 3 feet taller! He didn't even fit in his bed anymore. And just as wonderful: he had gotten a lot fatter, too.

Now the hunger pangs made sense: his real belly had digested everything he stuffed in it (not to mention it was now more spacious than before), and it was insistently demanding to be stuffed once more.

Aaron was happy to oblige it. He had developed a real passion for eating. And now, he wondered with giddy excitement, maybe that love of eating could allow him to bully people in new and exciting ways?

Next...

7:58 am. The sun was shining bright in the morning. All was peaceful within the neighborhood. All was peaceful except in the Beltzer residence...

Young Aaron hoisted his fat figure up from his nearly demolished bed, which had suffered from holding the bully's new taller and fatter figure. He was nearly hitting the ceiling with his new height and his waistline looked a little too big to fit through the door. But he knew he had to get out sooner or later. But before he could do anything, someone was opening the door.

"Aaron, sweetie, it's time to get u--"

Aaron's mother, a heavy set woman stopped midway to see a large, fatter figure standing tall about her. She looked up and up to see it was her own son, his newfound girth nearly blocking her view of her son's fatter face, which smiled at her sight.

"Hi mom," he said nonchalantly, "What's for breakfast? I'm starving!"

His mother snapped out of her trance and looked up at her son again.

"Ohh yes, my big boy," she said, now starting to feel happier than before, "I made a big meal for you. But I'm not sure it'll be big enough for you now..."

"Well see about that," he replied, as he pushed her out of the room with his belly.

His mother backed away immediately, then saw her son squeeze within the door frame. His belly was all the way out, but his wider figure was still stuck. He hoisted and heaved out as much as he could, using his larger arms to force his way out. Suddenly, with a slight creak and a loud RIP!, he broke through with the door frame still stuck on his figure.

His mother cautiously walked downstairs into the kitchen, as his larger son followed in behind, creaking down the steps. He tossed the remnants of the frame behind him, as he didn't want to have that stick to him all day.

His mother pulled out a tray of food, filled with more food than what he was served in his dream; pancakes, scrapple, toast, turkey and pork bacon, sausage, a large bowl of Cap'n Crunch, a big croissant, a chocolate frosted donut, a large jug of orange juice, and a tall glass of chocolate milk.

Aaron sat in the small chair and drooled at the sight and his stomach growled in hunger. The signal was good enough to tell him he was ready to eat.

And eat he did, as he scarfed down the pancakes like a madman. It was smaller to him, but was still good enough for him to eat, savoring the buttermilk flavor with the mixture of syrup and butter. After that, he moved onto the bacon and sausage, porking out on them like no tomorrow. Then the bowl of cereal was next, as he stirred it all up until it was soggy enough to swallow whole, milk and all. The croissant was nice and flaky for him to devour, as well as the donut with the chocolate glaze. Then he took the pitcher and guzzled it all down, leaving the jug empty. Catching his breath, he then swallowed down the glass of chocolate milk.

Fifteen minutes. It took fifteen minutes for the young boy to eat it all. To anyone else it would take a while. But this fat giant ate it all sooner than anyone else could do so. He rubbed his belly, which was full of all that food. Full as it was, it was hardly finished. In fact, he felt like there was still room inside... A lot more room...

"I'm still hungry," he said out loud.

He looked down at his mother, who was looking at him with concern.

"More food," he demanded, "More food!"

"Ohh don't worry baby," she said in a calm manner, "I have some cinnamon buns in the oven now and they're just about done."

The timer on the over dinged loud enough to know that she was right. She leaned down and pulled out a large tray filled with cinnamon buns, which looked larger than average cinnamon buns. She spread the icing all over them, making sure to use it all up just for her son. Just before she could hand it to him, Aaron grabbed the tray right out of her hands and the cloth. Even though it was scorching hot, Aaron was hardly phased by the heat of the tray. And it didn't stop him from scooping and gobbling the buns down.

One by one, the cinnamon buns were being devoured by the behemoth of a bully. All his mother could do was stare in awe and marvel at the sight of her son, looking like mountain of a man. Soon after, Aaron found himself licking the tray clean of the buns and icing.

What will this obese bison of a bully do now?

113121211132.content:
Aaron couldn’t take the hunger anymore. Spoiled brat that he is, Aaron wasn’t used to enduring the normal kind of hunger, but this was far beyond ordinary. His stomach felt like it was caving in. The tree had been better than nothing, but vegetables never made him full. He wanted…

Meat. No food satisfied his hunger better than meat. For Aaron, his lust for food was closely intertwined with his other lusts (he’s an adolescent boy, after all), and a perfect storm of greedy thoughts aligned, giving Aaron an idea. As his mind drifted to imagining sexy Mrs. Carmichael, as it so often did, his desperation and his desire caused him to suddenly remember his dream. In the dream, she had felt so good in his stomach, so satisfying. Sure, it was a dream, and he didn’t know it if would actually satisfy him that much in reality, but there was only one way to be sure.

His dream started off with him swallowing his mother. She had wanted him to swallow her, he reminded himself. Why not begin there? He looked down at his mother, eyes burning with desire. He liked his lips lustily and his belly let out a thunderous, greedy growl.

“Don’t worry baby. We’ll - I’ll find more food for you. I promise,” his mother pleaded, trying to sound confident.

She knew that look in his eye; it was the look he would have right before he would lose control and devour whatever was in front of him. This time it was her. Between that, him licking his lips, and the rumbling from his gut, she knew exactly what he wanted. She was terrified, imagining the possibility, but she couldn’t deny there was part of her that was excited, too. She always dreamed about the day her boy would grow up big and strong - this just wasn’t what she had in mind. But an ordinary transition to adulthood seemed out of the question now. Would her little boy really eat someone? The idea of being safe and warm inside him, drifting off while listening to his heartbeat, and feeding him (the activity he enjoyed most) all at once was kind of appealing. Then again, a darker part of her mind spoke up to add that it might be enjoyable to watch him gobble up some of the nosey, judgmental neighbors. On her angrier days, when she gave up her own food in order to feed Aaron, she sometimes dreamed about different ways to make them disappear. Now she almost regretted not daydreaming about making them disappear by feeding Aaron...or even satisfying her own hunger.

“Baby, honey. How about the neighbor’s house?” she timidly suggested. “I’m sure they have lots of - of f-food fo you.”

Aaron didn’t need to be told twice. He immediately stomped through what remained of their house and over to their next-door neighbors, the Ashers. Aaron ripped off the roof as if tearing into a package. By luck, he was staring right into their kitchen. His stomach demanded satisfaction, so he hoisted their refrigerator and poured its contents into his mouth, packages and all. Next was their cabinets. The 5 members of the Asher family, who had gathered for brunch, watched in paralyzed horror as the obese bully from next door ripped their cabinets off the wall, swallowed their contents, and them munched up the cabinets themselves.

“Ugh!” Aaron moaned. “More food. More food!”

Without really planning it, Aaron grabbed the smallest Asher girl: ten years old with curly, black hair and glasses. Commanded by his stomach to fill it with anything he could grab, and unconsciously drawing inspiration from his dream, Aaron shoved her into his mouth headfirst. He rolled her around on his tongue, savoring his first taste of a human, before his impatient stomach drove him to cram her into his throat and swallow. Aaron gagged a little, but was surprised by how easily she actually went down. After a slow descent of a couple seconds, he felt her plop into her new, fleshy home.

Her family, who had watched in helpless terror, saw the outline of their youngest child slide down his fat neck and disappear behind his collarbone before landing in his belly with enough force to make it jiggle. Now they were driven into action and tried to flee from the kitchen. Aaron dove after them, grabbing the two parents and trapping the other two children with his fat form. He didn’t take his time with the remaining family; he was far too hungry and couldn’t wait to feel them all inside him.

Aaron’s mother watched in horror and excitement - maybe even with a twinge of jealousy - as her little boy swallowed their neighbors one after another. His belly grew larger and larger and he swallow each person. She hoped it would finally satisfy him. She didn’t want to think what would happen if he kept eating and growing (or did she?). Finally, the last pair of legs disappeared between his massive lips. He gave a mighty gulp, the the Ashers were now nothing but future fat on his fantastic frame.

“Oh, the tasted so good, mom” Aaron called out as he played with his stomach: poking, prodding, and squishing it to try to feel the humans trapped inside. “This is the most amazing feeling ever!” It was even better than in his dream; both the rush of power and the tickling, vibrating sensations of them panicking inside him were stronger than his brain had imagined.

His mother couldn’t help but smile. She loved seeing her boy so happy, though she tried to repress just what made him this happy. At least he’s satisfied, she thought. Then, her blood ran a little colder and her heart began to race once more when she heard:

“I can’t wait to eat more people!”

Olivia says with a wicked smile, and she would do just that by taking herself a picture and smiled for the camera. She clicked it with a flash and almost immediately comes the picture being printed out, letting her to see it for herself. However upon seeing the picture of herself, Olivia looked shock and confused at the same time. Although it is her in the picture, but her body shape did not, and she was massively fatter than her chubby looks before.

“Hmm... no wonder why Logan would ever built a camera to make people fat? But whatever this was intentional or not, he must’ve read my mind already.” Olivia giggled with a bright smile, since she always wanted to be this big, like the picture she had it taken.

It would be a shame if this doesn’t happen in real life. Otherwise, it’s a brilliant picture to have it postered on her bedroom wall, when she gets back home. But as far as the weird looking camera is concerned, she wasn’t sure if she would give it back to Logan now, or save it till later on when she’ll meet him again?

Though she does have some other minds to give this camera another go in different, so she’ll be hoping if Logan didn’t mind having a shot and snap pictures as much to add some collection of her fattening looks with a surprise effects. It would take a while until Olivia thought she would...
121321.title: Olivia Found Some Camera

choices: Food is fuel for the body
122.content: So Olivia will be larger than life. But how will she grow?
122.title: She becomes a giant! [Giantess Growth]

choices: A food item that grew through scientific purposes
1221.content:
Olivia was not in the best of moods. Especially after being dragged to a pointless class trip to a scientific research facility.

The teacher, Miss Hart, had brought her class to a research facility to understand the fundamentals of science. As they approached the large building, Olivia only rolled her eyes at the structure with no enthusiasm whatsoever.

The children boarded off the bus, with Olivia coming off last, heaving her fat figure off while snacking on some Starbursts.

A female scientist in a white coat walked up to the group, wearing small frame glasses and sporting long black hair.

"Welcome to the Gordon Institute of Advanced Neoblastic Technology, or G.I.A.N.T for short," she greeted, "I'm Dr. Alicia Greenwell and I will be your tour guide through this marvelous structure and go over some of our most impressive work we've accomplished over the past 60 years! Any questions before we begin?"

"Yeah, when do we eat," asked Olivia, sticking her flabby arm out.

"Well we will have a large luncheon after the tour. The chefs have prepared a wonderful vegetarian feast for you all!"

Olivia just groaned at the lunch idea. Vegetables?! Who wants to eat lousy vegetables?! A girl like her needs some proper nourishment; candy, burgers, fries, chicken, cookies, soda, milkshakes, ice cream. Not some crappy group of greens.

Dr. Greenwell leaded the group to a large theater that had rows and seats made available. Each student took their seat, with Miss Hart taking the front seat, while Olivia sat all the way in the back.

"Before we begin, we will watch a little short film about the history of this institute, as well as the founding father himself, Hershel J. Gordon," said Dr. Greenwell who brought the lights down in the theater.

The theater screen was soon lit up from the projection, prompting the film to begin. An old fanfare theme began to play as the opening titles began to appear.

Gordon Institute of Advanced Neoblastic Technology presents


The History of Hershel J. Gordon and G.I.A.N.T.


After the opening titles, a cartoon light-bulb appeared with white gloves and brown shoes, looking like a character from the 30s or 40s.

"Hello folks," he greeted, "I'm Larry Lightbulb and I'm here to tell you the story of a man and the industry he created; Hershel Gordon and the company he made called G.I.A.N.T.!"

Olivia rolled her eyes as she was about to watch a boring old movie. But she then looked around to make sure no one was near the back exit. This prompted her to slowly escape the tedious boredom and out to find some good food to eat.

As she carefully made her way down the hall, she passed by various rooms where numerous experiments were being conducted. She was hoping a snack room was nearby so she could get something good to eat.

However, she found herself in a particular room where inside she found...
1221.title: Super-Sized Science

choices: ...she started to grow taller, outgrown the building.
...she started to grow little bit taller.
...she takes the ray gun and leaves the room.
12211.content:
Olivia was so much bored, she wanted to find some food by herself, just to keep her trip satisfied to say the least. She was desperate so much, this particular room had caught in the eye. There was of course food on the table, but also there was this small item that clearly looked like some children’s toy gun.

Of course being a curious 12 year old, she would try and look around to see if anyone’s around these parts. Luckily, she didn’t any workers yet, so she sneak in quietly and gets up close to the table and see what it was. She would carry the invention by two hands before seeing a label from what it says in there.

“Hmm... a size ray gun? Now I’m starting to get curious and wonder what this does?” Olivia seems to be interested with this thing already, and that wide grin to her face tells her a story.

There was also some food on the same table too, and it looked like some chocolate bars she loves so much. That made her licked her lips and was curious what would happen if she did activate the trigger on a bar and see happens. Olivia takes aim and zaps right at it, when it took a couple of seconds to see the effects started to take in and then, this happened!

The chocolate bar had suddenly getting bigger, which caught Olivia with amazement in awe, but also feeling more hungry when it was getting some very extra large portions, thanks to the ray gun in hand. It continued to grow, right until it was the size of a plate. Of course, a very amazed bully had her stomach growled and right away decided to unwrap the paper and takes a bite of the newly grown chocolate bar.

“Hmm... this is so good! I can’t wait to eat more of these!” Olivia says in a excited expression and continued on eating in her chubby figure, making her feeding more satisfying than she would thought.

It tastes so good, she would sit on the chair and munching it like she was in a candy store for life. It took 15 minutes to consume the whole bar, and a loud belch made her fully satisfied and patted her chubby belly for her efforts.

“Wow! That feels good!” Olivia makes a review with that grin look on her face again.

Right now, she didn’t realised that time it is, and has to get back to join the rest of the class, before they would know she is gone. So she begins to stand up when...
12211.title: A Size Ray Gun

choices: Her clothes started ripping appart (she grew more)
She stored the ray-gun in her back pocket
122112.content:
As curious as she was, she looked at her figure in the mirror, but did not notice anything different. She headed to the doorway and found her friend Logan. They headed to bus and sat together when Logan noticed something strange.

Logan: 'Is it me or you got somewhat bigger? Like an inch or so?'

This question left Olivia with her mouth wide opened as she felt her clothes a little tighter than usual. She just told Logan: 'Oh it must be your imagination nerd.'

The ride hone went fast and uppon arriving at her home, she entered the bathroom when she realized everything was smaller than it used to be. She stood next to the door and measured herself to find it she is standing at 5'3". She ran to her room with her belly jiggling in the meantime and went to her room to take her clothes off.

She locked her door and found that...
122112.title: ...she started to grow little bit taller.

1221122.content:

Olivia thought about it but brushed the ray off as
the cause of her growth after all she hadn’t used it
on herself yet.


Feeling hungry again though Olivia had an idea.
She had some crumbs in her lunch box.

In moments it began to enlarge in size.

Once it was cookie sized and growing she ate

She zapped her free hand and felt the same
