1221122.title: She stored the ray-gun in her back pocket

choices: Nothing happens yet, but she grows slowly sometime after the trip.
She grows slowly during the trip, but doesn't notice for a while...
She grows fast, beginning to outgrow the buidling.
12213.content:
Inside the room was an obese scientist pouring various chemicals together in a large beaker. Each one was of a different color and each one he poured caused the mixture to change colors frequently. Red turned into green. Green turned into purple. Purple turned into orange. Orange turned into a silver gradient. The gradient changed into a pink. The pink changed into a neon green that would glow like a flashlight.

The scientist stopped the mixtures and brought it towards a bunsen burner, allowing the concoction to boil slightly. The obese scientist smiled as the formula did not erupt of diminish during the burning process. He was about to have his fast food lunch until a female scientist came up from behind him.

"Dr. Kincaid, the professor wants to speak to you," said the female scientist.

The obese scientist took his burger and walked out with the female scientist, munching as he left. As he left, Olivia walked in and looked at the formula burning. The green color looked hypnotic and inviting. But what was more inviting was the large box of fries the scientist left behind. She wasted no time and grabbed a handful of them to scarf down.

As she pulled a couple out, a small fry flung out of her grip and fell into the mixture. She was too busy munching away the fries to notice the small fry soaking in the formula. But as she pigged out, the small fry began to grow bigger. The formula caused the piece to grow bigger inside, looking like a big Swiss army knife and getting bigger.

Olivia was about to finish off the fries but stopped to see the fry stuck inside the formula, now peeking out as it grew. She cautiously picked it out and held it in her hand, looking less like a fry and more like a large deep-fried candy bar. She sniffed it gently, noticing the aroma hasn't changed despite being soaked. Then without thinking, she took a big bite.

Immediately, her taste buds were intoxicated from the taste of the giant french fry. It was like nothing she ever had before. With that, she munched the rest of it down, enthralled with the new taste. She licked her fingers dry from the taste and was still in awe from the flavor. She knew she wanted more.

Taking the fry box, she dumped the last few fries inside the mixture and let them soak inside, as the formula hissed from the amount of fries dumped inside itself. The hissed quieted down as the fries began to grow, getting just as big as the one before. The moment they reached the same size, Olivia grabbed each one and munched them all down like it was nothing. This little girl was certainly a porker.

Within a short while, the fries disappeared into the gut of this overweight girl. She patted her belly gently, feeling really full. Before she decided to leave, she looked at the formula. Despite the amount of fries she dipped into it, it was still stable and still glowing. The hypnotic look came back again as she grew closer to it, reaching out to it. Before she knew it, she was drinking the whole formula down. The taste was overwhelmingly wonderful without having to dip fries into it.

As soon as she drank it, it disappeared into her body. She loved the taste so much that she was desperate enough to lick inside the beaker, getting as much as she could to savor it. But she knew it was all gone. Something like that wasn't bound to last against a greedy little pig like her...

Just as she was about to relax, she heard footsteps coming from the hallway. Quickly, she hoisted herself out and made her way back the way she came in. The two scientists came back into the room and noticed the empty beaker, arguing over what had happened, giving Olivia a little giggle as she listened from behind the door. She walked back over to her group, her belly grumbling slightly from her meal.
12213.title: A Taste to Grow On...

choices: Olivia started to notice her growth
Olivia still didn’t notice her growth
122131.content:
The good news is that Olivia had gotten out of the room where the scientist were looking shocked to see this mess being made, although not knowing it was her that caused it. The bad news however is she had to get back to her fellow classmates to conclude the trip, but luckily it was the end of it and glad this trip with them should be over at least.

Luckily, some effects didn’t came to play as of yet, so she may be lucky not to get find out the cause of these formulas gone missing. It was late in the afternoon, and a 12 year old plump little girl, wanted to have some leisure at least, so she decided to head to her own swimming pool, wearing a one-piece navy swimsuit. Although it felt much tighter than usual, it may because of her weight at this point, so she shrugged it off and ignore the issues at this moment.

Before she would make her way however, her stomach was started to growl with that sound, and now it feels like she is starting to get hungry. Even she had huge portion of the fries earlier on, she couldn’t wait to have some more food when needed them.

“Gee, I bet eating those fries from the Lab certainly makes me feel more hungry as usual.” Olivia had some thoughts and gathered so much snacks from the cupboard.

That’s when she had started to eat as loads as she can, stuffing with chocolate bars and bags of chips in all. It made her feel satisfied and even so when finished up her snacks and let it out a loud belch in comfort, and rubbed her chubby belly.

“Oh, pardon me!” Olivia says to excuse her manners.

It would take a while to cool it down, and so it was time to head to the pool outside. One thing that something may have changed slightly is that it seems as though she’s getting a little taller than usual. Even when she had reached the top cupboard almost easier than usual, and even her head almost reaching the top of the doorframe when coming through. But the question is, does she realised about this?
122131.title: Something Happens Later On

choices: She goes to take a bite of the giant apple
122132.content:
The tour continued as Dr. Greenwell guided Olivia and her classmates through the facility, giving them a look into their oldest works in their scientific history.

"To your right, you will see the very first teleportation unit made back in 1963," said Dr. Greenwell as she pointed to a set of large teleportation chambers that looked almost like something out of a science fiction film. The class looked on with awe, while Olivia looked around in boredom, scratching her belly in the process.

What she didn't know was that her shirt was rising up slowly, nearly exposing her chubby belly, while her sleeves rode up her chubby arms and her pants slid upwards as well. Had she noticed, she would find herself about an inch or two higher than she was before.

But she was oblivious to the changes due to her feeling extremely bored over the tour of the science facility. But soon things changed a little when they came across a large ray gun at pointed at an apple on a large bullseye.

"Here is our size changing ray," said Dr. Greenwell, "It can enlarge or shrink any item with a simple calculation of the machine's console."

"Can it change people's size," asked Olivia enthusiastically.

"Well, we haven't actually tried it before on people, as it could be a tad drastic and disastrous towards anyone hit by the beam. Let's move on, shall we?"

Olivia frowned as Dr. Greenwell moved onward with the tour. Olivia stayed behind as she took a look at the giant apple, which looked about as tall as a refrigerator. She was so focused on eating an apple that large that she hardly noticed her body growing another inch or so. Her belly was now exposed with half of her navel appearing, her sleeves reaching her elbows and her pants riding up by her kneecaps.

"Would I like to eat an apple like that every day," said Olivia as she daydreamed. She imagined herself at about 20 feet tall, snacking on food that would be bigger than she was, making sure she could eat her fill and then some. The sheer sight of her height and gluttony would frighten her fellow classmates and teachers every day as she ate and ate. She even imagined how she could easily pick up a person and threaten to eat them if they didn't obey her every whim. It made her smile wickedly at such an idea.

Just the thought of her being bigger than anyone and eating anything at such a large size drove her crazy. Little did she know that her wish might come sooner than she thought...
122132.title: A New Perspective With Science

choices: Olivia gets lost and finds another experiment…
1221321.content:
Oliva approached the fridge-sized apple, taking in its size and girth with hunger gleaming in her eyes. Though still full from her recent meal of engorged fries, Olivia knew she could manage a quick bite out of the apple. However, she also knew that she had gotten really close to getting caught in that last room and she didn’t want to risk being seen and having her new meal interrupted.

She walked behind the apple, gently squeezing herself between it and the large target on the wall behind it. Her stomach touched lightly upon the apple as she reached up and gently ran her hands along the red skin of the enlarged fruit. It felt nice and firm, perfectly ripened.

Olivia licked her lips, leaned forward and took a big bite out of the apple, her cheeks bulging with its meat as she chewed. Much like with the fries, Olivia’s tongue was awash with the taste of the apple, sweet and crispy with a faint tingle that danced atop her taste buds. She swallowed the piece down, gasping slightly for air and saw some of its juice beginning to slide down along its skin. Eagerly she lapped at it, fighting back a moan of satisfaction as the strange tingling of flavors assaulted her tongue again.

“One quick bite?” Olivia murmured to herself. “Forget that, I’m taking as many as I can!”

And so she did, quickly and ravenously Olivia took bite after bite out of the apple until there was a sizeable chunk missing out of it. It was just large enough for the young girl to fit her head into. That is, if she had any more room in her stomach.

For all that she was a glutton for food, even Olivia had her limit and she had surpassed that quite a few bites ago and the price to be paid was a rather uncomfortable ache that only seemed to build in intensity with every quivering breath she took.

“Oh… oh man… I… I may have overdone it a bit…” Olivia groaned from the feeling of an overstuffed stomach, which now sat entirely free from the confines of her shirt. She squatted down slightly and quickly squeezed her way out from behind the apple.

Once she was out from her little hiding spot, Olivia leaned against the wall and carefully rubbed the taut globe of her stomach, and having such an action be punished by another sharp wave of pain followed by a cacophony of rumbling groans. The flesh of her stomach quivered beneath Olivia’s fingers as it tried its hardest to process how much was churning inside of it.

Caught as she was by the fierceness of her bellyache, Olivia took no notice of the increasing tightness of her clothes, attributing most of it to the increased size of her belly. As for her sandals, well it wouldn’t be the first time her feet had swollen from the pains of enduring a pointless field trip.

“Speaking of those dorks… I better go catch up…” Olivia sighed, wanting nothing more than to take a seat and let her meal digest but she didn’t want to run the risk of getting caught snacking. Her regular punishment at school was bad enough, she didn’t want to imagine what the scientists would try and do to her if they figured out just what she had been eating.

Walking slowly as to not jostle her quaking stomach, Olivia headed out of the room. She stopped at the doorway and peaked out into the hallway looking left and right. “Now where’d those dorks go—AH!”

Olivia’s words were cut short by more rumblings from within the cramped prison of her stomach. She soon felt a bloating sensation in her middle, which was steadily climbing up from the depths and into her throat. Knowing what was coming, Olivia hastily clamped her hands over her mouth and did her best to stifle the belch that threatened to erupt out of her mouth like an exploding volcano.

“BUUUUURRRRRP!!!”

Needless to say, she didn’t quite manage it.

Hastily looking around to see if anyone had heard her, and biting back a snicker at just how loud of a burp it was, her loudest yet, Olivia headed off down the hallway. Relieved by the small decrease of painful pressure in her stomach and distracted with trying to find and catch up with her class, the young girl hadn’t noticed the small changes she had undergone.

How the straps of her sandals were one sharp step away from snapping free entirely with her little piggy toes and a bit of her heels all sticking out from the soles. That her stained shirt was just barely beneath the fatty curves of her chest, or that quite a few seams alongside the outside of her shorts had torn free, letting the meaty flesh of her thighs bulge through the gaps.

Olivia had no idea that her burp was the opening signal to a unique reaction that was taking place within her stomach. The remains of the apple had been doused in the same stomach acids that had eagerly absorbed the growth formula. Despite having been grown earlier that day, the apple was still contaminated by the radiations of the growth ray, energies that were now circulating through Olivia’s systems alongside the formula.
1221321.title: She goes to take a bite of the giant apple

choices: No-one but some lab rats. Really FAT lab rats...
12213212.content:
Ten minutes had passed since Olivia had left the room with the giant apple and she was starting to get worried. Not for possibly getting in trouble for having left her touring classmates behind for she had quite a few viable excuses armed and ready at the tip of her tongue. No, what had the young bully so concerned were the aching pains of her body, most notably in her stomach.

While her earlier burp had relieved some of the pressure inside her belly, it had returned with a fierce and agonizing vengeance that had the young girl stumbling more than once in her increasingly ill-fitting sandals. A cold sweat trailed down from Olivia’s flushed face, a faint tinge of green coloring her plump cheeks. Olivia felt as though the contents within her expanded belly was roiling like a violent sea in a terrible storm.

Her stomach was bloated to its absolute limit, noticeably distended almost like a balloon ready to pop, which Olivia was starting to fear as being a real possibility. Her arms were wrapped underneath her agonized belly, holding it up slightly as it bulged and gurgled ominously. Tears were starting to mix with the sweat pouring down her face as Olivia tried and failed to ignore the worsening ache in her stomach.

Her cheeks reddened further with shame. She hadn’t cried since her early days in kindergarten when other kids tried to pick on her for her weight, but right now she was feeling every bit the scared little, or well, younger kid she was then. She wanted to sit down in her comfy chair at home rather than stumbling around lost and alone in a stupid building, she wanted to be dressed in her oversized pajamas rather than her ill-fitting clothes, but more than that…

“I want my mom—” SNAP. “Eek?!”

The tension on Olivia’s feet suddenly eased as the sandal straps finally gave way and fell free to the floor. Unfortunately, the young bully was in the midst of walking when this happened and couldn’t help but stumble over the smaller flip-flops. With her center of gravity changed from her recent meals and unnoticed growth spurts, Olivia was struggling to remain upright. She reached out to grab a nearby door handle only for the door to swing open, which resulted in Olivia stumbling into the room and crashing to the floor on her butt with the shifting contents of her engorged stomach sending her falling onto her back with her head thumping loudly into the side of a lab table leg.

“Ouch!” Olivia winced as more tears streaming down from her eyes. She rubbed the back of her throbbing head, looking sourly up at the edge of the table when she felt it. Her face tensed and she slowly looked back down towards her engorged stomach.

“Oh…”

The ominous gurgling deep within her belly was quickly turning into a fierce rumble. A massive vibration that spread out to the rest of her body, making her quiver and shake like jelly.

“S-So-Some-b-b-body…” stuttered Olivia, gritting her teeth against the pain, “He-Help m-m-meeee!”

The pressure building deep within her reached its crescendo at last as Olivia tilted her back and released a truly gaseous eruption. It went on for well over a minute as strange, almost animal-like noises joined the bassy bellow that was at perfect odds with Olivia’s childish features. Her face twisted and twitched as though she were under some fiendish possession.

With her body already shaking as it was before and throughout her burp, Olivia never noticed that the room, and by extension the whole floor of the building, was actually shaking as well. So much so in fact that a precariously placed beaker containing a viscously glowing liquid was trembling closer and closer to the table’s edge, just above Olivia’s head. As the last echoes of her belch faded away and she gasped for breath, the beaker tipped forward, falling end over end before its open top plunged down into Olivia’s gaping mouth.

“Mmph?!” Olivia’s eyes bugged out as the concoction within the beaker poured down her throat and into her belly. She pulled it out with an audible pop and hastily looked it over for any signs that it was not meant for human consumption and only found crystal clear glass all around and nary a drop inside.

With a disgruntled grunt, Olivia set the beaker down beside her before reaching up and gripping tightly on the edge of the table. With a bit of a struggle with her bare feet sliding slightly on the linoleum floor, Olivia managed to pull herself upright, unknowingly rising taller than before and capping just shy of seven and a half feet tall in all. When she eventually managed to stand up, Olivia slowly looked around the room, her hands unconsciously going to her slightly shrunken belly, now quiet, still, and so very soft to the touch. It was another lab much like the first one she had snuck into but this one was actually occupied by…
12213212.title: Olivia gets lost and finds another experiment…

122132121.content:
In a large cage were five of the fattest rats Olivia had ever seen. They were practically roly-poly rodents, with thick bodies that were a struggle for them to move around. Their fat jiggled slightly from each movement they made. She giggled as she watched them, as they reminded her of Templeton from Charlotte's Web.

One of the rats had managed to snag a piece of cheese that was taken from a sandwich left behind by a scientist. As the mouse ate the piece, Olivia snagged the sandwich and wolfed it down without a thought. Even after eating enough earlier, her eyes were bigger than her stomach. As she munched down the rest of the sandwich, she saw the rat quivering slightly. The other rats looked on as the one mouse began to shake and shudder slightly.

Without warning, the mouse began to expand within the confines of the cage. The roly-poly rat was beginning to look spherical, as its limbs were beginning to get sucked into its ever-expanding figure. The expansion was beginning to be too much for the cage and for the rest of the rats, as it continued to grow at an alarming rate. The cage creaked loudly until the size of the rat proved to be too much to contain and broke from the top instantly, allowing it to grow a little more freely.

Olivia's eyes widened as she saw this once chunky rat turned into a blobby, balloon-sized rodent. She easily picked it up and held it as best as she could. The growth had obviously increased the mass of the rat's weight indefinitely. As she held it, it jiggled almost uncontrollably. It was almost like she was holding an enormous water balloon. It squeaked from under the gelatinous, furry flesh.

But while holding the fatty rat ball in her hands, a strange feeling had occurred within Olivia. She looked at this rat with a strange sense of anticipation... Of euphoria... And of hunger...

Without even thinking, Olivia brought the spherical rodent to her mouth and began to hork it down. While it was a struggle at first, the weight of the rat would be its inevitable downfall as it soon found itself falling down her gullet and into the abyss that is her stomach. It bounced slightly at the sheer impact of the rat's landing from inside. Her belly bulged out slightly, but it hardly made a dent compared to her last binges.

But even after that huge rat, the ravenous feeling had not left. She looked at the rest of the fat rats left in the cage and made her move. One by one, the remaining four were vanishing within Olivia's gluttonous gut. Their squeaks would be silences as they slid down her throat. Soon, there were none. Not a living thing left inside the lab. Except for the tallest child in the room.

The rats had hardly fought inside her belly. It was almost as if they knew they were doomed and their fate was sealed the minute they were gobbled up. Olivia patted her belly gently, feeling proud of her obscure accomplishment. But this was far from over...
122132121.title: Lab Rat Lunch

choices: Interrogate her for information about making Olivia grow more
1221321213.content:
Olivia's rat-filled belly began to quiver, like it had turned into churning liquid. The plentiful flab on her arms and legs rippled.

"What's happening to me?!" cried Olivia with fear.

Suddenly, fear turned to euphoria, as her entire body exploded with growth. The sensation of growing felt pleasurable, a warm sensation flowing through her flesh. But the idea of growing was even more pleasurable. Olivia's favorite thing about herself was how big she was, how much she towered over the other kids, and how much power that gave her over them. She could imagine nothing better than being even bigger.

Her growing body knocked over tables and smashed equipment. She had to huddle in fetal position in order to fit into the room.

Hearing the commotion, a group of scientists burst through the door.

"Jesus Christ! What the hell is going on in here?" shouted one in horror. "Where are my rats?"

"I ate them," said Olivia, simply, as if it were the most natural thing in the world to have done.

"Ate them?! Do you understand how much money was sunk into that research? And how much danger you're in?"

Olivia wasn't scared. She didn't feel in danger. She felt dangerous. Especially since she was still growing.

"The chemical compound in your bloodstream is extremely unstable. It translates all energy you consume into instantaneous growth. It--"

"What are you doing?!" shrieked another scientist.

Over the shoulders of the scientists, Olivia had spotted a vending machine in the hallway. She shoved them out of the way, dragged the machine through the door, and began shaking the contents into her mouth.

"Are you even listening to me?!" yelled the first scientist. "Eating is the worst thing you could do right now! We need to find a way to reverse your growth before it spirals out of control."

"I don't want to reverse my growth," growled Olivia. She was annoyed to find that she had finished off the machine's contents already, and so she swallowed the machine down for good measure. "Besides, I'm still hun--"

She didn't finish her sentence. A thought had just occurred to her, and a cruel smile spread across her face.

Her hand shot out and pinned the four scientists to the wall. She stared into their eyes, and drank in their fear. Her victims' scared faces were always one of her favorite parts of bullying, but they had never looked quite so scared before.

She gulped one down before he realized what she was doing. It was better than she could have imagined. She could feel him struggling inside of her. Visions flashed through her head of how horrible it must be to be eaten alive. How smelly and painful and scary it must be to be trapped within her belly. The thought of doing that to another person made her squirm with delight.

She popped the next two (a man and a woman) into her mouth and swished them about. This time she wanted to hear their screams and feel them punching and kicking. She savored this feeling of raw power for just a moment, and then tossed them back too.

That left one, sobbing in terror.

What does she do with the last one?
1221321213.title: Scientist Snacks

122133.content:
That’s how you make a chubby girl satisfied when taking her on a trip. Getting loads of meals as much as she could and she’ll be feeling absolute fine for the rest of the day... or is it? That’s when she eventually rejoined the rest of the class, Olivia had stopped completely and felt something strange inside of her. She may seem to feel a bit full or hungry if this was the case, but it wasn’t that and she felt something much different than that.

She would ask so many questions as much as she never had that strange feeling before. But it wasn’t that long when something had dramatically happened and is being shown right in front of the classmate and a school teacher. She seems as if she’s starting to getting taller, and it was an instant pace as she shoots way up above the rest of the kids.

She knew there was nowhere to go, when realising where she was, as her head was hitting the ceiling for a while until it started to break through, still growing in the process. The classmates are so shocked and terrified from this, they all tried to ran away from a growing giant girl as much as they can. Her growth continue until she had reached up to 100 feet tall!

Olivia could hardly believe what has happened to her, and come to think of it, it might’ve been the formula that has caused to make her bigger in the first place. Now that she’s so gigantically huge, she could basically look down at the carnage and laughed just as much she’s starting to like being so massive.

“Wow! Now that’s what a big bully should be like!” That was her statement big time, and she couldn’t wait to get started by...
122133.title: Olivia Outgrows The Building

choices: Pig out. Eat the whole city.
1221332.content:
Olivia rummaged around in the wreckage for any signs of her classmates. But all she could find was broken machinery and already dead scientists. Aw, no fun!

Then she heard cars. She whirled around. The remaining scientists were making their exit, and in among their cars was the school bus that she came in on.

"Bingo!" she thought, and she ran after it.

Olivia wasn't much of a runner. Seeing her huff and puff after that bus would have been comical if she weren't destroying every car in between her and the bus. She swatted some away with her hands, delighting as they burst into flames at the side of the road. Some she crushed underfoot as she ran. The crunch of metal and bones under her sole was a joyous feeling. God, she was so powerful! She barely noticed how many more were swept aside by her giant belly as it bounced around from running.

The students were staring out the back window at her, watching her path of destruction, screaming with terror. They could see not only her pleasure at the carnage she was causing, but also something else: Olivia was drooling. Years of watching Olivia eat everyone's lunches had taught them what her priorities were. They knew exactly what she wanted to do with them.

She got closer and closer and closer. And then suddenly her chubby fingers covered the windows, and they could feel the bus being lifted off the ground. The students and their teacher shrieked as Olivia peeled off the roof.

"You know what, pipsqueaks? I forgot to steal your lunches today. But that's okay. You can drop them in my mouth right now. Here, I'll help you!"

Olivia inverted the bus over her face and began to shake it. The passengers clutched onto the seats for dear life, but it was no use. One by one, they fell into Olivia's waiting mouth.

"Ah!" said Olivia with satisfaction, as she finished them off. She crumpled the remainder of the bus into a ball, spotted a busy stretch highway, and threw it into it, causing a massive pile-up.

She chortled. Man, it rocked being big! Then her tummy rumbled a bit.

"Oh, it feels like I'm about to grow again!" she said. And indeed she did, another twenty feet.

The city was only three miles away, and she strode confidently towards it. A whole city to bully. Now, what to do with them?
1221332.title: The Tragic School Bus

choices: It's her own tummy rumbling. She is about to grow much, much more.
12213322.content:
It wasn't a difficult choice for Olivia. Her twin appetites for gobbling down food and for causing people misery were limitless. Now she could satisfy both at the same time. This was the best thing that could have happened to her. And if a few kids in a school bus could make her grow this much, imagine what an entire city's worth of people would do to her...

She reached the city limits, and gazed down at the terrified people. "Hey there, city! Meet my belly."

She was standing near a row of skyscrapers. They were taller than she was, and she didn't like that. She grabbed handfuls of her flab, and swung it into the skyscrapers, knocking them to the ground, and crushing anyone unfortunate enough to be inside them or standing nearby.

"Belly," she said, clutching it and talking to it as if it were a person. "This is the city. All of it is going to be inside you soon. Do you like the sound of that?" She shook her stomach up and down, like it was nodding. "Great!"

Meanwhile, the people had been scattering. Many were too busy screaming to have heard any of her conversation. But those that did were even more terrified, as they realized what this girl wanted to do to them.

Olivia punched her way through all of the surrounding buildings, and stuffed whatever she found into her mouth. She wasn't sure what most of it was, and she didn't really care. People were her ultimate aim, but for now everything was just fuel for growth.

Since her feet weren't doing anything useful, she kicked anything that she wasn't devouring. Might as well wreak some extra destruction while she was at it. A nice two-for-one deal.

With each bite, Olivia swelled larger and larger. The fleeing people couldn't keep pace with her growth. Soon, they were easily within reach of her pudgy fingers. And with so many of skyscrapers cleared, she now had a clear view of them.

"There you are! Come on in! We've been waiting for you," she said, giving her belly a slap.

She snatched them from the road, a fistful at a time, and sloppily swallowed them down as fast as she could manage. No one would escape her.

She could barely see. Her eyes were rolling from pleasure, at the sensation of so much eating and at the sound of the people's screams as they plummeted down her throat. Suddenly, the screams stopped. The world snapped back into focus, and Olivia saw that there were no people left, just rubble. The city was all gone.

She looked at her own stomach with awe. There must be over a hundred thousand people trapped in there. Oh, and think how much they must be suffering!

Suddenly, she heard a loud noise...
12213322.title: A Chat with Her Belly

choices: Does a body good! Let's do it!
1223.content: They say milk does a body good. Well, what happens if a tainted gallon of milk affects this bully and makes them grow taller and taller every time they drink it or any other form of dairy products?
1223.title: Spoiled Milk for a Spoiled Brat?

choices: She Grows Slowly [An Inch Or So] Everyday
She Grows Noticeably [Nearly A Foot] Everyday
Her Hunger Is Insatiable [Never-Ending Hunger, Eating and Growing]
123.content:
Olivia walked into the school, strutting her wide figure. The students were afraid of what she was capable of with her weight. There was no telling what type of mood she would be in. One minute she could be flirting with the smallest boy in school, then the next thing you know she belly bumps him into the lockers while eating his lunch. That was how unpredictable she could be. God forbid she was any bigger than she is now... As she was walking down the hall, she noticed the science lab was open. Not only that, but a student was in there all by himself.

Logan Fredickson was sort of a big bookworm, very intelligent for a young boy. He knew more than any elementary student or even a high school senior. In his spare time, he would experiment on various pieces of technology. And he was experimenting on something new. Little did he know that his invention would be something he would regret creating...

As he was finishing with the final touches, Olivia walked up to him with a wicked grin on her face. His calm concentration was interrupted by a hard fist rubbing his head violently.

"How's it going, twerp," asked Olivia as she gave Logan a wicked noogie.

"Ow ow ow ow OW OW OW! STOP! PLEASE," Logan yelled as she rubbed his head.

"Alright, but only because you said please," she replied as she let him go, "So what's going on here, nerd?"

"I was just finishing up my latest invention," he said as he rubbed his head from the noogie, "It's a machine that can enhance the materials of any food item, increasing the nutrition of the compound, as well as its size."

"Bull," said Olivia, crossing her arms in disbelief.

"Oh yes, it's true," he replied, "Here, I'll demonstrate with this candy bar."

Logan opens up a king-sized Butterfinger and places it on a target underneath a large ray. He presses a few buttons on the keypad, causing the machine to warm up. Then without a word, he presses a large red button, which unleashes a large beam to emit from the ray. The effects of the beam cause the Butterfinger to grow slowly yet noticeably. Olivia's eyes were widened, her mouth drooled at the sight. After a short while, Logan presses the button again, stopping the machine. He walked over and held the bar as high as he could, as it was now over the size of a ruler and thicker than a textbook.

"What do you have to say now," he said with a smirk, struggling to hold the bar.

"I say GIMME," shouted Olivia, who took the bar with ease.

"Hey WAIT," yelled Logan, who was far too late to stop her.

With a big CRUNCH, Olivia began to scarf down the chocolate bar, even though it was larger than her. Within minutes, which felt almost like seconds, the candy bar was now in her stomach, leaving a big bump on her belly, peeking out of her shirt slightly.

"Now THAT is how a candy bar should be," she said as she rubbed her belly with pride.

"Are you insane," yelled Logan, "I haven't even tested it to be sure it was actually safe to eat!"

"Well don't worry about it," said Olivia, "If anything you should be thanking me for eating your project. It was delicious!"

"Olivia, I haven't even tested any sort of side effects on the machine," said Logan, still panicked, "It could be hazardous!"

"Yeah yeah yeah, whatever," said Olivia as she brushed off the dangers, "Anyway, I came in here for a reason. I took care of those punks for you last week and you said you owe me a couple sandwiches."

"O-oh yeah," said Logan, still frazzled about the experiment. He leaned over and grabbed his backpack, pulling out a large sandwich in a big grocery bag.

"I didn't have enough bread slices so I got you a large bread roll to make up for it," he explained as he held it out for her.

"Oooooh, aren't you such a sweetie," gushed Olivia, taking the sandwich from him, "I can't help but think you have a crush on me..."

Logan blushed slightly, but tried to hide it. Truth be told, he actually did have a crush on Olivia. He wasn't sure what drew his attention towards her; her looks, her attitude, or maybe her body... But his thoughts were interrupted when Olivia ruffled his hair.

"Well thanks for the meal, short stuff," said Olivia as she munched on her sandwich as she left. Logan sighed in exhaustion as she left. He couldn't help but think that something might happen after she had eaten the exposed candy bar. There was no telling what would happen to her... And had she stayed a little longer, he would've noticed her belly bulging out a little further...
123.title: A Guinea Pig or Was It Meant To Be?

choices: Some time later, she goes downstairs for dinner.
1231.content:
Olivia continued to munch on her sandwich as she walked down the hall. She was already halfway through the whole thing, savoring every taste from within. As she walked down the hall, several students observed her with intimidation and disgust, between her big figure and her poor manners in eating. But she didn't care what they had to say. Even if they said anything, she made sure to shut them up with either a stink eye or a good punch in the gut.

She was nearing the cafeteria as she finished the last portions of her sandwich, rubbing her belly in the process, which stood out an additional inch as her navel was beginning to show. She walked inside to see a few students gathered together for what looked like a class project. Making sure there were no teachers around, she made her way inside to do what bullies her size do best...

"Hello half-lings," she greeted them with malicious intent, "How are my little victims today?"

The other students looked up at her, some beginning to shake with fear. As she surveyed their fearful gazes, she took her eyes off of them and onto their project lying in the middle of the table. Lying on the table was a large map that resembled the United States of America. But this was no ordinary map. This was a map made entirely out of snacks, each piece molded and assembled to represent each state. The map itself was large enough to fit on the cafeteria table. The sight of the map caused Olivia to drool with hunger. She then snapped out of her trance and looked over it, almost like an artist critiquing.

"Not bad at all," she mused, "But it needs something..."

"Like what," asked a young girl.

Olivia grabbed two small milk cartons and poured it all over the project before they could do anything to save it.

"It needs a little rain," shouted Olivia, dousing the map with milk.

The snack map began to get soggy from the milk, as the remnants began to drip along the sides of the table.

"Oh dear, look what I did," said Olivia with mock surprise, "Don't worry, I can still save it!"

Before the students could do anything, she scooped and wadded up the remains of the map into a large heap and proceeded to eat it like a large sundae. The students could only look on with remorse and sadness, as the young girl began to cry. This only made Olivia revel in her work more than before as she took handfuls of the mound and ate like a pig.

"Mmmmm, I gotta tell you guys," she said in between mouthfuls, "If I was your teacher, I'd give you an A+ for this. But it needed more chocolate..."

"YOU FAT SLOB," yelled the girl as the tears still flowed down her little eyes, "We worked hard on that project and you ruined it!"

The timid child attempted to thrash the big bully with every fiber of her feeble body, only to have no effect whatsoever. If anything, it was like a toddler trying to move a large punching bag. But even in her weak state, this did not go ignored by Olivia, who stopped eating and grabbed the young girl by her collar.

"Listen you little clod," she said in a low yet menacing tone, "You got a lot of nerve to try and take me on. If you hadn't given me such a generous treat, I would annihilate you right here and now."

Olivia proceeded to hold the little girl up from her feet, leading her up against the wall. Had the young girl or any of her fellow students noticed, Olivia was slowly growing taller, yet not as noticeable as she hardly moved up an inch.

"So here's my only warning; You make another stupid move like that and I will sit on your scrawny body until you can hardly breathe and make you into my new throw pillow. You got me?!"

The young girl could only nod her head slowly, eyes still filled with tears. Olivia's smile slowly returned as she set her down slowly. She then moved back to the table and scarfed down the remnants of the project.

"So here's the deal," she said as she was finishing off the treat, "You brats owe me half a dozen cookies each for your project. I don't care what you get, but it better be half a dozen from each of you. Hell, I'll let you off easy if you bring me a dozen each or even a box each. And I want them by tomorrow after school, no later than that. If you skimp me off one cookie, you're all gonna suffer. Deal?"

The students could only agree silently, which made Olivia's smile wider.

"Good! See you all tomorrow!"

With that, Olivia walked out of the cafeteria, shaking her fat butt at the students, who proceeded to talk over the situation. It felt good to be in charge of puny kids. And it'll feel better to have all the cookies she could ever want.

After a short bus ride, Olivia found herself at home, hoisting her backpack inside her house. She walked in to see her mother coaching three people during a yoga exercise. She walked into the kitchen and grabbed a slice of cake from a container and ate it as she watched the people attempt to do yoga. One young woman was distracted from the smell of the cake, as Olivia held it close to her and was putting it close to her mouth.

"Wake up there Kinsey," yelled Olivia's mother, "You're here to lose weight, not ogle the food in my daughter's hand!"

The young woman took her gaze off of the cake and back into the yoga lesson. Olivia just chuckled, feeling accomplished on teasing her. She gobbled down the cake and made her way upstairs into her room.

She sat by her computer and watched a few YouTube videos, while grabbing some chocolates she stored in a drawer. She felt accomplished on her actions today and was excited for what she would do tomorrow. Unbeknownst to her, her belly growled and churned silently, while her clothes felt a tad snug on her.
1231.title: Olivia and Her Day

choices: The next morning, Olivia becomes a bigger and badder bully.
That night, Olivia craves a midnight snack.
That night, Olivia begins to dream...
12311.content:
It was nearing 6pm and Olivia woke up in a slight haze. She found herself still in her chair by the computer, with a video she had just watched had ended. Near her side was a pile of candy wrappers. And in front of her was her belly, looking a little bigger than before. In fact it was peeking out of her clothes more than before, with her navel looking out.

While she noticed her belly looking a bit chunkier, what she didn't know was that her body looked a little bigger too. Not just fat within her figure, but she was slightly taller than before. In fact, she looked like she grew less than an inch. Between her height and weight, her clothes had shrunk within her figure slightly, as it dug into her a little more than usual.

She got out of her chair and walked out of her room, ready for a real meal. As she got out, she could hear fer father coming in the front door. He held numerous plastic bags, all labeled "Boston Market". The moment Olivia looked at her father bringing in the food, her mouth watered and her stomach growled.

The family of three had gathered together at the dining room table, as they prepared the food that filled up the center. There was so much food that it almost looked like it was a Thanksgiving feast; three big chickens, four bowls of spinach, four bowls of mashed potatoes with gravy to match the servings, three bowls of green beans, three bowls of mac and cheese, three bowls of special rice, and two big bags full of cornbread.

While her parents ate their servings normally, Olivia began to pig out like there was no tomorrow. Scoop, munch, cut, bite, over and over again. Everything she had began to go down her gullet. She was basically a porker at the table. But her folks weren't even bothered by it. It was like a normal occurrence to them.

After her parents were done, Olivia continued to scarf down the rest of the food, munching away the chicken all the way down to the bone. And as she ate, her belly pushed out further and further. She stopped to open her pants, which allowed more room for her belly to flow and more room for her to eat. And she wasn't planning on stopping.

Soon after, the table was covered with empty containers and food scraps that could hardly be called leftovers. About 1/3rd of the food was eaten by her parents, while the rest was gobbled down by this adolescent with an amazing appetite. She laid back in her seat, as her belly was pushed up against the table, stuffed from the meal she had.

And all Olivia could do was leave a loud BUUUUUURP in response.

As she hoisted her belly up and out from the table, she managed to move out of her seat. The weight seemed to go straight to her gut, as she seemed to lose her balance after eating such a hearty meal. But after a moment, she managed to walk upright. Even though her belly was blocking her lower view, she still managed to walk out without a problem.

Then she smelled something... Something chocolatey. She looked into the kitchen to see a small container that she missed. It was a container that held three brownies. She waddled over and grabbed the whole thing, her mindset fixated on eating again.

"I don't care if I burst," she thought to herself, "These brownies are mine!"

She was about to leave, but not before grabbing a pint of vanilla ice cream and the whipped cream. She made her way to her room, locking the door to make sure she wouldn't be bothered. As she sat on the bed, she opened up the pint of ice cream, revealing half a pint left inside. She scooped out the rest into the container of brownies, then shook up the whipped cream and immediately sprayed a small cream tower on top.

Then the porker pigged out again, devouring the chocolatey dessert like a hog. Piece by piece, drop after drop, the dessert was eaten away. As she ate, her belly growled and gurgled profusely, not as enthralled with the gluttony as she was.

As soon as she ate it, it was gone. All that was left inside was the remnants of ice cream and whipped cream, as she licked it all up, smearing it all over her chubby cheeks. She licked it all off, not wasting good food.

After all was said and done, Olivia belched one last time and passed out on her bed, her belly fully exposed and groaning from her meal. There's no telling how it was going to digest all of that...
12311.title: The Bully's Big Meal

choices: She is satisfied and goes back to bed
She is still hungry and wants more food
She is interrupted by her parents
123112.content:
Growls and gurgles could be heard from Olivia's belly. She made a big pig of herself eating so much food. It was satisfactory for her. But something felt different within her system. The growls and gurgles from her belly had begun to calm down, as a new feeling occurred within...

Her belly slowly shrank down as it began to digest her meal. It hardly faded away considering her fat frame, but then something else began to occur. Her face began to look a little rounder, her cheeks were looking chubbier, and her neck formed into a fat double chin. Her arms and legs began to expand, getting thicker than before. Her figure began to get fatter and wider as her hips and belly grew fatter.

While she began to grow a little fatter, her body was experiencing a new change. She was growing slightly taller, getting noticeably higher. Her body was becoming so big that she was filling up her bed more-so then before. Then as soon as it came, it faded away. Her figure had gone from her slightly altered 5 foot 3 inches and 173 lbs. to a newly altered physique of 5 foot 11 inches and 236 lbs.

Basically, she became a bigger bully...

The time was 12:17am and Olivia began to stir. She woke up feeling a little hungry. She had a big meal but she felt like eating a little more. She was so focused on her own sense of hunger that she barely noticed any changes in her body. She made her way down to the kitchen, making sure not to make any noises that would wake her parents up. Soon she found herself in the kitchen.

She grabbed the bag of sliced bread and reached into the fridge for various items; meat, chicken, cheeses, mayo, mustard, lettuce, bacon, anything that could make a few sandwiches. Each piece of food she found she piled them into three sandwiches. She also grabbed the gallon of milk and poured herself a tall glass to top it all off. She was too focused on her food that she hardly realized she was able to grab a glass from a high position.

With the dim light of the full moon shining into the kitchen, she looked over her "snack" and began to feast again. Each sandwich had instantly been devoured by the young bully, while also guzzling down the glass of milk, making her belly fuller and slightly bigger than before. But soon those three sandwiches hardly seemed like they were enough to be a midnight snack. She grabbed more deli meats and more pieces of bread and made three more, while refilling her glass of milk. And even after that, she finished them off without a hitch, feeling fuller and fatter.

Her clothes had already felt confined within her larger figure, unbeknownst to her, especially around her abdomen as her belly was peering out further than before. If she had any buttons on her clothes, she would be bursting each one without a hitch. And had she noticed her newfound figure, she would see how much of a difference it would make. But she was too busy depleting the amount of deli meats left in her fridge to notice or care.
123112.title: Midnight Snack or a Midnight Meal?

choices: Olivia goes next door to continue her feasting
Olivia goes to sleep, she can eat in the morning
1231122.content:
She didn't even like spinach, but after clearing out all the bread, deli meats, cheese, juice, a whole Cheesecake, all the cereals and snacks in the pantry, the ice cream, fruit and now dessert she still felt like eating even more and was officially clearing out the veggies.

She didn't want to eat anything that needed the microwave or oven to use because the didn't want the beeping to wake up her parents. But all 6' of her still craved more substance. She either didn't care or didn't realize she pretty much cleared her house of food. she just wanted more, even after the growth effects of the candy bar wore off the hunger effects remained. She knew then next door neighbors were really old obese people and she knew where they put the spare key to let people in but she also thought about just going back to sleep. She felt like eating but it was late. But... she thought, they probably have yummy food and I can get in easy!
1231122.title: She is still hungry and wants more food

choices: She eats everything in sight in her dream...
She begins to wake up for a midnight snack...
She wakes up the following morning.
123113.content:
Olivia put her hand on her belly, holding it gently after having such a big meal. It gurgled and groaned, trying to digest the mass amount of food she ate. And as she fell asleep, she began to dream...

-----------------------------------------------------------------

It was a peaceful day within the school, as teachers and students made their way to their respective classrooms. All was calm and tranquil.

It was peaceful until SHE came in...

A large behemoth of a young girl burst through the doors of the school. What was a young girl looked more like a monster made entirely of fat with an imposing height.

She weighed in a staggering 720 lbs. and towered at nearly 10 feet tall. Her belly was the biggest feature to her round and immense figure. Had it not been for her large height, she would be the fattest girl of the school.

Everyone in the school feared her. She grew day in and day out, getting taller and fatter everyday. She ate like no tomorrow too, eating her own food and everyone else's food if they weren't careful.

The moment she walked down the hall, she grabbed bags upon bags of lunch food from each student in her way. They knew they were powerless to such a monster.

As she walked down the hall, she spotted a young, chubby girl. She held a large tray of cookies, eating each one by herself.

Olivia grinned maliciously as she walked down towards her. The chubby girl looked up and up at the big bully, who eyed her tray of cookies.

"Give me those cookies," Olivia demanded, holding her large hand out.

"No," yelled the girl as she took another cookie, "these are mine! I'm hungry and they're all for me!"

Olivia's smile faded as she looked at the chubby girl with anger. She was stupid enough to stand up to her and was certainly stupid enough to keep all those cookies to herself. Her stomach growled like a panther stalking in the distance.

"You're gonna be sorry," threatened Olivia.

"Maybe you need to lay off the food for a while, fatty," teased the chubby girl.

That did it...

With a loud snarl, Olivia grabbed the girl with both hands and began to dangle her above her head. Then, she opened her mouth wide enough and swallowed her whole, making sure she could fit her wide figure into her mouth, and proceeded to swallow her whole.

Without another word, the chubby girl had disappeared...

The hallway was dead quiet as teachers and students watched with horror at the sight of this giant who ate a student whole. All that was left to show for it was a larger bulge in Olivia's stomach.

The silence was broken when Olivia picked up the tray and proceeded to wolf down the cookies. Even after eating a young girl, this monster was still eating. She scarfed them all down, leaving crumbs on her chest, disgusting everyone around her as she made a large belch that could break glass.

"Well, what are you looking at," she bellowed in the hallway, prompting everyone around her to scatter.

It was good to be big...

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Back in reality, Olivia's belly gurgled louder than before, as it began to digest everything she ate. But as her belly began to shrank, her body began to slowly grow.

Her shirt rose above her belly slightly, the sleeves rising higher against her arms. Her pants were getting tighter against her expanding waistline, as the pant legs began to rise up against her thickening thighs. Her belly shrunk from all the food, but it grew bigger and flabbier than before. And she slowly grew taller than before.

All Olivia could do was moan in her sleep, as the growing feeling she had mixed with her dreams made it more interesting for her.

What happens to this bully now?
123113.title: It's a Eat or Be Eaten Dream...

choices: Olivia wakes up, finding herself bigger than before
1231131.content:
As the dream continued, giant Olivia looked at her belly. It was already stretched impossibly large, and she could see a vaguely human shape kicking and squirming through all the layers of fat. Olivia's stomach gurgled hungrily. One measly girl and normal sized cookies weren't enough to fill her greedy gut. She scowled around the room, angry that she hadn't been given more food. But as she looked into the horrified faces of her peers, her expression turned into a pleased and eager face.

"Here I was about to yell at you all for being so useless and selfish," Olivia said, flashing a malicious grin. "But turns out you're useful after all." Olivia slapped her belly with so much force that she heard the girl inside of her stomach yelp.

Olivia stomped towards her peers, and their momentary confusion about her intent was all the opportunity Olivia needed. Just as they turned to run, Olivia grabbed two students, pinning them to her fat form. The terrified teens could faintly feel the girl struggling in Olivia's digestive dungeon.

Not wasting any more works on the meaningless pieces of meat, Olivia hoisted the boy into her mouth, holding the girl tight with her other arm. In a swift motion and a couple gulps (aided by the smooth physics of her dream), the boy was shoved struggling and screaming into Olivia's throat. She slurped up his legs and he slid all the way into her swelling stomach.

"Oh yeah!" Olivia sighed, followed by a slight belch, "you are all good for something." She turned her gaze to the pinned and extremely terrified girl. "You all should have given me your food sooner."

With that, Olivia opened her salivating maw and stuffed the girl in as she cried for mercy. Cries for mercy had never stopped Olivia before, and they certainly won't going to stop her now that she knew how delicious and filling people are. In a matter of seconds, a third human being plopped into the slimy sack of her stomach.

No food and none of her bullying was as satisfying as being stuffed full with tasty food, and the delicious, sadistic knowledge that all her peers were nothing but meals for her now. Their entire lives amounted to nothing else. And, after all, that's how it should be. Olivia's belly was impossibly stretched out. Even at 10 feet, her belly was nearly 2/3 the size of her. She let out a triumphant belch, and it shrank her stomach to better reveal the wriggling forms inside. Without air, their movement was slowing down and her body was beginning to digest them.

Unbeknownst to Olivia, her real-world growth was fueling new turns in her dream. As her acids melted away the three trapped students, her body began to surge upward. It only took 15 seconds, but by the time it was done, Olivia stood a terrifying 15 feet tall. Her belly was no longer stuffed, but it has a sizeable new layer of fat padding it out. Students had begun fleeing from the gluttonous giant, but Olivia's size helped her chase them down, barreling through doorways and any other barrier in her way.

As she chased her prey, she bellowed out to the school: "you had your chance to give me your food and obey my commands. Too bad for you, you wasted it. Now you'll all just be my waste! No one is making it out of here, except as layers of my fat!"

Next...
1231131.title: Begins eating her peers

choices: Her head has busted into the attic of her house, and she's stuck.
She has grown so big that she's outside, lying in the rubble of her house.
12311311.content:
Fifty students stampeded down the hallway like a herd of wildebeest. Just behind them was the thunderous tread of Olivia, huffing and puffing, her belly jiggiling up and down as she she ran. She looked almost comical. Almost, because the crazed, hungry look in her eyes was fully serious. The students were her prey, and she would waste no time in devouring them if she caught up with them.

Just then, a student at the front of the pack tripped over his shoelace, and fell to the floor. The row behind him tripped over him. Then the row behind that tripped over them. Soon, all the students had fallen like dominoes in the middle of the hallway.

Olivia skidded to a halt. Or, at least, she tried to. But she had gained too much momentum. Her belly barreled down the hallway, dragging her along, and smashed the entire group of unfortunate students against the wall at the end of the hall with a sickly crunch.

Groans emanated from the heap of injured students. Some had been knocked out cold by the force of the crash. Others were vainly trying to extricate themselves from under the bodies of their comrades.

Olivia, however, was unharmed. With a wicked gleam in her eye, she looked down at the students spread before her like a buffet. Then, she tucked in. Even louder than the students' screams was the wet smacking of Olivia's lips as she sloppily packed them into her mouth and gulped them down.

Each student she ate added to her height. Before she was halfway through the pile, her head was already brushing the ceiling of the hallway.

Back in her bedroom, the real Olivia was growing too, matching her dream self inch for inch. But why was she still growing? All of the food she had greedily bullied her way into guzzling over the course of the day had been fully digested. There should have been no more fuel for growth. But a curious thing was happening. Just as the sensation of growing in reality made her grow in her dream, eating in her dream fooled her body into growing in reality. She had entered a feedback loop: eating made her grow more, growing made her eat more.

As dream Olivia continued her frenzied consumption, the bed collapsed and smashed into splinters under the real Olivia and the walls of her room began to give way as her expanding body pressed into them.

"Yes, yes! More, more!" moaned Olivia in her dream, as she continued to feed. The pile of students in front of her was dwindling, but her appetite was not. And the diabolical pleasure she took from knowing how many lives she was permanently ruining made her relish all the more the banquet before her.

She was swelling in all directions. Her sides were scraping against the lockers. Her head was breaking through the ceiling. Some teachers and students peeked out of their classrooms to see what the commotion was. Bad move. They were snatched up and swallowed before they knew what had happened.

Then, just as Olivia's head burst through to the second floor, she awoke from her dream, and she looked around her in surprise.

Where was she?
12311311.title: Feeding Feedback Loop

choices: Walk to the highway and start grabbing cars
123113112.content:
As her eyes snapped open, Olivia was surprised to see the stars in the night sky above her. No roof. She glanced around, and realized that she was sitting in the wreckage of her house. She had grown through it. She looked over her giant body.

"Sweet!" she thought. "I'm colossal. I can torment whomever I want."

As she examined herself with pride she noticed two stains on her belly. She brought her head closer. From the clothes stuck to them she realized that they were her parents. Her body had smashed them dead when it had swelled through the house.

Olivia shrugged. She didn't really care for them. They bought her food, but were not good for much else.

As if on cue at the thought of food, her tummy gave a monstrous rumble. In her dreams, she had just eaten countless students. But in reality, she had not eaten since dinner.

She suddenly remembered the feeling of devouring all of those people in her dreams. She could taste their skin on her tongue; she could feel their struggles inside her as they surrended to the awesome power of her belly. It was positively intoxicating. Thinking of it now made her wild with gluttonous desire. If it was half as good in real life, she knew what she wanted to spend the rest of the night doing. No, more than the rest of the night! She would do it endlessly, if she could.

She looked around her. The darkened street was bare. But it was lined with rows of houses full of sleeping people. She imagined the houses as boxes from a bakery, filled with delicious human-shaped treats inside. She licked her fat, greedy lips.

Off a little way fruther was the highway from her suburb into the main city. She could imagine having a lot of fun snatching passing cars and toturing their drivers before she swallowed them. A bully's paradise.

Olivia rubbed her hands together mischievously. "Time to make my dreams reality!" she said.
123113112.title: Out on the Street

1231131121.content:
Olivia started with the closest next-door neighbor. She had been bullying their children for years, but they always tattled, leading their parents to complain to Olivia's parents. Well, they wouldn't be able to complain anymore!

She ripped the roof off of their house. The two bedrooms were exposed to her hungry gaze: parents in one bedroom and the three children in the other, all sleeping peacefully. They were still sleeping peacefully as they went down Olivia's throat. By the time they woke up they were drowning in her stomach acids.

Olivia was about to move onto the next house when she realized that eating anything would make her bigger. So, she might as well finish off the other contents of the house. She swept all of the walls and furniture of the second floor into their mouth. Chewing on all of this was a pleasingly crunchy experience.

Next, she punched through the second floor and rummaged around on the first floor, grabbing and munching whatever she could find. When the house was almost empty, she lifted it off of its foundations and shook the remaining contents into her mouth.

She could feel herself beginning to grow from what she regarded as the first course in the banquet to come. A little thrill shot down her spine at this feeling: not just because the sensation of growing was itself pleasurable, but also because the knowledge that she was growing into an even more powerful monster (with even greater destructive potential), gave her devious delight.

She was still holding the hollow shell of the house in her hands. She thought of setting it down on the ground again, but then a wicked idea came to her. She heaved it with all her might into the distance, imagining with glee the destruction it would cause when it landed, and the poor people it would smash to bits. God, being big was great!

She polished off the next house in an instant. Some of its six inhabitants had woken up before she ate them. Not from the sound, but from the drool that landed on them from her mouth, as she eyed them greedily. They didn't have time to scream before they were shoveled into the all too eager mouth. The rest of the house gone in the blink of an eye, and Olivia shot up further.

By the time she got to her third course, she was large enough that she didn't need to stand while eating. She could sit next to the house. But why sit on the ground, she thought, when there was much better seating? She lowered her colossal buttocks over the nearest, and slowly pulverized it. She imagined the people popping like balloons as she crushed them. She had to stifle her giggling so as not wake the rest of her prey.

After gulping down her third house, she gazed into the distance. There was a line of houses stretching out for a mile. An entire community was at her mercy. But Olivia felt no mercy. Soon, they'd all be gone!


Continue eating them.
Rampage, and smash them all.
1231131121.title: Noshing on Neighbors

12311311211.content:
The line of houses on both sides of the road stretched out to the highway for just a short enough distance that Olivia could see its end. She guessed that there were at least thirty of them. She wasn't sure how many people each held, but she imagined that it must be over a hundred. Over a hundred, and she was going to eat them all!

She lumbered towards the houses, and began gorging herself at a furious pace. She surprised even herself with how rapidly she could pig out. She couldn't even see anything: her hands were shoveling everything in front of her into her mouth so quickly that they were a blur. At any given moment, she wasn't sure if she was eating wood, concrete, gravel, or people. All she felt was the steady flow of mass down her throat and into her belly, punctuated by the wild struggles of her victims, and the warm, spreading feeling of her own growth as it pumped into overdrive.

The withdrawal of most of her senses left the pure sensation of consumption, which was nothing short of blissful. It made her realize just what made eating so gratifying. It was that eating something both destroyed it and made it hers forever. With every bite she took, she stole something that belonged to someone else, broke it irreparably, and transformed it into the greatest physical pleasure possible--the feeling of something sinking into her stomach, from which nothing could escape.

Like now: People had saved for years to buy houses, and the houses had taken months of labor to build. She was wrecking them with a single swipe of her hand. All their work: gone! The people inside considered their lives precious. But she swallowed them down like they were nothing. Their hopes, their dreams: gone!

"I am the Queen of the Bullies," she thought. "Everything I touch, I demolish. And if I just get big enough, I can ruin every single life on the planet!"

As her attention snapped back to reality, she realized that she was eating grass and trees. She must have finished off that row of houses a while ago. At last, her feeding frenzy paused for long enough that she could finally take stock of how large she had grown.

How tall is Olivia now?
12311311211.title: Appetite for Destruction

123113112111.content:
Olivia was a hundred feet tall. "Only" a hundred feet tall was how she thought of it, because anything less than city-sized was too small in her mind. It kept her victim count in the double digits, and she wanted to destory millions upon millions.

The road that she had reached was usually pretty quiet: one or two cars would pass every few minutes. She grabbed and ate each of them that passed. At first, she experimented with ripping off the roof and popping the driver and passengers into her mouth one at a time, before working her way through the now empty car. But this took too long. Next, she tried crumpling the cars in her hands before munching on them. This caused the people inside the cars to pop with a satisfying squelch. But she missed the more prolonged pleasure of feeling the people struggle inside her belly. So, she settled on her preferred method: chewing her way through the front of the car until she reached the people, sucking them out and swallowing them whole, and then chewing through the rest of the car.

After a dozen cars, she had reached a hundred-and-fifty feet. But she was growing impatient. As fun as this was, it was much too slow. She needed to shoot way up. She needed to eat people by the handful, not a couple at a time.

"Enough with snacks. I want a meal!" she thought.

The road stretched in two directions. One was towards a nearby casino, sure to be packed with late-night high rollers. The other was into town, where the population was larger, but probably less densely packed.

Which way should she go?
123113112111.title: Vehicular Victims

choices: No. Graze a bit more in the suburbs to get even bigger first.
1231131121111.content:
The bright lights of the casino flashed in the distance. Olivia waddled her way towards them. Most of the cars in the parking lot were empty. But hey, eating anything would help her grow. And so she idly popped them into her mouth and swallowed them down, taking great pleasure in flattening all of the other cars underfoot.

At last she reached the casino proper. The only people outside were the valets and the doormen. She made fast work of them. So fast that they didn't have time to scream. That was a pity. She would have enjoyed hearing their terror. At least she could faintly feel them thrashing about in her belly.

Olivia peeled back the roof of the casino as if it were the top of a can of sardines, and she peered inside. There must have been over a thousand. Olivia drooled at the sight of them. Her stomach gurgled with anticipation.

The people screamed in terror at the triple-chinned face that loomed over them. They knew what her intentions were. They had seen her lick her lips. But even if they hadn't, the expression on her face was unmistakable: equal parts gluttony and sadism. Whoever this monstrous giantess was, she wanted to eat them and make them suffer, preferably at the same time.

"Hope you all won a lot at the tables, tonight," she said. "Because your luck has just run out."

The people tried running out of the casino. But Olivia saw them and she hugged the building, sinking it into her, so that her layers of flab wrapped around the building, blocking the exits. There was nowhere for the people to hide.

Olivia stuck her head into the casino and went to town: licking, slurping, inhaling. The gamblers screamed and kicked and flailed all the way down, and continued to do so even more when piled on top of each other in her stomach. You might think that this would annoy Olivia. But she loved it. She loved feeling them struggle in vain, knowing that they would all lose, that soon they would all burn or suffocate to death inside of her. She rubbed her hands over her belly to feel their misery all the more clearly.

Soon, the growth from all of that eating kicked in. Olivia's expanding girth closed in on the casino, smashing it to bits. She roared with pleasure as she grew. More power! More eating!

The growing stopped. Oliva was two hundred feet tall.

Was it time to head into the city?

“Well well, looks like you ain’t gonna go anywhere without dealing with me. Besides, I wanna make you as a toy, but also feeling hungry, whenever I want to!” Olivia says in bed statement, as her voice boomed around the area to make everybody being heard of that monstrous, twelve year old girl.

And so, she wants to get on with her fun, and starts picking up a number of cars on the highway. It was basically like a toy like any boy would play those stuff, expect it was too real, and there’s people still inside, trapped by the grasp of a obese monster.

"Oh crap", her useless parents woke up
1231132.content:
She was in the middle of swallowing a teacher that gave her a bad grade when her stomach rumbled so loudly it actually woke her up.

She stretched her arms and scratched her belly as she yawned and looked for the lights. She finally found the lights and as she got out of bed and looked in the mirror the site reflecting back shocked her. Everything about her was bigger, she grabbed her belly and shook it and was ecstatic that everything shook. She noticed how tight her pajamas felt and realized her pants which used to partially cover her feet were now up to her ankles. Did I get taller she thought to herself. She was still checking herself out when her belly let out another growl.

"Okay, okay" she said to herself as she rubber her slightly bigger belly.

"I'll fill you up right now"

She started walking downstairs and noticed none of the lights were on. Good she thought, my good for nothing parents are asleep so I can really eat, I can't believe how much those fat asses ate while I'm sitting here starving.

She walked downstairs using her brand new iPhone 7s as a light until she made it to the kitchen. She checked the pantry and immediately started to drool. "Bingo" she said. The pantry was filled to the brim with her favorite junk foods. She then checked the pantry and the freezer. To her surprise they were all filled tonthe brin with ice cream, twinkles, fruit roll ups, cereal, anything and everything she could of asked for and more. Maybe my parents aren't good for nothing's after all she thought as tore open a family size back of chips from the pantry, grabbed some double stuffed Oreos from the cupboard, and then went to the freezer and grabbed a gallon of Ben and Jerry's

She was a growing girl, and growing girls need to eat and eat is what she was gonna do.
1231132.title: She begins to wake up for a midnight snack...

12311321.content:
Olivia stuffs herself Oreos, fruit roll ups, little Debbie cakes of all saving the ice cream for last. As she ate her stomach expanded larger as she sat on the kitchen floor. Her gut went from basketball to beach ball size as she struggle over her spherical belly reaching for the ice cream. The ice cream was a whole gallon and she finished it of in less then 5 min and belched for 5 secs when she finished.

Olivia quickly covered her mouth, hopefully she wasn't to loud to wake her parents. Her belly had swelled double her size and reached her knees. With great effort she leaned forward grabbing on to fridge door handle to pull herself up. She was too tired to clean up her mess and made the long walk upstairs to sleep of her meal.

Crawling into bed at 1 in morning she fell asleep without even bothering to lift the covers. She patting and rubbing her belly as she snoozed. As she slept her body was growing again, her belly shrank from an overinflated beach ball to basketball sized. Her legs got longer and doughier and same with her arms. Before her midnight snack she grew 2 inches, but after she grew 3 more inches. Oliva also gained some padding on her ass and developing breasts.

Over all Oliva is now 5'6" and weighs 186 pounds. And tomorrow she will get even bigger. When Oliva wakes up...

You outgrew everything, I'm going to call you in & we're going clothes shopping
123113211.content:
"Oh god Darrel look at this, our growing baby girl was hungry last night." Debra Olivia's gym trainer mom said to her husband and Olivia's father Darrel.

"Goodness gracious, I remember this time of my life all too clearly, I ate even more than this every night my poor parents but i cleaned up after myself! Our girl must be growing into a young woman." He said as he picked up some wrappers off the floor.

"Me too dear, i ate so much I was 450 pounds when I was her age"

"Same sweetheart but I was 500 when I was 12!"

"Goodness we should have known she'd be a big eater like us when we were her age, did you see how much she ate last night? That's about what I was eating when I was her age, maybe a bit closer to 13." Debra said.

"That doesn't excuse the mess though honey, we need to stand our ground, if we let a 12 year old boss us around imagine how high school will be, I know I was a fat bastard because my parents let me walk all over them!"

"Same here sweety, I was a total bitch to my mom, we need to stand our ground now!"

"Ya!" Darrel said enthusiastically, "but it's only 6AM and our little booger doesn't get up until 7, if she's anything like me at that age she'll need food, shoot we need food so I'm going to get some fast food for us and a feast for Olivia so she won't be hangry!

"Sounds good dear, I'm going to clean up a bit of this mess" Debra replied.

Olivia woke up to a delicious smell of Bacon, Eggs and other delicious smelling breakfast food. She ran down the stairs in her shirt which was too small before but now that she was 186 only covered her chest leaving her pudgy belly fully exposed. Her pants which were too tight 20 pounds before her midnight feast were now ripped in between her thighs and among her backside leaving her underwear fully exposed.

Debra was the 1st to see her daughter jiggling down the stairway and was shocked at how tall and chubby she'd gotten, Even she never grew that much in a night and Darrel looked at Olivia running towards the food and got in the way of her tumbling daughter before she could get to the table. The impact caused Darrel to work more than he thought he'd have too but he successfully stopped her letting his O-Line football skills come into effect.

"W-T-H dad, I'm hungry" Olivia screamed at his father trying to get around her dad and mom who blocked her way from the table. "I want to eat, I have school you dumbasses." She shouted her face turning red from anger.

"LANGUAGE YOUNG LADY" her mother shouted causing Olivia to calm down. "We pay the bills, we buy your food and we're going to buy you new clothes after you outgrow these clothes, so under our house YOU LISTEN!" She screamed

Olivia just screamed back, "YOU'RE STARVING ME THIS IS CHILD ABUSE!" But both the parents refused to budge even after she let out some crocodile tears.

"Look my little booger" her dad began to speak

"DONT CALL ME THAT, I'm 12 now! I'm not your little booger anymore!" Olivia replied.
