Those bastards think they can put me on a diet, ya right but I'll play their game, I hope they never put me on a diet, she was angry yet scared because they never threatened her like that before. She decided she was going to be extra mean in school today. Even if they put me on a diet I'll just eat more kids food to make up for it, I'll get every kids lunch and lunch money if I have too. As she was in her head her dad patted her on the back and pulled out her favorite candy bar.

Olivia was still angry but accepted the candy bar and quickly unwrapped the candy bar and to her and her fathers surprise stuffed the whole king sized bar in her mouth and swallowed it whole in one gulp.

"Chew your food sweety" her father said but before Olivia could reply her mom came down the stairs. Olivia didn't grow in height anymore but her father definitely overdid it on breakfast and she had to be at least 200 pounds now.

Olivia her mom shouted
123113211.title: Her parents fuss at her for making a mess in th...

1231132111.content:
Olivia knew she had them wrapped around her chubby little finger, whether or not they knew. She knew she was going to get her way no matter what they would attempt to do to her. But what also made it interesting was how they felt nervous around her. She was nearly chest level with them and felt like she was going to get bigger again soon. And with her new weight, she could be a little more threatening than before.

But her thoughts were interrupted by her mother coming towards her room. She carried an old box that said Hand-Me-Downs written on the front. She placed the box in front of Olivia's feet and began to speak.

"This box has old clothes from myself, your father, and all your relatives," she said, "Look through and see if there's anything that can fit you for the day. After school, we'll go out later and buy you some clothes that'll fit."

"Yeah whatever," groaned Olivia.

"Now I got some people coming over for workout routines, your father will drop you off at school as soon as you're dressed. He'll give you money for lunch today."

"Great, anything else?"

A short silence fell until her mother spoke up again.

"Honey, are you feeling... alright?"

"I would if I had some clothes that fit," said Olivia, as her shirt began to rip from her chest.

"Urgh, just get dressed so you can go to school," said her mother as she stormed out the door.

Olivia leaned down while her undies began to creak, as she looked at the clothes that were in the box. Most of them were smaller clothes from her cousins, who were hardly at her size before her recent size change.

But then she saw clothes that looked like from her father or mother's high school days. She found a large hoodie that was a size 2XL that said Benson 42 on the back and on the front had a large fat bear design. She slipped on the hoodie and it felt a little loose on her. If anything, it left a lot of room for her to grow...

She looked around some more and found a black skirt that looked like it could fit. She slipped it on and it was very snug, a tad tight around her waist. She looked in the mirror and saw herself looking somewhat silly.

"God, I look so stupid," she said to herself, "I gotta find something else."

But before she could do anything, she felt something within her body. A slight shudder crept up her spine. Then it happened. She slowly grew taller. Slow and steady, she grew taller until she reached 5'9". She leaned back by her wall, making a loud thump.

"Oh man, that felt good," she said as she began to sweat.

"OLIVIA, YOU'RE GONNA BE LATE!"

Her moment to herself was interrupted, as she got herself off the wall and walked downstairs. She stomped down the stairs with her new weight, meeting her father by the front door.

"Is that really what you're going in, Liv," her father asked.

"Yeah dad, I didn't have anything else that could fit," she yelled, "Let's just go!"

Her father felt uneasy looking at her own daughter bellowing at him, but it felt worse when her own daughter was getting close to his height. They walked to the car, as Olivia was struggling to get inside from her newly fattened assets. After a short moment, she managed to get herself into the front seat, then proceeded to buckle herself in. The buckle was feeling slightly tight on her, but she didn't care.

The ride was a silent one, aside from the radio playing. Olivia looked at her phone browsing social media apps while her father drove. He looked over his faughter, still wondering how she was getting so big. This was definitely unnatural. It was a short drive, but they managed to make it on time at the school. Olivia squeezed out of the car, but not before her father handed her $20.

"Have a good day, sweetie," her father said.

"Yeah yeah, see you later dad," she replied.

His father felt awkward looking at her own daughter walking towards the school. He knew she was getting fatter, but she shouldn't be getting this fat so fast. He drove off to work with these thoughts.

Olivia was ready to start the day with her newfound figure. It was obvious that she was going to use her fatter figure to her advantage, but the students would never know how far she was going to take it...
1231132111.title: If It Fits, Wear It...

After pondering for a short while, Olivia thought it would be shameful to skip out on her snack time. After scanning the hallway, she made sure she was totally alone. She then reeled her large torso back a step.

CRASH!

The young bully used her large belly to crash the vending machine, making a large hole big enough to take everything inside of it. Wasting no time, she grabbed each item piece by piece, shoving everything inside of her backpack as quick as she could. After clearing out the machine, she moved over to the soda machine and reeled herself back again.

CRASH!

She broke the other machine's window, looking almost as large as the other hole. This time, she tilted the machine over to let the cans and bottles drop inside her backpack. She knew they would fizz up after being shaken up slightly, but part of her was hoping for that to happen.

Double checking her area, Olivia made sure she was still alone in the hallway. With the coast clear, she hoisted her backpack over her one shoulder, which was thick enough to hold it in place but wouldn't fit like it used to. As she walked down the hallway again, she pulled out a can of juice and a pack of Ho-Hos, prepping herself before her big lunch, even though she had 15 minutes left. She wouldn't lose this chance.

While a few students groaned, Olivia smiled slightly. Though a girl of her size wouldn't have to worry about lifting weights, but she figured she check to see how much she can lift now with her new figure.

As everyone was trying out some of the equipment, Olivia made for the barbells and began to test her strength. She started with a set of 10 lb. barbells and they were too easy for her to deal with. She switched them with 20 lbs., but they were too light for her as well. She jumped up to the 40 lb. barbells and she felt a little more at ease with them, as she was beginning to get more of a proper challenge. She flexed and pulled the barbells for some time, feeling stronger after a while. But then something strange was happening... Her body was quivering slightly... She was going to grow again...

Slowly and steadily, her body grew higher, as her clothes felt tighter as she grew. The weights in her hands were beginning to feel as light as the 20 lb. barbells as they shrunk within her grip. As soon as it came, it began to fade away, as her height rested at 7'6". Her clothes were extremely tight on her now, as her shorts rode up past her ass cheeks and were close to ripping apart as it was stretching past its own maximum capacity, while her shirt was still trying to contain her fat chest and was ripping from her back end.

Olivia was feeling like a whole new person, looking larger and more intimidating. Her fat figure was thick enough to smother anyone, whether it was her ass, belly, or even her thick legs and arms. She was a tank made of thick cellulite and could not be stopped. Who knows how fat she could get and how far she would take her size?

All Olivia could do was act like nothing happened and began to use the 60 lb. barbells, as she prepped herself for more bullying techniques. What could this obese monstrosity be up to?

123113211122231121211132.content:
Meanwhile, back in the science lab, Logan was furiously working on some modifications to his device. Apparently it had worked to shrink Kirsty, but Logan didn’t know how to reliably repeat that result. However, he was determined to change that and fine-tune his machine.

He had to admit there was a lot he loved about Olivia’s new body. Her round belly and behind were not the least among them. But it was more than her body: he always admired (with a bit of terror) her cocky confidence. Olivia’s ego certainly didn’t need any inflating, but there was something awe-inspiring in her increased sense of authority and dominance. And sure, she was even getting rid of some people who had made his life miserable.

But this had all gone too far. There was a part of him that took some secret, sadistic pleasure when Olivia devoured Kirsty, but she was out of control. He couldn’t even guess how many people she’d eaten by now, but she was certainly showing no sign of stopping. Her voracious pace was increasing, and so were both her height and waistline. He didn’t want to imagine how far she might go if her trend continued. Would he be safe? Would the school be safe? If it got even more out of control, would his family be safe? Would anybody? Or were they all destined to be chub of Olivia’s titanic frame?

Logan was sure this wasn’t who Olivia really was. She’d just gotten caught up in the moment and the excitement of new possibilities. If he just shrank her back down to a normal size – if he could only reverse her growing process – Logan knew she would snap out of it. Sure, she’d still be a greedy, gluttonous bully, but things would be back to normal.

These thoughts, as well as his own terror, were very distracting as Logan worked. Still, he was confident he’d made the breakthrough he intended to by the time the next class period neared an end. Having admired Olivia and often followed her around, he knew she was in PE. With his modified device, he eagerly ran off to the gym.

By that time, Olivia had devoured everyone in sight. It felt so wonderful. She was in awe of her own ability to swallow such massive things and pack them away in her unbelievably expansive stomach. But the best detail was that her belly was packed with panicking, struggling pip-squeaks. While Olivia generally got whatever she wanted from her victims, she had never been satisfied that she’d taken enough from them. Now she’d taken everything. They would never deny her again. Even better, they were helping her take more and more for her own pleasure. Her greed was expanding as fast as her body, and she couldn’t wait to see just how much she could eat. As she dragged her way to the door, she began fantasizing about being a giant, growing monster. What would it feel like to have the entire school in her belly? Or the whole town? Her mind was reeling with excitement. She began drooling as the fantasy expanded to greater extremes. What would it be like to have the entire world stewing away inside her?

It was then that Olivia ran into a problem. She’d wedged herself part way through the door and gotten stuck. No matter what she tried, she couldn’t move forward or backward. Olivia squealed in frustration. As nice as it was to feel so many people digesting in her distended gut, there was so much more she wanted to eat and it was infuriatingly out of reach with her stuck in the doorframe.

Just then, Logan rounded the corner with his new machine. He nearly dropped it as he saw the new and “improved” Olivia. Her belly was roaring with its gurgling digestion, but Logan still had to block the terrible knowledge out of his mind that he could hear people begging under all that noise and all that fat. He had to snap her out of this frenzy and get her back to a normal size.

“Perfect timing, cutie!” Olivia beamed. “Seems I’m a little stuck. Mind giving me a hand?” Olivia reached out toward Logan with a massive, fat hand.

“I can do better than that,” Logan said proudly, but not without an undertone of terror. “I modified the machine. I can get you back to a normal size, Olivia!”

Olivia snorted angrily. “Down to a size where I can’t gulp people down? No thanks. Just get me out of here.”

Logan was tempted to obey her commands, both out of love and terror. But he was determined. He fiddled with the settings on his machine, pointed it at Olivia, and fired. It…
123113211122231121211132.title: Back to Logan, working on a shrink ray

choices: Olivia wants to feast on more food
1231132111222311212111321.content:
The effects of the machine were instantaneously noticeable, as Olivia's massive height slowly shrank down. She felt surprised at the feeling of her larger figure diminishing, then frowned as she felt less powerful and dominating. After a short while, she found herself resting at 5 foot 7 inches, still taller than how she was before this all happened but not tall enough for her to be the best.

"Well great," groaned Olivia, "I'm back to my wimpy size again. Thanks for nothing, Logan..."

"Well I wouldn't say you changed entirely," replied Logan, "You surprisingly retained your body fat."

Olivia looked down and noticed that her weight was still the same, as the hoodie she wore was holding her new fat and then some, while her skirt was a little loose on her. Her thighs and arms were still thicker than before, her butt was round and thicker, her face was plump, and her belly was still the biggest feature. She may have lost some height, but her gluttony remained intact.

"Well, what do you know," she said, "I still got my girlish figure."

"Yeah," replied Logan as he blushed, "And you still look good..."

"Ohh, you're a real sweetheart, Logey," replied Olivia as she stroked his chin gently, "You have a way with words... But your ways with technology ruined everything I ever wanted!"

"Well maybe we could try it another time. Besides, it's best to keep a low profile on your actions. How many people have you eaten so far?"

"Not enough," replied Olivia as she rubbed her fat.

"Well let's pace this a bit... If people found out about what we've been doing, it could fall into the wrong hands again. Heck, it could end up being someone worse than you!"

"Worse than me? Logey, I'm the toughest, fattest, smartest, and the meanest kid in this school. I AM the worse person to have been exposed to your machine and its effects. It was wonderful... But the point is that there's no one else dumb enough to tough enough to use it without having to deal with me!"

"Nevertheless, I'm keeping this device with me at all times. I don't think we should be using something so dangerous for some time."

Olivia pouted and folded her arms inward as Logan placed the small machine inside his backpack, along with the rest of his supplies. Secretly, he wanted to try and make Olivia grow again, but he knew it was too soon for it to happen again. If anything went wrong, it could mean utter devastation to everyone and everything. But despite her reckless intentions and pure gluttony, it was satisfying to see Olivia become such an enormous leviathan of gluttonous proportions.

What happens now?
1231132111222311212111321.title: Back to "Normal" Size...

choices: Olivia actually manages to eat a whole weeks worth of food
Olivia gets full/stuck before finishing everything.
12311321112223112121113211.content:
Olivia was furious, so close to everything she ever dreamed of (well dreamed of while it happened, Olivia never imagined eating the world as a dream before) and had it taken away by a little pipsqueek. To make matters worse Olivia was not only angry but she was somehow hungry, she was hangry and smitten with anger. This didn't bode well for poor Logan who was easily swept away and put into a trash can and rolled to the other end of the ladies locker room. Despite still digesting countless classmates and a few teachers she was absolutely ravenous and that's when the final period bell rang letting all her potential victims out of school and back to the relative safety of their families.

She shook her belly in frustration, "dammit Logan, I could have eaten the whole school, no the whole town but you just had to stop me huh, look at me I'm tiny now"

"I had to, you were becoming a monster Olivia, we have high school and college to look forward too, do you want the government to drop a bomb and make us all disappear! I did you a favor I swear, I'm sorry but it was for your own good!" Logan desperately replied as he tried to get out of the trash can Olivia stuffed him in.

Olivia couldn't say he was right, it would go straight to his head, but secretly she agreed, after all she has so many years left of good fun with her classmates, she was still the tallest and fattest in her grade, and she still may have some natural growth spurts in her before she needs the ray anyway. Still she was hungry and frustrated and kicked the can Logan was in which caused her whole body to shake.

Suddenly she let out a loud "BWURP" and ol and behold the janitors keys popped out of her mouth and onto the floor right in front of Logans face.

Logan stared nervously at the saliva covered keys, "Olivia what is that? Did you eat old man Jones??" He was a good guy, he worked at the school for 30 years!"

"Well he's working in me now, and you and him both get to be useful" Olivia signature evil smile creeped onto her face as she pulled Logan out from the trash can

"What how?"

"Well Logan, you're always in school after hours doing whatever nerdy stuff, I'm starving (Olivia slapped her large belly for emphasis), you're going to get me in the cafeteria and the kitchen by saying I'm working with you IF ANYONE is even here or asks, and you will do this for me understood"

"Gulp, what if we get caught! And, and-" Logan was interrupted by a peck on the cheek which immediately caused him to blush.

"You get more Olivia time, so just go with it, plus there's no cameras, how do you think I got away with everything?"

Olivia's belly gurgled loudly, as loud as it did when she was stuck in the doorway which made Logan nervous but he reluctantly went with the plan as he rubbed his cheek. Olivia just rubbed her belly, don't worry she thought, you'll be full again soon, even if I can't eat students I sure as hell can eat food.

Logan walked down the hallways to the kitchen trying to be sneaky but Olivia's loud footsteps and carefree attitude defeated the purpose. They didn't run into any teachers or students, the place was deserted after a certain janitor disappeared who would normally be on duty. They made it to the same Cafeteria Olivia had feasted in earlier and found the doors were locked. Tiny Logan couldn't see into the window so Olivia looked in and saw the coast was clear. After a few minutes of messing with the keys they got into the cafeteria and the kitchen and Olivia couldn't contain her delight any longer.

Inside the kitchen the pantry and fridge were fully stocked with a weeks worth of food meant for the students of her school, Olivia had something else in mind for the food though. She quickly barked orders at Logan telling him to take out cakes and ice cream to thaw, getting him to microwave burritos and other items and having him bake the frozen pizzas and other items that needed an oven. While Logan slaves in the kitchen Olivia ate and ate and ate. She sat her fat ass in the pantry and just demolished all the dry and ready to eat foods she could get her greedy little hands on.

Cookies, peanut butter crackers, nutter butters, chips, bread, cans of nacho cheese and tuna, it didn't matter for it all met the same fate in Olivia's belly. Meanwhile while Olivia was eating everything within reach Logan was off cooking everything he could as fast as he could. He had this weird sensation of fear and... happiness, he was actually happy to be feeding Olivia!

He got a full view of Olivia's growing belly every time he went to put ice cream or burritos or whatever was ready in the pantry. Olivia's only interest was eating and why leave a pantry filled with yummy treats when you can have more treats brought to you anyway. She ate and grew and ate and grew seemingly not never getting full. Her belly took up more and more of the pantry as the food disappeared and she grew. Logan couldn't believe his eyes even at a much more reasons 5'7 Olivia was still eating like she was a giant. He made a mental note to do further test on the effects of shrinking things when he got home but for now his main focus was to not incur Olivia's wrath.

Logan was worried though, could Olivia really eat a full weeks worth of food and she was growing so big so fast she was bound to get stuck if she didn't get out of the pantry. Not that Olivia noticed, she was in heaven and the food almost seemed endless. Logan just hoped that Olivia would get full before the trouble really began.
12311321112223112121113211.title: She can't eat the students so eat the schools food

12311321112223112121113212.content:
Olivia may be disappointed that Logan had made her back to normal slightly, and ruined her moment, despite it deemed unsafe if she was to grow even larger and fatter, and consume every person from her desires. She was loving being fatter, and could even imagine if herself dominating the school, or even the town for that matter, but all she would have to get is that machine Logan now possesses in his backpack.

And so it was recess, when both have gotten outside to have some fresh air, and even Logan could sigh of relief of this moment, though he as getting thirsty and let’s Olivia know by placing the backpack on the bench.

“Olivia, my mouth’s dry at the moment. So I’ll head over to drink some water till I come back.” Logan says and walks away from the scene for now.

“Okay, Logey, take your time!” Olivia sits down and sighed, still moaning about being only that taller and a little fat, despite she was enjoying being so monstrous at times.

She would look around the place and even her stomach was started to growl heavily. She knows that she was getting hungry, and would only wish if she had that machine in her hands to use it. However, that’s when she looked over and there’s Logan’s backpack sitting beside her. That surprised Olivia despite a nerd kept his promise to process the machine at all times, but it was left sitting there, and it got her thinking with a smirk look to her face.

“Well well, I don’t suppose I could try things out, if you don’t mind, cutie?” Olivia says to herself and opens up Logan’s backpack and takes out the machine almost immediately.

She takes a closer look and see’s how it all works. There’s a switch that can make it grow and in reverse, and that’s she she smirked and turned to growth on, but this time, puts on even more increase of the growth and get much bigger and fatter than she originally was before.

Olivia was ready to go and tries to aim herself with it. That’s when she realised Logan was back from drinking water. Though he puts his glasses back on again, Olivia had to be quick and use the machine straight away. Then come to think of it, she may have other ideas and thought this could be fun, if she ever wants to?

That’s when she would aim with the machine and decides to shoot at _____ to get bigger and fatter.
12311321112223112121113212.title: Don’t Leave Your Backpack Unattended

choices: Olivia begins rampaging through the school, devouring everything in sight
1231132111222311212111322.content:
The beam shot out of Logan’s device and zapped Olivia. Logan watched with slightly smug certainty that his plan had succeeded while Olivia’s body ripped and shifted. His confidence wavered and then collapsed into terrified shame as the floor and walls began to rumble. Olivia’s stomach rapidly digested its contents, fueling a greatly intensified reaction inside her. The effects “food” had on her growth had increased significantly and the doorframe she was stuck in began to buckle and crack.

Logan had no choice but to run as Olivia expanded: first breaking out of her prison, then out of the walls, and then out of the roof! Logan clenched his fists. How could he be stupid enough to make this big of a mistake?! Did he really let himself get that distracted during his work? He didn’t want to imagine how badly everything could go now. His distracted mind might have just unleashed something truly devastating upon the world.

Olivia stopped growing at a towering 30 feet tall. She looked around with a massive grin as people began to panic. Her body was finally beginning to be proportionate to her ego, and she couldn’t wait to use this new body to bully all of these puny people. Acting fast, she used her fat fists to collapse every exit from the school except the one block by her obese, gigantic form. She scanned through the terrified crowd of students and staff until she spotted Logan. She snatched him up and brought him to her face.

“Oh you sweet little boy!” Olivia exclaimed. “I knew you were just kidding about shrinking me down. You really love the new me, huh?”

Olivia brought Logan to her massive mouth and gave him a few dramatic smooches. Logan screamed in terror, thinking she was about to swallow him down, but then blushed profusely as she gave him surreal, enveloping kisses.

“Now, I’m wasting away and need to eat a little something – or somethings. You just hang tight and watch me enjoy your sweet gifts.”

With that, Olivia deposited Logan in her hair, giving him something to desperately grasp on to as Olivia went to work.

“Now,” Olivia boomed to the school, “I’ve been trying to show you for years that you’re supposed to give me whatever I want whenever I want it. But I don’t think you numb-skulls got the message. So it’s only fair that I take what I want now to teach you a lesson.”

Olivia bent down, sweeping up a handful of 7 kids, and popped them in her mouth. At this size, and with her body’s incredible expansive abilities, it was no problem to swallow down the 7 struggling students. Olivia moaned contentedly as she felt them splash into the digestive mush and begin squirming around, desperate to find a way to escape and save themselves. It felt good to take advantage of people this much, and finally begin satisfying some of her dark appetites. But “begin” was a key word. There was so much more she had yet to do…
1231132111222311212111322.title: Malfunctions! Olivia grows into a giant!

12311321112223112121113221.content:
The trapped students and staff screamed in horror as they saw the bulge of seven students slip down Olivia's fat neck. Their terror was only intensified the globular giant proudly patted her protruding gut, which caused her to burp and her stomach to shrink slightly: revealing distinct hints of the squirming, suffering students inside.

Olivia looked at the trapped, panicking people with a feeling of great contentment. "It makes me so happy to have you all admire me so much! You're finally looking at me with the awe I deserve." Olivia smiled down at the crowd with a toothy, greedy grin. "But enough friendly chat. Back to business!"

Everyone in sight did everything they could to flee and hide from the massive bully. It took some restraint on Olivia's part to not just drop to the ground and sweep everything she could grab into her mouth. Instead, she wanted to take her time and enjoy the experience. After all, it's not every day you get to eat everyone in your school. It was such a wonderfully efficient way of bullying everyone all at once and feeding her insatiable hunger.

Olivia drummed her fingers on her jiggling gut - still feeling the squirming prey inside - as she thoughtfully looked over the panicking crowd. Who to start with first? They would all be ground up into energy and fat inside her sooner or later, but this was a special event worth savoring.

As she watched students and teachers scramble to hide anywhere they could, Olivia reached and obvious conclusion: why not start in the same place her days usually began? She stomped over to her homeroom and was overjoyed to see about 40 people crammed into the room: nearly double the amount of students who were normally there.

She crouched down, her immense belly nearly resting on the ground between her knees, and reached toward the door, only to have it slammed in her face. Olivia's pleasure turned to rage: how dare they deny her this food? How selfish of them! How inconsiderate! Hadn't they all learned their rightful place yet? In her anger, Olivia simply punched through the walls and tore them away in handfuls. With an evil grin and a lick of her lips, Olivia gazed down at the revealed buffet of humans. But she couldn't grab them with her hands full. She momentarily thought of dropping the debris, but then realized that her body could surely digest anything at this point. Why not make her desire to eat her entire school a little more literal? Not to mention she was eager to grow bigger and bigger. So instead, Olivia stuffed the handfuls of drywall into her mouth, munched them up, and gulped them down. With her mouth and hands open, she was ready to resume her feast.

Meanwhile, Logan had been swept up in the rest of the crowd. He, too, was panicking in the face of a giant, gluttonous Olivia, but he was also wracked with guilt for being responsible for this massacre. However, Logan's horror, unlike most around him, made him become enraptured in watching the scene unfold, like being unable to look away from a car wreck. As Olivia dug into the helpless people hiding in her homeroom, Logan was struck with a feeling of absurdity as the first thing it reminded him of was how Garfield ate lasagna. Olivia was grabbing handful after handful of people and tossing them greedily into her mouth. They plummeted down the pit of her throat with virtually no effort. Logan grew queasy as he saw her belly swell further and further out as it became packed with panicking people.

Olivia shoved the last of the 40 people into her gaping mouth and swallow them down. In rapture, Olivia collapsed backwards onto her fat butt, shaking the ground on impact. With immense pleasure, she ran her hands over her stuffed stomach, feeling all the wiggling, screaming, crying people inside.

"Oh yes!" Olivia exclaimed. "That feels so great. I wish I had done this years ago; you're all so tasty and it's so satisfying to finally have you all where you belong," she gloated, directing her words towards to belly, whether the trapped morsels could hear her or not.

Wish significant effort and a lot of heavy breathing, Olivia rose back to her feet. As she did, her stomach let out a loud grumble which shook her body. "Ah, here it comes!" she announced, "get ready to become fat on my growing body, pipsqueaks!"

Olivia set out to continue rampaging while her gurgling gut began breaking down all the suffering people she had stuffed inside her stomach.

Next, Olivia makes her way to...
12311321112223112121113221.title: Olivia begins rampaging through the school, dev...

choices: Logan has thought up a dark and desperate plan to stop Olivia
123113211122231121211132212.content:
Olivia was pretty sure where she could go to find the biggest meal in the whole building: the gym. After all, it was big enough to house every kid and adult in the school for assemblies. She was almost certain it would have lots of tasty victims to continue satisfying her lust for power and her hunger for struggling food.

As Olivia stomped her way across the school, knocking down walls in her path and sending students diving for cover, she felt her body begin to bubble and stretch. What used to be a quivering across her body was now closer to an earthquake. Whatever Logan had done in his most recent body-altering attempt seemed to have intensified the growing process. Olivia rapidly shot up another 10 feet and her belly bulged out 5 feet further. She was now a towering 40 feet tall and looked fatter than ever. She loved the sensation, the new height, and being one step closer to devouring literally everything. But, there was one major drawback: she couldn’t feel people panicking and squirming in her immense stomach anymore. She hastened toward the gym, determined to fix that problem.

Olivia’s earth-shaking steps came to a halt in front of the double doors to the gym. Her head now poked out of the building, and she could see inside through a crack in the roof she created when she smashed the emergency exit from the gym. What Olivia saw inside made her mouth water and her stomach gurgle greedily. Easily 150 students and adults were grouped inside the gym. Some idiot must have thought it would help protect them. Olivia didn’t mind though. It was actually quite nice of them to serve her up a hefty helping of food like this.

Olivia stormed into the gym, knocking down the wall and leaving it a ruined pile of rubble. Thinking fast, she tore out the bleachers, chunks of the roof, and any other debris she could. She hurled this debris at all of the remaining exits, ensuring that these miniscule morsels couldn’t even escape back into the hall and locker room (one of which was already in shambles from her initial giant growth). A couple students were hit with debris, but it was a sacrifice Olivia was willing to make, despite her stomach’s protests.

When she was done, close to a 150 people were trapped in a pen. With how the debris had crumbled, it was almost like they were nestled in a bowl in front of Olivia (though if she had been a normal size, this “bowl” would be as big as a small table). Her mind was quickly being overtaken by a gluttonous haze, but she fought back the urge to cram her mouth as full as possible, at least long enough to survey the crowd. Without knowing what she was looking for, she found exactly the people she would want to start with. Mr. Danvers, the principal, Mrs. Johnson, the assistant principal were both gathered there. Other than Mrs. Belommy, the gym teacher who constantly shamed Olivia for being fat and intervened to stop her bullying during PE, the two administrators were the people who had caused the most problems for Olivia in her bullying and eating (and Mrs. Belommy was now fat on Olivia’s body anyhow, so that grievance was taken care of).

Olivia snatched the two up as they tried to run. “Remember all the times you two got me in trouble? All the times you told me no one gets ahead in life by being a bully? Well, I’m sick and tired of letting you walk all over me. Let me show you how pointless your attempts to stop me are, and I’ll show you why being a bully is the greatest thing a person can be!”

With that she opened her massive maw, already slick with saliva. As the principal and vice principal gazed down into the putrid pit of Olivia’s throat, they had a moment of terror to appreciate just how “ahead in life” Olivia was quickly becoming before they plummeted down the dark, rippling tunnel. All of the survivors in the gym screamed in horror as the administrators formed a large lump in Olivia’s rippling, multi-chinned neck and sank into her stomach. She knew her hunger was about to take over, so she savored her last lucid moments, enjoying every flavor and every tiny sensation of mercilessly devouring the two most powerful adults in the school.

“Well,” Olivia proclaimed cheerfully, “I guess it’s my school now, huh? Though if you all weren’t so dense, you would have realized it was my school a long time ago! Oh well, no need to worry about fixing that now. The only thing you have to worry about is getting slurped down my throat and broken down in my belly.”

Some of the trapped people were so panicked and confused they stepped forward, unintentionally offering themselves to Olivia. While she appreciated the gesture, it was all a moot now. Olivia flopped on her belly and did to the gym what she nearly did to her homeroom: she reached out both of her hands, corralled all “food,” and began shoving them all into her wide, wet mouth. Olivia’s stomach was pitifully empty and she was eager to eat more thing – all things – so she tried to get this feast inside her as fast as possible. It was a non-stop flood of gulping and grabbing as 144 people were dragged into the gorging giant. The people were climbing and stampeding over one another, but it was futile. Even the lucky few that made it out of her fat arms had nowhere to run and were snatched back up.

To Olivia, the flood of people was like chugging down some thick and chunky liquid. It was almost like she drank a couple gallons of dense, chunky soup in only a couple minutes. Only there was no liquid, and she was swallowing down things that Olivia had only recently come to view as food (though she had secretly always wondered what it would be like to eat someone). When she was done her stomach was more packed than it had ever been in her entire life. It was an enormous bulging, moving mass. The people inside were packed so tightly that Olivia could see their forms pressed up against her skin, despite all her layers of blubber. It really made it clear that the food inside her wasn’t normal food: Olivia could clearly see that the moving she felt inside of her were the desperate life-and-death struggles of real human beings. Humans that she had gone to school with day in and day out for years. Now just nothing but calories and fuel for her insatiable, voracious lust.

Olivia’s eyes rolled back in pleasure as she reveled in the most filling, pleasurable meal she’d ever had. After her pleasure subsided and digestion set in, Olivia attempted to get up. Much to her satisfaction, her body had gained incredible amounts of muscle as part of her growth and she rose with ease, despite a highly altered center of gravity. She stomped her way out of the gym, lovingly rubbing over her engorged stomach and she continued her quest to finish of the school and move on to bigger and better meals.
123113211122231121211132212.title: Next Stop for Stuffing her Belly

choices: "I need you to make me even bigger."
"I need you to complete my school-wide feast, by joining our friends in my belly
1231132111222311212111322121.content:
Olivia began to shoot up from her gargantuan gym feast. Up until now, the unusually high ceilings of the school's first floor had been able to contain her. But now, she was growing so much that even lying on her belly her head started to break through to the classrooms on the second floor.

The students above had no idea what had just happened below them. Oh, they had heard some screams coming from the assembly room. But kids being unruly there was nothing new. So, the students in the classroom right above the gym were utterly shocked when Olivia's giant face burst in from under them.

Several students were thrown into the air. Some landed against the wall. Others landed directly in Olivia's mouth. She barely noticed as she swallowed them.

Olivia's hands had not yet punched through to the second floor. But she didn't need them to eat the rest of the class. She inhaled gigantic gulps of air as she moved her head forward, mouth chomping all the while. Students were rushing towards the door or madly trying to hang onto chairs. It was no use. Everyone in the class was sucked into the black hole of Olivia's mouth, their screams stifled in an instant by the loud smacking sounds of her frenetic guzzling.

Olivia's could see only into the classroom in which her head had burst. So she swung her head from side to side, smashing through the walls to the left and right of her, exposing more classrooms to her greedy gaze. These two classrooms were right above her hands on the ground level. She punched through the first floor, grabbing fistfuls of students, and shoving them into her mouth.

Some of the students evaded her grasp, falling down the holes that she had made with her hands. But they landed directly on her belly, sinking into her fat. Their wild but futile struggles to free themselves from their quicksand-like surroundings only succeeded in tickling her.

"Ooh ooh, hahaha!" she bellowed. "Ooh stop it, that tickles!"

Her uncontrollable laughter caused some students to fly out of her mouth, granting them temporary reprieve. But only for a second, as they were instantaneously shoveled back into her mouth and down her eager throat.

She smashed downwards with her chin, so that she could see her own body. Some of the students were buried so deep in her blubber that they weren't even visible. All she could see were the depressions where they had sunk into herr. They would be nearly impossible to fish out with her hands, so she didn't try. Instead, she planted her own face into her stomach, licking up everything.

She headbutted her way into the second floor hallway. She knew where all of the remaining classrooms were. She had been continuously growing throughout. And she no longer needed to use her hands, because her tongue was so strong that she could use it to break down the doors of the classroom and lick every corner clean. This was followed by crunching through all the floors and walls. Less succulent than teachers and students, for sure. But the knowledge that she was destroying the school heightened the otherwise dull flavor.

In a couple of minutes, the ceilings and floors separating the first and second floors were gone. There were no tables to be seen, no chairs and no doors. Not a single object could be seen inside in the school. It was like an empty shell, all of whose contents had been swallowed by the monstrous, gluttonous girl.

And there in the center, lying on the floor and rubbing her immense stomach, was Olivia herself. She could feel all the freshly swallowed people desperately struggling inside her, their screams faintly audible. Her eyes rolled with pleasure at the sensation, and even more at the knowledge of that there were hundreds of them. What heaven! But hundreds was nothing. She dreamed of thousands.

There was only one person in the entire school still alive. Looking up at her was awestruck Logan, covered in dust and rubble from the collapsing building.

"Oh, Logan! There you are." she cried, as she spotted him. She scooped him up to her face. "I was beginning to think that I might have eaten you."

"Yeah, I'm sure you took great care not to do that," he said, sarcastically.

"I tried not to. But..." Olivia shrugged. "If I'm honest, I don't really see faces any longer. Only juicy, little treats, waiting to be gobbled up." She looked him squarely in the eyes. "But I need one more thing from you..."
1231132111222311212111322121.title: Up to the Second Floor

choices: "I'm sorry Olivia. I can't let you eat more people."
12311321112223112121113221211.content:
"I need you to make me even bigger," said Olivia.

"What?!" cried Logan. "How could I possibly do that after watching you massacre every single person I grew up with."

"Logan, right now, you and I are the only ones that know that I've eaten the entire school. But my head is almost brushing the ceiling. My next growth spurt is going to make me bust through the place, and everyone will see me."

"And what? You're ashamed of the world seeing you like this?"

Olivia gave a giant laugh. It rippled through her gargantuan belly, shaking all the walls surrounding it, tossing around those few inhabitants of her belly that were still alive and had not succumbed to her juices.

"Ashamed?! This is the greatest day of my life. I have never felt more alive, more powerful." She paused. "And more beautiful." She gazed into his eyes. "Tell me honestly, Logan. Have you ever seen me look this beautiful?"

Logan had to admit to himself that he hadn't. As repulsed as he was by her actions, by the fact that she had become a mass murderer--when he looked at the majesty of her size, the gluttonous glint in her eye, and her entire body heaving with excitement at the thought of just how many people he had eaten, his already strong attraction to her grew even stronger.

"Then, what are you worried about?" he asked.

"As soon as the city sees how big I am, and what I've done, they'll send the entire police force to kill me. Unless..."

"Unless?"

"Unless I'm too big for them to kill. Unless I'm big enough that the entire city is at my mercy."

There was a rumble. Olivia began growing from her recent binge. The walls and ceiling began to crack from her expanding body. In a minute, the building would shatter.

"Hurry, Logan! There isn't much time! Don't let them kill me." She begged, and she gave him her cutest pout.

Logan shuddered. How could he help her further, after her seeing what she did? He would be responsible for the deaths of all of her future victims. And who knew who many that would be? Yet, in spite of everything, he still loved her and didn't want to see her killed. He had to come to a decision quickly.
12311321112223112121113221211.title: Logan's Dilemma

123113211122231121211132212112.content:
"What did you say?!" growled Olivia. She dropped her cute act. "I thought you loved me, you insolent pipsqueak."

"I do! I do!" cried Logan, as he backed away from her. "But answer me honestly, Olivia: how many people are you planning to eat before you stop this rampage?"

"Oh, just a few" said Olivia. "Maybe a couple of thousand."

Logan felt a little sick at hearing her definition of "few."

"I don't believe you would stop there," he said. If you could eat all seven billion people in the world, would you do it?"

"Seven billion? Is that how many people there are?" cried Olivia. She was visibly salivating. "Alright, I admit it!" she cried, "I want them all! I want to eat cities, countries, continents!"

"You're talking about armageddon! I can't let you destory the entire planet!"

"Well, well, looks like my little shrimp has grown a spine," said Olivia, menacingly. "You know what I do with spines, Logan? I break them! Now, gimme the machine!"

"No way!" said Logan. And he darted out through a gap in the wrecked school, and sprinted away as quickly as he could.

Olivia heaved herself onto her feet (no simple task); she smashed her way through the remainder of the school, and began to run after him. She hopping mad: mad not only that her shot at ultimate power was skittering away, but also that time spent chasing Logan was time spent doing something other than eating people.

Logan glanced backwards. Olivia's strides were gigantic and getting larger all the while as she continued to grow, but her girth was so enormous that it was slowing her down, as did the many pedestrians and cars she was carelessly smashing underfoot. Huffing and puffing with all her might, she could barely manage a jog.

Could she narrow the gap, and catch up to him?
123113211122231121211132212112.title: Armageddon Outta Here

1231132111222311212111322122.content:
During all the chaos, Logan had managed to wiggle himself free from Olivia's hair. As he got swept away with the crowd, Logan desperately held onto his device, despite his terror that it would draw attention to him and people would know he was responsible for the devouring, destructive giantess. As Olivia devoured everyone in the gym, Logan arrived in his private sanctum: the science classroom.

He thought long and hard, wracking his brain for any solution to Olivia and her insatiable appetite and growth. He how had serious self-doubt about his ability to reliably modify his device to reverse the growing effects. He could try, but he desperately tried to brainstorm other solutions. Olivia's giant mass was making her unstoppable. She had always had a talent for throwing around her massive weight in order to get what she wants. Now that weight was beyond Logan's imagination. She was going to keep growing and eating and no one could stop her.

You don't know that, Logan's scientific mind countered. You haven't conducted every possible experiment. If being bigger than everyone is what makes her unstoppable, there's something you know you could try.

No! I can't do that. his ethical mind responded. But it was a weak counterargument. Logan knew he could do it. He'd seen it work on Olivia more than once. He was sure it could work on someone else. Then Olivia wouldn't have the upper hand due to her size anymore. It might just take a giant to counter a giant.

But that was more desperate of a gambit than trying to reverse the effects, wasn't it? He could create someone just as dangerous (though he couldn't in all honesty believe it was possible to make a more dangerous giant than Olivia). Still, is Olivia was telling the truth about Kirsty's plan to eat Olivia, then this power had already corrupted someone else. It might happen again.

Logan was out of ideas on how to properly fix the device, particularly when his mind was so clouded by terror and shame. He concluded that he had to try. Realistically, Olivia might just overpower them anyway, so there was a chance the second giant could be kept in check, worst case scenario. What if he chose someone incorruptible? Was there such a person in the school?

Well, there is one person that just asked himself that question. his mind answered.

No, he couldn't. Could he? That just wasn't his personality. On the other hand, he did desperately want to save Olivia, and he knew he could trust himself. However, he could surely find someone else, too, either talk them into it or do it without asking.

With Logan's mind already far down this dark path, he concluded that he had to try...

Oblivious to the monumental shift in Logan’s life, Olivia gazed hungrily over the expansive complex of production facilities the town nicknamed “the food factory.” She was vaguely aware of the masses of people screaming in terror, but her brain was mostly preoccupied with a debate of what to eat first. Her latest growth - which brought her up to a respectable height of 50 feet - left her belly rumbling for more food.

The terrified people excited Olivia more than any other food she could choose from, but having eaten nearly her entire school, she thought balancing out her diet might be a good idea. Then again, one of her goals had been to eat the entire town, and half of them worked in this complex.

Well, why choose? I could just eat everything, the ambitious bully thought to herself. She was used to getting everything she wanted, which meant her meals and desserts were usually extremely diverse, even before people were added to her diet. Still, even though all her gluttony and ego, she had to wonder just how much she could really fit inside her belly. So far, her record sat just shy of 200 people. This factory, on the other hand, employed closer to 5,000 people, and the buildings were packed with food. Sure, she was 10 feet taller and her stomach stuck nearly another 10 feet out, but she had to admit 5,000 people was out of the question.
...For now. Why not eat as much as she could, grow more, and catch these wiggling morsels later? Olivia shrugged. All this internal debate was just making her hungrier. Time to start thinking with her stomach.

Olivia wasted no more time. She ripped off the roof to the confectionary wing of the factory. At 50 feet tall, the building was just above the height of her belly, so she had to smash some of the walls to give her unfettered access. The panicked humans inside immediately began to flee. As she had done with the school, Olivia smashed the exits as quickly as she could, even if some still got away. Meanwhile, the mostly automated production line kept on producing a variety of sweets. The smell of both the sugary treats and the terrified humans made Olivia’s mouth water.

Stepping into the building, Olivia plopped on her immense stomach, right in front of the end of one of the production lines, which she promptly redirected to be conveying then into her waiting mouth. Meanwhile, she was reach out and snatching every person she could and stuffing them greedily down her throat along with the desserts. The humans were largely covered in sweat as they gazed in fear upon the globular giantess. That saltiness perfectly complemented the sweetness of the desserts. Olivia was in heaven, particularly as she imagined all the things she had yet to eat and all the things her ever-expanding height and waistline would allow her to pack into her ravenous stomach.

Olivia inched her way further through the production line, not caring that the machines and conveyor belts were also sliding down her throat. This also enabled her to grab at more people and gulp them down. In less than five minutes, she had cleared the floor of every person and munched away at the machines enough that they were no longer producing more food. She finished off this most immediate meal by guzzling down a gigantic vat of frosting, as if drinking water to wash down a meal.
While she could faintly detect the workers struggling under the pile of sweets she’d stuffed herself with, there was still so much room left in her belly.

Next…

1233.title: Her Hunger Is Insatiable

12331.content:
Olivia marched her way into the cafeteria and flung open the doors. Fifteen fourth graders had just sat down to lunch. They cowered at the sight of Olivia. Whatever her plans were for them, they couldn't be good.

Normally, Olivia would be savoring their frightened expressions. But she wasn't even looking at their faces, only at what they held in their hands: food! One kid had taken his first bite of his sandwich, and was still holding it to his mouth.

"Out of my way, pipsqueak!" she bellowed and she rushed towards him. She grabbed the sandwich out of his hand, and shoved him to the floor. The kids looked on as Olivia scarfed it down faster than they could have imagined it was possible to consume food.

"The rest of you, give me your lunches. Now!"

Some immediately capitulated, handing their brown paper bags to Olivia. She ripped them apart eagerly to get at the food. She tore the tops off bottles with her teeth, and drank their contents in a single swallow. A few students tried to make a run for it.

"Where do you think you're going?" Olivia growled. She tackled them, forced them face-down onto the ground, and then sat on them.

"I know that you have more lunches." she said to the remaining students. "Give them to me!"

Some students denied it. She turned them upside-down and shook them until their lunches clattered to the floor. She ate them, and slammed the students against the tables as punishment.

Then the terrified kids noticed something. With each swallow of food, Olivia appeared to grow larger.

"Olivia...Are you getting bigger?" asked one girl.

Olivia hadn't noticed anything. She had been too absorbed in her gluttony. But now that the question had been raised, everything else around did look smaller than usual...She wanted to test the theory.

"Put all of your money in the vending machines in the corner, and buy me food," said Olivia.

The kids did as they were told. Olivia ate each item they brought her, and she waited for its effects. Sure enough, she saw her perspective change. Eating was making her grow! By the time, the kids had spent all their money, she was fully six feet tall.

Olivia thought about the possibilities. She wanted to keep growing. As much as possible. She wanted to be huge, big enough to bully everyone in the school, even the grown-ups. She took a chair and smashed the glass on the vending machine.

"Give me all of that food."

The children scrambled to give it to her. They were too scared to resist, as they watched her grow, foot by foot. But of course, the contents of the vending machine were not enough to satisfy her hungers for food and power. With her now immense strength, she wrenched the kitchen door open, busting through its lock.

"Feed me everything in the kitchen," she ordered.

The students obliged. Packages of salad greens, hot dogs and their buns, hamburger patties (still raw). They gave them all to Olivia, who barely chewed as she greedily guzzled them down. Soon prepared foods were gone, and she moved onto ingredients: tubs of condiments, sacks of flour and sugar. She gulped down bottles of cooking oil like they were soda. Anything edible disappeared into her. She had grown so much that her head was brushing the ceiling. She didn't look like a girl any longer, but like some ogre out of a fairy tale.

"Why have you stopped?" demanded Olivia. "Keep feeding me."

"The kitchen is empty" said one kid. "There's no more food."

What does Olivia do next?
12331.title: Feeding the Ogre

choices: To her next class. Eat people her own age.
To a kindergarten. She wants more little kids.
123312.content:
Olivia bent down and grabbed a little boy. At her newfound size, her meaty paw easily spanned his waist. She gripped tightly, constricting his breathing.

"We're not holding out on you," gasped the boy. "There's nothing left for you to eat, Olivia. Honest!"

But Olivia's greed was insatiable. She needed more! Suddenly, an idea struck her, and her sadistic smile grew larger and more evil.

"Oh, I see plenty left to eat!" she chortled. Then she popped the boy into her mouth and swallowed him.

It was by far the best sensation she had ever felt in her life. In one action, it satisfied every primal instinct she had: to eat non-stop, to cause a maximum of suffering, and to grow ever more powerful.

The children screamed in absolute terror. They scattered in all directions, hoping to escape the cafeteria. But Olivia was too large. She flopped onto the floor, trapping several students beneath her massive torso. With her free arms, she swept up all of the stragglers.

Part of Olivia wanted to savor the fear in the children's eyes. Another part of her wanted to gobble them up as quickly as possible. As usual, the gluttonous half won. Through the layers of blubber, the students trapped underneath her heard a horrible sonic combination: the wet smacking of Olivia's lips, her moans of pleasure, the pained cries of their classmates, and the gulp as each of them was forced down her throat. They could feel Olivia's body growing with each child she ate. And worst of all, they could feel the swallowed children pounding against the walls of Olivia's stomach, trying in vain to escape.

Olivia shifted to uncover the other students.

"Ooh, goody, another course!" she said. Then she made short work of them.

She lay back on her butt and rubbed her stomach with satisfaction. She jabbed a couple of the flailing forms with a finger, for good measure. The satisfaction subsided quickly and was replaced by greed. Fifteen kids was nowhere near enough. They were barely an appetizer. Her school had hundreds of people in it. Hundreds! Drool dribbled down her massive double chin. Man oh man, could she possibly eat all of them? Only one way to find out!

Where did she go next?

Kelsey Levesque is a young girl with blonde hair and an tomboy attitude, wearing casual clothes. She was standing by her locker, scanning over images on her phone. While some might think she's just browsing through social media, she was actually looking through images of fat characters. While most of them were from cartoons, they would consist of fat characters or characters that were getting fatter. To her, it was a big fascination to her, seeing these people or animals go from lean to large or even larger than normal. To her it was hard to describe the feeling.

"Hey you!"

But her thoughts were interrupted by the young bully Lewis. He marched towards her with determination, while Kelsey looked at him with a sign of disinterest. She knew he was going to be bad news, but decided to go along with it just so she could be left alone afterwards.

"What do you want," she grumbled.

"Well I think a lovely little dish like yourself should be nice enough to pay for my snacks," he said acting all machismo.

"What makes you think I'm going to be your slave and pay for your food?"

"Because I'm a growing boy and growing boys need proper nourishment," he replied as he patted his flat abdomen.

"What, you actually want to get fat," asked Kelsey, thinking he was certifiably nuts.

"Well maybe I do," he replied without hesitation, "Maybe I want to be the fattest kid in the school. Maybe I took something that will help me achieve that goal and really give these losers a run for their money."

Kelsey could only stare at him blankly after what he just said. What could possibly possess this young upstart to think being fat was going to be worthwhile? And what did he take that could "achieve" his goal?

"You can't be serious," she said, "You can't get fat that quickly. It takes time to add a couple pounds."

"How would you know," he asked sharply.

"It's common sense," she replied, "besides, some people have a different metabolism. Some people may never get fat."

"Yeah, well you're looking at someone who took something special to change this frail little punk into a big chunky nightmare."

"How exactly can you prove it?"

Lewis held her hand gently, bringing it close to their faces.

"Pay me for a few snacks and I guarantee you a show you will never forget," he said with determination.

Kelsey looked him over and thought for a long time about this. Then she asked him a crucial question.

"What happens if it doesn't work?"

"Well if it doesn't work, then I'll reimburse you for the snacks and leave you alone for the rest of the school year."

She thought about it for another moment. Even if it was a joke, at least he would pay her back and would never bother her again. What did she have to lose?

"Alright," she replied, "But this better not be a stupid prank."

"Believe me, you won't be disappointed..."

------------------------------------------------------

The two arrived at the vending machine, looking at the vast amount of junk food made available.

"Jeez, quite a selection here," said Kelsey, looking at the large amount of fatty snacks inside the machine.

"Yeah, I can't wait," replied Lewis, licking his lips eagerly.

"Alright, so what do you want?"

Lewis looked inside carefully, going over each row and each snack. Then his eyes were glued to a specific threat that was nearly dead center of the machine.

S'MORE PIE

This was one of the most popular snack treats that is nearly the most fattening snack ever made. The mixture of chocolate and marshmallow in a graham cracker crust could almost put Hostess' pies and cakes to shame.

"THAT," bellowed Lewis, poking into the section eagerly.

Kelsey sighed as she pulled out five $1 bills and placed each one inside. She pressed the button combination of the snack's section and soon the pies fell down. Lewis reached down and grabbed the five pies from the dispenser and began to scarf them down. Kelsey just looked at him with disgust, as he basically acted completely desperate over the pies.

Wrapper after wrapper, bite after bite, the pies were eaten by the young hooligan, who wiped the excess chocolate and marshmallow remains off of his lips and licked his fingers clean. His belly had bulged out barely an inch outward, hardly seemed noticeable. Kelsey looked over and felt like she was ripped off.

"Was that it," she yelled, "Was that all you were going to show me? Just you making a pig of yourself?!"

"Oh no," Lewis replied as he was holding his abdomen, "This is only the beginning..."

Before she could say anything else, a loud groan was coming from Lewis's belly. Soon the potion he took before entering the school was beginning to take an effect. A loud gurgle followed afterward, as his body began to expand...

Lewis held his abdomen as he began to feel it become round and large, forming into a very noticeable belly. It shook slightly as it grew, rising his shirt up slightly. His arms began to get a little thicker, looking slightly flabby as they would grow and jiggle. His face had begun to add some weight, with his cheeks getting more noticeably large and a double chin beginning to form within his neck region. His legs weren't left out either, as they began to expand from within his sweatpants, which were now fitting firmly than looking baggy. Even his hips and butt were added to his frame, looking fat and very noticeable.

This young and frail child was becoming pretty chubby and Kelsey took notice...

Soon the growth slowed down, as he now weighed at a new weight of 140 lbs. It may not be big, but certainly noticeable for a small boy like Lewis. Kelsey looked at him with awe as the once thin kid was now a chubby punk. And they were certainly liking it. Lewis patted his new belly and looked over and Kelsey with pride.

"So, what do you think of this," he asked with a wicked grin on his face.

"That... is so cool," she said with a look of surprise.

"Really? You like this?"

Kelsey snapped out of her trance and formed a grin on her face as she walked over to him.

"Well yeah, you certainly have a better figure on you," she said in a flirty fashion, "But..."

"But what?"

"But I think you need to eat more..."

"Wait, what?"

Kelsey walked over to the vending machine and placed another dollar inside. She pressed a button combination and grabbed a king-sized candy bar from inside. She gingerly opened the wrapping from the top and began to wave it in Lewis' face.

"I think a boy like you could enjoy being a lot fatter with proper nourishment and a good person to assist him," she said with her grin getting wider, "If you like eating and getting fat, why not go further with it?"

"Yeah, it does sound pretty good," he said in his own trance as the candy bar was dangling in his face.

Lewis began to moan to the idea, beginning to think about looking fatter than ever, waddling within the hallway as students cowered in fear at the sight of the fattest bully in school.

"And all the food you get will help you get fatter every day," she whispered in his ear as she moved the candy bar close to his lips.

"Yes, the fatter the better," he replied as his mouth was getting closer to the candy bar.

"Then don't stop... eat..."

Lewis felt the candy bar enter his mouth and began to chew on it ravenously, savoring the chocolate taste. Kelsey smiled as she gently held his belly, which was beginning to expand slowly from the chocolate bar. Her fingers were pressed against the fat gently, feeling it expand within her grasp.

"Alright fatty, if you really want to be the biggest, then you're gonna have to keep it up," she said as she had gone from seductive to serious.

"Alright, so when do we eat," he asked as he patted his slightly bigger belly, "I still have some room."

It was a short drive to meet up with Kelsey, considering how she lives nearly across town. The house he was meeting her looked average for a two story home, with a few interesting decorations shown from the front lawn.

After being dropped off, Lewis adjusted his clothes as they struggled to adjust to his new weight. He rang the doorbell, waited for a short moment, then noticed the door opening. From behind the door was a tall and older looking man wearing a sweater vest and a pair of thick glasses. He looked down and smiled at Lewis.

"Ahh, you must be the young boy my little Kelsey had told me about," he greeted as he extended his hand out to him.

"Yes sir, I'm Lewis," he replied as he shook his hand, "Is Kelsey ready?"

"Oh yes, she's finishing up and we'll be on our way," replied Kelsey's father, "I trust she told you where we're going?"

"Not exactly, she only hinted that we were going out somewhere, nothing specific."

"Well don't worry, I can assure you that you'll enjoy where we're going," Kelsey's father assured as he patted his shoulder gently.

Their conversation was interrupted by the sound of footsteps coming down the stairway. It was Kelsey, wearing different yet casual clothes. She stopped and noticed that Lewis had gained a few extra pounds, then smiled at the sight of his new look.

"You look great Lewis," she greeted.

"Thanks," replied Lewis, blushing slightly.

"Are you ready?"

"I suppose," he replied, "But I still don't know where we're going or what we're gonna do."

"Oh I couldn't ruin the surprise for you," giggled Kelsey, "Besides, I think you're gonna like this..."

Lewis felt a little uneasy when she pulled out a little handkerchief and bared a big grin on her face.

-------------------------------------------------------------

It was a longer drive than what he had taken earlier, which made the anticipation more interesting for Lewis, who was blindfolded while seated in the backseat of a luxury sedan, with Kelsey sitting next to him as they were being driven by Kelsey's father.

"Ughh, are we there yet," groaned Lewis, "We've been in the car for ever..."

"Don't worry kiddo," replied Kelsey's dad, "We're nearly there. Just a few more blocks."

"Why don't we play a little game to pass the time," asked Kelsey as she opened up her side window.

"Well I-Spy is out of the question," replied Lewis sarcastically.

"Well how about I-Smell?"

"What? What's I-Smell?"

"It's like I-Spy, but you use your nose to guess the smell around the area."

"That sounds gross," grumbled Lewis.

"No, trust me, you'll love this," Kelsey reassured, "I'll start it off. And if you guess correctly, I'll take the blindfold off."

"Okay fine," groaned Lewis.

Kelsey looked to see that they were arriving close to their destination, then began to make sniffing noises.

"I smell with my little nose," she spoke as she sniffed, "something that begins with B."

Lewis groaned as he tried to smell outside. After a few whiffs, he began to detect a familiar scent...

"Wait a minute," he said, "That smell... Is it... Is it... Belly Buster Burgers?!"

With a quick swipe, Kelsey took off the blindfold and smiled widely at Lewis.

"YOU WON," she yelled, "And here's the surprise!"

Lewis looked over to see a wonderfully familiar surprise awaiting him from outside.

The exterior of the building was a tad large to be a fast food joint, but make no mistake that from within the building was one of the most popular and fattening fast food joints in the country. From the outside-in, he could see a large dining room area that could put the school's cafeteria to shame, large enough to feed maybe two football teams. Next to the dining area was one of the largest playrooms made for kids, looking almost like a Chuck-E-Cheese arcade room. The largest attraction was the ball-pit jungle gym, which looked almost like something out of a game show set. And from the top of the building was the mascot towering high above it all. A happy fat boy with his belly sticking out as if he burst a couple buttons, while holding a plastic burger that would put Whoppers and Big Macs to shame. And next to the mascot was a sign made with neon letters that said Belly Buster Burgers, looking almost nostalgic.

"Kelsey told me about your healthy appetite," Kelsey's dad began to speak, "so we thought we could take you to one of my restaurants for a fun night out."

Lewis had no doubt about he was in for quite a treat...

Their conversation is interrupted when Kelsey's father comes in with a tray full of burgers. The thing about Belly Buster Burgers is that their burgers rival the size of Burger King's Whoppers. In fact, they're double the size of a Whopper, to the point where each burger is a pound and a half. So basically that tray Kelsey's father is holding has 15 lbs. worth of meat.

And that's not including the variety of toppings on each burger; lettuce, mayo, cheese, ketchup, mustard, pickles, fried onions, and a special sauce made for the burger. Each topping adds another 1/2 lb. to the burger, making it a total of 20 lbs. for the whole set of burgers.

Soon both burgers were almost gone and Lewis shoved both of the remains in his mouth, chewing each one slowly. With one big GULP, the burgers were gone.

With a groan and a belch, Lewis was full. He never ate so much before. His belly lurched outward from his clothes, looking as big and tight as a drum. Kelsey held it gently, rubbing around his navel.

"Great job, fatty," she said with a smile.

Lewis pushed his immense frame as hard as he could, as his butt and hips had begun to bend the door frame, creaking louder and louder as he pushed. 141311.content:
Lewis spotted a ray gun that looked like something out of the movies. He inspected it and noticed two settings on the gun: Shrink and Grow.

"Well, this could be promising," he said to himself.

He aimed the ray gun at a standing lamp in the corner, set the gun to Shrink, and pulled the trigger.

SHWIM!

With a quick shot and a short flash, the standing lamp began to shrink to the size of a toy. He picked it up and held it up to his face.

"Well now I'm totally convinced," he said, beaming with excitement.

Before he could do anything else, the Professor came back into the room.

"Well, that situation has been dealt wi-- OH NO," he yelled, "What are you doing with that gun?! ? It's completely unstable!"

"What? I was just testing it out," said Lewis, trying to act all innocent.

"Just give it back to me before you do any further damage," demanded the Professor, holding his hand out.

"Uggghhh, fine," moaned Lewis.

He walked up to the Professor, about to hand the ray gun to him. The Professor was about to grab it, but Lewis pulled it back from him.

"One more thing," Lewis said, as he switched the ray gun to Grow.

"Lewis wait!"

Before the Professor could do anything, Lewis aimed the gun at his abdomen and pulled the trigger.

SHWIM!

With a quick shot and a short flash, Lewis did what the Professor had hoped he would never do.

"Ooopsie," said Lewis, mockingly putting a finger to his lips, "Guess I had butterfingers..."

And with that, Lewis began to grow. His body stretched up higher while getting thicker and fatter. The Professor watched with horror as the young boy grew taller and fatter before his very eyes. He grew up to the Professor's own height, but it didn't stop. He grew bigger and fatter. His belly expanded like a balloon, growing out of his shirt. His legs and thighs growing flabbier and thicker. His butt grew wider, ready to crush anything or anyone he would sit on. He grew a double chin within his neck. His cheeks grew thicker. Basically, he was becoming an obese giant.

And all the Professor could do was stare up and up and up at this growing, expanding boy.

Lewis grew up to the ceiling, bumping his head pretty hard. But he wasn't even done growing. In fact, his head began to break through the roof itself, with his body following. His body grew so big and so fat that it demolished the roof, as the young boy grew to a staggering height of 65 feet.

"Now this is living," exclaimed Lewis, as he patted his new fat belly with pride. "I'm the biggest kid in the world! And I'm taking over everything!"

One of several ways Fatzilla tried to horrify and disgust its audience was by having the giant, fat monster eat people throughout his rampage in the city. To Lewis, however, this wasn't horrifying or disgusting. Instead, he found it exciting and fascinating. There were many reasons he wished he was as big as Fatzilla, but being able to chow down on entire people was one of the most appealing aspects. For Lewis, imagining eating people whole was invigorating; that kind of power seemed intoxicating, and it far exceeded any other kind of bullying he'd ever tried.

Now he had the chance to try it for real. He debated where to begin, but thinking back to the movie helped him decide. In the movie, the scientist teamed up with the military to bring down Fatzilla, including stopping his immense, obese growth. What if this Professor could do something like that? What if he could find a way to reverse Lewis' growth and take this power away from him? Lewis didn't want to take that risk, and it was an easy problem to solve.

So, he made his choice and waddled over to the Professor's car to satisfy his massive appetite. Every part of his jiggled delightfully with each massive step. Once the professor realized what was going on, he jumped back into his car, shifted into reverse and tried to escape. But the Professor was too slow to get away from the bully's powerful grasp. Lewis effortlessly snatched up the car.

"I gotta thank you, doc. Your ray gun is a smashing success," Lewis chuckled. "But a smart guy like you might find a way to change me back, and I can't let that happen. I've got too much I need to do. Fatzilla's in charge now, and I'm hungry. With all the work you put into this, I thought I could give you the honor of being my first human snack."

With that, Lewis ripped the door off of the Professor's car, tipped it up above his head, and began shaking it to try and knock the Professor out of it. Various items fell out of the car and down the abyss of Lewis' throat while the Professor screamed in terror and desperately held on to anything he could. In the end, it was hopeless; his hands slipped loose during all the shaking and he fell into Lewis' mouth. Lewis took only a split second to savor the taste of another human. Tasting wasn't really what he wanted to do. So the gargantuan, gluttonous bully rolled his tongue back and gulped the Professor down.

While the Professor was puny compared to Lewis, he was still big enough to be a noticeable lump in the boy's throat. Even better, Lewis could clearly feel him drop into his spacious stomach. The crowds around him had already been terrified, but now mortal panic spread through the multitudes of people. All of these images had been engraved in Lewis' brain after watching Fatzilla again and again. And so, after proudly slapping and stroking his stomach (feeling the wiggling man inside), his sleeping mind swept him off to live out more of the movie.

Next...
