14132.content:
It was 8:29am in the Wright residence. Wilson Wright walked up from the basement where he made his experiments. He held a large bottle of a liquid that was dark purple. As he walked into the kitchen he saw his wife, Veruca, cooking a large breakfast for their son Lewis, consisting of pancakes, sausage, bacon, and scrapple.

"Honey, I think it got it," Wilson exclaimed as he held out the bottle.

"What is that dear," asked Veruca as she finished the last piece of scrapple.

"I made this formula for our son. This should help him with this small and unhealthy figure."

"Honey, that's great news! How do we give it to him?"

Wilson thought about it for a moment, then noticed a saucer of maple syrup by the pancakes.

"This might work," he said as he poured a small amount inside and stirred it all up.

"Are you sure it'll work for our Lewis," asked Veruca as she brought the food to the table.

"It should. I already tested the formula on three mice downstairs and they swelled to the size of Italian sausages."

Their conversation was interrupted as they heard faint footsteps heading towards the kitchen. Wilson hid the formula behind the toaster while Veruca placed the rest of the food on the kitchen table. Lewis groggily rubbed his eyes to wake himself up, then sat down to eat his breakfast, only to be interrupted by his mother walking up to him.

"Good morning sweetie," his mother said as she kissed him on the head gently.

"Morning," groaned Lewis, feeling miserable.

"I hope you're hungry, I made a big breakfast just for you!"

"Ugh... mom, you know I can't eat all of this..."

"Oh honey, at least try. Here, have some syrup with your pancakes."

As she poured the syrup all over the pancakes, his father smiled as he was about to witness a miracle in the making. Lewis sighed as he took his fork and dug into a piece. He took a small bite and chewed for a short while.

What seemed like an average breakfast soon changed as he took another bite, starting to savor the taste. Then he dug into it again, taking bigger scoops and bigger bites, enjoying every taste of it. Each pancake was beginning to disappear into his mouth. He just couldn't get enough!

As he finished off the last of the pancakes, his parents smiled to each other as he was able to eat the tower of flapjacks by himself. He sponged up the last of the syrup on his plate with a lonely slice of pancake left over, then munched it away like it was nothing. He patted his tummy gently, only to notice it was bulging out of his pajamas, his navel fully exposed.

Before he could even say anything, he felt a shudder creep from his belly all the way towards his spine and all over the rest of his body. Then, his body began to grow.

His body began to stretch upwards, reaching higher and higher, as his belly and body began to fill out more, causing his pajamas to feel tighter. The buttons began to stretch from his expanding figure, almost ready to pop off. But soon his growth spurt began to fade away, as he grew to a height of 6 feet 3 inches, which was a little higher than his folks were.

He stood up and saw he stood above his parents, who looked up at him with awe and pride. He then looked down to see his belly look much bigger than before, blocking his view of his feet, as the girth had become somewhat exposed as it was still constrained by the set of buttons that held on tightly.

"Whoa," Lewis exclaimed, "This is weird... but so cool... What happened?"

"My experiment worked wonders, that's what happened," his father said with excitement.

"My little baby's grown so big," said his mother, beaming with pride.

"You guys did this to me? How?"

Wilson reached behind the toaster and pulled out his formula, which still had plenty left inside the jug.

"This formula is what helped made you grow," he explained, "it's meant to help increase your weight and height."

"You looked so unhealthy and unhappy," Veruca said with concern, "We wanted to be sure you were becoming a growing, healthy boy. And with this formula, you became such a big boy!"

Lewis held his body and observed his new surroundings. He felt weird having a big belly in his way, but it felt good to feel it jiggle. And his height was certainly something to get used to, but it didn't bother him at all.

In fact, he was starting to love it...

142114.content:
Bianca Jones was a smart 17-year-old girl. Straight-A student, passed all tests and exams without a hitch, even reaching her full potential of making her way to Harvard to work on her physics major. This girl has huge potential.

But before she can even graduate, she is still stuck in the same rich home with her younger, bratty wench of a little sister, April Jones. No matter what her parents did, she was still acting like a mean and spoiled brat. This chunky 9-year-old was always getting everything she wanted, but now Bianca was fed up with her attitude.

Using her great intelligence, she crafted a chemical compound to fatten up her younger sister into an enormous fatty. Anytime she would overeat, the potion would instantly cause all of the food would digest and create a substantial amount of fat on her body. Anytime she would stuff herself silly or eat so much junk food, it would make her fatter day by day, quicker than a normal digestion process. April would be so miserable and so fat, she would just beg to change her ways and behave like a normal little girl.

After a few days of work and a few tests, the compound was finally ready to be used on her little sister. And just in time too...

"I want some food and I mean NOW!!!"

Bianca wasted no time and made her way to the kitchen. The cooks were preparing April's favorite breakfast of red velvet pancakes with cream cheese icing, a large mixture of scrapple and bacon mixed together, and half a dozen cinnamon rolls. Bianca noticed a tall glass of orange juice served with April's meal on a large tray. She stopped a servant from taking the tray.

"Just let me add a little something to her drink first," Bianca said as she placed a couple drops of the potion in the orange juice.

The potion's bright green compound fizzled slowly into the juice until it faded within. The servant was a bit concerned about what she had put into her, but Bianca reassured him with a smile.

"Just a little something special for my little sister," she said calmly.

The servant shrugged it off and took the tray to April's room. There, April was in a pout as she itched her belly while lying in bed, waiting impatiently for her food. Soon, she saw the servant with her meal.

"About time," she yelled with frustration, "I'm starving and you took your sweet time to bring me my food! Next time, get here quicker!"

"Yes Ms. Jones," replied the servant.

April began to scarf down on her food, hardly using her utensils or even using proper table manners. She just ate like a pig and acted like one, as she nearly snorted like one as she gobbled her meal.

Bianca watched the servant leave in a huff as he grumbled how April was such a little wench. She then she spied on her little sister as she ate and ate like her life depended on it. She was amazed how her little sister could be such a spoiled hog, eating like a slob and not even showing some form of dignity and grace.

But then Bianca's hopes turned up when April paused to take a drink from her juice. She guzzled down half the glass, then proceeded to eat the rest of her meal. Bianca could've been seeing things, but she couldn't help but notice April's belly peeking out of her PJs slightly, looking a bit bigger and bloated. But she tried to stay out of sight while her little sister ate and ate.

After munching down on the last cinnamon bun, April grabbed the glass and chugged down the last of the orange juice. She then laid back on her bed and patted her belly gently, feeling pretty full after her big breakfast. Bianca stood back to see what would happen next. There's no telling what would happen with her potion still working in effect. But she knew she had to wait it out...

The pjs are getting tighter now, even her arms and legs was starting to get thick and her butt and thighs are getting blubber and wider.

Despite this though, April was still fast asleep, which is strange to think of it. Not sure if she was even dreaming, wether it could her eating more food, or simply looking herself fatter? Whatever it happens, she hadn’t move her muscle since she had finished stuffing her breakfast moments ago.

Bianca walked into her sister's room to see how much had changed since she left. As she walked in, she could see from afar how much she had grown. The changes were very noticeable and surprising to her.

April had thrown her covers off, showing off her new fatter features. Her legs and thighs and grown thicker as they ripped apart her pant legs of her PJs. Her belly, which was her biggest feature, had dropped down because of how big and fat it was while popping a few buttons during the process. Her face was slightly thicker as a double chin was forming.

Bianca was surprised how big she had grown while she had left. She was trying to contain a gasp, then tried to contain a laugh as she didn't want to wake her sister up. But she knew she had to wake her up anyway. She was curious as to how April would react to her new size and how it would affect her in general.

Bianca slowly approached her sister and gently nudged her new fat body to wake her up. She could feel how much thicker she was as she gently shook her.

"April, time to get up," she said as she tried to wake her up, "Come on, bratty fatty, wake up now."

April slowly stirred as she began to wake up, looking up at her sister in annoyance. She rubbed her eyes to try and wake up, then shifted her self up in her bed. As she tried to get up, she noticed how it was more difficult to move herself up. That's when she noticed how big she was now. She looked at herself and saw that she was practically fatter than before. She placed her hand on her belly and shook it gently.

"Well, nice to see you finally up, fatty," taunted Bianca as she poked her belly, "Now why don't you get dressed so you can actually do something aside from lazing around in bed?"

Bianca stood up and walked out of the room, trying to contain a giggle as she left. April was still shocked at how fat she had gotten. It was almost like something out of a dream. She even looked back to what she had dreamt earlier. She was dreaming that she was in a large cafeteria and was eating everyone's food to the point where her belly was beginning to expand like a balloon and nearly exploded.

That's when April looked at her big belly again. She felt a bit unsure about it at first, but after shaking it around and massaging it gently, she felt a bit more at ease with it. She nearly welcomed it. To be honest, she was starting to like it.

142114112.content:
April rubbed her belly as she felt more comfortable with it. The new jiggling mass was different but felt good altogether. Before she could continue, it growled again. She felt a bit familiar with it. She knew she was hungry again.

"Well I gotta keep you full, don't I," she said as she patted her belly.

Without even worrying about her PJs, April would just walk out of her room. And by walk, I mean waddle. Considering her new size, April found it a bit more difficult to move around. She knew it was going to be a struggle, but she had to find someone to help feed her. Her belly was still growling in hunger. In fact, the hunger pang felt stronger than before. Now she was really hungry...

After a while, she found herself in front of the kitchen, where the servants and Bianca were putting away the last of the groceries. Bianca looked over to see her somewhat smaller sister walk into the kitchen, waddling her fat self in while her PJs were still containing parts of her newly-expanded fat.

"Well well, look who finally got out of bed this morning," said Bianca in a snarky tone, "I was wondering if we would have to haul you out with a pickup truck."

"Shut up," replied April, "I came in here because I'm still hungry. I need more food!"

"What's the magic word, shorty?"

"NOW!!!"

Bianca could only shake her head in disapproval as her sister acted the same bratty self. She walked out of the room while the servants were still in the kitchen, knowing that they would have to obey the little fat brat that stood before them. They were a little uneasy looking at the youngest member of the Jones family and how she had gotten fatter so quickly. But they could only do what they were paid to do and that was to do whatever she wanted.

"Alright losers, here's the situation," she began to demand, "I'm starving. I'm like totally famished! I need a good brunch and I mean a REAL good brunch! So fix me up something good or else!"

The servants looked at each other then sighed as they began to work on cooking for her again. One was stopped by April.

"You! I need you to help me to get to the dining room. Give me a piggyback ride!"

Katrina, a young woman who was fairly new to working as a servant in a rich estate, was flabbergasted when this fat little girl ordered her to give her a piggyback ride into the dining room. Even though she didn't want to, she had no other choice. The other servants were busy working in the kitchen and didn't even bother to say anything to help.

With a sigh of defeat, Katrina kneeled down to pick up this fat girl. April practically jumped on her shoulders, nearly causing Katrina to lose her balance. It was a struggle at first, but she managed to hoist herself up and keep a decent balance as she held onto April. The sheer weight of the child was certainly a struggle for her to handle. It took about twenty minutes to get her into the dining room, which was large enough to hold a huge party for about a hundred people.

"W-where would you like to sit, Ms. Jones," asked Katrina as she struggled to hold April.

"All the way down the end there," said April as she pointed down the end.

Katrina nearly flipped when she was told to put April down the far end of the table, right near the fireplace. The length itself was about fifteen feet down as if she didn't have enough trouble helping this fat child to the dining room. She slowly walked down as best as possible, but April's fat body was beginning to weigh her down and slow her down.

"Come on, come on," yelled April as she kicked her fat legs around and flailed her fat arms with anger, "let's get a move on! I want my brunch! I'm still hungry!!!"

Katrina nearly lost her grip as she felt April flailing around. She decided to pick up the pace and moved a little faster, trying to make the trip easier for herself. Soon after a struggle, she was at the far end and gently placed April in her seat.

"There... you go... Ms. Jones," said Katrina as she panted, "Will there be... anything else?"

"Yeah, get me a chocolate shake," replied April as she adjusted herself in her seat, "And a blanket too! I want to be comfortable while I eat."

Katrina nodded as she made her way back into the other room. Bianca witnessed the whole ordeal of her fat little sister using a servant as a pack mule. But she knew she was going to make her life miserable. She knew she was going to get fed up with being fat. Even if she had to be immobile...

Soon, the servants walked into the kitchen with a large amount of food; bagels with butter and cream cheese, chocolate-filled croissants, a large omelet, a few chocolate chip pancakes, and a few waffles smothered with syrup and powdered sugar. Bianca watched from afar at how much food they were giving her. She was amazed that her little sister could eat so much. But she was even more surprised when she saw Katrina walk into the dining room, holding a large chocolate shake and a large blueberry pie.

"Here's your shake and your pie for afterward, Ms. Jones," said Katrina as she placed the shake and pie with the rest of the food.

"Who said I was having the pie last," said April as she took the pie from the spot, "I want my pie now! I'm starving!"

The servants were in shock as she began to eat the pie without using any utensils. She basically went head first into the pie tin, as the blueberries smeared her cheeks. The servants slowly walked out while she pigged out on the remains of the pie. She tossed the tin and got to work on the omelet, as bits of egg and cheese smears her face. She wiped her mouth with her hand and licked off the remains off of her fingers.

Bianca slowly walked in as April bit into the bagels piece by piece. She was stunned to see her little sister acting more ravenous than before. She began to work on the waffles, as the syrup and powdered sugar stained her lips as she ate. Once they were gone, she went to work on the chocolate chip pancakes. But then she stopped momentarily when she thought of something. She reached in her pocket by the side of her fatter hip and pulled out a small call bell. She held it up and shook it violently to get a servants attention. Katrina walked back in while still feeling sore from the piggyback ride.

"Yes, Ms. Jones, what do you need," she asked as courteously as possible given her sore back.

"These pancakes don't have enough chocolate chips on them," bellowed April, "I want more chocolate chips, as well as my Kit Kats and some chocolate syrup!"

Katrina was appalled by April's demand. Who would allow a child to eat candy and milkshakes with brunch? How can this child be so spoiled? But to avoid losing her job, she could only nod in acceptance and do what she was told. Meanwhile, April put the pancakes to the side and got to work on the chocolate-filled croissants, savoring the chocolate taste that was stuffed inside each one. April was a true chocoholic.

After she finished her croissants, Katrina walked back in with a big bag of Kit Kats and a bottle of chocolate syrup. She handed the syrup to April, who proceeded to pour a heaping portion of chocolate out on her pancakes, completely soaking them in the syrup. Katrina then opened the bag of Kit Kats and pulled a small handful out.

"How many would you like, Ms. Jones," she asked as she held out the handful.

April looked at her with a sneer and grabbed both the handful and the entire bag out of her hands. Katrina was shocked to see this child just grab the chocolates like a falcon grabs a bird with its talons. April was not messing around.

"You're new here, so here's something to understand," said April as she began to bellow at her, "I never ask for a small amount of candy. I want as much as I can and as much as I will have! Remember this golden rule when you're serving me: Whatever Ms. Jones wants, MS. JONES GETS!!!"

Katrina flinched as the young girl shouted at her like a slave-driver. She held in as much of her emotions as she could as she felt humiliated being talked down to by a child. All she could do was nod 'yes' to her, then walked out of the dining room. Bianca followed her and tapped her on the shoulder. She turned around to show her tears beginning to flow out but tried to remain composed in front of her.

"Katrina, take the rest of the day off," Bianca replied as she gently patted her shoulder, "I'll make sure you work with me or my parents, try to get you out of April's hair for a while."

"T-thank you, Miss Bianca," replied Katrina as she wiped the tears out of her eyes.

"Please, call me Bianca. I'm not like my sister."

Katrina walked down the hall, still sobbing from the onslaught. Bianca walked back into the dining room, witnessing her sister's unbridled gluttony continue. April placed Kit Kats in between each pancake, then poured more chocolate syrup on top. The stack was now like a cake to her, as she slowly munched on the towering mess by herself. She only stopped to take a couple chugs out of her chocolate shake, which only fueled her chocoholic moment. Soon it was almost a routine; munch munch munch on the tower, chug chug chug down the shake, clean off remains from your face by licking it off, repeat until you're done.

After what seemed like forever, April finished off her brunch while looking like a total slob. Her face was still smeared with chocolate but felt a little exhausted to worry about that. Her belly looked bigger than before, as it looked like it could explode at any moment. She basically stuffed herself to the limit. But she soon felt like her eyes were bigger than her stomach when she took the chocolate syrup and guzzled down the remains. She seemed like she had no limits!

Bianca was appalled by April's own gluttony. She was wondering if the potion she made even made much of a difference aside from making her fatter. But she knew she had to break her gluttonous spirit somehow. It was just going to take some time...

She even attempted to pry it open to get as much as she could. She was so desperate for more that she was licking inside the container. Bianca had enough and took the bottle away from her.

"I want something thick and cheesy," she said as she patted her belly, "Get me a big bowl of fettuccine alfredo, some garlic cheesy bread, and some thick mozzarella to snack on."

As she gnawed the last one down, another servant came out with a large plate of garlic cheesy bread. The bread was large half slices of Italian rolls, each smothered in melted cheese and seasonings. All she could do was recline in her seat, as it creaked from her large weight. She looked to see her belly peaking out far enough to reach and pat it. 1421322.content:
After a short while, the school's principal walked onto the stage along with a young student that April has never seen before. The two stepped up to the microphone together as the principal tapped the mic for frequency.

"Good morning students," he greeted, "It's wonderful to see all of you here today. Now, I gathered you all here for a special event for today."

The principal ushered the young boy to the microphone next to him.

"I have brought a student over who is from a neighboring school and he has brought over a special scientific experiment to show all of you," continued the principal, who then lowered the microphone to the student's level.

The student in question, Irwin Berkowitz, is a young genius from an elementary school a few miles away from this school. His IQ rivals that of college students and college professors. With his immense knowledge, he has made numerous inventions that could benefit the world. And with all of the tools and mechanics placed all around the stage, it was obvious he was going to make something interesting.

"Good day," he greeted, "My name is Irwin Berkowitz and I will be here to invent anything and everything. I always believed that creativity and construction are limitless when you have a good mindset like mine."

April groaned at the boy's lecture. To her, it was just nerd talk. And all that was on her mind was food. She was too hungry to care about any boring science experiment.

"And today, I will be working on something that could benefit all those in need; the world's largest food item!"

And that's what caught April's attention.

"Yes, today, I will take an ordinary piece of food and triple or even quadruple it in size. I have created a machine that will do just that and hopefully if it turns out as well as it should, it could solve world hunger!"

The auditorium began to erupt with applause, as students and faculty members applauded over Irwin's idea. Even April clapped enthusiastically.

"Now, all I need is a piece of food to help with my experiment. Any volunteers?"

Students began to clamor around their pockets and backpacks to find pieces of food to use. Some only had tiny pieces of candy, others just useless junk. A boy sitting next to April pulled out a Twinkie from his backpack, only to have it being stolen by April in an instant.

"Here, pick me," yelled April as she swung the Twinkie around like a flashlight.

"Well, nice to see an eager face in the audience," said Irwin, "Alright, come on up here."

April jumped out of her seat and walked up to the stage with the Twinkie in her pudgy hand. She walked up to Irwin, who was standing near a machine and a small table.

"Hello there, what's your name," asked Irwin.

"My name is April Jones," she replied as she took the mic off the stand, "and I'm the richest girl in the school. Don't any of you forget it!"

A few of the students groaned at her lack of tact and modesty as she flaunted her fat figure and Twinkie snack cake.

"Very humble young girl," replied Irwin as he cleared his throat, "Now April, are you ready?"

"Just one question before we start," she replied, "Will I get to be able to eat it afterward?"

"W-well, if my calculations are correct and if all goes well, I'd say it would still be edible after it goes through. I'm sure you're friends would like to have some as well..."

"A ha ha ha, ohhh no. You certainly are new here so let me give you a little reminder about who you're talking to; Miss Jones does NOT share anything with anybody, especially when it comes to food..."

A short moment of silence hangs in the auditorium after April gives notice. Irwin is taken back from the young student who opposes his remark about sharing. But not wanting to lose face, he continues the assembly.

"Uhh right, why don't we just get started?"

Irwin reaches out for the Twinkie but is stopped when April pulls it back.

"One bite for the road first."

April takes a small bite before handing it over to Irwin, who is perplexed at the chubby bully. Disregarding that setback, he then places the snack cake on the small table, then escorts April over to the machine. He types on his keyboard and checks the monitors to make sure everything is stable. Soon, the machine begins to whir and a piece moves from above the table. A large laser beam moves around until it focuses its laser barrel on the Twinkie itself.

"Alright now, we're almost ready," said Irwin as he made a few extra notches on the machine, "Just one more thing... April, you see that big switch over there?"

April looks over to see a large yellow switch by her right side. She points at it while looking back at Irwin and raises an eyebrow in response.

"That's the one... When I say now, you throw the switch."

A short moment of silence occurs within the auditorium, aside from the loud whirring of the machine. April places her hand on the switch, waiting for his signal.

"NOW!"

April flung the switch downward, as the laser began to emit a large light blue light onto the Twinkie, as a strange sound was quivering from the laser. The Twinkie began to glow from the laser's energy. The room was beginning to shine from the laser's light, as the whole auditorium looked on this experiment with great anticipation.

"Alright, turn it off now!"

April flipped the switch off, as the machine turned down for a while and powered off, as the beam shrunk back into the laser barrel. Irwin and April moved over to the small table and looked at the Twinkie with caution. The Twinkie had a strange afterglow from the laser's effect. Then suddenly, it happened; the Twinkie began to expand. The spongey cake began to grow larger, looking less like a snack cake and more like a deli sandwich. The growth slowed down for a while until the Twinkie looked like a footlong sandwich and was as wide as a video game console. In fact, it was so large that it overlapped the table.

Irwin brought out a large scanning device and scanned the entirety of the Twinkie, which oozed a bit of frosting from the section April bit off earlier. After about a minute or so, Irwin went to the microphone.

"Ladies and gentlemen," he began, "after some conclusive research into the pastry, I declare this Twinkie safe to eat!"

The auditorium erupted into applause from the declaration and the successful experiment. The principal walked up to Irwin and patted him on the back.

"ALRIGHT!"

The applause ceased as everyone looked at April, who was in front of the bitten off end of the Twinkie, scooping large handfuls of the cream into her mouth.

"This is the best thing I ever had," she yelled with her mouth full, "It's even better than it was originally!"

"Uhh April," stuttered Irwin, "Perhaps you could share some of that with the rest of the students?"

April finished gobbling down some of the cream that oozed onto the stage and stopped eating to walk over to Irwin, wiping excess cream off of her face and licking her lips.

"You certainly are a pushover, so let me remind you again," replied April in a snarky tone, "Miss Jones NEVER SHARES HER FOOD WITH ANYONE."

Irwin felt a little more intimidated by this young girl, who was bound to eat the large pastry by herself. She walked back and picked up the Twinkie with ease. Even enlarged, it was still decently light to her. She made her way out of the auditorium while munching on more of the pastry, while students groused and grumbled over April's greed and gluttony.

Before Irwin could say anything, he received an alarm from his scanning device. He looked at it and saw a piece of information regarding the scan.

"Oh my," he said with great fear, "It seems I had missed a crucial piece of information regarding the scan. After enlarging the Twinkie not only did it increase in size, it also increased in bulk with the calorie and cholesterol intake. In other words, it will make the person very fat after ingesting it."

The auditorium was full of mumbles of conversations and questions regarding the result. Could this be serious? How bad would it affect other people if more than one person had eaten the Twinkie? And more importantly, how would this affect April?

April walked around the hallways of the school, which was pretty quiet as almost everyone had gone to class. Everyone except Jeremy Langstrom. He was never one to fully pay attention whether in school or not. He would usually be playing on his Nintendo 3DS, especially when walking down hallways. And that was what he was doing right now.

Looking at the wand and then at Jeremy, April began to cast a wicked grin on her face and waved the wand around. She finally pointed the wand directly at him and... nothing happened. She swung it around and pointed at him again and... still nothing.

"What's with this thing," she muttered, "This should be working!"

She looked all over the wand and noticed an engraving on the side that was small but still easy to read.

"To cast a spell, simply make a rhyme and focus your mind."

With a cool head, April looked over at Jeremy again and waved the wand once again, while quietly making the rhyme.

"You hardly pay attention at all, so let's make you about 3 inches tall."

And with that, the wand began to work its magic. And the moment she pointed the wand at Jeremy, he slowly began to shrink. He hardly noticed as he was playing with his 3DS. But soon it became apparent when he noticed his hands could barely hold the 3DS, as it felt heavier than before. Then he noticed his surroundings...

With a sudden surprise and a big gasp, Jeremy saw that he was shrinking in the hallway, as the lockers towered over him. Shorter and shorter, he dwindled until he finally reached the height of 3 inches. Everything was so big compared to his new minuscule outlook. But it became worse when he saw April walk up to him, looking down at him with an evil look.

"Well well, looks like Jeremy's lost touch with reality now," gloated April as she dangled the wand.

"Wha... what did you do to me," quivered Jeremy.

"I shrunk you down to the size that fits you the most. You always had your head buried in something, whether it was a book or a game. You were such a boring character. And now I'm going to rectify the problem."

"W-w-what are you going to do to me?"

April licked her lips gently and leaned down to pick up Jeremy, bringing him close to her face.

"Well, I am pretty hungry right about now..."

Before Jeremy could even scream, April shoved the three-inch boy inside her mouth. But at that moment, the bell rang and various students began exiting into the hallway. April hid her wand and walked towards the girl's bathroom and locked the door. She made sure the coast was clear by checking the stalls, as it turns out she was the only one inside.

Within her mouth was a young boy who was fighting for his life. He was kicking and thrashing around, attempting to get out of the obstacle known as April's mouth. She took wind of the situation and made her way to the sink. She turned on the water and began guzzling down water to drown the boy. Splash after splash, wave after wave, water pushed Jeremy around April's mouth.

After a short while, one big wave of water knocked out Jeremy, causing him to fall down April's throat. With a big GULP!, the deed was done. April had swallowed a tiny boy using her wand. This was a miracle for her. She washed her hands and carefully made her way out of the restroom.

1423.content:
It was a warm summer evening at the Jones residence. Fireflies gleamed throughout the enormous courtyard from the back end of the mansion. In the middle of the courtyard was a large pool, bigger than the ones used for swimming competitions. And in the middle of that pool was little April Jones.

The young chubby girl relaxed in her deluxe pool chair, which held a small tray of truffles and a tall glass of pink lemonade. She snacked on them while listening to her iPod, enjoying every moment of her alone time. She patted her belly as she snacked on her truffles, then drank her pink lemonade gingerly.

But her relaxation would soon be interrupted by a green light shining in the sky. She looked up to see a green orb, which turned out to be a meteorite, headed towards her. She swam her chair away as best as she could, but between the complications of the chair and with her own weight keeping her still, she could hardly get out fast. Luckily for her, the meteorite missed her by a few feet and crashed into the shrubs far from her.

After calming down from the near catastrophe, she swam out of the pool and walked over to the spot with caution. She looked to see the meteorite was glowing green still, flashing like a beacon. And as she looked on it, she could smell something familiar about it. The scent of the meteorite was almost like a dessert; hazelnut, vanilla, chocolate, mint, and so many other wonderful aromas. She couldn't help but take an interest in touching it.

As she reached for it, she could hear strange voices in her head. The voices were speaking in foreign tongues, but she ignored them. She got closer and closer, as the voices grew louder and louder. She touched the meteorite, which hardly scorched or burned her from the touch. In fact, it felt cold...

She brought the meteorite closer to her face, which felt like the size of a baseball in her hands, noticing the smells feeling stronger and more intoxicating. The voices in her head were loud, but they weren't objecting. To her, it almost felt like they were telling her to eat it...

"It smells so good," she said to herself, "It wouldn't hurt to just give it a little taste.."

April took a little lick of the meteorite and instantly a wave of flavors hit her taste buds. She tasted flavors that she had before and others that were different but still delicious. It was phenomenal, remarkable, and so delightful!

"This is so good," she yelled to herself, "I want to eat it! I want it all for myself!"

And without hesitation, she popped it in her mouth, which felt like a big jawbreaker in her mouth. As she chewed on it, the voices in her head made sounds that sounded like a congregation, applauding her for eating the object from the sky. As she ate the meteorite, inside was a large amount of ooze that skyrocketed her taste buds more-so than before.

And she smiled as it was all for her... No one could stop her from enjoying her new treat...

Soon, the meteorite was gulped down. As soon it came, it vanished inside the belly of this silver spoon brat. She sighed with relief as it almost felt like a whole new experience eating that meteorite. Nothing could compare to that wonderful treat. She walked over to the pool and swam back into her chair. She sat back in and began to relax again. She snacked on her truffles and drank her pink lemonade.

But they could never compete with the object she ate that came from the sky...

But regardless of that, April loves getting a lot of attention from everybody, even the choppers that are flying close to her as they either report to the news or film her to the world.

“I hope you’ll worshipping Queen April very much, because it’s time I should take every single puny stuff out, once and for all!” April makes a threatening statement with that grin look on her face.

She wasted no time but to start off the action, as she prepares to...

"Hey, I wanna have some more food, and I want it now!" April says in a bratty tone, since she never liked manners, despite her parents tried to encourage her at public school, but did not phase her in one bit.

It would take a while until she spotted a butler, carrying more food which seems to be some pizzas and hot dogs, plus some more lemonade among with it. This butler is around about in early twenties, and only works for the Jones family for six months. Despite receiving some abuse by an nine year old girl, the butler remained calm and would try his best to make her much comfortable as he placed the food onto the table.

"Here's your lunch, Miss Jones!" The butler reminded, which he can only giving their proper surnames, including April's for that matter.

"That so sweet, now go away and let me have some peace, will ya?" April replied at its best, and soon the butler walked away in a polite tone, and soon she was on her own and takes some bites out of some pizzas and hot dogs for her enjoyment.

She was very much relaxed, even when being outside and let it out with a loud burp in satisfaction, before she drinks the lemonade and started to yawn as if she was started to get tired of it. Of course that seems to be worth it in some, and lays back on the pool chair to have some sleep.

Of course listening to her iPod would be satisfying that much, but for some reason, she didn't felt it this way while she was asleep, but it appears as if she was started to get a bit bigger, like ballooning out and grew some height a bit too. Of course she wouldn't notice what was going on, but it was strange that something had happened to her, and unknowing what was the cause unless she might know otherwise when she would wake up.

April was still sleeping for an hour or so, and soon it came to an end when someone had called her name, which lead her to wake herself slowly, since she didn't liked to be interrupted while she was doing something.

"Hey, I was trying to sleep here! Who's calling me?" April wondered and looked over to see it was...
14232.title: Need Lunch Now!

choices: ...the food your brought, and then something living"
142323.content:
April sleepily opened her eyes to see the butler had returned and was calling her name.

"Miss Jones!" He called, sounding concerned. "Are you alright?"

April scoffed. "Of course I'm alright. Why wouldn't I be?"

"Well, miss, you seem to have - um - grown?" he offered, nervously.

April took a moment to look around. The world did seem a little smaller. She stood up and noticed she came up to the butler's chin: quite a feat for a 9 year old, particularly when the butler was decently tall himself.

"Hmm. Seems you're right. But it doesn't matter. I'm still hungry. Take me to the kitchen," April commanded.

The butler swallowed. "Of course, miss."

He led her through the house. This wing was empty; the massive house meant that April sometimes barely saw any of the rest of the family. That's what they had butlers for, after all.

They arrived in the spacious, industrial-style kitchen. The kitchen in this wing was meant to preparing meals for large parties. It was regularly stocked with enough food to feed 40 or 50 people.

"Grab that chair," April commanded, too entitled to bother getting it herself. The butler complied. April hopped up onto it. "Now," April instructed, "as long as I am hungry, you will keep bringing me food. No questions asked. Remember, what's the rule?"

"Anything Miss Jones wants, Miss Jones gets," the butler recited, clearly having had it drilled into him long ago.

"That's right. And right now, I want to stuff myself with every ounce of food in here."

The butler's eyes went wide. Surely she was exaggerating. Then again, she had grown a couple feet in the span of a nap. It was all so surreal. But, no matter how he felt about it, it was his job to obey the family's orders, April included. So he set about cooking her food and delivering it.

While he cooked, April became impatient and began grabbing anything in arm's reach. She wasn't about to get up to get more (that was too much work, and she had servants for that kind of thing), but her belly demanded food and the butler was taking so long - even though it had only been 10-15 minutes. Between rounds of the butler delivering food, April managed to grab three bags of chips, 4 bananas, and 3 apples. By the third apple, she was bored of chewing and simply swallowed it whole, thinking nothing of that feat.

The butler worked at a furious pace as April demanded more and more. He barely stopped to let the impossibility of the scene sink in: April easily ate enough food for an entire party worth of people in the span of a couple hours. Her belly balloon out bigger and bigger, eventually being so big the butler thought (with a chill) that April could fit him in there if he curled up. The belly would be absurdly bigger than April's entire body, except for the terrifying fact that her body was expanding too. It was not only getting fatter, but not the butler could see the growth happen first hand. After the first hour, he was pretty sure she was taller than him, but it was hard to tell when she was sitting down.

After two and a half hours, the butler had exhausted every piece of food. There wasn't a crumb left. The only sign of those pounds of food was the massive gut April was absent-mindedly massaging.

"I'm afraid that's all we have, Miss Jones."

April stared daggers at him. "All we have in this kitchen, you mean."

"Well, yes. You are correct, of course. But, miss, aren't you-"

"Still hungry? Of course I am. So now is the part where you bring me more food."

The butler's usual servile nature was not intensified by the growing discomfort he felt being around the growing brat.

April sighed in dramatic annoyance once the butler was out of sight. She was not hungry and bored. She was trying to think of things to eat to keep satisfying her hunger when she heard a purring coming from below her. April shifted her belly out of the way to see Duchess, one of the family's cats, rubbing her silky black body against April's massive ankles (her feet now reaching the floor.

The cat was an obnoxious distraction to April trying to solve her dilemma. She couldn't focus on thinking up new things to eat with the obnoxious cat. Then a hunger pang gave her a stroke on inspiration. Not taking another moment to think about it, April scooped up Duchess and stuffed the cat headfirst into her mouth. It was an interesting taste and texture, but she didn't really take time to savor it. She was hungry, and she never liked this cat anyhow. April was a girl with no impulse control and no patience, so she started gulping the cat down impulsively.

The butler rounded the corner to see a long black noodle being sucked into April's mouth. He was sure he'd already fed her all the food in the kitchen, but she'd clearly found something. He didn't give any more thought to it until he heard a muffled meow. He froze in his tracks, food still in hand, and was chilled to the bone when he was April's stomach wiggle and shift. He even though he could see a faint impression of a cat through all that flab.

"Miss Jones, did you sw-" he began before April cut him off.

"Didn't I say 'no questions asked'?" she snapped.

"Yes, Miss, I believe you did."

"And whatever Miss Jones wants..."

"Miss Jones gets," the butler finished.

"And I'm still starving. So make yourself useful and feed me...
142323.title: Butler returns and the feeding continues

The butler was slight both concerned and horrified for different reasons. He must'be heard that cat from the room April was, and feared the worst when he tried to ask. But the more demands of April, trying to get herself to feed more food, of course swallowing a cat taste delicious in her opinion.

Soon, the butler nodded in her demands and came over which he surely think she had gotten larger than before, with her weight being increased and gotten taller as well. Her arms have thicken, and her face looked chunky, she develops some chin coming in. As for her height, she looked like she stands at over 8 feet tall, and continues to feed all the food, until the butler had finished the load of food. Not before she felt the chair was started to let loose and soon breaks, letting her enormous size plopped down to the floor with that great big thud, much to the surprise of both April and the butler looking on.

Despite this, her butt felt the chair like a pancake and giggled as if this was the best feeling she had done so far.

"Hey, did you see what I did to this mini chair?" April wondered in case the butler would notice.

"Of course, Miss Jones, I've never seen you so larger than anything in my lifetime." He replied and only knowing that a little girl is now looking obese, looking around about 500lbs in weight or something?

"I know, it's so much fun!" April smiled in giggles, even before she had that idea which she thinks it might be interesting. "Say, how about if we can have some fun, like maybe..."
1423231.title: More Food To Feed

1423232.content:
"And I'm still starving. So make yourself useful and feed me all that food you brought." April rubbed her gurgling stomach. "Then after that, I want something like the cat. She feels good wiggling around in there. I'm sure you'll find some special and alive to feed me. You don't want me to have to find food for myself, do you?" April shot a deadly glare and a toothy grin at the butler.

Remembering his thought that her belly was nearly big enough to fit him in it (and she was still growing!), he hastened to please her - more than usual.
"Of course, Miss April. Whatever you want."

Saying nothing more, April tipped her head back and opened her mouth wide. The butler, eager to live, hurried over to her with the platter of food and began holding it out to her. It began with a plate of brownies.

He dropped them in one by one and April lazily chewed them as they came. By the time she'd eaten two thirds of the food he brought, April had begun to quake subtly as she continued to grow. As the butler moved the last two brownies up to April's face, she shot forward, enveloping not only the brownies, but the butler's hand as well. She swallowed forcefully and the brownies were dragged down her throat. April locked eyes with the butler, who was full of terror as his arm was pulled into the fat, entitled girl's throat.

Mercifully, April stopped swallowing once the brownies entered her bulbous belly. The butler pulled his hand back as fast as he could.

"Hey!" April squealed. "That hurt! How dare you be so forceful with me!"

The butler, even more acutely aware of the danger he was in, hastily apologized. "I'm sorry Miss. You just - just scared me, that's all."

April burped. "Oh. I'll scare you a lot more than that if you don't give me what I want."

April was suddenly invigorated by the butler's terror. It had always been his job to give her whatever she wanted...what if she wanted his fear? His panic as he is crammed into her dark, demanding stomach until he was nothing but fuel for her fat? She shuddered. Oh, she liked that quite a bit. That ooze, whatever it was, was letting her finally get everything she wants. But he hadn't used up his usefulness just yet.

"Of course, Miss, of course. Just tell me what you want."

"I'm bored with all this normal food. You're going to feed me something alive," April said, matter-of-factly. "So you're going to feed me..."
1423232.title: Food appetizer before feeding her something living

14232321.content:
"But Miss Jones..."

"NO OBJECTIONS," demanded April, "Just do it now, I'm STARVING!"

The butler dashed out of the room after her bellowing, afraid of what she would do if he continued to object. And by the mere sight of her and her own actions made it best to keep her as happy as possible.

April was a behemoth in the dining room, her larger belly pressed up against the table, growling with hunger despite eating so much already. Her height was just as frightening as her weight, as she looked taller even as she sat. And with all of that newfound weight, it caused her chair to creak heavily.

To her surprise, she found herself sinking slowly towards the ground. Was she shrinking? Not even. It was her huge figure slowly crushing the seat, as the legs of the chair were bending towards the floor, until her fat ass was on the floor itself, while her belly had drug the tablecloth towards her end until the remnants of the items and her belly were directly underneath the table.

"Urgh, what is taking that oaf so long," groaned April as she held her belly.

She looked up and noticed a flower pot resting in front of her end of the table. She reached up and grabbed it, looking over the blue pot and white roses. She took them out of the pot and munched on them ravenously. She then drank the remaining water inside the pot, then ate the pot itself without thinking. It wasn't until she was forcing the pot down her throat that she realized what she was doing. She was beginning to eat household items without a problem. It was strange, but they were certainly appetizing to her.

She tested it again by grabbing the plates and utensils that surrounded her. One by one, forks, knives, and plates were going down her gullet, as she chewed on the metal and porcelain like it was nothing. It hardly hurt her insides when she swallowed and chewed the items. But the only thing it did for her was fuel her hunger, as she grabbed her belly and rubbed it.

Suddenly, a large tank was coming into the room on a large hand cart. It was the butler returning with the exotic fish collection, hundreds of fish in different varieties. He panted as he heaved the large glass tank towards April, who was eager to see it right before her eyes.

"Here... huff... here is the fish collection, Miss Jones," panted the butler as he placed the tank on her side.

"Good," replied April replied as she licked her lips, "Now get the net and feed them to me!"

"Yes madam," replied the butler as he grabbed a medium sized net.

April clapped her hands with anticipation as the butler scooped up as much fish as he could. One scoop after another, he grabbed a heaping pile of fish to feed the young beast of a brat. He brought the net over to April's face, who opened her larger mouth wide enough to take it all in. Cautiously, the butler placed the heap inside her mouth but was stopped as April guzzled down both the fish and the net, much to his surprise. All April could do was forcibly swallow what she ate, as her figure began to grow slightly. She wiped her mouth and looked up at the butler, who was shaking slightly.

"Don't just stand there," she bellowed, "FEED ME!"

"But you ate the net," replied the butler, "How can I...?"

"Oh forget it!"

April stood up on her own fat feet, showing her new imposing figure, looking mildly obese at a staggering height of 8 foot 10 inches.

"I'll do it myself, you little prick!"

She pushed the butler aside using her own belly, as she walked towards the tank and began to suck out everything inside; fishes, rocks, fake plants, models, even the water itself. The butler staggered up on his feet as he watched this monster of a girl eat up a tank full of fish and items like it was nothing, all while her figure continued to fatten as he saw her fat ass grow fatter and slightly higher from behind.

"Good God almighty," mumbled the butler.

Soon April finished the tank itself, but was still hungry. It would take a lot more to keep this fat brat satisfied. And all that was left was an empty glass tank.

"Oh the hell with it," April said as she began to break the tank apart.

The butler could only watch with horror as she broke the fish tank with ease and proceeded to eat it right in front of him. Bit by bit, piece by piece, the wood frame and glass would be broken apart and eaten by April, who was growing fatter and taller as she ate. This was no ordinary form of hunger. This was madness!

Soon the frame was gone, everything inside the tank was gone, all inside April's belly. She patted her larger belly with pride as she did what no child or any person would ever do. And all the butler could do was stare at this child, who was not only fatter but also stood at a height of 9 foot 6 inches.

"That was pretty good," she said with a tremendous BELCH, "But... I'm not done yet... I'm still hungry..."
14232321.title: Rich And Exotic Seafood, Fit for a Bratty Queen

choices: April wanders off for more food
April sees her parents come home
142323212.content:
"That was pretty good," April said with a tremendous BELCH, "But... I'm not done yet... I'm still hungry..."

"B-but, there's nothing left in the house," replied the butler.

April stood up and towered far above her butler, who looked up at her with great fear. She had a look in her eyes that seemed threatening as she glared at him while slowly moving towards him, as her flab jiggled as she moved.

"Nothing left in the house, you say," questioned April in a dark tone, "But I see something right in front of me that looks very appetizing..."

"M-m-miss Jones... Please..."

Before he could say anything else, April quickly grabbed him by his sides and lifted him towards her face as he began to scream mercilessly.

"Miss Jones is hungry," April roared, "Miss Jones will eat whatever she wants! Because whatever Miss Jones wants MISS JONES GETS!"

And with that, she began to stuff the butler head first into her gaping mouth. It was a struggle since he was still pretty big for her to eat. But it was still worth a try. With a little slobber and more force, his body continued to go into her mouth, as he continued to scream for help from the inside. But his cries were muffled inside the behemoth brat's mandible.

April was completely ravenous for more food, so she was desperate to swallow her own butler to satisfy her new hunger. She always gets what she wants and what she wants is to eat whatever she wants until she is full. But the butler may not be enough for her...

Soon his legs were beginning to slide inside April's mouth, as he flailed around rapidly in an attempt to escape. But the girl's hunger and her large body were too much for him. Slowly but surely, his legs and feet were sucked inside her mouth. Finally, with a tremendous GULP, the butler was gone. With that relief, April landed on her butt hard enough to shake the house upon impact. She held her belly gently to console her latest meal.

------------------------------------------

Inside April's belly was her own butler, who was scared out of his wits to see that the young daughter of the Jones family had eaten her and is stuck inside her belly. But what really surprised him was the fact that her belly was glowing bright green inside. The walls of her stomach were coated and concealing the green ooze that was formed from the meteorite from earlier. He didn't know what any of this was, but even if he did, he knew he was still in trouble...

Suddenly, voices of another language were chanting something. The butler could hear them distinctly, but couldn't understand what they were saying. But even if he knew, it was too late for him to do anything. The ooze began to form off from the walls of April's stomach and flow around the entire area. It grew closer and closer to the butler, who tried to move away from it, but more ooze followed him.

Before he could try and run, it caught his legs instantly and began to engulf his body. He screamed as more ooze covered his body, only to be muffled when the ooze reached his head. The screaming would only intensify as the ooze began the digestion process.

------------------------------------------

April began to feel a hand push up against her stomach from the inside, as her butler was trying to fight the digestion. What would've been painful for her had only felt like a small tickle to her as his hands reached outward.

"S-s-stop that you little prick," laughed April as she held her belly, "I can't stand tha-a-at!"

After a short while, the struggle stopped and his hands began to slide back. As it happened, April felt a deep shudder and a big quivering feeling all over her body.

"O-o-o-o-ohhh GOD! What is goin-- OOOOHHHHHHHHH!"

Then it happened. The greatest feeling she ever had. She was growing again.

Seated onto the floor, her legs thickened up as they stretched outward, while her ass bubbled up and rose higher as she grew higher. Her arms expanded as well, looking thicker than any sausage in the world, as her fingers followed slightly. Her neck was forming a slight third chin as her face bloated. But the biggest feature was her belly as it grew larger and fatter before her very eyes. And her height was expanding a little faster than before. All she could do was groan and clutch her belly as she grew.

"Yes... this feels sooooo good... grow bigger... bigger..."

Soon the growth slowed down and her weight was a dramatic difference, looking like a roly-poly but still threatening with her height of 11 feet even.

"Ohh man... that was... amazing..."

After a short while, she managed to get her fatter form from off the floor, only to find herself grazing the ceiling above her, with the chandelier in her face. She held it for a short moment then tore it off and ate it like grapes.

There's no denying it... April is now a bigger threat than before...

Her feast did become effective again, and was starting to grow again, but she would have to prepare for this one as her head had bounced onto the ceiling before smashes it through, again from the sitting position. 1423232121.title: The bigger she gets, the better she eats

14232321211.content:
April found herself looking into her room. It was large enough to keep her pampered self occupied with all the toys, video games, dresses, and everything else she could ever want. But now everything was too small for her now. But it didn't bother her at all. The world was going to be her oyster. She wanted to take advantage of her new figure and her new position. She knew she was bigger than anyone that could stop her or boss her around. Now she was going to boss around everyone and do anything she wants. Because she was basically a queen. In fact, she might as well call herself Queen April.

"This is my time now," she bellowed to herself, "I'm going to do whatever I want now! I'm going to be Queen!"

April stood up as best as she could, as her bedroom floor opened up more of her larger body to fit through. As she stood up, her head reached the ceiling and broke slightly as she stood up on her own two feet. She broke her hands through from under the floor and grabbed anything she could get her hands on. She grabbed her dollhouses and dolls and began to munch on them like nothing. She grabbed her personal home theater with her movies and games and swallowed them down. She ripped her clothes out of her closet and chewed on every fabric. After all of that, she then grabbed her furniture and ate them like candy. Cushions, blankets, pillows, wooden frames, even the expensive mattress was munched on.

It wouldn't be long before April ate everything in her own room, as it looked desolate and demolished. But it satisfied her bizarre hunger for a short while. She even took the liberty to tear off her bedroom door and munched on it like a KitKat bar just for the hell of it.

But as she ate the door, her body quivered and shuddered again. Her body was going to grow again. The feeling was more welcoming for her as she was finishing off the door, she felt her fat body expand and break through her floor. Her head reached up higher and higher as the ceiling broke through her growing figure. Her head was now through another room, larger and more expensive looking than her own bedroom. She recognized it as her parents' bedroom. Their bed was larger than hers, they had an expensive bathroom with a jacuzzi included, and they each had their own large walk-in closets.

That's when things got worse...

142323212111.title: More floors to feed

choices: To have them bring her more living things to eat (people or animals)
1423232121112.content:
April rubbed over her lumpy belly with pride. Sure, the furniture was not match for the delicious pleasure of trapping live meals inside her, but the massive belly – and even better, her massive body – filled her with arrogant pride. All of the lavish material goods that filled her family’s mansion never really satisfied her until now. She took great satisfaction in knowing that it would help her swell to greater proportions. But satisfying as it was, the pride she felt in having been capable of devouring all the extravagant, expensive furnishings of her home was no match for the satisfaction of reducing living things to nothing but food for her to consume, digest, and discard.

That was what really made her feel like a queen. Everyone else was disposable peasants in her eyes: they always had been. Now she had the opportunity to dispose of them for her own pleasure and to help her grow to greater, more unstoppable heights. Finally, everything Ms. Jones wants, Ms. Jones was going to get! She began to drool a little in anticipation of the new possibilities.

Her thoughts were interrupted by two shocked voices coming from below her massive form.

“April! My god, what happened?!” a terrified female voice exclaimed.

At nearly the same moment, a man shouted, “What – how did this happen?!”

April looked down at her shocked parents. She had always looked down on them in one sense: their only purpose was to satisfy her needs and demands. Now she took sick pleasure in looking down on them in a different sense.

“That’s Queen April to you,” April instructed, condescendingly. “And what happened? What happened is I got hungry and ate whatever I pleased. And finally I’m starting to grow into what I was meant to be.”

“Honey,” her mother said, “We’ve got to get this under control. You’re tearing up the house that we’ve worked so hard to provide for you!”

“Well,” April replied, “as you can see, I don’t need you to provide anything for me now. I can take whatever I please, and there’s plenty of food for me to eat.” April’s eyes took on a menacing glint.

Her father, catching on faster than her mother, took a step back and tried to take on a confident, reassuring tone. “April, we can get you more food. We can get you whatever you want. You know we’ll do anything for our darling.”

April licked her lips. “You’ll do anything? Give me whatever kind of food I want?”

Both her parents nodded apprehensively.

April thought a moment before deciding…
1423232121112.title: April’s parents comes home

choices: Start Rubbing My Big Fat Body

14331231.content:
It was a sunny morning in America, as a young Tracy Oshiro was waking up in her small room in the suburban apartment she lived in with her family. She got dressed in her cutest outfit and largest bow to wear on her head and walked out into the kitchen for breakfast.

In the kitchen was her mother by the stove, making hotcakes and sausage. Her mother, Noriko, was an overweight housewife. She sported weight within her breasts and hips, giving her a curvy motherly figure. When she was younger, her figure was slightly smaller, but still attracted the eye of her current husband, Takashi. Takashi was a slim figure, who was reading the newspaper, only stopping to glance at his young daughter and smile at her. He is a hard-working stock broker, who had only a few minutes to spare before going to work. Even though he is constantly busy with work, he still spends valuable time with his family, who he loves very much.

On the subject of love, Tracy's parents spoil her to the point where she is rotten to the core. But they know when to be stern with her. But she continues to act all sweet and innocent to let their guard down to the point where she would get whatever she wants. And she always gets what she wants...

"Good morning buttercup," greeted Tracy's father, who leaned down and kissed her cheek, "Sleep well?"

"I did, Daddy," Tracy replied as she acted all sugary sweet, "Thank you."

"Hope you're hungry, sweetie," said Tracy's mother, "I made a big breakfast!"

Tracy's mother placed a big tray full of pancakes and sausages. Tracy was not a big eater, but her eyes were bigger than her stomach. She grabbed five sets of hotcakes and two big sausages, while her parents grabbed the remains of the food. Tracy knew she had to eat gently when around her family, so she took a bit of her time eating her breakfast, even though her father was eating pretty quickly. He finished his breakfast long before she or her mother were even halfway done. He picked up his briefcase and walked up to his family before rushing out the door.

"Goodbye dear," he said as he kissed his wife then moved to kiss his daughter on the cheek again, "Goodbye sweetie, have a good day at school!"

With that, his father was out the door, leaving the two to continue their breakfast. Tracy was starting to feel full as she was working on her last hotcake and half a sausage. Her mother was done and was beginning to clean up a few plates from breakfast, leaving Tracy to finish. With her back turned, Tracy scarfed the rest down greedily, then took her time to pat her full belly. But she needed something else...

"Mommy!"

"Yes dear," asked her mother as she was cleaning the last plate.

"Can I have a glass of milk please?"

"Of course dear!"

Her mother went up to the fridge and pulled out the gallon of milk. She then grabbed a tall glass from the cabinet and poured the milk for her. What she didn't know was that there was a label that had a specific warning on it:

WARNING - CONTAINS EXPERIMENTAL GROWTH HORMONE. NOT FOR HUMAN CONSUMPTION. RETURN TO SENDER IF FOUND.

The problem with that label was that it was slightly faded and very small. But it didn't stop Tracy's mother from pouring her a glass and serving it to her.

"Here you are, sweetie," said her mother who gave her the milk, "Finish your drink so we can go to school, okay?"

"Okay mommy!"

Tracy's mother left the room to get ready, which left Tracy some time to roll her eyes at the fact that she had school. God, what she would give to just get rid of it. Stomp it into submission. Tear it down, brick by brick. Boy, she was going to get that wish soon...

As she drank the milk, she felt a strange taste in it. It felt like it coated her tongue then faded away into her taste buds and into her system. It was weird, but it still tasted good to her. So she proceeded to drink the rest of it. After finishing the glass, she placed the cup by the sink. Then she felt a slight quiver in her belly, followed by a faint grumble. She thought it was indigestion, so she just ignored it for now. But what she didn't know was the milk was going to have an effect on her body...
14331231.title: Calcium Deficiency? Not for Tracy!

choices: Tracy goes to find more dairy products
Tracy continues her day, bullying others with her new height
143312312.content:
After being dropped off from school by her mother, Tracy's gentle smile slowly formed into a wicked grin as she made her way down the halls. She spotted two kids having cookies and milk and she saw them as easy targets. As she approached them, the two saw her and their smiles disappeared from their faces.

"Hello boys," greeted Tracy in a dark demeanor.

"Hello Tracy," stuttered the boys.

"I see you two have some tasty treats there," said Tracy, "Cookies and milk; a cute combo. Any for me?"

"Uhh actually," stuttered one of the boys, "they were given to us by our teacher in homeroom..."

"I see... so you're not going to share?"

Tracy began to move in closer to the two boys. Even though they were about two inches taller than her, they knew size would not matter for the scorn and wrath that would occur with this wicked, tiny girl.

"A-actually," began the second boy, "you can just have our and that'll be just fine!"

The two boys immediately gave Tracy all of their cookies and pints of milk without hesitation, which made Tracy smile even more.

"Thank you so much, boys! You know how to make a girl so happy!"

With that, Tracy skipped away, leaving the two to sigh in relief.

"Why do we keep letting her do this to us," asked the first boy.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------

Tracy found herself in the cafeteria, sitting quietly to herself. Although she was in a far corner to herself, there were a few other students scattered around, sitting by themselves as well. But it didn't matter to Tracy, who was too busy snacking on cookies. Then she opened one of the small cartons of milk and began to guzzle it down. After she stopped drinking the first one, she felt the rumble in her stomach creep around again. This time, the rumble grew stronger, then spread out within her system, making her body quiver in a strange way.

"W-w-what's happen-n-n-ning," asked Tracy as she was quivering.

Suddenly, she felt herself inch up slowly, her point of view raising up as she grew slightly taller. Inch by inch, she could see the room feel slightly smaller to her. Soon, she felt it all began to fade away as she stopped growing.

"I... I don't know what that was," she said to herself," but that... felt pretty good..."

Looking down, she saw she still had another carton of milk to drink. This time, she had an idea. She opened it up and slowly let the milk pour down her throat. As she slowly drank, the feeling crept into her system again. She was growing again, feeling her perspective change as she continued to drink. As the last drops of milk dripped onto her tongue, the growth subsided and her height was altered again.

She felt her feet touch the floor for the first time as she still sat in the cafeteria chair, which was one signal that told her she changed drastically. She stood up and noticed that she could see over a few tables more than before. This was an interesting perspective for her now. If she had to guess, she had to be about 4 feet and 10 inches, much taller than she was before. Her smile had a sense of wonder, but as she began to think about the situation, it turned into a wicked evil grin.

choices: Tracy goes on a rampage in her own neighborhood
Tracy goes into the city to make some real havoc
143312322222221.content:
Tracy was enjoying her own playtime in her room, as she was casually playing with action figures and dolls. And by play, I mean acting like a giant and using them as victims for her own game of reeking havoc. She would usually pretend she was either a monster or a giant and used the toys as civilians trying to escape, only to be caught in her grasp. She would pretend to act like they were flailing and screaming in her grip, then would throw them to the side.

At this point, she grabs a Barbie doll and decides to do something different. She prepares her teeth and bites off the doll's head, ripping it clean off of its plastic shoulders. She hardly had ever done that, but it was fun all the same. With all of the imaginative destruction, she secretly wished it was real...

------------------------------------------------------------------

From outside and far out in space, a group of aliens were watching this young girl playing around in her room with the toys. They were searching for the perfect life form to help carry out their plans of total world domination. And after seeing this girl acting like a monster, they were hoping to possibly seal this girl's fate.

"I wish I could actually do this in real life," Tracy muttered to herself from the alien's computer screen.

And that was all they needed.

"Set course for the earthling's living quarters," said one of the aliens in their foreign language, "We will make preparations for world domination tonight!"

------------------------------------------------------------------

Tracy was about to play a little more when a strange light flashed into her bedroom window. She covered her eyes, as the light nearly blinded her. From within the light came a small being that was half her size, with a large forehead, pale green skin, and large black eyes that resembled an insect's eyes. As the light faded away, Tracy looked down at the alien that stood before her.

"Who are you," she asked.

"Who I am is not of importance," replied the alien while speaking English fluently, "But it's my mission that is vital to both myself, my people, and to you."

"What are you talking about?"

"We have been watching your planet for some time and we find it to be completely abysmal. It has become a corrupt and immoral habitat, so we intend to take it over and rule it as our own. But we will need some help, which is where you come in..."

"I'm listening," replied Tracy with a sense of curiosity.

"We've seen how you act with those playthings and we want you to be our weapon of choice to take over this planet. You will be free to do whatever you wish, but we will still rule this planet and you will be our enforcer."

"So you want me to basically destroy anything and everything around me just so you can take it all over?"

"You can do whatever you want, so long as we have total control afterward..."

"Where do I sign," asked Tracy with a wicked grin on her face.

"No need, just a simple handshake as you humans call," said the alien as he extended his hand out to her.

The two shook hands for a short moment, then pulled out as the alien faced the window and opened it, which gave way for a large ray gun to enter. It slid through easily but looked very long as it made its way in. It stopped until it was six inches from Tracy, aiming directly at her chest. The alien then makes a signal outside, which causes the ray to turn on, glowing bright green. Then with a quick hit, the beam shoots out and hits Tracy in the chest, as it circulates within her system.

Tracy could feel a major power surge going into her body, as it felt like she was given an enormous energy boost. But then it happened; slowly but surely, her body grew. She began to notice her point of view was different. She could see everything around her was getting smaller, but she knew she was growing bigger. And she liked it...

The ray was affecting her well enough to keep the growth slow and steady. The only downside was that her clothes were hardly affected by the ray. They grew as best as they could, stretching along with her as she stretched higher. But soon her dress was beginning to rip slightly, her sleeves busting at the seams, but they still held on as she grew.

But while her clothes could still sustain her growing frame, the same could not be said for her room, as she began to hit the ceiling and was ready to burst out of her room. She laid down on the floor and let her arms and legs break through the walls, acting like a destructive Alice from Wonderland.

"This is so good," she moaned to herself, "Bigger... Gotta grow bigger..."

She continued to grow, as she found herself cramped inside her room. She felt her head hit the ceiling again and began to break through head first. She slowly stood back up, but not without bringing down the walls and the rest of the ceiling with her in the process. She rose up higher as she stood on her own two feet, breaking through her own house. She found herself looking out into her own neighborhood, as she saw it shrink under her as she continued to grow.

"This is the best feeling ever," she thought, looking over the neighborhood like a small set of dollhouses.

The alien's ray beam was turned off, as Tracy's growth slowed down and she found herself at an impressive and intimidating height of 60 feet tall. She looked down to see her home a wreckage, as she moved her legs out of the rubble and onto the street. The alien's ship was hovering right beside her, as the aliens knew to clear out of the mess the moment she was ready to bring the house down.

"So now you have enough power to take control over this land," said an alien from the ship, "Now go and terrorize this miserable planet!"

Tracy's eyes glared over the neighborhood with malice while casting a wicked grin...

What will she do now?

Man, I could get the hang of this, or maybe yet, I wanna see myself even bigger if I ever want to!” That sounds like a warning towards not just Jimmy, but to the rest of the school and others that this may not be the only time Deston can grow taller dramatically.

143332221122.content:
Deston looked down at the smaller teen in front of him, he considered for a moment continuing his efforts to educate Jimmy on keeping his mouth in line. But then Deston had a thought, a devious thiught that he couldn't wait to test out.

Walking away from Jimmy, out of the stall Deston waved and with a casual tone simply said
"See you later shorty, it's time for my, Big, debut."

Leaving the bathroom Deston returned to the science fair area and began looking for the display with the growth ray. At 7 feet tall he could easily see over the other displays and it didn't take long for him to find what he was looking for. Pushing his way tbriugh the crowd Deston approached the student working on his displayonce more.

The student had yet to notice Deston, an impressive feat but not impossible, and was working on the machine muttering to himself.

"Too dangerous, control measures, more testing needed, but they won't fund me or back me or even help me till after I PROVE the concept, and safely!" The student was half ranting half shouting now.
"Why do I have to do everything, I already revolutionized the field with this, well I'll show them, I'll show them ALL!!" He rose up from beneath his machine having just replaced the power source.

Finally rising up to meet Deston. Looking up he saw the now massive 11 year old and his mind began to spin.
"Uh can I help you?"
"Yes you can" Deston repliedas he reached out and decided to test his own theory. He stepped between the student and the machine and hit the power switch to on. He felt the beam of energy lace through him again, and then Deston decided to put part two of his plan in motion. He figured if one dose of the be a had allowed him to grow from 5 to 7 feet then a second dose would speed it up. To test this he stepped forward grabbed the smaller student by the back of his underwear and proceeded to give an atomic wedgie of magnimous proportions. The student helped as his underwear went over his head and eye's, and Deston felt his whole body warm up..

Again he grew....

That’s when the two and everybody else have all started to scatter and running out of the school building as quickly as they could. The growth from Deston was still going and caught his head through the ceiling before he bursts through it as a result.
