1433332221122.content:
David Buxton is 11 years old, and he’s been a bully for a couple of years. This is because he was made fun of by kids being taller than him, so he clearly had enough and decides to give them a taste of their own medicine. It was the first time he was able to fight back, but never would be realised that he’ll become a bully and his attitude and aggressiveness had changed since then.

But what cannot changed him is the heart and warmth of his little brother, six year old named James. Both loved each other as siblings, David would treat him like a father-like type and his guidance too. If James feels down and upset, his older brother would be delighted to help and deal with these issues along the way.

Such as was this case, when David was coming home from school when he saw James sitting on the doorstep, feeling dejected and upset. This concerns David a lot and comes over to see his brother immediately and sits beside him to try and comfort James as much as he can.

“Hey bro! Are you okay?” David asked in a concerned look to his face.

“No!” James replies in lower tone and shook his head before he explains his reasons. “It’s just that everyone from my class and school are picking on me, because I’m smaller than them. I really hate that and wished I was bigger.”

That made David had to come to terms which is too similar what he had experienced as mentioned before. He would wrapped his arm around his little brother’s shoulders and gives him comfort to try and solve this problem.

“Y’know, you’re not the only one! I’ve had that same treatment when I was about your age. But I was able to fight back and I became a bully ever since. I’m not saying I’m forcing you to do it, but if you wish to do something like I did, it’s all up to you whether you want to or not?” David says as he tries to give his little brother some advice.

“Well, I guess it could be being a bully like you. But how do I stop those kids that are bigger than me?” James seems to be interested in his big brother’s route, but he was still unsure if this could stop anyone else to be frightened of phased by his own size.

“Oh, not a problem! I’ve somehow bought this from the magic shop, and it says it can make things get bigger if I can mark it above your head. Would you like to try it?” David asked and showed James the pencil he had bought just yesterday.

This made James’ eyes lit and looking at his particular pencil his big brother is holding. Though he seems to be confused as to why it makes it happen. But he seems to be desperate to be witnessed and find out this he could mark the pencil some gaps above his own head and see if that could make himself getting taller to make have his own revenge? Only one thing to find out as he nodded and smiled to give this a shot.

“Okay! If that makes me getting taller, then I’ll do it!” James was so desperate, he couldn’t wait to try it out so badly.

“Alright then! How about you stand by the wall and I’ll mark it up for you?” David asked and pointed to the wall where he wants his little brother to stand by it.

James didn’t waste his time and stood up to stand by the wall, watching David come over towards him to start marking the pencil. He may seems to be very nervous about this, but whatever happens, he doesn’t mind how tall would be get just as long as this stuff works. David made no hesitation and starts marking the pencil above James’ head. But where did he mark it at?

"Daddy, I'm home!" That voice is Chelsea herself, and she came over to the kitchen and spotted her father making dinner for a surprise.

Both embrace their hugs and her father then spoke just wanted to know how she's getting on at school.

"Hi, sweetie! did you get on well at school, today?" Her father wondered, which he would be hoping to hear the exact same thing coming from his daughter's reply.

"Just the usual, Daddy! Eating lunches, bullying other kids, and other things in all." That was a usual reply Chelsea had to say, and her father rubbed onto her head and smiled as such.

"That's my girl!" Her father chuckled, before he would remind her daughter on what's happening tonight. "Well, I've got a huge surprise for you, and it's something would you love so much, just for being a good girl."

143333222222221111.content:
Chelsea's father had placed the last burger he cooked off of the stove, as he places it in a bun with various toppings and places it next to the countless stacks of burgers on the counter. He placed the pans he cooked in the sink as Chelsea walked in to see a large number of burgers in view, as her eyes widened like saucers and her jaw dropped slowly.

Each burger on the counter were half-pound patties, covered in a thick amount of melted cheese, topped with bacon, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, ketchup, mustard, and mayonnaise. Each of them was slopping a bit with their toppings, which only made Chelsea's mouth water at the sight.

She was out of her trance when her father placed a hand on her shoulder, looking down at her with a smile. She looked up with a smile of her own, then looked back at the burgers while rubbing her chubby belly with anticipation.

"Take a seat, princess," her father said with a friendly voice, "I'll bring them to you in a second."

Without hesitating, Chelsea dashed to her chair and waited eagerly for her burgers. Her father grabbed a big tray and placed each burger on it, even stacking them high enough for space. After a while, he managed to have every burger on the tray and made his way to the kitchen table, only to witness that Chelsea was impatient as she takes a burger and eats it ravenously.

Chelsea was known to be ravenous when she ate, even when she wasn't hungry she ate like no tomorrow and ate like a pig. Her father didn't mind unless they were out eating somewhere, but at home, she let her eat however she wanted. But whether they ate at home or out, Chelsea always ate more for herself than ever. Her father always encouraged her to eat more. More appetizers, more big meals, more desserts, all just to make her daughter fat and happy. He always believed that the fatter she got, the happier she would be. And as she got to her third burger, she looked pretty happy.

Chelsea hardly kept track of how many burgers she ate, as she went through each one pretty quickly, despite having to be bigger than the average burger. Grease, cheese, sauces, everything was practically smearing and dripping all over her chubby face as she porked out. Her belly was pushing out slightly as she ate, pushing her buttons slightly as her fat skin was showing from within the gaps.

From the sixth came the seventh, with no signs of slowing, Chelsea was going whole hog with her special meal. Her father was so enthralled with her gluttony that he couldn't help but stand behind her chair and place his hand gently on her belly as she ate. He could feel it bloat slightly as she ate, as he gently massaged it to try and comfort her.

"Daddy..."

He looked at her daughter as she still had a mouthful of burger in her mouth.

"Could I have a glass of cola, please," asked Chelsea as she bared her puppy dog eyes.

Her father smiled as he went to the fridge and pulled out a 16 oz. bottle of cola just for her. She finished her ninth burger, then proceeded to grab the bottle and chug it down. Her father looked down and saw a button was struggling to withstand her engorging belly, then saw it pop off and fly away onto the floor, allowing her belly to push out a little more as it was still restrained from the rest of the buttons that held on.

BUUUUUUUURRRP!!!

With a loud belch, Chelsea left her bottle half full so she could finish off her burgers. Even after nine burgers gone, she hardly lost track of her eating process, which looked almost faster than before. It seemed no matter how big those burgers were, they were no match for Chelsea's own gluttony. In fact, it almost seemed like she was more of a glutton than her own father had expected.

The eleventh burger went down to the twelfth, then the twelfth disappeared. And then there were none...

Twelve half-pound burgers, all gone. All inside the now bulbous, firm, fat belly that belonged to a little girl named Chelsea. Her belly was so large that three more buttons had popped off after the twelfth burger, exposing her fat navel that had nearly become an outie belly button. Chelsea was in a slight daze, but she was still aware of her bottle of cola and wasted no time guzzling the rest down.

POP! POP! POP! POP!

The rest of the buttons had finally popped off as her belly had pushed out further for room to expand, as it pushed up against the table. Chelsea's father walked up and gently massaged her belly gently, feeling how firm and full it was.

"Daddy... that was the best meal you made..."

"I'm glad you liked it, sweetie," he said as he kissed her forehead.

The two smiled at each other for a short while, still reveling in the gluttonous scene that had occurred within the kitchen, as Chelsea's chair groaned slightly from her weight.
143333222222221111.title: Big Burgers For a Big, Fat, Bratty Princess

choices: Chelsea asks for another snack. She's STILL hungry?!
Chelsea decideds to relax before her dinner. Gotta work up her appetite!
1433332222222211112.content:
Chelsea was still in a haze from her big burger meal. Her belly was attempting to digest all she had eaten, as it gurgled and growled from trying to sustain everything from the inside. Despite her belly's protest, she felt like she could eat more. It was typical for someone like her. Her eyes were bigger than her stomach, but if she kept this up her belly would practically be bigger than her own eyesight.

And that would soon be put to the test when she saw her father walk towards the freezer to bring out a carton of orange sherbert. He took a few spoonfuls and ate a few himself, then looked over to see Chelsea eying at the carton. Her belly was still protesting, but her hands were reaching out and fidgeting in a clingy, demanding manner. He saw this and gently smiled, as he brought the carton closer to her. She immediately grabbed the container and spoon and began to shovel the sherbert in her mouth.

This young girl was just in a slight food coma after eating twelve thick burgers, but now she managed to work up enough energy to scarf down on dessert. To any other parent, she was out of control and a complete glutton. But to her father, it was him making sure she was happy no matter what happened. And he basically enabled her to be so spoiled, so demanding, so relentless, and so fat. There's no telling how far this would go, but he knew he would do whatever it took to make her happy.

As for Chelsea, her belly was still straining from the amount of food she kept shoveling inside herself. Her belly growled and groaned louder in protest, as it stretched outward further to sustain more room. She looked almost like an over-inflated beach ball, just ready to explode at any minute. But she still ate and ate. She savored the sweet orange dessert as her belly continued to suffer. But even in pain, it felt good to her.

A clink of the spoon was heard as she placed it in the now empty bowl. Chelsea's father grabbed the bowl and smiled at his daughter. Chelsea, on the other hand, was breathing heavily as she held her belly tight. It was under so much pressure that she felt like she could explode from even the most delicate touch. Her belly groaned under so much pressure that the ripples only added to the pain. But even after all of that, Chelsea still loved it. Even after eating more than she ever could imagine, Chelsea was willing to do whatever she wanted, even if it meant going overboard.

"Oooohhhh that was so good," groaned Chelsea as she was in a bigger haze.

Her father gently placed his hands on her belly, as he could tell how tight and stuffed it was from her meal. He knew he was fully responsible for feeding her like this, making her into a complete glutton, to the point where she would be over-stuffed to the limit. But he knew it was what she wanted and he knew it was something he had to do. In fact, it felt like it was something he actually wanted to do...
1433332222222211112.title: There's Always Room For Dessert!

choices: Time for a little post-meal nap
Her belly is super sore. She needs a good belly rub!
14333322222222111121.content:
Despite her belly feeling as tight as a drum, despite eating like a ravenous beast, and despite looking exasperated from her own gluttony, part of her was ready to eat more. Chelsea never had set limits for herself, neither had her own father. But she was willing to see how much she could withstand as far as her own eating habits could.

"Daddy," she groaned as her stomach groaned louder, "I'm still a little... *urp!* little hungry..."

Her father looked at her with concern. He could see from the strained look on her face that she was about finished, but her eyes seemed to be bigger than her stomach. But he knew just from looking at her innocent little face that he couldn't resist giving her a little more. With a short walk into the kitchen, he pulled out two large slices of red velvet cake. Chelsea's eyes widened furiously as she saw her father approach with a heaping slice of cake in each hand. Even after glutting like a laden hog, she was eager for more food.

She hardly moved her arms up to reach out for the cake slices, as her hands were still fixated on her swollen belly. Her father took the initiative and gently fed her the first slice from his left hand. Chelsea took to the cake like a fish to water and began scarfing it down. Just from munching on the cake sent signals to her stomach, as it growled in frustration from the exceeding amount of food already stuffed inside. But soon she finished the one slice and was eager for the next one.

As she munched on the other slice, her belly pushed outward as it took in more of the food she was eating. As it loomed outwards, a slight sound came from her belly, almost as if it was stretching like a balloon. It felt a little painful to her, but she ate through the pain. It was like eating was more important to her than anything else. And all her father could do was comply to her every whim. He was a little concerned about her eating, but as long as she was fine with it, then it wasn't a problem for him.

With the last slice devoured, Chelsea licked her lips from all the cake and icing that was smeared on her face. Her father walked back into the kitchen as she was trying to breathe after eating so much. Then her father came out with a tall glass of milk. She opened her mouth as her father tipped the glass to her mouth.

But upon tasting the drink, it turned out to be a little thicker than any regular milk. Truth be told, he didn't give her milk. He gave her heavy cream. While there was enough milk in the house, he felt like heavy cream was more appropriate for her daughter. It was almost like he wanted to make his daughter really fat. As the last few drops of the cream went down her mouth, her father stepped back and smiled at his daughter.

"Daddy... could I have... another glass... but with chocolate?"

Her father nodded and made another glass of heavy cream, this time adding chocolate syrup to it. After a little while of swirling the glass, he was ready to give her the second glass. Eager, she opened her mouth and took to the cream again. This time, the cream made her belly swell up again, as her belly stretched a little more loudly, billowing more noticeably. Her father saw it before his eyes but wasn't entirely phased by the situation. It didn't seem to bother him as much as it bothered her.

Soon the last few drops dripped inside Chelsea's mouth, as rubbed her belly rigorously to keep it calm and satiated. All that did was shake and jiggle it like a mound of gelatin. It was like her belly was a big water balloon and felt just as tight. There was no telling how much she could withstand from her own gluttony.
14333322222222111121.title: Cake Slices and Cream for Chelsea

choices: Her dream turns into a nightmare
She is waken up by her father
1433332222222211113.content:
Chelsea was beginning to feel groggy after eating so many burgers, as she groggily rubbed her eyes.

"Daddy, I feel a little sleepy," she said in a lazy tone, yawning at the end.

Without saying a word, Chelsea's father gently pulled her out of her chair and slowly escorted her to the couch, as she waddled and heaved her big belly over. With a groan, Chelsea laid on the couch with her belly up in the air. Her father patted it gently and rubbed it in a circular motion.

"Mmmmmmm... G'night daddy..."

With another yawn, Chelsea fell into a deep sleep as her father walked back into the kitchen to clean up the mess. Her belly groaned slightly, as it slowly digested her big meal. Her father came back into the room to cover her belly and body up with a blanket, making sure she wouldn't be cold as she napped.

As he walked away again, Chelsea began to dream. She found herself walking into a restaurant in her normal chubby figure, with her father holding her hand as they walked to their table. The room itself was empty, even though there were sounds of other patrons around, there was no one to be found. After taking their seats, the waiter came up to their table holding a paper and pen, waiting for their orders. But Chelsea's father looked at her with a big smile then looked back at the waiter with a simple request.

"Fill her up!"

In what seemed like a quick haze, the waiter turned around to leave, only to turn around again with trays of food. He placed each plate around Chelsea's area, surrounding her with food in different varieties. Steak, pasta, chicken, pork, pizza, sushi, everything that was edible was made for her and placed in front of her to eat.

Soon after the whole table was covered, Chelsea could only take a deep breath and just suck in all of the food. Her mouth was opened large enough to suck in all of the food from the plates off of the table, looking and acting like a human vacuum. As the food entered her mouth, her body would only expand wider, fuller, and fatter. She looked more rotund than she was before, as her belly and body were fatter after scarfing her meal.

With a tiny burp, Chelsea was gently taken by the hand by her father and taken into another scene, as the restaurant changed into a large park outside. They saw a food truck parked nearby and would stop in front of it for another meal. The cook inside saw the two and smiled at them. Chelsea's father smiled back as he began to make his order.

"Fill her up!"

Without hesitating, the cook moved away from the window while Chelsea's father backed away from Chelsea, which gave her the opportunity. With a quick adjustment of her bigger belly, she began to take a few quick breaths to prepare herself. Then came the resounding vacuum sound again as she began to suck in the food from the truck. Everything from inside the truck began to fly from the window and into her belly, as it all flew within her maw. Hardly anything fell from within the girl's tornado of a mouth, which would cause her body to fatten up and expand again, making her fatter and more round than she was before.

After sucking in all of the food from the truck, Chelsea found herself patting her larger belly with pride. She looked down while her thicker double chin squished within her movement while heaving her belly up and releasing it to jiggle around like a bowlful of gelatin, sloshing around like the fat ball that she is.

The scene would fade once again as her father took her by the hand again and soon they found themselves in an ice cream shop, made to look nostalgic. Much like the restaurant, the place was empty except for a lonely attendant manning the ice cream. The attendant looked down at Chelsea and smiled at her, who would smile back through her thicker cheeks. Her father looked at the attendant with a smile then began to make the order.

"Fill her up!"

Without even saying anything, the attendant took each gallon of ice cream and placed it by Chelsea's feet. Gallon upon gallon would soon surround her, some would even tower her. Soon, the attendant and her father had been replaced by the gallons of ice cream that surrounded this large bratty girl. She looked up to see some towering high above her, going higher than where the ceiling should be. She wondered how she would be able to eat her dessert.

Her thoughts were soon interrupted when a gallon tub began to tip over and the ice cream began to flood out. Without even thinking, she opened her mouth and the ice cream would instantly fly down her throat. Her belly expanded slightly as the first flavor was gone within a matter of seconds. Another gallon tipped over as she opened her mouth again and allowed more ice cream to flow down her throat. As she felt her belly grow again, a big smile grew on her face.

She knew that there was a process going on and she allowed it all to happen. The second a gallon container tipped over, Chelsea would open her mouth wide enough to let it all fly inside her gut. Each gallon would expand and engorge the spoiled piggy, as her body grew wider and fatter. Her belly grew rounder and tighter, as it was now out in the open for room. Her arms and legs grew thicker, to match her wider frame. Her face grew fatter, as a third chin grew in and made her look like a blob of a balloon.

Soon, with each gallon disappeared, one last gallon was floating above her head. It spun around and moved away from Chelsea's area. Chelsea followed it close, trying to move her now completely obese figure around. She was so fat that she was waddling more than walking, reaching up high for her last gallon. She was stopped when she saw her belly bumping into the counter as the gallon was still directly above her. She reached as high as she could.

"I want more," she whined as she still felt hungry, "I want to be filled!"

Almost acting as if it heard her, the gallon slowly tipped over. Chelsea's eyes lit up as she noticed her favorite ice cream flavor was pouring out; peanut butter cup. Opening up her mouth, she allowed the gallon to go down her throat. But what she didn't know was the gallon was far from empty. It was like the container was never ending as it continuously poured more and more ice cream down he mouth. But Chelsea wasn't complaining, she wanted more! As she chugged the ice cream down, her belly was beginning to expand again, as it pushed her away from the counter and grew fatter and rounder. The rest of her body followed suit as she grew fatter and rounder, looking nearly spherical.

But she didn't want it to stop. She wanted it to last forever.
1433332222222211113.title: FILL HER UP!

choices: Chelsea is still a little hungry and wants more food
Chelsea feels sleepy and wants to take a nap
143333222222221112.content:
"Well tonight, this little princess is going to have the largest sundae to herself!"

Chelsea's father moved out of the way of the kitchen table, which revealed to be a large bowl full of ice cream in a variety of flavors and toppings. Chelsea's mouth began to drool at the sight of the dessert.

Scoops upon scoops of ice creams were slowly melting away in the large bowl; vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, chocolate swirl, caramel cone, cherry vanilla, and so many others built inside this bowl. The toppings were scattered all over the sundae, like chocolate sprinkles, chocolate chips, chocolate syrup, hot fudge, marshmallows, whipped cream, gummy bears, and crushed up candy bars from a standard Hershey's to more unique types like Reese's and Twix. It was a mess of a sundae, but all it did was make Chelsea's eyes grow wider and her belly feel hungry.

"Daddy, it looks so wonderful," she exclaimed as she slowly approached the table while her sight kept on towards the sundae.

"I'm glad you like it, but maybe you should take a seat and actually enjoy it before it melts away," replied her father, who had brought a chair to her.

Chelsea snapped out of her gluttonous trance and sat in the chair, which prompted her father to push her in towards the table gently, while also handing her two large spoons to assist her. She took two heaping spoonfuls of different flavors and toppings, wasting no time in gulping down the giant dessert that was meant for her.

Bite by bite, spoonful after spoonful, Chelsea's gluttony and pig-like attitude gave her the upper hand in devouring the sundae with ease. She hardly stopped for a breather and any sight of a brain freeze was hardly visible. All it did was fuel the fire in her belly, as it felt like it wanted her to eat more of the sundae faster.

All while this was going on, her father watched from the other room as he picked up her backpack. He looked inside to see a few extra dollars scattered inside and open bags of snacks and candy bars completely torn apart. He knew this was what made her happy, which made him feel just as happy too. Anything to make his piggy princess happy was all that mattered.

He walked into the kitchen to see how well Chelsea was handling the sundae, only to find that she was about 2/3rds done but was somewhat struggling to eat more. Her belly was pushing out of her shirt and struggled from her pants as the button was pressed tight against it. He leaned down and gently unbuttoned it, allowing her flab to push up against the table from the release.

Chelsea took one more spoonful of ice cream and bit into it at a slower pace. She tried reaching for another spoonful but found herself somewhat lethargic to make an attempt, as she dropped the spoon halfway towards the ice cream. Her father looked on with concern and knew exactly what to do.

"Chelsea, do you want Daddy to feed you the rest," he asked with great concern, holding onto her shoulder gently.

"Yes Daddy," she said faintly, followed by a mild belch, "I want to eat the rest, but I feel too tired..."

"Don't worry, sweetie. I can help you."

Chelsea's father grabbed the spoon she dropped and began to slowly take scoops out of the rest of the melting sundae and slowly fed her each one into her mouth. Chelsea was still a little tired from her feast, but she was still eager to have more. Obediently, she opened her mouth to take in each spoonful given to her.

Slowly but surely, the sundae was disappearing into Chelsea's belly, as it grew slightly fatter and fuller, pressing up against the table further as she ate more and more. She was beginning to feel full but she didn't want to stop eating. She wasn't going to let that sundae go to waste. If there was one rule she would follow is that she should never leave good food behind.

"Does my little princess like her special treat," asked her father who slowly fed her more of the ice cream.

"Yes Daddy," she replied as she ate her ice cream, "I love this so much. I want more..."

"Don't worry, sweetie, there's still more here for you. Just let Daddy help you..."

Time passed and soon the bowl was completely done. The rest of the sundae was gone inside Chelsea's big belly, as it was stuffed to the brim and looking like it was ready to pop at any moment. But Chelsea didn't mind at all. She loved the stuffed feeling and enjoyed every moment of it. Her father took the bowl off of the table and was about to clean it off, only to hear his daughter stop him.

"Daddy wait," she yelled, "I want to lick it clean before you take it."

"Of course sweetie," replied her father as he handed the large bowl back to her.

Chelsea went to work and licked all over the bowl, making sure to get every morsel and drop of ice cream. She lived up to her piggy trait as drops and smears of ice cream were showing on her face and chin. But she didn't care, she wanted more and she always gets what she wants. With one last lick, the bowl was now ice cream-free. Barely a drop or smudge of ice cream was left inside, only to be found inside the belly of a spoiled brat.

What happens next to this piggy princess?

Chelsea woke up to find herself in a large dining room, still wearing her pajamas. She makes her way towards the end of the table and sits on the lone chair. It was like she was in the middle ages with a Victorian mix.

As she sat in her chair, a person comes out in an elaborate outfit while wearing a powdered wig, while holding a large tray filled with a mixture of muffins. He placed the tray right in front of her, as her eyes were dead set onto the baked goods.

"Bon appetite," greeted the servant as he took his leave.

Chelsea wasted no time and began scarfing down the muffins like she hadn't eaten in forever. The muffins were light and fluffy but still were pretty thick. Each ranging from banana nut to chocolate chip, they began to disappear within the belly of this spoiled child. As such, it began to expand slightly from under her pajamas, tightening her top as the buttons strained to keep her fat contained.

As she was munching on the last muffin, another servant walked in with an enormous tray of pizza. It was steaming hot, looking larger than any pizza she had ever seen. It was sliced into 16 slices, as the cheese looked thick while the crust was smothered with butter and garlic. He placed the tray right in front of Chelsea, who had just gulped down the muffin and wasted no time grabbing the pizza. As she was about to munch away, the servant pulled out a large bottle of cola and poured it into her goblet, then nodded and took his leave.

Chelsea meanwhile had scarfed down slice after slice, eating them with both hands. She savored the cheese and sauce as she pigged out, as part of it smeared on her chubby cheeks. With one last munch, a crust was devoured and the pizza was gone. Chelsea was beginning to feel a little hazy from her meal but noticed two female servants coming out with two large desserts. One held a cake that could put any wedding cake to shame, as each section was a different flavor while decorated with white frosting. The other had a large tray of gelatin, which nearly resembled the cake, only it was more like a quivering rainbow with whipped cream draped all around it. Chelsea chugged on her goblet of soda before the two servants prepared their forks for her. After tossing it to the side, Chelsea opened her mouth as the two began to feed her.

The feeding process started with a forkful of cake and frosting, a quick chew and swallow, then a forkful of gelatin and cream, then another chew and swallow, and the process would continue back and forth. Sometimes she would take large mouthfuls of each before having to gulp it all down after a while. No matter how she ate it, she was going to eat every bite.

As she ate, her belly began to grow again, this time more noticeably. She could feel her fat push her PJs out more until the buttons gave way, allowing her belly to push outward and jiggle freely. With that, they fed more to her. And as expected, her belly grew more. It was growing faster as she ate more. It was reaching towards the floor and pushing up against the table. But she was ravenous and anxious for more. The two towering desserts had hardly shrunk from this girl's hunger. In fact, it was almost like they were towering higher and higher as she kept eating. But she was determined to eat it all.

"More! More! I must have more!"

She cried and screamed between mouthfuls as she ate and ate. While her belly got larger, her face looked thicker, with a 2nd chin forming into a larger chin. Her thighs and hips were thickening slightly along with her arms and hands, looking nearly spherical. But her belly was the dominant one to grow as it was looking like a dome of flesh getting larger. The servants were nervous to get near it as it looked like a blob rather than a body part. But it didn't matter, Chelsea wanted more of her desserts.

"MORE! GIVE ME MORE! FEED ME MORE! I WANT TO EAT MORE!!!"

The location seemed to have faded into a new location, as Chelsea found herself in a smaller room, with a bed that was too small for her and several pictures that contained nothing but anthropomorphic rabbits. It was basically the White Rabbit's house.

Chelsea looked down to see that her pajamas had been replaced by a blue dress with white trim, which was surprisingly large enough to fit her new fat frame. Her hairstyle matched her outfit, almost as if she looked like an obese Alice from Disney's Wonderland movie.

She twirled around in her new outfit for a short while, but stopped once she heard a voice in her head yell "action". She looked around the room for something, but soon stopped when she opened a small porcelain jar filled with cookies that said "Eat Me" on each one.

Cautious, she took one and gently nibbled on it. The taste was intoxicating. She then chewed it all down. She took another. Then another. Then a small handful. Then a larger handful. Then two handfuls. Then she just took the jar and munched away what was left inside.

"HEY!"

She stopped the moment she ate the last cookie, then turned and saw a small white rabbit looking at her with anger. Her face and dress were covered with crumbs, as she stared at the rabbit dumbfoundedly.

"What do you think you're doing? Those cookies were for the Queen!"

Chelsea wiped her face, then had a wicked smile on her face.

"Yeah, so what," she replied, "I was hungry and now those cookies are in my belly!"

14333322222222122221.content:
*ZAP!*

A quick shot from a large laser instantly changes a large grandfather clock to the size of a miniature item small enough to be for a dollhouse prop. A successful test for the machine.

Chelsea's father was a brilliant inventor, as he managed to invent a large machine that can grow or shrink anything. It was a feat no one else had managed to create or perfect, but he managed to have it functioning properly. A quick switch to shrink and his invention could successfully shrink an item without a hitch.

From the steps of the basement, Chelsea watched on discretely without making a sound. She could only watch with her eyes bugging out as she saw what was once impossible become a reality. Her father had managed to shrink an item in just seconds. She could only hope that the machine could do more.

"Now," her father said as he talked to himself, "let's see if I can grow it back to its proper size..."

As her father aimed it low enough to hit the clock, Chelsea stood back and watched with anticipation. He switched it to grow and the machine's lights switched from blue to green. The laser was charging, ready to fire again. However, a glitch in the system caused it to spark suddenly.

"Oh no! What's going on?!"

Chelsea's father checked the monitor to see that the machine was going through a massive power surge, as it displayed numerous warning messages.

MALFUNCTION

POWER GRID UNSTABLE

POWER SURGE INCREASING IN DANGEROUS LEVELS

Chelsea stood up and tried to go over to her father. He saw her approach and was surprised to see her down here.

"Chelsea," he shouted, "You can't be down here! The machine's malfunctioning! Get out before you get hurt!"

Scared, Chelsea scrambled to escape, only to find her leg caught on a couple wired that were connected to the machine. She tugged as much as she could, but they were too thick for her to escape.

The machine's hum grew louder as the lights grew brighter. Suddenly, the machine imploded as sparks burst from the back end of the machine. The power emitted through the cords and a strong current flew towards Chelsea's direction. Immediately, a strong current of power went through Chelsea's body, shocking her as it went towards the nearby wall socket, causing a major blackout in the basement.

A few minutes passed as Chelsea's father carried his only daughter from upstairs and into the family room on the couch. He gently washed her face with a wet washcloth, until he saw her eyes open.

"D...Daddy?"

"Oh my god, Chelsea! You're alright! Thank goodness!"

He held her in a tight hug as tears rolled down his eyes. Chelsea felt his embrace, confused as to what happened.

"Daddy? What's wrong? What happened?"

"You don't remember," he asked as he released the hug, "You were struck by a powerful surge of electricity from the laser I had downstairs. I thought you were dead!"

"I'm sorry, Daddy," she replied as tears were forming from her eyes.

"It's alright sweetie. The important thing is that you're alright and no harm was done."

The two exchanged a smile as they held each other in a big hug together.

"Well, Daddy is going to take care of the mess downstairs. Why don't you relax out here while I'm sure you're still exhausted."

"Okay, Daddy!"

With that, her father went back downstairs to deal with the mess, while Chelsea was by herself. She felt a little strange after what had happened, but it didn't bother her entirely. In fact, she was just bored now. She wanted to do something after going through such a catastrophe.

14333322222222131.content:
Deep inside all of us is a dark thought that tends to fester and influence the mind to do things that we could regret later on down the road...

Chelsea was sitting in the kitchen, eating a big lunch consisting of nothing but fast food from Burger King. Normal kids meals were not good enough for her, as she would eat both a kids meal and a double whopper sandwich and large fries. And she was happily eating it all except for one problem...

"I WANT MY SPRITE!"

Chelsea always wanted a large soda. No milk, no juice, only a sugary, carbonated soft drink. However, the restaurant forgot to give them one. That's when he got an idea and went towards the cupboards to grab a large glass bottle of a formula called "Jumbo-Gro". This would give him a wicked grin and a devious idea...

The idea of using this bottle occurred around a few days ago when he saw his daughter watch old cartoons on his computer. The cartoon in particular that caught her interest and his own was called "King-Sized Canary". The cartoon focused on a group of animals that would fight over a bottle of the same formula that would cause each of them to grow to gigantic and rotund forms, to the point where two of them outgrew the world. Once he saw his own daughter smiling at such a concept got him to thinking and got him to planning.

After a short search on the internet, he managed to find a couple bottles for a decent price and bought them in bulk. Even if they couldn't work, he could either use them on actual plant work or sell them online elsewhere. But deep down, he knew it had to work...

He brought over the bottle and a tall glass and poured it for his own daughter. She looked at the bottle with concern and aggravation.

"Daddy," she said as she pouted, "I wanted a soda, not some weird grass juice!"

"Now now, sweetie," her father consoled, "This is something a little different but it'll be even better than a soda."

Chelsea sniffed the glass, which had a hint of mint and citrus flavors. Curious, she took a quick sip. The taste was better than she had expected. Without even thinking, she began to chug the rest down from the glass. She licked her lips after savoring every last drop.

"Mmm, that was delicious, Daddy! Could I have some more?"

"Certainly, but finish your lunch first," he said as he took the glass from her.

"Oh yeah, I still have more fries to eat."

Without a second to lose, Chelsea grabbed the rest of the fries by the handful and scarfed them down. Her father didn't mind her gluttonous behavior, but he knew something was bound to happen shortly.

Before she was able to eat the rest of her fries, a quick shudder occurred within her belly, which proceeded towards the rest of her body. Suddenly, her belly and body grew up towards an inch, as her belly was beginning to stretch her shirt, pushing the buttons outward as her shirt exposed some of her belly's skin.

Confused, Chelsea looked over her body but was suddenly interrupted when her body grew again by another inch, as her belly caused her shirt to stretch outward as the buttons were holding on tighter, while her clothes were stretching slightly from her sleeves. Her belly was getting so big that it pushed up against the table.

Once again, Chelsea was bewildered over what had just happened, as she felt her clothes feeling slightly tighter on her newly enlarged body. Her body looked somewhat rounder as most of the new weight had gone to her belly, with the rest evening out within her system. She looked a lot fatter but her height was also slightly more noticeable as well. At 5 feet even, it could estimate that her body weight was about 165 lbs. to match her new figure.

This new change was a big surprise for her father, who was amazed and astounded by his daughter's latest figure. He didn't think it would make her so much larger, as it was almost like a fantasy come to life for him and her. But he felt so happy to see her look so large.

"Daddy, I feel a little funny," said Chelsea as she was feeling her new figure over.

Before he could say anything or even do anything, Chelsea's body began to shake and quiver again. Soon, her body began to grow in quicker spurts than before, as she felt herself growing larger and higher in her seat. Her buttons were popping off as she grew, her sleeves tore slightly as they tried to remain intact on her growing body, along with her pants as they ripped up from her calves and towards her thickening thighs. And all she did was sit and grow, inching higher and higher in her seat.

It wouldn't be long until her chair would give way from her new weight and crumbled immediately from her enlarging figure. Soon, her figure would stop growing as she found herself looking over the kitchen table while sitting on the floor. She hardly moved or said anything as she just looked around from her new surroundings. She then saw her father approach and assisted her into standing up on her own feet. It was a struggle at first, considering her new weight and all, but she managed to get up properly. However, she would be surprised to see her looking down at her father, who was looking up at her at the same time.

Chelsea stood at an impressive 6 feet and 6 inches, while her body was more rotund and fat to the point where even if she moved slightly, her belly would jiggle like gelatin. If there was an estimate about her weight, she had to be over 300 lbs. She was amazed at how she had grown so large to the point where not only was she fatter, but she was a couple inches taller than her own father. She looked down at him with a great big smile, as he returned with a smile almost as big as hers.

"Daddy, this is amazing," she yelled with delight as she held her father in a tight hug.

"I'm glad you like it, buttercup," he replied as he was held tight in her arms and her huge belly.

"I'm so big! It's so wonderful! And the growth felt so incredible too! It was such a rush I can't even describe it!"

"Sweetie, I know you love it and all, but could you let me go now? Daddy can't breathe..."

"Oh sorry, Daddy," she replied after letting him go, allowing him to breathe.

After a short moment, he felt his daughter's belly gently as it felt soft and jiggly. Chelsea giggled as she felt her father's hands all over her larger belly. The feel of his daughter's fatter figure would only inspire him to make his daughter bigger, larger, and most importantly happier.

But the question is what will happen now?

14333322222222131231.content:
Chelsea would find herself still in the living room, almost as if nothing happened during her nap. She stood up from off the couch and looked around. All was silent, all was calm. Nothing seemed to be going on.

"Daddy, I'm hungry," Chelsea yelled out loud.

There was no response. Not a sound.

"Daddy, I want food!"

Still no response.

"DADDY, WHERE ARE YOU?! I WANT FOOD NOW!!!"

Nothing...

Chelsea began to feel concerned. She waddled her way into the kitchen. No one was inside and there was nothing cooking. She looked into the refrigerator only to find it completely empty. Now she was concerned. She looked in each cabinet and saw nothing. No food, not even any utensils or pots or pans.

She immediately rushed back into the living room, as she was panting from both her new weight and her endless search for food. No one was here to help her, no one was here to feed her, she was all alone.

"Why can't someone help me," she sobbed, "I'm so hungry..."

"Aww, is the big fat piggy feeling hungry?"

A voice came from somewhere inside the room. She looked around but didn't see a figure or any person nearby.

"Up here on the mantlepiece, sweetie."

Looking by the mantlepiece above the fireplace, Chelsea saw numerous pictures framed above. Most of them were scattered images of herself and her father throughout her childhood. However, a large portrait of her mother stood out from the rest. She was a young woman with blond hair, a maroon dress, a voluptuous figure that looked chubby but still maintained a sexy figure, and a necklace on her chest that looked like a priceless heirloom. Chelsea stared at the image carefully, wondering where the voice came from. She moved in closer as the portrait still looked the same.

"I must've been hearing things," said Chelsea as she stared at her mother's portrait.

"Well I hope you can at least open your ears for me," said the portrait of her mother as it came to life.

Chelsea shrieked as she saw her own mother, who had died years before she even knew her, spoke from her directly from the portrait. She stumbled back and fell on the table on her butt. The table hardly survived under all of that weight. And the portrait could only laugh at her own expense.

"Ohohoho, Chelsea, you clumsy little hog," chuckled her mother, "With that new size of yours, I'm surprised you can still get around easily!"

Chelsea stood back up as she brushed off the debris off of her butt, then walked back up to the portrait.

"M-m-mom? Is that really you," asked Chelsea, "I thought you were dead!"

"Oh I am dead, honey," she replied as she put her hands on her hips, "But I figured I'd give you some much-needed help."

"What do you mean?"

"Look behind you, piggy."

Chelsea looked swung her wider body around, only to see the table in perfect condition and a porcelain jar that looked like it came from the 1800s. She walked over to it and opened it carefully, revealing inside to be numerous cookies that read 'Eat Me' on each one.

"Yup, those are exactly what you're thinking of," said Chelsea's mother.

"You mean these will actually..."

"Honey, they're going to make you into a humongous heffer. That drink you had may have made you into the giant fatty you are now, but wait until you've had these cookies! It's a old family heirloom of ours."

Chelsea was hesitant at first, but then she felt at ease as she took a bite out of the first cookie she ate. Then she took another cookie. Then another. Then another. Then she began to scarf down the cookies until the jar was empty. As she scarfed down the last of the cookies, her belly began to shake and shudder, swirling her large mass like a towering bowl of gelatin.

"Hope you enjoy your new horizons, my little fatty," cackled her mother as her laughter echoed away as she disappeared from sight.

Chelsea couldn't say anything as she began to grow and expand in a stronger fashion. The growth spurts felt stronger as her body had shifted higher and her body expanded to follow suit. She looked down to see her feet disappear from her evergrowing belly, while her view shifted higher and higher as she grew. Soon, her head hit the ceiling but her growth didn't fade. She had to kneel to make room, but her growth had continued. She sat to make room, but her growth was still going. Her head hit the ceiling as she was sitting and she knew what was bound to happen...

Outside, various neighbors were casually minding their own business, as Chelsea's father drove into his driveway with bags of groceries stored in his car. As he grabbed a few bags and made his way to the door, a rumble was occurring from within his home. He could feel the walls of his house shake and he was greatly concerned. Before he could do anything, the walls broke apart as a thick figure burst through freely. A large gelatinous figure loomed high above, greatly damaging what was once his home.

The figure had an enormous belly sticking out in front, an inch away from where he was sitting, frightened out of his mind. Thick tree trunk sized legs planted with loud thuds on both sides of his lawn, nearly cornering his escape. He looked up to see a larger and chubbier looking smile look down at him with glee. It was his own daughter, looking at nearly 20 feet tall and looking at over 500 lbs. if she was at her normal size. But everything about her was anything but normal at this point...

"Hi Daddy," she greeted as she waved her thicker arm at him, "I'm glad you're home, because I just had some yummy cookies and I'm really hungry! So, get to work and FEEEEEEEED MEEEEEEEE!!!"

With her new size, Chelsa could see around the neighborhood a little better, especially their own yards and all. She could see some people doing various chore work, relaxing in their yards, or just moving stuff around from in and out of their homes. Pretty normal yet tedious stuff.

But what caught Chelsea's eyes was her neighbor from across the way. Young Eddy Sinclair was being bullied around by his next-door neighbor, the young but large bully Benny Walker. Belly was using his chubby body to wrestle the weak little Eddy, even pulling at his leg like a wrestler would. Eddy was yelling in pain as Benny kept hurting him. Chelsea knew what she had to do...

"Come on, say 'uncle'," demanded Benny as he twisted his ankle.

"UNCLE! UNCLE!" cried Eddy who was slamming his hand on the grass in agony.

Benny was holding on tightly until he noticed a large shadow casting within their area. He looked up and saw a larger figure standing right in front of them, as he loosened his grip and looked up in curiosity. Eddy was too busy to try and recuperate his wounds, not knowing of the large figure in front of him.

"Who the heck are you," asked Benny.

Standing right in front of him was Chelsea, with her hands on her wider hips and a smug look on her chubbier face.

"Well, you should know me, Big Butt Benny, because I'm the one who kicked your big butt before," she said as she shook her hips.

"Chelsea?! What happened to you?!"

"I grew up like a weed. I have a new larger figure and I know how to use it!"

"HA! You grew up like a whale! What could you even do at that size?"

Benny teased Chelsea while poking at her exposed belly, as he felt how thick and fat it was from a mere touch. However, Chelsea was expecting him to fall into her trap.

Before he could do anything, Chelsea hoisted her belly back a bit, then flung it into Benny as hard as she could. The force of the belly bump caused him to fall back against the fence of the yard and then would immediately bounce off and onto the grass. Eddy looked at this with sheer wonder and astonishment. And all Chelsea could do was brush off her belly like nothing happened. She felt proud of what she had done. She liked how her new figure amplified her position as the bigger, better bully.

143333222222221324.content:
Chelsea's eyes were wide and her mouth was salivating at the sight of the plate of hotdogs put in front of her. They were thicker than average hot dogs, as they nearly overlapped the buns they were served on. Each one was topped with ketchup, mustard, and relish, making the bun feel smaller with everything placed on top of the weiners. Unbeknownst to Chelsea though, each one was laced with a special chemical substance that would practically expand the figure of this chubby little brat.

Chelsea took one and began to scarf it down, savoring as much of the flavor as she could. The substance added an extra zesty flavor that made her taste buds go crazy. This, in turn, would make her eat faster, getting her into a feeding frenzy. In short, she was eating like a pig. But this didn't bother her father Mark. He was happy to see her eating to her heart's content. Even if she had bad table manners, he felt satisfied when he saw his daughter eating the meal he presented to her.

One by one, the hotdogs were disappearing into the girl's gullet. It seemed like it would never end, between the food and Chelsea's gluttony. But after a while, she slurped down the last hot dog. She even took the time to lick the plate clean. She even wiped her mouth of any excess condiments and crumbs off her face, licking herself clean too.

Chelsea patted her belly in content, as her white shirt was trying to contain the new excess that was pushing outward slightly, while her hips dug into her skirt slightly. Her father came up and gently massaged her shoulder.

"How was your meal, piglet," he asked sincerely.

"That was the best, Daddy," she sighed with contentment, "I feel so full..."

Suddenly, a slight quiver came from her belly, followed by a spontaneous growth spurt that caused her belly to expand, as the buttons of her shirt burst off and let her belly push out further. Chelsea was surprised when she saw her belly jut outward so instantaneous. Her father Mark was just as surprised too, but his surprise turned into excitement as he began to witness his experiment in action.

In a strange yet steady pace, Chelsea's body began to grow in spurts. Her belly was growing fatter before her eyes, while the rest of her body was growing thicker. But she also grew taller and taller with each spurt, as she began to rise up from her seat. Her clothes were struggling to keep ahold of her enlarging body, as her shirt was still covering her chest but left her belly exposed indefinitely. Her skirt was still digging into her widening hips but wasn't big enough to cover her newly expanding butt from her backside. Her socks slid down as her legs got thicker, eventually fitting around her ankles in a slightly loose fit.

Eventually, her chair gave way from under her expanding weight and found herself sitting on the floor. She still grew taller and fatter, surprised by her evergrowing body and drastic change of perspective. But soon the growth slowed down as her head nearly hit the ceiling as she sat on the ground. She looked down at her father who was grinning from ear to ear. He approached her and gently placed his hand on her belly.

"Daddy," she said as she felt his small hand touch her big belly, "What happened to me? How did I get so big?"

"I made a special formula to make you grow into the biggest girl ever," he replied, "I wanted to make sure you were the biggest and the happiest. Nothing but the best for my daughter!"

Chelsea looked over her newfound figure and was beginning to admire the change very well. Her clothes were pretty tight on her, but it didn't bother her. The only thing on her mind was how she would adjust with her new figure and how much it would affect her daily life. All she knew was that it was going to be a great big change and she was going to enjoy it...

Bella Piñón the Nutcase

143333222222222.title: More

choices: Steal their lunches and enjoy the buffet
Eat one of the visitors themselves!
1433332222222221.content:
Bella used to have a bright future ahead of her… but for the past few years, she’s been a recluse, rarely daring to venture far from her home. Why? Well, the poor girl has a strange, unexplained… ‘disorder’. Fairly frequently, about once a day, her mind grows foggy, and she blacks out for the duration of an hour or so. During this time, she becomes a gluttonous machine, going so far as to bully and attack people just to steal their food. Being a kind-natured person, she’s horrified by the kinds of acts she commits while she’s unconscious. To make things even stranger, the more she ate during these ‘binges’, the taller she seemed to grow. She used to be a scrawny little thing, but when she started blacking-out, she had starting growing at an alarming rate. Of course, just as this was becoming a problem, she learned how to control herself; whenever she found her consciousness growing foggy, and her hunger growing, she had someone lock her inside her own bedroom until she finally returned to her senses. This is how she’s lived her life for a while now; hiding away, living in fear that she may lose control at any moment… Unfortunately, she’s gotten so good at hiding away that she’s gone long enough without incident that the government considers her ready to return to Gray Oak High. She’s tried to explain her condition, but they never seem to understand. She’s only been coming here for a few days, but her constant anxiety hasn’t let up in the slightest. She hasn’t had any blackouts during school yet, but Bella knows it’s only a matter of time. She can only pray it doesn’t come at an inopportune moment. In the meantime, she’s been distancing herself from her peers, and trying to focus solely on her studies. Still, it was hard not to be embarrassed sometimes. Even with her condition under control, she towered over the rest of the girls in her class, and even some of the boys. She didn’t have much in the way of social acumen, either, preferring to stare at the ground and try not to notice the people laughing at her behind her back.

Today was a particularly bad day, too. She’s been constantly feeling the hunger grow within her the longer she goes without binging, and it seemed she was about to hit her breaking point. To make matters worse, a troupe of kids seemed to be wandering around the school today for some reason, pointing at her whenever they see her. ‘Wow, she’s so tall!’ ‘Why does she look like that?’ Apparently they were from the local primary school, visiting Gray Oak High as part of some sort of tour. She wished they would go away -- their constant mockery was humiliating -- but it seemed they were here to stay for the day. Despite all the distractions, Bella tried her best to stay away from everyone else… but her hunger was growing. As she walks past the cafeteria, she begins to grow light-headed. Surely, one little peek couldn’t hurt… She usually eats her lunch tucked away somewhere solitary; this was the first time she had entered the cafeteria, and the sights and smells bombarded her. Apparently, the visiting class had brought along lunch, and her addled mind considered the feast to be one of the most delicious things she’d ever seen. She felt her consciousness slowly fading, as if entering a dream, as her psychosis overtook her. Within moments, her eyes slid lazily shut, and her unconscious body moved as if on its own accord...

Bella blacks out. Her consciousness is stripped from her, and she’s overcome by primal hunger, as if she’s been possessed. She has been possessed, in fact -- by you. This black-out will last about an hour. What will you have her do?
1433332222222221.title: Calm Before the Storm

14333322222222212.content:
Bella woke from her gluttonous stupor about an hour later, wrestling from unconsciousness by splitting pain coming from within her gut. She looked around, dazed, to find herself sitting on a chair in the cafeteria. She looked down at her round belly, only to realize that it was huge! Much bigger than she thought possible! What did she eat? To make matters even stranger, much of the visiting class was now rubbing her belly with excitement, as if entranced by her big, gurgling gut. “Wow! You ate him!” One of the girls rubbing her belly said. “You really did it!”

“W-what?” Bella groaned, still confused and half-awake. She groaned as she felt something weird in her stomach, as if something was moving around inside. She looked down at her belly, which was so large it looked like it she was nine months pregnant with quintuplets. Her huge, round belly was just hanging out for all to see, her shirt much too small to have covered it. Worse, Bella’s heart sank when she saw a small hand press against the sensitive flesh of her stomach from the inside, creating a sizeable hand-shaped bulge in the skin.

“Jimmy! You said you were going to gulp him all up… and you did!” One of the boys said, excitedly. “This is crazy! Is he moving in there?” Bella’s heart was thumping in her chest as she realized what had occurred. Judging by the size of her belly, during her black-out, she had swallowed one of the visiting students… whole! She had always been worried about something like that happening, but it never seemed possible. She groaned, feeling every movement from the poor boy as he tried to break free. Luckily, the belly rubbing from the rest of the class reduced the pain somewhat.

“Our teacher tells us food gets digested…” Another of the students asked curiously. “Is Jimmy your food now?”

“Y-yes, he is…” Bella nodded, trying to come up with something to say. Her gluttonous act had been witnessed by the entire class! Luckily, instead of being horrified, they seemed curious and excited for some reason. Still, she didn’t want this event to become common knowledge. “But n-nobody can know!”

“What do you mean?” Another girl raised a brow.

“Uh… imagine how embarrassed he would be if everybody knew that a girl ate him!” She said, quickly coming up with a convincing lie. It made her guilty, but it was her only choice at this point. “Tell them… tell them that a big, scary monster got him. For his sake, y’know?”

“Yeah… that makes sense…” One of the other boys said, contemplatively, and the rest of the class nodded in agreement. With that, Bella stood up and pushed hurriedly past the class, desperate to be alone as fast as possible. “Hey, where are you going?”

“I-I have to go to class…” She made up an excuse, waving weakly as she power walked away. “Goodbye!” The class smiled and waved at her, shouting byes and thank yous, as if the whole experience had somehow been a barrel of laughter for them. For Bella, and presumably Jimmy, it had just been a nightmare. She sat down on a bench in a private back room, tears starting to roll down her cheeks as she felt her belly loudly start to digest her ‘meal’. “Oh my god, oh my god, oh my god…” Bella said, almost hyperventilating. “He’s really in there… I’m so, so sorry…” She laid on her back on the bench, the weight of her belly almost crushing her, as she tried to calm down. “I… can’t get you out… just, please stop moving in there… it really hurts!” Eventually, the movement inside her subsided a little, and she was able to get up and start walking. Everybody else was in class, so the hallways of the school were mostly empty. She made a beeline for the front door, desperate to make it home before anybody sees her. “Please stop wriggling… I can hardly walk…” She says, almost being knocked off balance every time the body inside of her shifted. Still, she was able to limp shakily towards the door.

“Hey. Aren’t you supposed to be in class?” She heard a voice calling out from behind her in the hallway, quickly realizing it’s one of the staff. She doesn’t dare turn around to face them; they’d notice her belly for sure!

“I… I don’t feel very well…” She squeaked out, anxious.

“Oh. Do you need me to show you to the nurse?” The voice asked, and she could hear their footsteps approaching her down the hallway.

“N-no! On second thought, I’ll be just fine…” Bella yelped, rushing forward, and taking a right down the hallway towards her next class. “I’ll just get to class now…” Her pursuer sounded confused, but they didn’t follow, much to Bella’s relief. Later, Bella snuck into her class, trying to cover her huge bulging belly with her bag. If anybody looked directly at her, they would of course be able to notice her massive gut; but luckily, she managed to make it to her desk unnoticed. Luckily, she was sat in the far back corner, so she could spend the next half hour trying to act natural. “Oh no, oh no, oh no…” She groaned, quietly. Their teacher was mentioning something about standard deviations, but it was hard to pay attention when her gut was holding an entire kid prisoner! “Please stop squirming… I can’t… take it anymore…” She whispered, trying to rub her belly reassuringly, only for ‘Jimmy’ to kick against her gut with maximum force! “Augh!” She cried out.

Everybody in class turned to her, snickering. Luckily, her belly was hidden under her desk, and most people didn’t seem to notice it. “Are you alright, miss Piñón?” Their teacher asked, raising a brow.

Bella looks up at him, her face flushed. “... can I go to the bathroom?”

“Of course,” their teacher sighed, and Bella waited for most people to turn away before grabbing her things and sneaking out of class as fast as she could. She didn’t know if anybody noticed her stomach as she left, but there was nothing she could do about it now. Digestion was really kicking in at this point, and the boy was kicking and wriggling like mad, his hands and feet making very obvious bulges in her gut. Her stomach groaned loudly as it struggled to contain its meal, and Bella could hardly stand, much less walk.

“Come… on… stop… s-squirming… there’s nothing I can do now…” She groaned, crying in pain as she walked out the front door. Luckily, there was nobody outside at the moment, but a car could glide by at any moment. She had to make it there fast. She took a deep breath, bracing herself… before bursting into a full jog down the sidewalk. Even this slow run caused her big, round gut to bounce up and down like mad, jostling and rattling the kid inside like mad. She panted and grunted in pain as she ran, her bouncing belly feeling like it might just fall right off. A few cars passed her by as she ran, much to her embarrassment, but they mostly seemed to be people from out-of-town, and would probably just assume Bella is severely pregnant.

After what seemed like an eternity of running, Bella finally made it home. Her entire family was out, either at work or school, so she just grabbed the key from under the mat and let herself in. Drained of all her energy, she could barely make it up the stairs before she finally locked her door behind her and collapsed onto her back on her bed, the weight of the boy in her belly almost crushing her. With her alone time, she had some time to contemplate her situation… but at this point, she was too exhausted and emotionally fried to feel any guilt. She wanted to just go to sleep and churn this kid up into fat. Then, tommorow, she could worry about what she’s done. “Ssshhh… it’s okay…” She said, rubbing her bulging belly, more to settle the boy inside down so she could get some sleep than out of some genuine compassion. “Just relax in there…” She rolled over onto her side, feeling her gurgling belly jostle as it laid on her bed. Now that she wasn’t constantly worrying about getting caught, she could savor the fact that this actually felt kind of good, for some reason. She had never felt so full, nor had the skin of her belly ever felt so sensitive. Best of all, feeling something moving inside her gut gave her an almost maternal instinct. She could get used to this...

Despite the constant jostling, Bella finally managed to lure herself into a veritable food coma. Her prey held strong for hours, but eventually succumbed and was churned down to nothingness. When she woke up the next morning, Bella was...
14333322222222212.title: First Blood

choices: Let's blimp up the Scot and give her what she wants!
1433332222222222.content:
Mor Grant
Age: 14
Race: White
Height: 4'8"
Weight: 100lbs.

Mor is an oddity in this list because she isn't really a bully. Not in the normal sense, anyway, but sometimes she can be a wee bit careless! A pasty Scot with brown hair set into two large pigtails and curly locks which frame her hazel eyes, Mor's name means 'Great Giant' but she's anything but, a major source of contention. Always wanting to live up to her name, she's dressed in punkish-gothic clothes that are always a size too large, waiting for the day that she'll simply erupt out of them, growing up into the massive girl she should've been when puberty passed her by. As a result, she's always had an obsession with being bigger, daydreaming and watching cartoons with expansion, and collecting objects from her favorite movies and series that made the characters grow. If she starts growing, she won't ever stop, and though she doesn't want to hurt other people in her growing spree, Mars is looking pretty tasty...

A total shrimp, her personality is wonderfully boisterous, with a clever devilish streak that always gets her in trouble. Instead of being the bully, she might be the impromptu rescuer instead!

Mor wanders the town during a huge festival for food. She wanders for various treats, but a strange figure offers her a tasty treat called Passion Patties. She offers her a sample and she is hooked instantly. The dealer gives her as much as she can sell and she begins to snack away the rest.

Eventually, she runs out and craves for more. Even though she has so much food at home, they're not enough to satisfy her cravings for more Passion Patties. She's stark raving mad for more!

Eventually, she looks for the figure that sold her the Patties and finds her, begging for more. The figure takes her to a location and promises her all the Patties she can eat... if not more than she can handle...
