14333322222222221132.content: Mor comes across an old Polaroid-style camera during a swap meet and decides to try it out. Taking normal pictures with it, Mor eventually takes pictures of herself as she messes around with her toys. However, she sees that she looks fatter in the pictures. Not worrying about it, she ignores them and moves on. But by the following morning, she finds herself looking just as big as the pictures made her out to be. How far can this go for the little scot?
14333322222222221132.title: Mor and the Curious Camera Conundrum

choices: A plumper Mor, excitedly watching as her nighty strains around her new bulk...
Mor, twice as big as she is now, messing around with her friend...
Colossal Mor! Five times her size and flattening a chair while she devours lunch
143333222222222211321.content:
"Can't believe I managed to find me one...for a few quid, even! With plenty of film to boot!" Mor said to herself as she headed up the stairs of her home to her room. She had just come back from a swap meet with a particularly special prize: a Polaroid Camera, this one an SX-70 collapsible model, a cult classic. Being a purveyor of not just growth-inducing memorabilia, but a professed lover of photography and cinematography for both her own unusual hobbies and ordinary life, finding a rarity like this particular camera in a flea market was finding a diamond among coal. Taking it out of the little plastic bag, the brunette noticed a small card fall out, furrowing her brow. "What's this?"

Reaching down and grabbing the card, she read off the little blurb, " 'Say Cheese-And Die Again! stage play camera. Limited production, certificate of authenticity. Fully functioning SX-70 model, with custom modifications...' oh! Ooooh! Just my luck, I get somethin' I was looking for on eBay for months~!"

Popping it open with a press of the switch, she turned it on herself momentarily before giving a giggle and grin. "Naaaaah, not yet! Let's get a gallery going of all of my merch first..."

Opening up her closet, Mor began to take pictures of her setup, a collection of various things all expansion-related that she kept hidden away. She wanted to keep everything cataloged for posterity, and if they ever moved from their sleepy house in Scotland, as a record book of how she had everything placed. There was a specific method to her madness as the flash and motors whirred inside of the camera, spitting out photo after photo as she adjusted the light and shutter each time for the best photo of every item she could manage. Even with an amateur's hand, the camera itself worked wonders, and she found herself in an utter giggle fit as she finished.

"Oh it's perfect! Works just as well as I thought it would~ Mmm...now a portrait of the curator to commemorate the occasion!"

Taking out a tripod from her closet, the diminutive Scot set the Polaroid up in front of her collection, aimed towards her bed. Marking the timer for 30 seconds, Mor stood in front of it with a mischievous smile gracing her lips before she was greeted with a blinding flash, and the sound of the camera developing the photo. "Let's see what we got~"

Mor plucked the photo from its resting place at the edge of the camera's developer, fanning it a little as was tradition to help the developing agent dry just a bit faster. Holding it up, she blinked a little in surprise and gave an uneasy chuckle, before it turned into genuine laughter. "Seems the camera likes jokes and knows me a bit too well from its little samplin'! They say the camera adds ten pounds, but I'd say it added over a hundred! Still, it's a keeper and came out good!"

Opting to frame the strange outcome and put it on her bedside table next to the camera as she put it away, Mor yawned a little, scratching the back of her head. "Mmmmhm...that train ride took a bit out of me...gotta get up early 'morrow and work on my homework for class... pfft. I'm good at math, but that doesn't mean I like doing it...stupid calculus."

The shower called, and so did her early night as Mor wandered off to complete her daily before-bed rituals.

If she recalled the story at all, perhaps Mor would've been a bit more cautious in blowing the camera off. After all, the effects of the camera in the story were delayed; the changes occurred the next day. In the light of her bedside lamp, as the shower began to run, what Mor would look like the next morning is clear as day on the photograph...
143333222222222211321.title: Say Cheese-and Blow Up!

143333222222222213.content:
Mor's always wanted to explore everything she could about getting bigger. Fat or height, it didn't really matter, so long as she could live up to her name.

So what kind of fun stuff could she get into? Magic, science gone wrong, a little bit of alchemy, other staples...

Props that turn out to be more than harmless replicas?

I mean, there's no telling what a girl who so badly wants to grow would do in order to make her fantasy come to life...
143333222222222213.title: Mor becomes the biggest thing EVER! [WG/GTS]

choices: A can of Monster Blood, from Goosebumps?
A box of 'eat me' cookies, from Alice in Wonderland?
1433332222222222133.content:
Mor's friends are rarely exposed to this, but within her room is a closet that is essentially a museum to all things embiggening throughout media history. Opening up the door exposes a cabinet absolutely loaded with interesting pieces and replicas from movies, TV shows, video games, books, comics, anything she could get her hands on, even handmade versions crafted by dedicated fans, and all of them are dedicated to making the victim or user bigger.

Whenever she manages to find something she likes, either through eBay or an online seller, Mor is the first to pounce, paying for it with her hard-earned part-time job money in order to fund her collection. After receiving the item, she makes a little bit more space among her collection, giving it a placard she made with detailed, researched information that would make most museum curators green with envy.

It's large enough for dozens of other objects, and she rarely decides to jump on the big pieces, preferring to keep her collection private and contained, if just to have a little bit of history for herself and some more fantasy fuel.

Today, she's adding something special to her collection, something that might give her a bit more hope than just wishing she could grow.

What is it?
1433332222222222133.title: Mor's Curios of an Expansive Nature

choices: ...That her hands were slowly lifting the can up to her lips...
...the Monster Blood boiling up before splashing all over her!
14333322222222221331.content:
A knock came at the door of a house in a Scottish hamlet, the intricately carved iron knocker echoing throughout the two-story abode. A small brunette teen reading an old Goosebumps favorite of hers perked up at the sound, rising up from her queen-sized bed with a start. Straining her ears, she heard the sound of a mail truck scurrying off, her pale, freckled face breaking out into a devilish grin as she swung her small legs off the side of the bed. "It's here, it's here~! I can't believe it's here already!"

Dressed in a violet blouse with detached sleeves, a plaid skirt underneath, lacy faux-wrap knee-high socks and a pair of slightly oversized boots, no one could mistake her for anything else but a punk, though some of her schoolmates jokingly assumed she dressed this way due to the trash known as Twilight. She had purchased a copy once, if just to make a model building out of its pages and then grind it into her carpet! Making sure the ribbons were tied tightly in her big, broomlike, bushy pigtails, Mor hurried downstairs to the front door, thankful that her parents were off on a trip and couldn't make a fuss about the clatter her boots made.

At 4'8", she was so short that she had to use a small stepping stool to use the peephole in the door. Pulling it up so she could take a look, she saw the package through the fisheye lens, giggling happily before shoving the stool aside and opening the door.

"There you are! I've been waiting for you for a good week, I have. I can't believe that seller had a genuine prop can of Monster Blood..." Mor breathed, bringing the small package inside and closing the door.

The short girl took her prize to the kitchen table, where she took a letter opener and gingerly opened it up, careful not to spoil the packaging. Inside, nested in well-dressed bubble wrap was the can of Monster Blood. It was a silly, Halloween-themed can, a bit cloudy on the outside but that obvious green on the inside, with a jack o'lantern's face printed on the side and Monster Blood stamped in red letters on a yellow stripe around the lid. Her eyes shimmered with happiness as she picked up it and examined it, holding it up to the light.

"Hee, even the markings are official~ These were sold so long ago I thought they disappeared! I'm happy to have a can of my own. Hm?" Mor's eyes caught something that was hidden underneath the container: besides the purchase notice, there was a note. "Huh...maybe the seller's just tryin' to push his stuff on me..."

Picking up the note and unfolding it, Mor was mildly surprised at the message. It read:

Dear purchaser,

Thank you kindly for your patronage. This is the last real can of Monster Blood to exist, and it was a difficult find. However, not many have a use for a magical artifact capable of bodily transfiguration. For whatever you wish to do with it, enjoy your can of Monster Blood.

Signed,
The Great and Powerful Ashley

PS: If you wish to witness its power, pop the top.

"The Great and Powerful Ashley?" Mor asked quizzically, the seller definitely not being listed as such on the web page she ordered it from. Her skeptical side was more than willing to dismiss this as cute flavor for the item, but the hopeful side of her was hooked. Pop its top to see its power? She knew what Monster Blood did, and there's no way it could be real. Could it? "Well, nothing ventured, nothing gained! Besides, it's not like I keep'em totally pristine~ I like playing with the stuff I get!"

Deciding to act on the mysterious note, the freckled Scot unwrapped the lid and popped it off, holding it out like a shaken can of soda just in case it went off. When nothing happened, Mor glanced into the can, her eyes growing wide. The inside was bubbling, and smelled sweeter, more like a pudding or dessert than what she had imagined. Her stomach rumbled. Perhaps she should've eaten lunch before looking at this eerily tasty-seeming goo.

Entranced by the display, she didn't notice...
14333322222222221331.title: Monster Blood V

choices: Try to vomit the Monster Blood out
143333222222222213311.content:
Entranced by the display, she didn’t notice That her hands were slowly lifting the can up to her lips.
The Can was soon full.
She soon realized how close the Can was to her face.
She considered stopping but the allure, the smell and the thought of what Monster Blood might do for her were too great.
She brought the Can the rest of the way to her mouth.



Slowly Mor brought the can all the way to her mouth and began to eat the contents.
It was surprisingly easy and surprisingly delicious.
She at 3/4 then waited for the can to refill.
Once it did she ate every last bit this time.



Mor finally snaps out of it and realized what she’d done.
Next...
143333222222222213311.title: ...That her hands were slowly lifting the can u...

choices: Mor's growing a bite at a time, and she doesn't notice...
Nothing happens yet, but she's still hungry after the whole pie!
143333222222222213312.content:
Her mesmerized mind failed to catch the rising violence of the Monster Blood as it seemed to boil in its container, the goo making thick, slopping noises as it splashed against the sides and the bubbles popped. It was roiling so hard that it was shaking her hands, but it was only when a bubble popped so forcefully that a bit of it splattered on her face that Mor realized what was going on. "Eh? What's-? Oh bollocks-"

It was too late to escape the ensuing Monster Blood fountain as the substance erupted from the can, a lot more of the goo spilling out than what should have been conceivably possible and totally covering Mor in its citrus-smelling mass. Cramming the lid back on the now-emptier tub and setting it aside, Mor stood by the table, the green ooze slathered all over her outfit. It felt so warm, and a little bit sticky; it was mind-blowing how accurate this stuff was to the real deal. Strangely though, as she tasted the smallest bits that managed to land in her mouth, it was a lot more dessert-like than what was described in the books. It wasn't cloyingly sweet; more like a lemon or lime cream, and if she wasn't careful, she might start eating whatever she could to clean herself off!

Mor giggled a little as she looked at the mess it had made, with very little of the Monster Blood getting on the floor of the kitchen. "Well that was a bit unexpected~! I didn't know they put all this effort into making it so authentic! I have to figure out how they did it, but I should clean up first. All over my good set too!"

Starting up the stairs, she had to admit, it felt a little weird. At first, the ooze had felt wet and heavy, like it should've. Her clothes were matted slightly against her skin with the weight of the substance. By the time she reached the bathroom, the feeling had almost completely disappeared, and Mor briefly wondered if it dried that quickly outside of the can since it wasn't actual Monster Blood. Heading into the bathroom and turning on the lights however, it quickly became apparent that it hadn't just dried up. Her hazel eyes roamed up and down her figure, finding it almost...pristine, with barely a trace of the stuff on her dress or even in her big, bushy pigtails. "Wot?! What's this? Did it..."

She peeked into the hall. No trail of flakes. "It didn't dry up and flake off..."

Maybe it evaporated. Or I got less on me than I thought, Mor thought as she straightened out her pigtails again, fluffing them up and making sure there was nothing left of the Monster Blood lookalike on her person. The only trace that she had the novelty fountain all over her was this warm tingling in her skin, and it didn't particularly bother her. In fact, it tickled, and simply made her mood all the more giddy.

As she made her way back down to the kitchen, Mor was struck once more by her belly rumbling, this time a bit stronger than before. "I almost forgot, it's time for lunch! Can't have meself starving, I'm still a growing girl after all."

Opening up the fridge, she pulled out a large shepherd's pie that she had made the day before, still fresh with the barest hints of grease sitting on top of the meat, gravy and veggies. She had only managed a small part of it before, so there was still quite a good chunk left she could have. But instead of taking out a small serving for herself, Mor decided to unwrap the cellophane and stick the whole dish in the microwave. " 'm feeling a bit peckish today~ maybe I can finish this off!"

After waiting out the timer and letting her reheated pie warm up, the freckled Scot took a seat at the table with her package on it and set on her meal. Great heaping spoonfuls of the delicious dish disappeared behind her lips, something quite unlike Mor who normally took it slow. She hummed contently as she tore through the dish, the large-sized pie vanishing underneath her unusually heavy pace.

"I don't know what it is, but this hits the spot today! I'm a better cook than I thought~"
143333222222222213312.title: It Lives!

choices: Mess around with the Monster Blood some more. Maybe it was a fluke?
Go back to reading. She's got to finish the story!
Work on her model sets for stomp and crush fun?
1433332222222222133121.content:
The shepherd's pie was devoured greedily by the Scot, bite by bite vanishing into her belly as the minutes ticked pie. She was so single-mindedly focused on her meal that something very important went completely unnoticed.

Mor was growing.

Now she wasn't growing very quickly; indeed, even with a bit here and there a bite at a time, it wasn't like she was blowing up like a balloon. Still, she was adding a few centimeters to her diminutive height, slowly stretching taller and taller, but the Monster Blood seemed to carry a secondary effect. Her stomach rumbled, and as she shoveled more shepherd's pie in it, lapping the gravy from her lips so she didn't waste it, she was growing wider. Just little trickles of weight right now, a pound or so after a few bites, then another pound. It was enough to make her belly start pooching out, the slightest development of lovehandles evident on her waist and the thickening of her thighs, plus the curve of her face softened up.

All Mor could tell was that her clothes felt a little tighter and she wiggled around on the chair a bit, cleaning the casserole dish of every little morsel she could lap up. Leaning back in satisfaction, she drummed on her full belly, letting out a belch. "Aaaah...mmph, damn. I can't believe I ate every bite of that. I meant to save some for dinner...guess I'll have to go to the corner market and get stuff to cook with later."

Washing her dish and putting it away, Mor did notice that it was a little bit easier to reach the shelf she got it from, though she chalked it up to her shoe soles being a bit thicker than her other pair. Still, as she descended the stepladder she used in the kitchen, her stomach growled at her again, causing her to scratch her head. "I just fed you, you daft thing. I ate the whole pie from last night! Mrrrm...maybe some crisps'll be good for me. Mum and dad don't let me eat'em often, but since they're not here..."

Opening up another cabinet, she grabbed a family-sized bag of potato crisps, salt and vinegar(strangely her favorite), as well as a can of cola to quench her thirst once she had enough of the salty snacks. Putting the soda can in a pocket on her large plaid skirt, she cracked open the bag and began to eat the chips, her unusual appetite slipping by once again.

It would be a few hours before she ventured to the local store for groceries, so how would she kill time(and snacks) in the meantime?
1433332222222222133121.title: Sleeper hit

choices: She stops playing and goes out for groceries
She absentmindedly eats the clay figures
14333322222222221331213.content:
As she snacked on her crisps, Mor made her way into her bedroom. As she snacked, she tried to adjust her clothes as they felt a bit tight for her than before. She would shrug it all off when she finished off her snack. She was ready to take a drink but then she thought of having a little fun first. She took the cola can out of her pocket and placed it on her nightstand, then made her way to her closet.

Within her curious collection, she had also kept a model of what looked like a simple hometown and a city, each constructed with paper mache, cardboard, tiny bits of wood, and various other crafting materials. The models were all made separately, which would later be pieced together in a large outline as every model and map were covering her bedroom floor, safe for her furniture.

All that was needed were little people to go with the models. Reaching into her closet again, she grabbed a large pack of modeling clay. Peeling away each color, she made numerous little figures that represent people. She didn't make any specific textures aside from basic human shapes and smiley faces, but she made sure they were at a proper scale with the model buildings.

After using up all of the clay and making the last figure, her scale model was complete. With a couple dozen buildings and nearly six dozen clay figures all over the map, Mor was proud of her craftwork.

But before she could do anything else, she walked carefully out of her room and into the bathroom to wash her hands of the leftover clay smeared on her hands. She washed as well as she could as the smears were coming off easily with the soap and warm water. However, she would soon be interrupted by a familiar feeling and sound.

*GURRRRUUUUMMMBLE*

Mor looked down and felt her belly grumbling again, signifying hunger again despite having the shepherd's pie and the bag of crisps. She patted it gently to try and calm it down.

"Easy now, you blighter," she coaxed gently, "Maybe some soda will calm you down."

Mor walked out of the bathroom and carefully walked around her scale model to get her can of cola. She popped the top and began to take a sip. But eventually, that sip quickly turned into a big chug-fest, as she downed the cola like it was nothing. It was almost like her body, more likely her belly was in full control.

As she drank, her body was changing once again. It began to stretch up slowly higher as she grew a few more centimeters, getting slightly higher than earlier. Her body grew wider as her legs and thighs were looking plump, her belly was pushing out more, her love handles were more noticeable. her butt grew slightly thicker, and a second chin was nearly visible.

As her growth slowed down, she could feel her clothes tightening up again, as she pulled her blouse down as best as she could, but would shrug it off once again as she looked at her model city. It was finally complete and she was eager. She looked all over the map as she imagined voices of the model people all around the map.

"What a lovely day it is..."

"Ohh I better get to the market for the freshest fish!"

"Come along children, time for our errands."

As she slowly walked closer to a small model house, she could imagine the voices in a different manner.

"What in blazes is that?"

"Oh my god... it's enormous!"

"DEAR LORD, IT'S A GIANT!"

"RUN FOR YOUR LIVES!!!"

Soon, Mor found her foot on a nearby model house and proceeded to slowly crush it with her foot. The sound of the smattering model home being destroyed by her own foot only excited her, as she proceeded to walk all over the map and crush all other buildings in her way. She even smashed a few clay figures along her route, imagining the screams of their pain and fear as she walked all over the map.

As she barrelled down a few miniature skyscrapers, she grabbed at least four clay figures with one hand. She grabbed the first one in her other hand and dropped it on the floor, then proceeded to smoosh it with her foot. She grabbed the second one and squeezed it in her grasp and slowly released it from her grasp. All that was left were two clay figures in her hands.

Before she could even decide what to do with them, her belly growled furiously. This time, it was a major hunger pang. She could feel very hungry once it happened.

"Bloody hell, you're still hungry," she asked herself as her belly growled again.

She had to make a decision and fast. Who knows what she was liable to do?
14333322222222221331213.title: Roleplay or Eventual Reality?

choices: "Sweet Chestnuts" Lost Technology from Galaxy Angel
14333322222222221333.content:
A well-known choice and a not-so-well-known piece.

Or do you want more?
14333322222222221333.title: Something familiar

choices: Her parents come home and she begins to take over
She goes out to show off her new figure to her "friends"...
She takes more of the Jumbo-Gro
143333222222222213331.content:
Today had been an interesting day for Mor. While walking home one day, she came across a large bottle that looked like it came from a cartoon, as it looked like an illustrated 3D item. But it was an actual glass bottle filled with green liquid, as she shook it and saw the liquid shake and slosh around from inside. And on the cover was the name of the item; Jumbo-Gro. Also featured was an illustration of a frail sunflower and an enormous tree-sized flower. She was deep in thought for a moment until she looked at the bottle again. She saw herself as the frail little sunflower then saw herself as an immense figure of gigantic and obesity like none had ever seen.

(For an example: https://tb-arts.deviantart.com/art/CMSN-...)

After a short run home, Mor found herself alone in the kitchen with the bottle still in her hands. She popped the top and took a couple of sips. The taste was a little strange but somehow she knew it would be worth it in the end. Soon a couple seconds pass by... Then another couple of seconds... Then a minute passes... Nothing.

Angered by a dream that never came true, Mor slammed the bottle on the table with fury. She grumbled and cursed under her breath after what could've been something special turned out to be a total dud. It didn't help that it gave her a bit of a bellyache. But soon that bellyache began to fade and a shudder began to creep up all around her.

Suddenly, Mor found herself growing in a quick and instant spurt. Her body grew thicker as her belly bloated in a flash, while her height had increased by a few inches. Soon another spurt occurred and her body shifted in size again. Her belly was exposed as she expanded in width. Her hips and butt were almost as wide. Her arms and legs were thicker to match her newly enlarged figure. Her clothes were adjusting severely to her newfound fat and newly-added inches. From an estimated guess, she had to be about 198 lbs. and 5 feet 8 inches.

Mor was about ready to get adjusted to her new figure, but soon things went off kilter when another shudder crept up her system again. Soon, her spurts came in in quicker interfolds. She found herself growing wider and higher, inches and pounds added to her frame as her clothes could hardly contain her growing figure. Soon her growth stopped as her perspective changed drastically, as she could nearly see the tops of the cupboards from her point of view.

Mor was practically an obese giant, as her figure was thicker and taller than way before. Her belly was nearly blocking her view of her feet, her butt, legs, thighs, and arms were much thicker than before. Her face filled out slightly with a double chin forming. After all of her growth, she had to be 245 lbs. if she was her original height, which was now an altered perspective of 6 feet 5 inches.

Mor looked herself over and felt like a new person. Her enlarged figure and thicker waistline made her feel ecstatic. She picked up her belly and dropped it, watching it shake around like gelatin. She shook her butt and knocked a chair over on the floor, giggling over her new thick posterior. She then reached up to the cabinets and pulled out a couple candy bars and snacks to munch on. Her parents would hide her favorite treats from her in a spot that would be impossible for her to reach. But now that she was much bigger than before, she was able to do whatever she wanted. And after realizing that aspect while still munching on her snacks, a dark idea grew in her mind...
143333222222222213331.title: Mor Grant: King-Sized Queen

choices: Growth Formula in a Strange Container (Men In Black TV Series)
Perfume Bottle that says "Essence of the Envious Frog" (Frog and Ox growth)
143333222222222213333.content: What else could she have within her collection?
143333222222222213333.title: More?

choices: She shows this off to friends and family
She's eager to grow more and breathes deeply again
1433332222222222133332.content:
One of the most intriguing items Mor had in her collection was a small perfume bottle. The color of the liquid was a bluish-green color, almost transparent. The bottle's label was just a figure of a frog, only looking large and spherical with a big grin on its face.

Mor took the bottle and looked at it carefully. She squeezed the pouch gently, but a large puff of mist came out and got in her face. Mor coughed slightly as it sprayed her face. The odor was faint but somewhat strange. There was a scent of saltwater but a mixture of milk and honey. It was almost intoxicating if she wasn't coughing like crazy.

Soon the coughing fit ended and Mor found herself feeling pretty normal. She was ready to sigh in disappointment but something strange would occur. She breathed in and felt air filling her body up. She looked down to see her belly swelled up, her navel peeking out slightly from under her shirt. She placed her hands on it and squeezed it gently. Even though it was air that filled her, her belly felt jiggly and firm like natural fat. A smile grew from under her lips.

Without hesitation, Mor began to breathe in deeply, swallowing a large amount of air in her mouth. This caused her body to swell up again. Her belly grew first, creaking like a balloon as it expanded further. Her arms and legs began to puff up slightly to catch up. Her butt and hips were widening as well. Her face began to puff up as well, as a mixed result of her breathing in heavily and her significant transformation.

But almost as drastic as her belly was, her figure was growing taller as well. Her feet were sliding on the floor as she expanded. She could see her own body rising higher as she continued to breathe in more air. Taller and wider, bigger and bigger, she was becoming a rotund giant. Her body got so wide that she bumped into her computer desk on one side and her chifferobe on the other. Her head was looming towards the ceiling as she grew.

Soon enough, she stopped breathing in heavily and gasped slightly. The growth process stopped immediately when her breath gave way. Then another change occurred. Her spherical body began to change. Her tight belly was soon becoming thicker, looking like pure fat on her body. Her arms and legs began to look chunky and less round. Her butt and hips were still wide but were hardly keeping the spherical look as it changed into a form of pudge on her body. Her round face would slowly form a thick double chin and chubby cheeks. What was once a spherical kid was now as obese as any other individual.

But even with her new fat, her height never changed since the process occurred. Her height changed from 4'8" to a drastic change of 6'8". Her head was just a few inches away from the ceiling. She reached up high with the greatest of ease. Once she saw her fattened arm, she then proceeded to look over the rest of her figure. She even hoisted her belly up and let it drop to jiggle and bounce like crazy. It was remarkably amusing to her.

There was no denying it; whatever was in that perfume changed Mor into an obese giant and she was proud of every new inch on her body.
1433332222222222133332.title: Can You Believe It Mor?

choices: Mor decides to enforce her parents more
Mor goes out to see her "friends"
Mor decides to use more of the perfume bottle to grow again
14333322222222221333321.content:
Mor was feeling extravagant and exuberant with her new body, between the new fat body and the outstanding height that dwarfed everyone else that would be around her. The idea of overshadowing anyone with her size excited her. She couldn't wait and decided to flaunt her figure in front of her family.

Bending down slightly, she walked through her bedroom door but was nearly stuck within the frame, thanks to her wider figure. With a quick heave, she was able to escape from the tight space but not before leaving a new wider indent on the frame itself. Shrugging off the damage, Mor wasted no time and waddled down the stairs. The pictures on the side were instantly knocked off from the walls and she moved downward. Once a frame crashed on the floor, a voice from the living room spoke up.

"Mor, how many times have we told you not to-- OH MY CHRIST!"

Mor's father was a heavy-set, middle-aged person with a no-nonsense attitude. But what was right in front of him was certainly inexplicably insane to witness; his only daughter was undeniably huge!

"What the bloody hell happened to you," asked Mor's father as his face was as white as a ghost.

"Simple," she replied as she adjusted her waistline, "I grew!"

"Da, what's all the-- OH SWEET MOTHER OF GOD!"

Another voice came from the kitchen, as Mor's mother entered the family room and saw the same sight that scared her husband. The two grabbed each other with fear as their own daughter was looking down at them with a wicked grin forming from her chubby cheeks and her hands on her wider hips and belly.

"Like what you see, mum," asked Mor as she patted her big jelly belly, as it shook softly.

"Young lady, what's wrong with you," asked her mother, her voice choked up from fear.

"Nothing's wrong with me," she replied as she knocked over a small end table with her belly, "I'm just a wee bit bigger!"

"Wee bit is not even close," exclaimed her father, "You're feckin' HUGE!"

"Maybe, but I like it just the same!"

Mor's parents looked at each other in shock as they were surprised to hear her say that out loud. Their daughter was absolutely mad, saying she liked her huge figure. They couldn't believe it!

"Mor, you can't be serious," shouted her mother, "You're practically an obese giant! You're like an ogre!"

Mor's smile vanished when her mother called her that. Her own mother practically insulted her and she wasn't going to let it down.

"An ogre am I," Mor asked as she slowly approached her parents.

"N-now Mor, sweetie, calm down," said her father who was getting more nervous as their daughter approached them.

"How can I be calm when I'm an ogre, dad," yelled Mor as she knocked over another end table and pushed a frame off the wall as it shattered on the floor.

"Mor, I wasn't trying to be--"

Before her mother could continue, Mor pushed her parents onto the floor with a big thrust of her big belly. Both landed on their backs as they saw their daughter walk up and stand right above them, looking absolutely terrified by their daughter's imposing frame and facial expression.

"I'm no ogre, mother," yelled Mor, looking completely angry at her own parents, "I'm a giant, yes, but not an ogre! I'm the giant of this family, which means I get to do whatever I want and you do whatever I say! Any issues and I'll squash you like bugs, you got that?!"

The two were frightened to see their own child with such malicious intent that they hardly spoke. All they could do was nod their heads slowly. Mor backed away and allowed them to stand up.

"Glad to see you understand your new roles now," she said as she gently scratched her belly, "Now we play by my rules..."
14333322222222221333321.title: Showing Off To The Family

Symptoms may start off relatively normal, but as the illness take hold, any infected under the age of fourteen become much hungrier than normal, and more aggressive in keeping their appetites at bay. Their metabolisms are also altered, not only making them gain weight at a severely increased rate, but also double up on calcium absorption so the affected can grow as well.

Adults who are infected remain physically unchanged (save for a select few who actually shrink due to the virus), but are mentally altered to go to any length to keep the younger fed, no matter what abuse they may deal on them in return.

1433332222222222232111.content:
Michelle was being taken out to a small spot out in Arizona by her father. She was being taken to see her grandmother for a few weeks during spring break. She never had a chance to see her grandmother. In fact, she never met her before in her life. No family meetings or holiday get-togethers, nothing. So this would be a surprise for her.

"Excited, my little cherub," asked Michelle's father as he drove.

"I suppose," she replied feeling a bit nervous, "I'm not exactly sure what to expect with visiting Grandma..."

"Oh don't worry honey, you're grandma is excited to see you. The only other time she met you was on the day you were born. She was so excited she was crying more than we were."

Michelle thought about how her grandmother would be. She didn't know if she was going to be welcoming or strict.

"Umm Dad? Could you tell me more about her?"

"Well you could ask her yourself," he replied as he put on the brakes, "Because we're here!"

Indeed, there stood in front was a large house that was bigger than their own home. In fact, it nearly resembled a hacienda. The two exited the car and made their way to the front door. Michelle was nervous the second her father rang the doorbell. After a short while, a figure finally opened the door.

"Reginald! Bienvenido a casa, hijo!"

"Ha ha! Hello mother!"

A woman with dark hair, a slight hourglass figure, and minor wrinkles had pulled Michelle's father as they shared a great big hug and laughed as they spoke. The two stopped laughing when the woman looked down at Michelle, who was a little shy to see her.

"Aww, qué pequeño ángel encantador," said the woman as she leaned down to see Michelle.

"Oh right, Michelle, this is your grandmother," said her father who held her shoulder gently.

Michelle weakly waved at her grandmother, as she reached out and gently pinched her cheek.

"Ohh you are such a lovely young girl," she said as she practically gushed at her own granddaughter, "I remember when you were so small I could lift you up and hold you high in my arms!"

"Uhh thanks... grandma..."

"Ohh, por qué estás actuando tan tímido a mi alrededor," asked her grandmother, "You don't have to be so shy. Come in, come in!"

Her grandmother ushered her into the house, as she saw how large and elegant it looked from the inside. The home looked like it was from another country with an elegant and rich culture. Nice furniture and well-kept rooms. It was a big step for Michelle.

"I know, my home is so large I could hardly know what to do around here," said her grandmother ecstatically, "Let me introduce you to my maid and your nanny during your trip. She's a very good friend too. Gertrude! Come and meet our guests!"

Soon a young woman in an old-fashioned maid outfit appeared holding a duster and a wipe cloth. She was a young beautiful woman with blonde hair and a larger, shapelier figure than Michelle's grandmother. She looked obese, but still had a sexy figure that could turn heads even at her size.

"Oh, guten Tag an euch alle," she greeted as she curtsied, "I am Gertrude. I help keep Mrs. Agrandar's home in tip-top shape. It's wunderbar to see young Agrandar come to visit her own grandmother. I will be sure to keep you company and get you anything you need!"

Michelle slowly began to smile as she was welcomed in open arms by her grandmother and her very friendly maid, both eager to make her feel at home.

"Well I better be off then," said Michelle's father as he walked over to his mother, "Take good care of her. If you have any problems, give me a call."

"Oh mi hijo, we'll treat her like the little princesa that she is," replied Michelle's grandmother as she hugged him tight.

"Now Michelle, be good for your grandmother and Ms. Gertrude while you're here, understand?"

"Yes Daddy," replied Michelle as she hugged him before he left.

As he left out the front door, Michelle turned around to see her grandmother lean down and pulled her into a big hug, followed by big kisses on her cheeks. Gertrude took her luggage and took them away.

"Oooh Michelle, my little pastel de ángel, we're gonna have so much fun together," exclaimed her grandmother as she took her by the hand.

"That's great," replied Michelle, "So what are we gonna do?"

"Well, we're going to..."
1433332222222222232111.title: To Grandmother's House We Go

choices: Michelle is then pampered by Gertrude
Michelle is then given a big dessert
14333322222222222321112.content:
"Well, we're going to have a nice big meal at home," replied Michelle's grandmother, "Gertrude, let's give our little princesa flaca a meal fit for a reina abundante!"

Gertrude nodded as the two went into the kitchen. Michelle was surprised at her grandmother's excitement and speed. She was about to object, but they were already busy gathering ingredients and putting the stovetops on to begin cooking. Michelle would have objected the idea considering that she didn't feel hungry at all, but her stomach growled to disagree. She was surprised to hear it and feel it growl with hunger as she heard them cooking. Before long, she could even smell the food being cooked and it only caused her stomach to growl louder. She felt like it had a mind of its own, but she couldn't deny how hungry she felt.

After a while, her grandmother came back out to bring her into the dining room. She gently grabbed her by the hand and led her into a large room with a long table, half-filled with an array of tacos, burritos, empanadas, quesadillas, fajitas, and more. Michelle could smell the mixture of cooked beef, chicken, rice, and cheeses that filled the dining room.

Michelle was completely speechless looking at the large quantity of food in the room. She didn't think she could even handle eating so much, but soon her stomach growled with anticipation and extreme hunger. There's no denying it; her stomach was willing and able to take in the food before her.

"Ohh come now, Michelle," said her grandmother as she gently held her shoulders, "You're on vacation! You're here to have fun and relax! Endulge, sweetie!"

Michelle looked at her grandmother, then the food, then Gertrude who smiled at her, then back at the food. She smiled weakly before grabbing a taco filled with beef, lettuce, and a big amount of melted cheese. She took a bite and her taste buds were in a thrill ride of exciting flavors. She then proceeded to munch down the rest of the taco. She then grabbed another and munched it down. Then another. And then another. And soon the tacos were all gone.

She then grabbed a burrito and began to taste a new sensation. The burritos were mixed between beef and chicken, all cooked with rice and a mixture of cheeses. Each one was gulped down by this little girl, who was once a shy and timid thing, now dead set on eating what's in front of her.

"Oooooh that's a girl with a good appetite," exclaimed her grandmother, who was estatic to see her granddaughter eat like crazy.

Michelle couldn't control anything at this point. Her appetite seemed to have increased and her stomach was beginning to take control. In fact, it was starting to expand from under her clothes. Her stomach was now starting to look bigger than earlier, looking more like a belly. But it hardly felt full.

As soon as the burritos were gone, she soon moved onto the empanadas. Then as soon as they were gone, the quesadillas were next. Then came the fajitas. Everything served on the table began to disappear from the now gluttonous appetite of this little girl. And all that did was make her grandmother and Gertrude smile from ear to ear.

After what seemed like over an hour, Michelle munched on the last cheesy nacho. After the last bite, it was then reality hit her like a ton of bricks; she was dangerously full and completely stuffed. She leaned back in her chair, in a near food coma, but woke up to see her stomach turned into a large belly. She gently felt it and poked at it, feeling how tight and full it was. Her belly then growled in a small amount of pain.

"Oooohhhhhh," she moaned, "Why did I eat so much food?"

Her grandmother approached her and gently massaged her belly. She then slowly moved her chair backwards and helped her out of her seat.

"No te preocupes, mi querubín gordito," replied her grandmother as she gently calmed her belly, "You'll get used to how our family eats and how you'll be treated around here. You're my little princess, but you'll soon be treated like a queen!"

Michelle was slightly dozing in and out from her food coma while struggling with her bellyache to even hear what her grandmother was saying. But she'll soon realize what sort of fate was in store for her...
14333322222222222321112.title: Family-Sized Meal for Michelle

1433332222222222232121.content:
Michelle found herself in what looked like a basement, with only the ceiling light providing a form of light as it shined upon her area. She was strapped to a chair with a helmet device placed on top of her head. She could hardly budge out of her seat.

"It's no use to escape, Michelle," said a voice, "You're strapped in tight."

"Who said that," said Michelle as she trembled with fear.

A figure with an old-fashioned lab coat crept out of the shadows, a man who looked to be in his mid-40s with a bald spot and a goatee. His smile looked a bit unwelcoming, given Michelle's current predicament.

"M-M-Mr. Lavowski? What's going on? Why am I tied up?"

"Well it's simple, Michelle" he replied casually, "I'm going to use my latest experiment on you!"

"W-w-w-what?! Why me?!"

"Simple," he replied as he walked back and forth, "I've been studying a substance that can not only alter one's personality but also their physique as well. You see, everyone has always a dark side to them. Sometimes it can fester deep inside their subconscious and just cause them to be negative, mean-spirited, or just completely evil."

Mr. Lavowski walks over to a machine with a large tube filled with a foreign substance that looks like oil but could move around erratically like a jellyfish. He taps on the glass, which disrupts and disturbs the substance greatly as it fidgets inside.

"See? This stuff is very temperamental and easily agitated. Now imagine just some of that, if not all of it, inserted into someone's subconscious. There's no telling what kind of problems it can make. In fact, you should see some of my earliest experiments!"

He then walked over to a curtain, as he pulled it back to reveal a black cat in a room by itself, except it was larger than most cats. In fact, it was about the size of a golden retriever. He pulls out a hairdryer and knocks on the glass. The cat looks to see the hairdryer and hisses so loud, it was almost like a soccer horn. It then bats at the glass several times to the point where it cracked slightly. Mr. Lavowski just laughed as he put the hairdryer away.

"Just like that, irritation is increased. Successful for animals, but what about... humans?"

Michelle was feeling more and more concerned and fearful about what could happen as Mr. Lavowski made his way back to the machine.

"But why me," she asked as she worked up the nerve to speak, "Why choose me as your guinea pig?"

Mr. Lavowski turned the machine on as the lights lit up and the substance floated around irritably. He then chuckled as he turned back to Michelle.

"You're a straight-A student," he said as he began to list off, "You're on time, you're conscientious, you're always friendly towards others even to those who make fun of you or bully you, you hardly have a problem in school or with other people, you're practically an angel! So I think you're the perfect test subject for my experiment."

Mr. Lavowski flipped a few small switches and pressed several buttons as the machine whirred and lit up brighter than before. The substance was now swirling in its tube frantically with ferocity. Michelle could only watch as her heart was sinking into her stomach, while her teacher-turned-evil scientist was about to experiment on her against her will. Tears welled up in her eyes and sweat began to fall down her forehead.

With one last glare and a wicked grin, Mr. Lavowski grabbed a large switch and pulled it down, which would take some of the substance into the machine. The substance shrank as part of it was flooding into a tiny hose that led into Michelle's helmet device. After a few seconds, the substance made it inside her body. She could feel it flood inside her body, shuddering from the cold and uncomfortable feeling it gave her.

As it continued to slowly flood into her system, Michelle could feel herself shifting slightly. Then all of a sudden, her body shifted up by a few inches. She was growing right before Mr. Lavowski's eyes, who was smiling from ear to ear as she grew. The growth came in quick spurts, as she inches higher in her seat while the straps were getting tighter. She groaned in pain as she grew higher and higher.

Suddenly, the straps could hardly hold her enlarged figure, as they broke off in quick snaps one by one. She could've taken the helmet off at that point and ran off. But a feeling inside her didn't want her to leave. It was almost like she wanted to stay in the chair as the substance flooded inside her. And she didn't even say a thing. She just sat in, groaning as she grew higher and higher.

After a short while, Mr. Lavowski switched the machine off and the substance was now half the size it was before. He looked at Michelle and was amazed at how she looked. Her clothes were now ripped from the sleeves but still held on to her newly-enlarged figure. Her tears dried but still had sweat on her brow as she panted slowly and quietly. She went from a frail and shy figure of 4 feet and 2 inches to a very noticeable height of 6 feet even.

As she sat in her chair, new feelings were developing as she looked at herself. She looked at how her hands were larger than before, then looked at her body at every angle she could. Her thoughts were stirring from amazement to irritation, anger, then bliss. Bliss mixed with dark thoughts. Thoughts that would scare some but amuse her. Her eyebrows furrowed but she grew a smile and began to chuckle.

"This... is... pretty good," she said mid-chuckle, "I like this... I like it... a lot..."

The 6-foot girl was now ready to take on the world. There's no telling what she's liable to do with her new outlook and new figure.
1433332222222222232121.title: Power Corrupts The Youth

choices: Michelle lives her life as a GIANT BULLY!
Michelle works with Mr. Lavowski now
Something happens... this might not be good...
14333322222222222321213.content:
Michelle began to clench her enlarged fists and cracked her knuckles with anticipation. But then a new thought crept into her mind. Why should she be just six feet tall? Why be that tall when she can be taller? Why not become the tallest giant in her town? Why not be the biggest? Why not take more of that substance?

Her mind was wrapped around the idea to grow more that she lost her train of thought when she heard a voice enter her head. This time, it wasn't her own. It was a dark, raspy voice that was hard to hear. But there was one word that kept echoing in her mind.

More...

More...

MORE...

She placed her hand on top of her head, feeling to make sure the helmet was still on and it was. She then sat back in her seat and began to shout at Mr. Lavowski.

"Hey pinhead," she shouted, "If we're really gonna do something with this, then I need to grow more!"

Mr. Lavowski looked at her in shock, wondering why she would want more when she was already tall enough. He looked at the substance that was left in the machine. It was still half the size it was before, but it was less frantic and more subdued like it knew what was going to happen next...

"HEY!"

Mr. Lavowski turned back to see Michelle more irritated as she stomped her newly enlarged foot on the ground. She was getting more impatient and angry, a major change in attitude.

"I said I want more, you little prick," she yelled as she slammed her fist on the chair, as it cracked slightly from her force.

Mr. Lavowski wasted no time and made his way back to the machine. After fiddling with a few switches and buttons, he took one last look at the substance, as he saw it hover still in the spot. It was unnerving to see it like that, almost like it was looking at him.

"TODAY, YOU LITTLE PENCIL-NECK!!!"

After that last shout from Michelle, he hit the big switch and the machine was at work again. He saw what was left of the substance had begun to shrink away until it just disappeared, then turned back to Michelle and was less prepared and excited about what would happen next. And he would feel worse for having to be responsible for it in the end...

Suddenly, Michelle's body began to shift higher again, as her body grew in shifts again. While it hurt the first time, it felt better to her as it happened again. Her body grew higher as her chair was now too small for her, as her newly-enlarged figure broke off the arms of the chair from its side. giving her more room. But soon the chair itself was too weak to handle her growing body and collapsed shortly thereafter, as she sat on the rubble. But she was still growing without interruption.

As she inched higher towards the ceiling, her clothes were struggling to contain her new figure, as the sleeves of her pants and shirt were breaking away, while her mid-drift was exposing her torso but kept her chest contained. Soon the machine had drained all of what was left of the substance and Michelle found herself bumping into the ceiling while sitting down. At an estimation, she had to be 10 feet tall now. She was really a giant now.

"Now this is more like it," she bellowed as she slammed her newly-enlarged fist on the ceiling, as it shook from the sheer force.

143333222222222223221112.content:
Benny's eyes were as wide as dinner plates as he saw who his new adoptive parents were. They were practically colossal obese figures bearing friendly smiles on their faces. And he was completely stunned to see them still mobile as they waddled over to him.

The man was a very large and wide individual. He was a man in his early 40s, with red hair and a large beard that covered his thick chins and cheeks. His belly was the largest feature from the front, as it was exposing how fat and hairy it was from under his now too small t-shirt. But his butt was the widest feature from behind, as it jiggled and shook around as he walked, bouncing between the side wall and the side of his wife's own fat sides.

The woman was a little younger than him, about mid-30s, but was no less fatter than her husband. Her blonde hairstyle was mid-sized but was overshadowed by her fat face, with fat dimples to match her thick cheeks and double chin. While her belly was noticeable, as the mound was fully exposed from the half t-shirt she wore, her breasts and butt were larger by far. Her cleavage had managed to stay inside her tight shirt, but could still jiggle like crazy. Her butt was wider than her husband's, as it shook harder and practically took up more space.

Despite looking completely enormous compared to Benny, they looked down at the young boy with smiles and glee. The husband was the first to speak as they were getting close to him.

"Well howdy there sport," he said with a big southern accent, "It's nice to finally meet you!"

"Ohh you look like such a sweetheart," said the obese woman in a normal voice but with high-pitched glee.

Benny's eyes shrunk back down as he finally snapped out of his shock and looked on them as normally as possible. He knew it was a huge surprise (literally), but he knew that he would have to get used to having obese parents. Better to have fat parents than no parents.

"Uh hi," he replied meekly, "It's certainly... surprising to see you."

"Oh don't be so bashful, Benny," said the woman, "We don't bite!"

"Oh but we should introduce ourselves first," said the man, "I'm Henry and this is my wife Gloria. We're the Weismans!"

"And we're gonna give you the best home for the rest of your life!"

"Ohh that's great," replied Benny as he began to open up to them, "I'd be really grateful--"

"Ohh you are such a little sweetie pie," Gloria interrupted as she grabbed him and gave him a big hug.

Benny found himself in a slightly tight hug but was tighter for him as he found his face headfirst into Gloria's cleavage, nearly suffocating from her thick rack.

"Ohh you're so cute I could eat you up!"

Benny couldn't speak up loud enough given his current position, but a voice spoke out on his behalf.

"Umm, excuse me?"

The voice was the head of the orphanage, who had just entered the room and saw Benny's current predicament unfold.

"I don't mean to interrupt, but I don't think he can breathe at the moment..."

Gloria looked past her cleavage and realized she was suffocating him and gently let him go. Benny was finally able to breathe but was gently comforted by Hank and Gloria.

"Sorry about your new mother," apologized Hank as he patted Benny's shoulder, "she tends to act out a bit whenever she gets attached to something precious."

"It's okay," Benny replied, "It was just a minor incident, no biggie."

The couple smiled as they each held Benny's hands and began to walk out the door. Despite having to be in between to of the fattest people he's ever seen, Benny began to feel elated, contempt, and most of all happy. His new parents made sure to leave enough space for their new son to walk, even though the orphanage would suffer great damage from their large assets hitting their walls.

As they walked out of the building, Benny saw a large limo that was about the size of a humvee but was the same standard length of a limo. Benny's new parents waddled over and managed to climb inside easily, considering their obese forms. Benny, on the other hand, had to climb into it as best as he could, considering how large the vehicle was and how small he was.

Benny managed to climb in and was in greater shock to see how big and expensive the limo inside was. The limo's interior was furnished with expensive fabric but had various mini snack machines inside. The snack machines looked almost like half-sized vending machines but they held more snacks and drinks than standard vending machines. He looked down the far end and saw his new parents snacking on chips, cheese balls, and soda.

"Oh I'm sure it's quite a shock to see us looking so fat and still eat out lives away," said Gloria as she swallowed her fistful of cheese balls.

"Well, yes," replied Benny as he tried not to offend them, "But I don't mean it in a bad way!"

Hank and Gloria laughed as their new son tried to act respectable, but they knew about their lifestyle and they just didn't care.

"Oh don't worry about it, son," replied Hank as he proceeded to chug down a can of cola.

"We already know how fat we are, but we're going to get used to it as we grow. And you'll see how far you'll grow soon enough!"

Benny felt a little strange hearing his new mother tell him about what he will expect. He was basically told that he was going to be just as fat as they get, but he had a deep feeling he would end up fatter than them someday. It was somewhat uneasy, but then he realized that they were his new parents and were only looking out for him.

While being fat was the last thing he ever wanted, he still appreciated being with his new family and hoped things would get better for him. Even if he gained a few pounds, as long as he could be happy, that's all that mattered to him.

1433332222222222232211122.title: Welcome Home Benny

14333322222222222322111221.content:
Benny grabbed his luggage and went up to his room. Upon reaching the second floor, he is stopped by a slim figure had awaited him in front of the stairway. It turned out to be a woman with long, raven black hair with a shapely hourglass figure that could turn heads. She opened her eyes revealing emerald green eyes that shone like actual emeralds. She looked down at him, as he was a little concerned about who this woman was.

"You must be Benny," she asked as she leaned down to greet him.

"Y-y-yes," replied Benny shyly.

"The Weismans have spoken about your presence," she replied as she straightened her figure, "I am Clarice, the head butler of the Weisman household. I will be sure to fulfill whatever you or your parents ask for, no matter how menial the task is."

Benny was silent for a moment, getting used to so many things about his new life in this home, but not before he began to muster a sentence.

"W-well... I was kinda looking for my room," he said shyly.

"Not a problem," she said as she took his luggage, "Follow me, young master Weisman."

Benny felt a bit awkward leaving his own belongings to the butler, but before he could say anything, she was already making her way down the hall. He wasted no time and followed close. The walk down the hall was silent between the two, but Clarice looked down at Benny with concern. She stopped as she placed the luggage down midway down the hall.

"I'm sorry, young master Weisman," she said as she leaned down to speak to him, "You seem to be troubled about something. Would you like to discuss what is on your mind?"

Benny shuffled a bit slightly but then began to speak.

"Well, I just got here and I already feel awkward between my new parents, my new home, and even you," he said as he let out his shyness, "But I don't mean I have an issue with you or anyone, it just feels like it's all so sudden and too good to be true."

Clarice placed her hand on his shoulder and gave him a gentle smile.

"Benny, you don't have to worry about a thing around here," she said as she spoke to him in a genial tone, "You are most definitely part of this family now. This will be your home forever and you will be treated like you belong here. And don't worry about a thing. Your parents and I will be here to give you anything you need to make you happy."

Benny's shy and concerned frown slowly shaped into a smile, feeling a small weight lifted off of his shoulders. Clarice picked up his luggage and made her way down the hall again. Benny followed in pursuit, feeling elated.

Their trip was put to a halt when they reached a room with double doors. Clarice opened the doors and set the luggage on the ground, allowing Benny some room to enter. As he walked in, his eyes widened and his jaw dropped.

His bedroom looked like a luxury condo, something that could beat apartment rooms or hotel rooms in a heartbeat. He had a double door patio door with a back deck to sit outside and sunbathe or enjoy the natural scenery from his backyard. Inside his room was a large bed that was way too small for him but could fit possibly one of his parents. By the patio door was a jumbo-sized HD television set with large speakers and numerous video game consoles. In front of it was a large couch that could fit five people on it, possibly for any company or for something else down the road. From the far end of the room was a large walk-in closet that was large enough to fit four pianos, with a large full-sized mirror. On the opposite side of the room was a bathroom that was as big as the closet, but its furnishings were upscaled like crazy; full bath and shower set, full-sized mirror, personal jacuzzi that was wider than the tub itself, and a large sink set that had three sinks available. It was more than Benny could ever imagine.

"Holy crap," exclaimed Benny as he looked at everything in amazement.

Clarice smiled as he looked at everything with wonder. She pulled out a small remote and walked over to Benny with instructions.

"Now Benny, this remote is what you can use in the house," she instructed as she went over the features, "It's a combination remote and walkie-talkie, so you can communicate with either your parents or myself in case you need anything. If you have a medical emergency, press this red cross button and you will get in touch with the medical department. If it's a serious emergency, press the yellow shield and you will get in touch with a 911 representative and you'll get help from the police or fire department. Any questions?"

"Umm, no I think I'm okay," replied Benny as he held the remote.

"Very well," replied Clarice, "I will let you relax in your room. Feel free to buzz me if you ever need anything. And welcome home, young master Benny!"

Benny smiled as he looked at the remote and looked at his new surroundings. So much to do, but the question was what could he do?

14333322222222222322111221112.content:
The numbers rose higher and higher, making Benny feel anxious and uncomfortable. He grew so fat so fast and was unsure how big he certainly had grown. But then he saw the numbers slow down to three dangerous numbers... 7-5-0.

Benny grew to 750 lbs. of pure obesity. He was so startled that he felt his body jiggle slightly as he walked backward. It was a complete nightmare for him to be so fat. As he waddled out of the bathroom, he immediately found himself in a new room. Instead of his bedroom, he found himself in a dining hall large enough for a hundred people. The table was filled with a plethora of food, enough to feed a neighborhood. Benny was unsure of why it was all here, but soon he heard is belly grumble loudly like a lion. It told him it was hungry and it wanted to eat everything.

Benny tried to get away but his belly seemed to be in control, as his body waddled to a chair and sat down. He seemed to have lost control of his own hands too, as they began to grab all the food around him and his mouth eagerly ate everything in sight. His mind was racing, trying to take control of the situation, but his body was already working against him as he ate without any form of control.

Slowly but surely, everything off the table was beginning to come straight into Benny's mouth, as he ate without hesitation despite him trying to control it. Eventually, he saw the food literally slide its way towards him, almost as if his body was a black hole. The food shifted closer and closer to him, as he ate everything piece by piece.

As he tried to regain control, he felt a new feeling within his system; his body was getting fatter as he ate. His arms and legs grew thicker, plumping like the thickest sausages. His butt grew bigger and wider, but the seat was still sustaining his widening figure. His face grew thicker and plump, growing more chins and looking like his face was inflating. But his belly was growing bigger than the rest of his body, as it was sustaining all the food he was eating. It grew so large that it was pushing up against the table to a point where it was placed on top of the table.

Even as he grew fatter, the food kept coming to him. He tried to stop eating as his eyes grew faint tears, his body was eager for more food. His belly was growling in a mixture of hunger and contempt. But it soon felt like it was running short of room. But it didn't seem to stop as it continued to take in more food as time went on.

Benny found himself forcing a whole cake down his throat, as it was the very last item of food left on the table. With a heaving gulp, it went down quickly. He panted and groaned with exhaustion as he placed his fat hand on his enormous belly, which its sheer size hung over the other side of the table from how much food it took in. As gelatinous as it was, it also felt as tight as a drum from all the food he ate. It was so sore that the slightest movement would feel slightly painful to him.

Benny's eyes were slowly closing from the exhaustion but stopped when he saw something slowly crawl its way over towards him. He felt it crawl on top of his belly, as he felt a slight twitch of pain upon impact. He looked up to see it was a red velvet cupcake, with tiny feet walking towards him. He didn't bother to question the legs on the cupcake as he was too tired to do anything else.

"No please," he said as he panted, "I'm already too full... too... fat..."

As the cupcake got close to his face, he saw a pair of eyes forming from the icing of the cupcake as well as a smile that looked friendly yet unwelcoming.

"What's the matter, Benny," asked the cupcake with a high-pitched voice, "Don't you want to have one last piece of dessert?"

"N-n-no," he grunted his reply, "I'm already... too... full... If I eat... one more thing... I'll... burst..."

The cupcake chuckled, which then slowly turned into a wicked cackle. Benny was feeling uncomfortable talking to a wicked little cupcake, but soon felt even more uncomfortable when he saw this little cupcake slowly grow bigger before his very eyes. Benny's heart sunk as the cupcake grew higher and larger, as the high-pitched laughter turned into a deeper, more menacing laugh. The cupcake stopped growing as it hit the ceiling, looking down at the obese boy with anticipation.

"Time for dessert," bellowed the cupcake as it forced its way into Benny's mouth.

Benny felt the cupcake force its way into Benny's mouth, feeling and tasting the heavy cream and dough lodge itself within his belly. As it shoved itself halfway inside, Benny could feel his belly expand slightly as it was rising higher on the table. Eventually, he saw the legs of the cupcake dangle from inside his lips then with one quick push, the cupcake was fully inside him.

Benny found himself in a world of pain, as his wider figure was sustaining more food than he ever could imagine. Even though his body was wider and fatter than before, his belly looked entirely massive from the recent cupcake stuffing. It twitched in pain slightly. The pain was hard to bear for him as he placed his hands and tried to sooth it, but to no avail.

But then things got more interesting...

He heard his belly gurgle and groan slightly. He thought it was indigestion or at least just feeling completely sore, but soon something else was happening. He felt his belly slowly surge outward in front of him, as it grew right before his eyes. He was completely shocked to see his belly growing bigger and fatter. But soon he noticed the rest of his body thickening up, as he saw his butt and hips growing wider from behind. He looked at his hands as they grew thicker. He couldn't see, but he felt his cheeks, chins, and even his lips plumping up.

Things were only getting riskier as he felt his belly grow wider and grew off of the table. But eventually, the weight of it was too much for the table as it broke it in half. His belly dropped like an anvil on the floor but jiggled and shook like a tub of gelatin. And it continued to grow. In fact, it was growing bigger and faster.

Benny was sweating bullets as he witnessed his enormous flab grow before him, trying to rationalize the situation. But he knew the inevitable was about to happen.

"Please... stop," he begged as tears flowed in his eyes, "Stop... growing... it's... too much..."

But the growth didn't stop. It just went on, growing bigger and faster. Eventually, it broke off the wall across him, as he felt his body and belly growing thicker, larger, wider, fatter.

"Please... stop... I'm... too... fat... Too... Fat... TOO... FAAAAAAAAAAAT!!!"

Soon he heard the sound of rubber stretching, almost as if he was reaching his limits. His body shuddered and shook as his body was reaching an unprecedented size. His body quivered and shook faster and faster, as he felt his belly getting tighter and tighter. Suddenly, something was about to give...

>> BOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!<<

Benny woke up with a start as he found himself in his room. His forehead was drenched in sweat, as he looked down to see his body was not morbidly obese or even ready to explode. He panted slightly as he felt relieved not to be so fat. But as he contemplated his dream, he felt a little comfortable with the idea. Sure, 750 lbs. is too much for a boy to handle, but maybe as he got older he wouldn't mind it.

He got off of his bed and walked into the bathroom, then took off his clothes except for his boxers. He looked at his skinny body and imagined how he would look if he was a couple pounds bigger. He was beginning to wonder how big he would want to be and how his body would look. He even would wonder how his new parents would react. With a short pat on his flat abdomen, he put his clothes back on and was ready to begin his new life of luxury and enlargement.

Benny may not be a true Weisman, but he was going to live like one.

Soon enough, the waitress brings over plate after plate of appetizers on several trays. And while his parents begin to eat at their own pace, Benny became ravenous again and ate like there was no tomorrow. Wings were deboned, potato skins were left empty, barely a crumb or sliver of cheese left in the nacho baskets. Basically, no food was left alone by this child.

While the parents had finished their share of the appetizers, Benny was still scarfing down the remains of the sliders and even a couple mozzarella sticks. After they were gone, Benny sat down and slouched in his chair, exhausted from his gorge. He could hardly think after eating his first course, but he caught a glimpse of something bulging from his abdomen; his own belly.

Benny snapped out of his near food coma and began playing with his belly, which was starting to appear from under his shirt. He patted it and shook it gently, feeling how it was nearly full and pretty fat. But then a strange sound occurred from within. An audible growl indicating one thing; it was still hungry.

Benny only shook his head as he smiled in response while grabbing two burgers. He seemed perfectly capable of eating his meal, but he was trying to keep it under control. Problem was that his stomach was in more control than he was, as he began to munch down the two burgers bite by bite, back and forth without any signs of stopping.

His mother looked on and smiled as he began to gorge like crazy. She may not have agreed with how he ate, but she was proud that he was trying to catch up to their level of gluttony. And she could tell as his belly was bulging out more than before as he ate his food. Somehow, she knew he would reach the potential of being a true Weisman.

After eating two burgers, Benny found himself eating another one while shoveling fries in his mouth. He would only stop to catch his breath or to take a heaping gulp of cola from his cup. Benny's father made sure that the waitress kept a pitcher of cola by his side so he could give himself a refill.

But soon after his burger was gone and his fries had been devoured, Benny took it upon himself to take the pitcher and just chug it down slightly. His parents began to wonder why their newly-adopted son was eating like crazy, but they looked to see his belly peeking out further and further, as they smiled to see how he's showing the true side to a Weisman; being a complete glutton and showing no signs of giving up.

Leaving half of the pitcher still, Benny went onto a set of short ribs. Bit by bit, the ribs were soon nothing but bones as he dug into the meat like a ravenous dog or rather a pig. After that, he went onto the sirloin with mashed potatoes. They went down in a heartbeat, as he left nothing to waste. Even a small amount of fat or gristle was still edible for him. Even as he got to the new york strip, he still ate like nothing was stopping him. As he was finishing off the remains of the strip, he only uttered one word with the food in his mouth...

"MORE!"

Benny's father could only laugh as he asked the waitress for more meat for the table. He was impressed with Benny's newfound appetite and gluttony. It was almost as if he was his own son. So much so that he could see his belly fully exposed from under the table, smears of grease and sauces dripped on top of it slightly. And he was ready to see how much more his son could take in as more ribs and steaks came to the table.

Benny dug into the food with more gusto than before, as he looked like he was ready to eat the table next. Ribs went away like nothing happened, the steaks were munched away in minutes, and all it did was make Benny feel fuller but still ravenous. His belly was looking like a large ticking time bomb, as it was bulging out bigger than before. It practically looked bigger than a basketball, nearly as big as a beach ball.

Benny sat back and took a short moment to breathe, trying to take in a moment to relax after eating nearly everything off of the table. Benny's mother smiled and gently patted his belly gently.

"You certainly got the Weisman spirit, Benny," she said tenderly.

Benny smiled and gently burped. He then saw the pitcher of cola left of the table. He was reaching out towards it but felt a little exhausted from his binge to do anything to reach for it. His mother smiled again and took the pitcher, bringing it close to his lips.

"Just open wide and let Mama help you," she said in a gentle tone as she tilted the pitcher slightly.

Benny's eyes widened and he nodded his head furiously in response. He opened his mouth as wide as he could as he let the cola flow into his mouth. His parents were smiling as he gleefully chugged down the soda, relishing in the taste of the satisfying beverage. As he drank, his belly bulged out further than before, feeling slightly tighter and even quivered slightly. It almost looked like it was filling up like a water balloon.

As the last few drops dripped into his mouth, Benny let out a loud burp in response, as he savored his drink and even patted his bigger belly with pride. He didn't even notice how much bigger it looked as he just felt satisfied in having a good meal. But soon his eye caught a glimpse of a few stray bits of fries in front of an empty platter and wasted no time munching them down. Sighing in contempt, he slid down in his seat and relaxed.

14333322222222222322133211213.content:
With a little heave, Benny managed to bring himself to his feet, despite his belly nearly weighing him down. Even after everything he ate, it jiggled and shook like gelatin, but was still as tight as a drum. He felt his clothes feeling slightly tight as he slowly walked with his folks. But suddenly, a sharp pain hit his belly and he knelt over slightly. His parents took notice and went over to him to try and comfort him.

"Benny, are you okay," asked his father.

"Do you need water or some medicine," ask his mother.

Benny let out a belch that sounded almost like a yelp and groaned as his belly was in pain. He made his way towards the restrooms and closed the door behind him. He made sure no one else was around and made his way to the sinks and mirror.

Taking heavy breaths, Benny felt the pain subside and a faint quiver build inside his belly. The quiver grew into shudders and shivers and spread throughout his body. He felt goosebumps on his skin and was unprepared for what was about to happen. He placed his hands on his belly and looked at himself in the mirror closely. Within seconds, he could see his body slowly shifting upward. He was growing!

The feeling and sight of growing taller was an immediate shock to little Benny, as he found himself getting taller within his new fat frame. His clothes grew tighter as he grew bigger. He looked down to see his arms and even the rest of his body growing slightly thicker as he grew taller. He looked back to see a second chin forming on his face within his reflection.

Within a minute or so, the growth slowed down and he was at a higher altitude and larger body weight. He wouldn't be able to tell but he was practically about 167 lbs. and was 5 feet 4 inches, meaning he grew 65 pounds and 6 inches in height. And it was slightly noticeable with his clothes looking tighter and his belly, despite shrinking from the growth, still bulging out and jiggling.

This new feeling was curious and a concern to young Benny. Just a few hours ago, he was eating like a madman. Now he grew in a way no regular person would be able to in such an instant effect. But it was proof positive what had happened; whatever the hypnotist did to him had worked like a charm...
