143333222222222223221332112132.content:
Touching his face and belly, still bewildered by his new look, Benny felt like this was all too sudden for him. He looked almost as tall as a teen and was looking like a chubby kid now. He had to get this straightened out. He had to see that hypnotist.

Barging out of the bathroom, he walked out into the dining room and walked over towards the stage where it happened. He stopped for a brief moment and saw a few pieces of bread and cake left over at an empty table. On instinct, he took it and ate it all while a few people watched him. Some were disgusted by his newfound eating habit. Others recognized him a little bit and were shocked to see how he had changed. Giving some of them a glare back, he took the cake with him and walked off.

He made his way towards the back room to find the dressing rooms. Some people were surprised to see a chubby kid walking in the dressing room, belly exposed and all while munching on a cake without any regard. But he didn't care. He was too concerned about finding that hypnotist and to try and fix his current situation... if he could...

Benny saw a large star on a door and immediately opened the door. Inside, he saw the hypnotist but he wasn't alone. A young woman was talking to the hypnotist. She was in her early 40s but still looked as young as a 30-year-old. She had dark red hair and yellow eyes that looked like they were golden, almost like they shone. Her figure was a svelt but sporty hourglass figure, with a noticeable bust and wide hips. The hypnotist was surprised to see Benny as his eyes nearly bulged out of his sockets. While the woman was looking in surprise and anticipation.

"Well, it looks like it worked a little too well," said the hypnotist as he untied his tie.

"Too well," asked the woman who was eyeing Benny, "I think you got a good starter here..."

"What did you do to me," demanded Benny as he grasped his gut.

"I hypnotized you," replied the hypnotist simply, "You wanted to make your parents proud and I basically did it in a snap."

"You turned me into a freak!"

"Freak," replied the woman as she approached Benny, "Honey, you're no freak. You just have a new personality."

"You don't get it! I'm a fat monster! And who are you, anyway?!"

The woman only smiled and gently patted him on the head, then placed another hand on his belly.

"I don't have a name," she replied as she rubbed his belly, "I'm just someone who knows a trick or two to help bring out the best in people..."

"The best," replied Benny as he tried to move her hands off of him.

"You're telling me you don't like this?"

"NO! I'm so fat and getting too big! I already snacked on some food before coming out here and I already feel like a heifer!"

The woman could only laugh as she walked out of his way. The hypnotist walked over and decided to give his explanation.

"Look, kid, I'm not a real hypnotist, at least not an expert like her..."

The woman only nodded as she was going over a gift basket full of food. Benny watched her from a glance but turned back to talk to the hypnotist.

"I was a con artist and made up crap and used people to make it look like they were hypnotized. But then I met her and she helped make me a fortune using real magic for actual hypnotism so not only could it be legitimate but also a profitable business."

"So basically I was your guinea pig," asked Benny as he was beginning to get angry.

"I'm afraid so, handsome," replied the woman as she held out a bunch of grapes, "I gave him some power, he gives the patsy the trick, and their fate is in their hands. But in your case, you get a bonus deal."

Benny was about to yell again but found himself staring at the grapes the woman held in her hands. She gently plucked one and seductively swallowed it whole.

"You get to eat as much as you want and allow those fatty nutrients to make you grow bigger and fatter day by day. And you don't have to worry about anyone putting you down. Just take them down a peg and you're in the clear."

Benny could hear what she was telling him, as the thoughts were wrapping around his mind. But what he didn't know was that she was hypnotizing him with the food in her hand, as she seductively made her way towards him.

"You'll be the biggest kid around and you'll be in complete control. And you'll get bigger and bigger. Doesn't that sound like fun?"

Benny slowly nodded as she brought the grapes to his lips. Benny slowly opened his mouth and allowed her to slowly place the vine and grapes in his mouth. He just took it all in and chewed like a cow grazing on grass, vine and all. The woman only smiled as she placed her hand on his belly again, gently massaging it.

"You're such a big eater... such a big boy... Your parents must be proud of you now, right Benny?"

Benny could only nod in a haze as he felt her hand gently massaging his belly. But unbeknownst to him, he was slowly growing taller and fatter. While not as noticeable as before, the woman could feel his body shifting up higher and his belly pushing outward. With what she did, he grew to another three pounds and two inches, making him 5 foot 6 and 170 pounds. The woman only smiled as she leaned into his ear.

"Go on back to your folks... they're waiting for you..."

Benny slowly snapped out of it and, without any thought, walked out of the room. He felt a little different and a little fuller than before. The hypnotist only shrugged off the predicament all while the woman watched Benny leave. She knew what was in store for him...

Owen Ferguson is eleven years old, and is classed as a nerd, hence the reason why he’s wearing smart clothes and glasses, but he’s also very smart at taking studies and had higher marks than everyone else at school. This was the main reason he had been made fun of by some students because of it, and he felt rather annoyed to say the least.

He had been constantly bullied by some students, no matter if it’s by the looks, his speech, or smartness that he thinks they’re all jealous of the top student in school. Owen knew it had to be done, and it was only last week when he had that great thought in his mind.

In fact, they're so small that he's discovered he can easily swallow them... whole! He's sad that he has to go to middle school next year, where he will go from being one of the largest kids in school to one of the smallest... but he's dedicated to making every day remaining count!
14333322222222222322222222.title: Vorish 5th Grader

143333222222222223222222221.content:
The halls of Willow Creek Primary School were mostly empty… except for one student. A little six year old first grade boy, with freckled cheeks and messy brown hair, was going creeping through the halls. He seemed nervous, checking every corner he crossed by and always trying to sneak quietly around, as if hiding from somebody. At last, the boy found his way to his classroom, and breathed a sigh of relief… only to tense up when he heard a familiar voice behind him!

“Well, well, well. Look who it is?” The voice asked, sounding smug as can be. “You weren’t trying to hide from me, were you, Alan?” With a shiver, the lone student turned… and beheld a boy so much bigger than himself! Sure enough, it was Scott James… with such an imposing figure! Being a bit of an early bloomer, the fifth grader was one of the biggest students in the entire school; not just in height, but in weight, too! He was plump as can be, with a big belly that loomed over the smaller boy, as Scott smirked down with the most devious expression on his face.

The smaller boy quickly denied it. “N-no!” He lied, staring gawk-eyed up at Scott like he was a deer in headlights! “I was just… just…”

Before the smaller boy could even respond, Scott James suddenly moved forward! Suddenly, the boy was being squished up against the wall by Scott’s huge, growling belly, only his whimpering head poking out from above all of that soft pudginess. “Well, you should be, you little tattle tale!” Scott growled, leaning forward to squish the boy with all his fatness. “Don’t think I don’t know you were the one who told Mrs. Brown about what I drew on the chalkboard! I got detention for that… my mom was so mad at me!”

“Well, then…” The smaller boy frowned, getting a little angry. “You shouldn’t break the rules!”

In response, Scott just laughed; a big laugh that sent jiggles and jostles all throughout that belly he was pinning the boy against the wall with. “Haha! Big words for such a small boy,” Scott said, before looking the boy in the eyes and licking his lips. “I’m sure you’ve heard the rumors about what I do to little snacks like you…”

The boy’s face went pale, especially when, as if right on cue, Scott’s belly let out a loud growl. “No…” He stuttered, before correcting himself. “Well, yes, but… that’s impossible!”

“Impossible, hmm? You really don’t think I could fit a scrawny little tattle tale like you into this big belly?” Scott smiled, grabbing the boy’s head and pressing it against his gut, squishing it into that soft skin and making him listen to all the gurgles and glorps emerging from within. “Well, let’s find out, hmm?”

Without further ado, Scott grabbed the boy by the sides, lifting him up and letting that massive mouth of his yawn open, revealing the sheer darkness of that throat. “Wait, no-!” The boy called out, but it was too late; soon, his vision would be eclipsed by those jaws.

***

A few minutes later, all that was left of the boy was a pair of small, wriggly feed in Scott’s mouth, which Scott smiled and licked over for a while, before one last swallow sent them to join the rest of his prey in his stomach. He was sat down in some obscure corner of the school, letting out a huge sigh of pure bliss as the boy finally curled up in his stomach completely. “Aaaaaah~” He smiled, patting his big, fully belly. “First graders are so yummy!”

Beneath that large shirt pulled taut over Scott’s belly, nothing suspicious about his gut could be seen… but when he pulls that shirt up, it reveals all sorts of bulges, hand prints and foot prints bulging that shifting, tumultuous stomach. He grinned, rubbing his hands all over that smooth, pale, soft surface, feeling every single movement of the kid within, feeling like he was getting the world’s best belly massage from the inside. “Hehe, you’re in my stomaaach~” He taunted his prey in a sing-song voice. “Still thinks this is ‘impossible’?”

Second graders were nice… third graders too, sometimes, when they were particularly scrawny enough… but Scott’s favorite food was definitely first graders! They were just small enough that they barely made a bulge in his belly, making it easy to keep them hidden beneath his t-shirts; and they were just strong enough that they could give him the best internal belly rub, while being too weak to give him a stomach ache, and especially too weak to escape!

He’s always enjoyed squishing and playing with the kids smaller than himself, but this particular, strange diet of his was a new development. One day, by fate, he noticed that some chubby teenager from the local high school, probably around 16 or 17, was loitering around the school playground. The teen and a fellow fifth grader walked behind some playground equipment; and later, only the teenager emerged, looking incredibly satisfied as he rubbed over his big belly, which was now full of a wriggling, imprisoned ten-year old boy. Only Scott noticed what the teen had done… and instead of reporting him, Scott had just been inspired.

Sure enough, he discovered, it was definitely possible to swallow someone whole if you were sufficiently bigger than them. And the whole process just felt wonderful; from their flavor, to the way they wriggled around helplessly inside of his stomach, to the way his belly felt as it digested them away. Scott was immediately hooked! “Now need to try escaping; once you’re in my tummy, you’re gonna get gurgled, no matter what!” Scott smiled. “But do keep wriggling though… it feels totally awesome!”

Eventually, he pulled his shirt down, covering up his belly again. Now nobody would be able to tell that he was digesting a little boy inside of his stomach; all they’d be able to notice was that his belly was letting out strangely loud groaning and gurgling noises, which could easily be explained away by saying he had a big breakfast. Sure enough, all he had to do was enjoy the rest of his day, getting a constant good mood from the feeling of the kid wriggling around inside his belly.

What would he do now that that little tattle tale is gurgling away?
143333222222222223222222221.title: Gulping a Tattle Tale

choices: “I guess I could try to show you how it’s done”
“I don’t think you could handle it. Not everyone can be a pred."
1433332222222222232222222213.content:
Scott hefted his belly, shifting the weight of the still-moving student inside. If someone had asked, he would have said this was just an adjustment to make himself more comfortable. The reality was that it kicked up another round of squirming, and Scott couldn’t get enough of that sensation. Any dutiful student would take this time to head to class, making up some excuse (maybe an upset stomach – or something upset inside his stomach?), but Scott hardly cared about any of that. Ever since he found out he could swallow people, this building wasn’t a place of education, it was a neatly assembled collection of morsels destined to end up inside him.

Instead, Scott headed for the downstairs bathroom: the preferred meeting place for him and his friends when they wanted a little privacy. Scott pushed his way through the door with only a little difficulty. The extra pressure from the door frame caused a whimper to emanate from his stomach, which was music to Scott’s ears. In the bathroom, his loyal companions were already gathered: clearly having skipped class themselves. They were all smaller than Scott: slightly smaller in stature, and somewhat smaller in weight. None had managed to swallow someone like Scott had, but they all had a general appreciation for gluttony. They, of course, knew the “rumors” about what Scott did to other students were absolutely true. At worst, a couple thought his diet was an innocuous oddity, and at best, a couple burned with envy when they saw the bulges of his prey in his bulbous belly.

The four assembled friends were nearly perfect pairs in size and shape. The skinnier two included Amir: a tall, brown-skinned boy and Jacob: a red-headed, freckles and a bit of fat on his body. The other two had considerably more weight on their bones. The fatter of Scott’s crew were Adam: a black-haired, tanned boy that was only a little shorter than Scott and Melissa: a tomboyish girl the 5th graders had reluctantly welcomed into their posse. She, too, neared Scott’s height. Neither she nor Adam could match Scott’s weight, but they were far from featherweights.

As Scott lumbered into the room, they all stared at his belly.

“Got another one, huh?” Amir smirked.

Scott slapped his belly, “Of course. Why do you think I show up each day? To learn?” he chuckled and the others echoed.

They spent some time exchanging the usual banter: complaining about teachers, mocking students they didn’t like, imagining (with a little trepidation) what middle school was going to be like, and so on.

Scott couldn’t help but notice Melissa being more silent than usual. As the conversation drifted her focus seemed to alternate between her comrades and Scott’s round middle.

“What’s up, Melissa? Can’t take your eyes off me more than usual today, it seems,” Scott said in a mocking tone.

“It’s not – I mean – not like that,” she blushed. He always teased her about secretly having a crush on him. “I’m just imagining what it must feel like: being that full, having the weight of an entire kid inside you, feeling their hopeless struggles…” she trailed off as her stomach gurgled.

“Yeah, man,” Adam joined in. “Any time you show up like this, I can’t help but imagine how great it must be to gulp someone down. You gotta teach us how to do it.”

Scott considered this carefully. He liked being on top, even amongst his friends. Still, he couldn’t deny he appreciated the jealousy he inspired. It seemed like even Amir and Jacob were a little jealous, too, but they always seemed a little more uncomfortable with the idea.

“Well,” Scott began…
1433332222222222232222222213.title: Hang out with his friends

14333322222222222322222222131.content:
Scott eyed his friends carefully. Which one - or ones - had the best personality to try and be a pred? Which were best built for it? Which did he want to see get fat?

And, did he have to worry about any of them becoming too good at being preds and becoming a rival?

Eventually, he decided to teach...
14333322222222222322222222131.title: Who does he teach first?

143333222222222223222222221311.content: His plump and more gluttonous friends... they seemed like the obvious choice! Which ones, though, did he think would make good pred material in particular?
143333222222222223222222221311.title: Adam and/or Melissa

choices: Adam tries his first prey after he's digested all that food
Melissa has been training on her own terms, hoping to become your rival!
1433332222222222232222222213111.content:
To be honest, you’d already considered teaching Adam how to follow in your footsteps, in the past. He was one of the biggest gluttons in the school, second only to yourself, and you couldn’t help but admire his penchant for stuffing his belly just as full as you liked to do. Besides, you could always tell how quietly jealous he was when he saw prey wriggling in your stomach. “You know… I think you’d make a great pred, Adam! I’d be happy to show you the ropes!”

Instantly, Adam’s eyes lit up with excitement! Melissa, however, seemed confused. “What? Why don’t I get to come, too?”

You giggled at the thought, as if the answer was obvious! “Being a pred is a boys-only thing, Melissa!”

She immediately crossed her arms and pouted! “Is not! That doesn’t even make any sense!” She gazed around at the other boys, as if waiting for one to back her up, but they never did. Melissa huffed, tired of being left out of boy things just because she was a girl! “Fine! I’ll just go learn how, all by myself! It can’t be that hard, if a dummy like you figured it out!” With that, she stomped away.

You and Adam prepare to go and train… but before you do, you stop and look back at Amir and Jacob. “You two sure that you don’t also wanna feel a kid wriggling in your bellies?”

“Uuuh…” They both blushed a bit as they looked down and noticed a handprint bulging clearly against the soft, shiny skin of your belly. They were never very gluttonous, and rather uncomfortable with the idea of eating kids… and yet, you made it sound so blissful, they couldn’t help but wonder what it felt like! “M-maybe later?”

You chuckled as you trotted away, leading Adam to the cafeteria and sitting down at one of the tables, pulling out your prodigious lunch bag. “Alright, Adam. If you wanna do this, you gotta practice; work your way up,” you smile, lifting up a bunch of chicken nuggets! “Fit as many of these into your mouth as you can, and then swallow em!” He accepts them into his mouth, being able to fit three at first, tensing up as he gives them a big swallow and let's them all slide down his throat. He gets better at it quickly, though; next time, four nuggets disappeared down his throat, and then five!

You marvelled at the sight! Once those nuggets were gone, you reached down into your bag again. “Okay, now let’s try something bigger!” You pull out an entire orange, which his eyes widen at! “Here, open your mouth as wiiide as you can. Don’t strain too hard, though; just relax your jaws.” He seemed hesitant, but still, he closed his eyes and tried to open his mouth as wide as he could… which turned out to be a lot wider than he expected! With a grin, you slipped the orange between his jaws.

He held it there for a while, gagging a bit, trying to get his throat to accept the massive, round object. Eventually, his throat muscles relaxed and allow the orange to pass into that cavernous tunnel. His throat bulged big and round for a moment, and he gagged a bit, struggling to swallow it… but eventually, the entire orange disappeared into his stomach! You laughed triumphantly, patting his belly. “There you go! See, it’s not that hard!”

He huffed, rubbing his stomach. “Oooh… that felt really weird…”

“Hehe, you’ll get used to it! You’re a natural already!” With that, the training really began! You had him swallow a few more oranges and apples… and then some burgers… and even some delicious donuts! Each time, you could tell he was quickly getting better and better at it, swallowing down bigger and bigger food items with greater and greater ease.

Eventually, he huffed, running a hand over his fat belly which was starting to grow big and round. “Oh, man… I’m starting to feel full…”

“C’mon, you still have just one last test ahead of you!” You smile, pulling out his last test… an entire watermelon! Once he swallows this, you’ll know for sure that he’s ready for the real deal! “Swallow this!”

“W-what!? A whole watermelon!?” He gasps. “But… that’s impossible!”

“‘Impossible’? Hah! That’s exactly what this kid told me… and now look where he is!” You smile, rubbing your belly, eliciting another round of struggles. “C’mon, you can do it! After this, you’ll be ready!”

“Uhh… okaay…” He couldn’t argue with that logic. With a sigh, he gently started to shove the watermelon past his lips, until it soon bulged out his chubby cheeks. He sweat and clenched his eyes shut, tensing as he tried to force the watermelon down. “Mph!”

“See? You’re a natural!” You cheered him on. “Just a little more!” He gagged a bit as the massive, round fruit into his throat, having to take a few more swallows and pushing at it with his hands to finally force it down into his stomach. He sat back, gasping in breath as the watermelon finally settled in his belly, now stuffed to the absolute brim! “There you gooo! How does that feel?”

“I feel so… stuffed…” He pants.

“Hehe, not quite as stuffed as I am!” You smile, playfully squishing both of your big, fat tummies together and making them both slosh all about like crazy! “Remember, sloshing your belly around helps your acids soak into your meals! It helps a lot with digestion!” He just nodded, still in a trance-like state after his massive lunch.
1433332222222222232222222213111.title: Gluttony Training!

choices: Scott Helps Melissa Find A Prey
Their Friends Argue Some More, With Melissa Coming Out On Top
1433332222222222232222222213112.content:
It was pretty obvious who Scott was going to choose. The amount she ate, the fact she was always memorized by his belly, how much she liked being bigger. Girl or not, Melissa was the most pred-like out of all his friends

“I think Melissa is probably big enough to eat someone.” He said, slapping the red-headed girl’s, round, belly

“R-really? Cool!” She replied, after a slight blush from the belly pat

“What!?! You can’t be serious!” Adam shouted at his bullous friend

Scott was afraid of this. While he teased Melissa a bit, he actually quite liked her. After all, it was the reason she was the only girl excepted into their little group. However, he knew his friends were never as thrilled to have a girl in their click. True, they didn’t HATE her, but she was always seen as the lowest of the group, despite being the fattest and most gluttonous, next to Scott himself

“Sorry, Adam. But it already looks like Melissa ate someone…maybe 2 people~” He teased as he poked her belly

It was true too. While Melissa had a nice layer of fat on her, the grand majority of her weight went straight to her gut. Had she been older, people would have thought she was pregnant. It would be the perfect disguise for the portly, preteen, girl when she did start gobbling up other students
1433332222222222232222222213112.title: Melissa

choices: More bullies to pick from or perhaps...
143333222222222223222222222.content:
Ethan
Age 12
Race: Caucasian
Height: 5 foot 3 inches
Weight: 280 lbs.

Ethan was a chubby preteen bully. He'd always loved to eat, and he has been teased about his weight throughout his childhood. In response, Ethan began to bully other children, eager to prove his superiority to them. Soon, the bully stopped being about trying to improve his self-esteem; he began to bully other kids simply because he enjoyed it. Around that time, Ethan also lost any sense of shame about his weight. That led to Ethan eagerly indulging his appetite whenever he could. It didn't take long before he found a way to combine his two passions, and Ethan began focusing his bullying on stealing other kids' food so he could keep making himself fatter and more overpowering.

Ethan's bullying didn't go unchecked, however. Many of his bouts of bullying were cut short by the intervention of adults. As much as Ethan could use his own size and weight to overpower the other children, he was still no match for the adults who were bigger than him. When adults intervened to save his victims, Ethan would sulk for hours, staring daggers at his would-be victim and the adult who saved them. He took pleasure in the times that his stare seemed to frighten them.

When Ethan took risks and bullied other kids with adults nearby, he had begun swallowing other kids food whole - or as close to whole as he could manage. That way, if he was caught, the adults couldn't make him give the kid their food back.

One time, just after he swallowed a little girl's apple whole, and seconds before a teacher pulled Ethan off of her, he whispered to her "Just be glad it's not you in here." He chuckled and patted him belly. A wide grin spread across Ethan's face when he saw how scared that made her. She's so stupid, he thought, she thinks I could actually fit her in my belly.

A few years had passed since then, and the kids at Ethan's elementary school had learned to be afraid of him. Recently, the preteen had reached the very beginning of puberty, and he admired how he seemed to be growing taller as well as fatter. His appetite also increased, if anything, to feed his growing body. He looked forward to testing out all the new things he could stuff into his belly now that he was growing up.

Now, at 12, Ethan was moving on to middle school for the first time. Ethan can't wait to start using his new height to teach all of the new kids at the new school to fear him. So many new victims, so much food to be given as tribute to his round, glorious belly. Little does Ethan know, his growth spurt isn't just the beginning of puberty, and it will take more and more to fuel his ever-growing body...
143333222222222223222222222.title: Someone else

choices: This is too good a chance to pass up!
Bide and wait... lunch will be served soon...
1433332222222222232222222221.content:
Ethan entered the school with a determined look on his face, wearing a denim vest, a black T-shirt with Metallica written on the front, navy jeans that were fading, and a pair of black boots. All accommodating his tall and fat figure, as he looked about 5 foot 3 inches tall and 280 lbs. of walking, talking, bully material.

As he walked down the hallway, he passed by various students who looked at him with a bit of fear, between his menacing glare and his large figure. Some of them knew of his arrival, while others had heard from the grapevine that he would be passing by. Either way, it was bad news for everyone...

Ethan looked around and saw a group of students with a large Tupperware container. He guessed it had snacks inside, but there was only one way to find out. He walked over as two of the students noticed him and backed away slowly, while he grabbed the other student holding the container by his shoulder.

"Well well well, what's going on here," Ethan asked, grinning from ear to ear.

The student looked behind to see Ethan, in all his large glory. He stared at the bully with wide eyes and shaking legs.

"I-I-I-I-I-I brought in some cookies from home," the boy said as he shook with fear in his voice, "I baked them yesterday..."

"Well isn't that lovely," Ethan said with mock excitement in his tone, "Why don't you let me take them off of your hands?"

"Well, I made them for my homeroom," the boy replied uneasily.

Ethan's smile started to fade away, as he began to push the boy into the lockers slowly using his big belly.

"Is that right," said Ethan in a hushed yet sinister tone, "You rather risk your good health than to give me those cookies? You must be a real moron..."

"I-I-I-I-I mean-- Uh, HERE! You can have them! All of them!"

"That's more like it," exclaimed Ethan as he took the whole container, then walked down the hallway laughing.

Ethan opened the container to see that the cookies were a variety; chocolate chip, sugar, snicker-doodles, pizzelles, butter pecan, etc. And they were all his for the taking. Wasting no time, Ethan gobbled down the cookies as he walked down the hall. Students who passed him by were uneasy with his eating style, as he had made a pig of himself, as crumbs flew around him as he ate. But he didn't care. Even if someone was to talk to him about how he ate, he would've knocked them on their butts.

As he was finishing off the container, he was by himself in the hallway, as it looked like everyone was in class already. But he didn't care, he was enjoying his treat. As he munched on the last cookie and swallowed it, he noticed that his belly was peeking out of his shirt slightly, as his navel was halfway visible. He patted his belly with pride, which was felling a little full but still had some room left...

GLOOORRRRRP!

A strange noise was coming from inside his belly, as he felt it quiver slightly. The quivers slowly began to affect his body, It felt like his entire body had goosebumps.

And then it happened...

Slowly but surely, Ethan's body began to grow. His fat frame slowly grew fatter, while his height slowly rose up inch by inch. His clothes were getting slightly snug on him, then eventually got tighter. He moaned slightly, as the feeling was something new yet exciting for him.

And as soon as it came, it faded away...

He noticed that his body looked slightly fatter, with his belly peaking out further and his clothes feeling very tight on him. He then noticed that he was slightly taller than the lockers around him. If he had to guess, he had to be a few inches over 6 feet.

And all he could do was grin like a madman...
1433332222222222232222222221.title: Continue with Ethan...

14333322222222222322222222211.content:
Over the past few months, Ethan has reveled in his growth spurt (upward and outward). As he began to enter puberty and both his body and his desires gradually shifted, he realized that his enjoyment of eating and growing was more than just hunger. Somewhere in his brain, a few wires had crossed between his gluttony and his bullying. In recent months, getting bigger and bullying other people combined into a sort of excitement that he couldn't quite explain. Now that he's seen a sudden growth spurt, that funny feeling of excitement coursed through his veins stronger than ever.

Ethan was smart enough to know this kind of sudden growth wasn't normal, but as he tingled with excitement, he had to know if it was a one-time burst. As a boy with an overactive imagination, he pictured himself eating and growing, eating and growing - becoming more and more powerful, conquering everything around him.

He snapped himself out of this daydream. He was getting way ahead of himself. The next step was obvious: keep indulging his hunger. Whether it caused him to grow or not, he always enjoyed eating for its own sake. All the better if he could combine it with the excitement of overpowering someone else.

The bell for class had already rung, but Ethan didn't care. Attending his surely boring first period class was completely insignificant next to his growing frame. He stomped through the halls - appreciating again how the school hallways seemed just the tiniest bit smaller than they did a few minutes ago - and looked for his next source of food.
14333322222222222322222222211.title: This is too good a chance to pass up!

choices: Delilah makes a run for it, spooked by the display of power.
Delilah looks away with an embarrassed blush on her face...
Someone else arrives... Could it be... a teacher?!
143333222222222223222222222111.content:
Delilah Jefferies was terrified of going into middle school. She was quiet, shy, and had trouble speaking to anyone. She eventually made a couple friends in her elementary school, bonding in no small part over their shared love of cartoons and drawing. But all her friends had ended up at a different school and now she knew no one. It was made all the worse that she had missed the bus and was now late for her first ever middle school class.

Juggling her books, sketchbook, and lunchbox, Delilah ran through the halls. Shy girl that she was, Delilah mostly looked down as she ran. That led to her running straight into another student as she rounded a corner. Everything she was carrying spilled out of her hand an onto the ground. Delilah barely managed to keep her glasses from falling. She pushed them back onto her face and gazed up at the person she ran into. At first, she couldn't see a face; all she could see was a round gut peaking out from under a strained black t-shirt.

"I'm really sorry," Delilah managed to mumble.

Ethan didn't even hear the apology. He leaned over and look down at her. Delilah could now see Ethan's pudgy face, but what she really noticed was his toothy, menacing grin. Delilah scrambled to try and recollect her spilled belongings.

"Well, well, well, what do we have here?" the rotund bully sneered. His eyes immediately locked onto her lunchbox. He snatched it up before she could stop him, and he eagerly pulled it open. Inside was not only Delilah's lunch, but also her breakfast since she was running so late. Two meals for the price of one: not bad at all. Ethan didn't know what kind of person Delilah was, or whether she would wield any kind of influence with the other kids. He decided to play it safe and make this a consuming show of force. Ethan positioned himself so Delilah could see him make quick work of her meals.

Ethan stared by pouring her entire pouch of cereal into his mouth, then tearing open her carton of milk to chug the whole thing down. He didn't bother chewing: he just let the milk sweep the cereal down his throat. Next, he tore into her breakfast banana, ferociously chomping it to pieces. He moved onto her lunch, all but inhaling her spaghetti and meatballs, guzzling her soda, and making a crunching, smacking mess of her small bag of chips.

Finally, to top it all off, Ethan made eye contact with Delilah to make sure she was watching, and he swallowed her apple whole. He had no idea he could swallow something that big, but something about his new, larger body and his intoxicating sense of power told him to do it - all the better if it intimidated Delilah. He felt the apple bulge out his throat. It hurt a bit, but he particularly enjoyed feeling it plop into his spacious belly. Having obliterated two meals in less than a minute, Ethan burped and patted his gut. He smirked maliciously and glared down at Delilah, who was still scraping together her papers and books.

"My name's Ethan," he told her, "And I'm gonna rule this school. You're going to let me do whatever I want and not say a peep to anyone, because once I'm done here, no one will be able to stop me."

As if to drive the point home, his belly groaned and gurgled, both beginning to digest the food he consumed and warning of the growth to come, modest as it may be when he only consumed one student's food, instead of snacks for a whole class.
143333222222222223222222222111.title: Someone runs into Ethan...

choices: Has found himself an adoring lackey!
Has found himself an unwitting minion!
Has found himself a ignorant stooge!
1433332222222222232222222221112.content:
As Ethan gazed down at Delilah, he saw that she was blushing, obviously embarrassed. That was unusual. She was scared, sure, and that was normal, but embarrassment was not quite the usual response. Taking the time to examine the rest of the scene, now that food wasn't in the picture, Ethan saw something that might begin to explain it.

As previously mentioned, Delilah used to bond with her friends over drawing and cartoons. What she and her friends drew varied greatly, from Disney characters, to anime, to My Little Pony. But Delilah had a few interests that deviated from what her friends were into, and she was always shy about letting anyone else know about it. Starting at a young age, Delilah was unusually interested in food in cartoons. Silly cartoons interested her above all else because every now and then characters would consume huge amounts of food, with their bellies ballooning outward to ridiculous, impossible proportions.

She could trace some of it back to some older cartoons that were outdated reruns even when she was very young. She could remember vague things about animal characters (maybe a wise-cracking rabbit and a duck character?) getting huge bellies and wobbling around as the food sloshed in their gut. Or there was another blur of a memory where some orange cat would laze around and eat huge amounts of food. A few variations on these ideas stuck out in particular.

In one of the stories, a cartoon duck wished to be big and became so huge that he stomped around a city - even crouching down to guzzle food out of a fast food place like he was chugging down water. Or there was one about the cat where he ate so much he kept growing bigger and bigger. Soon, he was eating buildings, swimming pools, and - if she remembered correctly - even a TV news camera crew.

She knew it was silly - of course it was - so she could never quite talk to anyone about it. Still, those images made her feel funny. She had always been petite and extremely introverted, so these chubby characters charging through cities and gulping down food was so different from who she was that it was appealing - desirable, even. Her parents pushed her to eat more to reach a more healthy weight, and pushed her to speak up for herself at school, and that pressure was exhausting. Sometimes she wished people would just be okay with her staying quiet and puny. Maybe it would make her feel more alone and powerless, but in a way it would also be a relief to escape the pressure to be someone she wasn't.

One of Delilah's outlet for these feelings were her drawings. She had always liked drawing cartoon characters, whether they were ones that already existed or ones she made up. She shared some of her drawings with her family and friends, but others she kept secret. Those secret drawings were invariably of characters with big bellies. Sometimes they were girls, sometimes they were boys, sometimes normal size, and sometimes giant. She still couldn't quite explain why she liked characters like that, but she knew her friends never drew anything like that, so her secret was a little shameful.

And now the secret had come out in the worst possible way, to the worst possible person. As everything spilled out of her hands, Delilah ignored her books, pencil bag, and lunch, because her sketchbook also dropped and some of the drawings she had hidden between the pages were now scattered on the floor. She tried to pick up the drawings as fast as possible, which made it easy for Ethan to snatch her lunch. She only looked up when she heard him speak to her, and when she heard the strange sounds of him ravenously consuming her breakfast and lunch. Since she was distracted by the sounds of Ethan's glutting, his burp, and the gurgling from his belly, she didn't collect all of her drawings in time.

Ethan caught a glimpse of a few of her drawings and snatched some up before Delilah could grab them all. He was caught off guard by the ones he grabbed: they were of boys with big bellies. The drawings were no works of art - Delilah wasn't bursting with natural talent - but he could still clearly see what the pictures were meant to be.

Ethan flipped through the drawings in his hand, then he looked back at Delilah, who couldn't meet his gaze. Ethan's body began to rumble, and he knew a growth spurt was coming soon (even if it was sure to be smaller than the last one). Surveying the embarrassed girl below him, Ethan...
1433332222222222232222222221112.title: Delilah looks away with an embarrassed blush on...

choices: Ethan's not the only one growing...
14333322222222222322222222211121.content:
Ethan glanced at Delilah over the top of the stolen drawings. All Delilah could see was his eyes and his belly (Was his stomach vibrating just now? she asked herself)

Ethan dropped Delilah's drawings and let them drift to the floor. Now when he looked down at her, his expression was thoughtful (if a little condescending) instead of menacing. "You like big bellies, huh?" he asked, though it was more of a statement.
Delilah was still blushing and frightened, but she managed a very slight nod.

"Interesting, interesting," Ethan mused. "Guess that means we-" he began before clutching his roaring middle.

Ethan shook and his stomach rumbled. His pained expression was soon replaced with a euphoric smile as he felt his clothes get tighter. Delilah watched as the t-shirt slid higher, revealing more of Ethan's belly, and his pants rose to expose the top of his boots. The seams of his pants began to strain, exposing both some of the stitching and his flesh underneath. The zipper of Ethan's fly became a little more strained from a more ordinary sort of growth. Delilah jumped to her feet and backed against the wall as he grew. Ethan only gained a few inches, but it was still a change neither he nor Delilah could ignore. By the time he was done growing, his clothes were still intact, but he knew they wouldn't stay that way for long. Ethan now stood 6' 7", and his stomach stuck out a couple inches further. Ethan felt another wave of excitement flow through him, but he felt a twinge of disappointment as he realized his belly felt emptier now. It seemed that each growth left him needing more food to satisfy him.

Ethan patted his gut with love and pride, while Delilah couldn't take her eyes off of it. "I told you I was going to rule this school and no one can stop me. But, since you like boys with bellies, maybe you don't want to stop me. You've seen what my body can do. Do you want me to have an even bigger belly?" He smiled, rubbing his stomach.

Delilah couldn't even manage a nod this time, but deep down she admitted she was awed by his growth, and she did want to see it happen again. Her desire to get to class was gradually fading.

Ethan didn't really need her to answer; he'd never really cared about what other people wanted, and he had even less reason to start now. What he wanted was all that mattered. He walked slowly forward, inching his belly closer and closer to Delilah. Her short stature combined with Ethan's growth meant that his dome of flesh was level with her chest. He stopped just short of pinning her against the wall, but she felt imprisoned by his mass all the same.

"Here's the deal, pipsqueak. Since you were nice enough to give me your lunch, I'll let you keep giving me food. Your job will be to go out and find me whatever kind of food I ask for, and bring it to me no questions asked," Ethan began. For some reason he couldn't explain, he added, "And you will watch me eat it all, feeding it to me if I ask you to."

Delilah's pulse quickened.

"Or, if you won't bring gifts for my belly, I'll just have to find ways to punish you with this ball of fat instead," he said, not really knowing what he'd do it her if she didn't cooperate. To drive the point home, he reached out and grabbed one of Delilah's hands, making her touch the underside of his bulging stomach. With a mind of its own, his belly gave a bestial growl, as if it was dreaming up its own consequences, should she fail to bring it food.

Delilah had never stopped blushing, but now she began to shake as adrenaline pumped through her veins. Something about that growl, and the idea of Ethan dreaming up ways to "punish" her with his ever-growing belly, filled her with terror. Or was it excitement?

Feeling she had no choice - or maybe because she truly wanted to - Delilah whispered, "Okay."

"Glad you see your place," Ethan said, talking a couple steps back. "Now go out and get me something interesting and different to eat. I'll get food for myself, too, so you'll need to come find me when you're ready to feed me. This big belly of mine is going to need a lot of food before it's full." He chuckled in his old, domineering bully way.
14333322222222222322222222211121.title: Has found himself an adoring lackey!

choices: Why not a bit of both?
143333222222222223222222222111212.content:
Ethan lumbered out of sight and Delilah took a moment to try to focus and slow her quickened pulse. This was her chance to escape, to tell a teacher, to call for help.

And yet, she didn't do any of those. Instead, Delilah started thinking about how to go about feeding the growing girth of Ethan the bully. Delilah wandered off into the halls of the school, peaking into classrooms in search of food. She had a stroke of luck in one of the science classrooms, which wasn't too far away from the cafeteria where Ethan, presumably, was beginning to feed himself.

This particular science classroom was deserted for the moment. Kids had left their backpacks and other supplies in the room and the lights had been shut off. Delilah didn't know where they had gone or when they'd be back, but she thought they might be getting a tour of the school. All the unattended backpacks seemed like a prime opportunity to gather food without needing to assert herself directly. Delilah snuck into the room and began rummaging through the unattended backpacks.

In a few short minutes, Delilah had scooped up nine different lunchboxes, which was about all she could carry. Having peaked inside each one, it seemed she could deliver quite a collection of food to Ethan. It was all the better that some students seemed to have an excessive amount of food packed away for their lunches.

Delilah was headed for the door when she remembered Ethan's instruction: he had commanded her to find "something interesting and different to eat." Since he was such a glutton, she didn't think he would complain about having an abundance of normal food, she didn't want to incur his wrath. He was a bully who grew when he ate, who knew what he could be capable of!

Since she was also nervous about keeping Ethan waiting, Delilah hurriedly looked around the classroom for any food that would be out of the ordinary. She quickly settled on only two options: there was a collection of chemicals (Maybe some of those would be good things to drink? she wondered) or the class pet, a large guinea pig named Fuzzy.
143333222222222223222222222111212.title: Stick with Delilah...

choices: Be obedient, bring food back to the master...
Whoops, the class (and teacher!) are back!
1433332222222222232222222221112121.content:
Delilah noticed a small display with a large beaker of orange liquid and an apple that looked three or five times bigger than a normal apple. The sign of the display reads "Experimental Growth Formula".

She then noticed a small paper that looked like a report. She skimmed through it a little bit until she read a passage that seemed very interesting...

...Although the experiment works with standard plants, it is unsure of whether or not it is effective on living beings. But I would rather not try to use it on people, since it could lead to disastrous results if it fell into the wrong hands.

With this information, she took both the apple, the formula, and all the remaining food that was left in the classroom. After making sure no one was outside the classroom, she made her way to find Ethan.

As she hurried to find him, she looked down at the larger apple and the growth formula. She wondered if this could work on humans as well as it did for the apple. And if so, how effective could it be? How big could a person get? How often would they grow? Will they continuously grow without stopping? And more importantly, what would it be like to grow?

Delilah looked down the hallway then back at the items. Could she really take a huge risk and try out these items or would she be the obedient servant to a giant bully who will continue to eat and grow?
1433332222222222232222222221112121.title: Grab the chemicals.

choices: Take the formula, and the food, for herself!
Take the food, and the formula, to Ethan!
14333322222222222322222222211121211.content:
Delilah decided to throw caution to the wind. Her growling tummy also reminded her she was hungry thanks to the bully. She took a bite of the apple and was surprised to find it was the juiciest apple she ever tasted. It even tasted stronger and more delicious to boot. She noticed a strange aftertaste but ignored it taking a few more large bites.

The apple was now half eaten. Little did Delilah realize the extra juice was in part from the apple being infused with the growth formula. She was so concerned with snacking and the taste she failed to notice herself grow 3 inches taller or the rest of the apple grow from 5x the size of a normal apple to 7x a normal apple in her hand.

Delilah soon finished the apple down to the core but for some reason felt compelled to eat it too. As Delilah forced it down, it once again enlarged slightly as it descended down into her stomach. Next Delilah eyed the bottle of formula thoughtfully.

"Maybe a taste can't hurt…" She took the stopper out and sniffed it. It smelled citrus like. She took a sip.

"Oh wow it tastes like oranges, peaches and pineapple all mixed together…!" Delilah waited a few moments. "Hmm it doesn't seem to be doing anything. Maybe a little more…"

This time she took a larger sip.

As she waited her mind wandered to thoughts of her pictures and cartoons, specifically the ones of outgrowing buildings and such. Soon her daydream shifted from her still being petite to her being the one giant sized. The weird feelings from when she had watched Ethan devour her food and swiftly grow began to surface again as she herself grew 3 more inches.

Delilah snapped out of it, totally unaware of her change in stature.

"This stuff doesn't seem to work on people after all but it tastes good and maybe if it works later... T-that dream could really happen…"

So with that in mind and cause of her current bully problem Delilah tilted the formula to her mouth and chugged every last drop. She then ran back to the classroom to look for more. Sure enough a 1/2 filled beaker was in the desk, presumably the one that was used on the apple and other plants.
14333322222222222322222222211121211.title: Time for some preteen rebellion!

choices: Be subservient, go crawling back to Ethan.
Be rebellious! Eat, expand, and grow!
143333222222222223222222222111212112.content:
Delilah stole a couple backpacks and dumped out their contents. She needed all the space she could get to cram in the food she stole from all of the kids in this room. She tucked the half-full vial into a small pocket on one of the backpacks, but nervously threw the empty vial into the trashcan. She was scared to think what Ethan would do if he found out that she drank an entire vial of growth formula instead of bringing it and the half-full vial for him to consume. She reassured herself that it might not matter at all. It had worked on the apple, but people aren’t apples, and she wasn’t hitting her head on the ceiling or anything, even after drinking an entire vial.

As Delilah moved out into the hall, she thought that maybe the doorframe was just a little bit lower, but she shrugged off the idea. Little did she know that she’d already grown 10 inches and now stood a full five feet tall. It was still nothing compared to Ethan, but the formula’s work wasn’t done. The apple had been rapidly growing – expanding even as she ate it – because the formula was designed to increase the size of plants and food. It destabilized the proteins within food matter and caused the proteins to rapidly self-replicate. So deep in Delilah’s stomach, the remains of the apple had been doused in the formula, significantly destabilizing and expanding the fruit. As it did, Delilah’s body began to absorb the formula, using the apple as a vector. It was this combination of the formula plus the food that was triggering her growth.

Once Delilah was in the hall, she immediately doubled over in pain and grabbed her stomach. She suddenly felt queasy and extremely full, almost like she had eaten something that gave her indigestion, but eaten so much of it that her stomach was bloated to its limit. Her mind was primarily overwhelmed with the pain and discomfort, but there was a buried part of her brain that gave her tingling feelings of excitement as her hands grasped her bloated, expanded stomach. Her belly had pooched out to the point where she nearly had a little pot belly. That excited her subconscious mind as it made her fantasies of characters with big, stuffed bellies just a little more real.

Her stomach roared and churned and gurgled. Delilah even thought she could feel the contents in her belly roiling like a violet sea. She squeezed her eyes shut as she rode out the pain. By the time she opened her eyes, her stomach was back to its usual flat, petite form, but then she noticed something completely unlike her usual, petite form.

She was bigger. Not just a little bit bigger, but a large enough difference that she couldn’t write it off as wishful thinking. Delilah guessed she had gained four feet. As she stood up, her head didn’t quite hit the ceiling, but she seemed to be about nine feet tall. Nine feet! Even Ethan, last time she saw him, was well below that height.

But that was last time she saw him. What if he’d changed? What if he’d eaten so much that he was even bigger than Delilah? That made her mind start to revert to its previous, subservient ways. It made her want to rush back to Ethan, apologize profusely, and show him all the food she had gathered. If that didn’t calm his anger, maybe the other half vial of growth formula would. That was an exciting thought, too: as scary as Ethan was, it would be wonderful to see him and his blubbery ball of a belly balloon to a massive size. Who knew how big he could get if he was already growing when he ate? And imagine all the things a voracious bully might do once he was big enough...

But then again, she was growing, too. What if eating made her bigger? What if Ethan had started growing because of some second-hand exposure to this formula? Maybe she could grow like he could. Delilah imagined herself towering over Ethan. Imagined herself as the one shoveling food into her swelling belly. Imagined herself as the one bursting out of buildings and stomping through the city. Imagined her being the one who was punishing Ethan with her massive size: picking him up and opening her –

She snapped herself out of the fantasies. That was going too far; she didn’t even know if she could grow again. And who knows how big Ethan got while she was gone. If he was his normal size, she had no reason to be scared of him now, right? But what if he was bigger and hungrier? What if he was starting to become unstoppable, just like he had promised?

After freezing in a moment of indecision, Delilah chooses to…
143333222222222223222222222111212112.title: Take the food, and the formula, to Ethan!

choices: Start living the dream! To the cafeteria!
Why not go say hello to Ethan?
1433332222222222232222222221112121122.content:
A couple years ago, Delilah would occasionally draw herself as one of the fat, giant characters. That was very rare. After all, she always pictured the giant, fat characters as confident and domineering: they wouldn’t let anyone stand between them and what they wanted. And that’s just not who she was back then.

Was.

Delilah was crumbling back into her meek, scared self, when that thought ran through her head. That’s not who she was back then. But now the emphasis changed.

Was.

She realized that she was suddenly different. She wasn’t small little Delilah. She wasn’t even a grown up, adult version of herself. She was sure she had to be taller than anyone else had ever been before.

So what did it matter who she was? She was different now, could be different now. She could be whoever she wanted. And if she kept growing, she could do whatever she wanted. She’d have nothing to be afraid of, and she’d be anything but powerless.

Those thoughts were pushed out of her mind by a crippling hunger. Her belly had rapidly broken down the apple and absorbed all of it. Now her larger belly violently demanded more food. Instantly, Delilah was salivating at the thought of all the food she’d gathered up, which now sat in the backpacks she’d dropped to the ground as she grew.

Now she turned to those backpacks and tore them open in a frenzy. Without thinking, she began shoving everything inside into her mouth. At first she chewed the food she put in there, but soon she just began swallowing it. Not only was her body larger, but she also found that she was swallowing bigger and bigger mouthfuls with no trouble at all. The formula was still flowing through her body, and it had made her physiology more flexible as it was exposed to the chemicals that put the apple’s proteins in flux. Her body was expanding to accommodate more food: in her mouth, her throat, and her belly. In less than a minute, she’d devoured the lunches of thirty students.

Now her belly distended noticeably in front of her. It still couldn’t match cartoon characters or the things she’d drawn, but it was closer to the cartoons than ordinary belly fat would have been. It didn't look like her entire body had become fatter (yet), but her belly had rounded out to the equivalent of being five months pregnant, if she was a normal-sized adult. But unlike pregnancy, her stomach was lumpy; she could feel the varying textures of all the food, and she could squish it and move it around as she massaged her belly.

It felt wonderful, but as her body began to absorb the food – which joined with the formula in her bloodstream – pain spread through her again as she began to grow. Delilah gritted her teeth as she endured the pain. It still hurt a lot, but now that she knew what was happening, her excitement dulled the pain.

As she grew, her head slammed into the ceiling, disorienting her for a moment. Once this round of growth was finished, Delilah had to bend over and her upper back was hitting the ceiling, which groaned slightly under the pressure. While Delilah couldn’t straighten herself up to check, she guessed she had to be close to 13 feet tall: more than three times her original height! She’d also gained a fair bit of fat now. She figured that made sense, considering how many calories she’d just eaten. She had flabbier arms and legs, a squishier butt, and a belly roll that gave her a muffin top. Well, a muffin top for the moment.

This last growth had shredded nearly all of her clothes. Her underwear and socks were barely holding on thanks to their elasticity. The old Delilah would have been mortified to be nearly naked in school, but that’s not who she was anymore. The new Delilah felt proud of her giant body, and immediately began imagining all the things she could do with it. She’d imagined and drawn so many fat, giant characters in so many situations. Now she could start living them!
1433332222222222232222222221112121122.title: Be rebellious! Eat, expand, and grow!

14333322222222222322222222211121212.content:
Delilah was looking anxious with these choices, which her hunger ended up whether should she do the right thing and give it to Ethan, or be selfish and take an apple without a big bully know what’s going on? Clearly, it’s more like a no win situation than anything else, since the last thing she would be worrying about is the fate Ethan can choose with that growing girth of his.

Of course she would like to make him a monstrous boy, but at the same time, she isn’t sure if she was ready to face the reality. Regardless, she wouldn’t want to keep a big, fat bully waiting, so her choice to see this, is give all of them to Ethan, and see what happens to him when it consumes.

Around the corner of the hallway, Delilah see’s Ethan standing at the same place as he was before, which made her sigh of relief that he didn’t left to rampage some more food along the way. She let out a huge sigh, before she brought forward and letting Ethan see by bringing an apple and food to fill up some appetite.

“Oh finally! I don’t know what took you so long, but I’m glad you brought me a lot of food to eat. I’m starving!” Ethan says with his belly gurgling hard, so much as he would rub it to calm it down again.

Again, no response from Delilah, when she starts insert the formula into the food and the apple straight away. Then, she gives it to Ethan and takes a step back to watch him stuff a lot of food in, unaware from these unexpected result, which Delilah is yet to find out in some fate. His grin smiles says it all, as he appears to enjoy a lot of it, hoping to be the biggest, and baddest bully there is, and he let out a loud belch and pats his blubber belly in satisfaction.

“Hmm... That tastes so good! I think I can feel myself getting bigger any minute now, right slave?” That sinister smile from Ethan’s face makes him wonder when staring right at Delilah to make her respond.

Though she was about to, until she knew the formula is starting to kick in, just by seeing Ethan started to get bigger...
14333322222222222322222222211121212.title: Be obedient, bring food back to the master!

1433332222222222232222222221112122.content:
Two memories flooded back to Delilah and helped her decide.

The first was of the class pet in her elementary school. It had been a ball python. For years she had no idea what it ate, since they would always feed the snake after school, but one day she had stayed to help the teacher and she saw the custodian feed the python. Mice! The python ate mice! Alive, too! She watched in horror and fascination (or was it just fascination?) as the snake swallowed the kicking feet of the mouse. She could swear she saw the mouse's outline moving as it slid down the snake's body. It gave her the chills anytime she thought about that, and she found herself thinking about it often.

The second memory came from more cartoons. First, the memory was sparked by that cartoon starring the fat, orange cat. In the episode where the cat ate and grew huge, there was a part where a newscaster said the cat ate the film crew. They didn't show the cat eat the people, but (much to her private shame) Delilah had drawn what it might have looked like. She based it in part on other cartoons, like the one where a different cat is always trying to catch a mouse. In a few episodes, that cat swallows the mouse in a big, cartoon-y gulp. Then the mouse would land in his belly, and the belly would swell into a round shape. She liked that part.

In her frantic need to find him some sort of unusual food, these two memories came to her in a flash, and she made up her mind. Delilah juggled the many lunch boxes she had stolen, and reached into the guinea pig's cage. She easily grabbed Fuzzy, and she stuck him in one of the lunch boxes so he would be easier to carry.

"If you get hungry," she whispered to Fuzzy, "you can eat some of the food in there."

Delilah worried that she would get in trouble if people noticed that Fuzzy and the lunchboxes were missing, but she was more afraid of what Ethan might do to her if she didn't bring him food at all. And Ethan couldn't deny that Fuzzy would be a "different" sort of food, and Delilah admitted to herself that she, for one, thought Fuzzy would be an "interesting" bit of food for Ethan to try.

So Delilah left the classroom and scampered off to the cafeteria. She wasn't sure Ethan would still be there until she heard a belch echo down the hall. When she entered the spacious cafeteria, her eyes grew wide. There was Ethan, sitting on one of the tables and stuffing with mouth with a handful of breakfast burritos. And he was bigger: she wasn't sure how much bigger, but she guessed he had passed 7 feet tall. Ethan gulped down the burritos and looked over a Delilah.

"Ah, my servant returns!" Ethan stood up and walked over to her. Delilah found herself mesmerized by his gut; it was now more exposed and it jiggled as he got to his feet. "What did you bring to help me keep growing?"

Delilah couldn't speak, but she laid out the stolen lunchboxes. She opened them one by one to show Ethan what was inside. He seemed pleased. Delilah saved the lunchbox with Fuzzy in it for last. Nervously, she opened the velcro flap and held the lunchbox up so the towering Ethan could see inside.

Ethan, who had been salivating at the sight of the rest of the food, saw Fuzzy and...
1433332222222222232222222221112122.title: Goodbye to Fuzzy.

choices: Throw caution to the wind, let this boy grow!
Sneak a bite, or two, for herself.
14333322222222222322222222211121223.content:
For a moment, Ethan was confused by being presented with a guinea pig. He looked at the nervous, bespectacled girl, and for the first time he noticed a hint of excitement in her. In truth, Delilah didn't even realize she was excited by this idea, but Ethan was beginning to share Delilah's excitement. Although he had said it absentmindedly, Ethan now remembered his demand for something "different" and "interesting." This certainly qualified.

He was also reminded of how, years ago, he had told one of his victims that she should be glad she wasn't being stuffed in his belly. Of course he didn't mean the threat seriously, but presented with something live that he was pretty sure he could swallow, Ethan realized he actually quite liked the idea. His stomach growled in agreement, and it was loud enough of that Delilah could hear it.

Not even bothering to speak to his dutiful servant, Ethan grabbed Fuzzy and brought it up to his face. He breathed in the smell, which was gamey, but unmistakably alive. Ethan pictured a living thing being imprisoned in his massive belly, struggling to find a way to escape. If he was a less cruel person, he would have some pity on the creature, but instead he was only disappointed that it was a class pet and not a classmate. It struck him that if he was growing as he ate, a classmate might not be out of the question in the near future. That realization was the last push Ethan needed, and he stuffed Fuzzy into his mouth.

The guinea pig was quite a mouthful, but at his now larger size, it wasn't too much bigger than the apple he had swallowed whole. Fuzzy struggled, but as Ethan's saliva coated the rodent, Fuzzy began to slide around Ethan's mouth. He threw his head back and the saliva-slick guinea pig hit the back of his throat and he swallowed. The guinea pig immediately got stuck, and Ethan needed to give a series of forceful swallows.

When that couldn't finish the job, he frantically grabbed a soda out of one of the lunch boxes and guzzled it down. The wave of soda washed the guinea pig fully into his stomach. He felt a plop that was far stronger than the apple had been. Ethan froze for a moment, wanting to relish his first time. He was electrified with excitement as he felt Fuzzy begin to wiggle around. His food was fighting back for the first time, and his glorious, growing body was going to dominate this creature to the greatest degree imaginable.

For Delilah, the sight of the wiggling lump in Ethan's throat eclipsed anything she'd seen in cartoons or from the ball python. She shivered as she watched it descend into his bulbous belly. In a daze, she moved forward and put a hand on his stomach - voluntarily this time - without being conscious of the desire to do it. As she felt a bulge shift under her hand, and as she watched the vibrations of Fuzzy's scampering ripple throughout his belly, she snapped back to her senses. This hulking bully had just consumed a creature alive, and Ethan seemed overjoyed about that fact. She had let it happen. More than that, it happened because of her!

As Ethan turned and began eating the rest of the food, covering Fuzzy in a rain of student lunches. Ethan's mind was already swirling with all the things he could do if hid body got even bigger, and he was stuffing himself so he could reach new heights as fast as possible.

In the wake of all of this, Delilah decides to....
14333322222222222322222222211121223.title: Is confused.

143333222222222223222222222111212231.content:
Ethan shoveled all of the food he could into his mouth, swallowing mouthful after mouthful in large chunks. Although it hurt his throat to have it bulge out so much, he was getting more used to the sensation. It was completely worth the pain to feel his belly swell further and further out. By the time he finished all of the student's lunches, which had been more than enough food for 9 individual teens, his belly was back to being a hard, stuffed orb, despite his growth spurts creating more space that needed filling. For the moment, he was once again full.

But the most important, exciting, delicious detail was that something in his belly was moving and struggling. It was, to some degree, aware of its grisly fate trapped inside the belly of an arrogant, voracious bully. Ethan held in his burp for a few more minutes: he didn't want to rob the guinea pig of its air just yet. That would have ended Fuzzy's struggles, and Ethan was still thoroughly enjoying the idea of a creature futilely searching for freedom that would never come.

Instead, it would become part of him as he grew to greater and greater proportions. Like his other bullying, he didn't swallow the creature because he needed to: he wasn't doing it to satisfy a legitimate hunger. No, Ethan swallowed it because he was bigger, stronger, and more important than the puny class pet. He needed to put the creature in its place, and he had an insatiable desire to be bigger and consume even more things and creatures.

Ethan sat and felt his new belly, stroking, and poking, and prodding. He was digging for any sign of the creature trapped within, and then relishing in it when he found it. The swelling in his crotch had moved beyond a mere strain on his fly. It was now a full bulge. Fuzzy wasn't really the creature that needed to be put in its place. Sure, anything below him on the food chain rightfully belonged under his control - and in his belly, if he wished it. What really made his manhood swell was the knowledge that he was going to keep getting bigger, and then he would be able to fit larger things down his throat and into his belly. This was only the beginning. So many other creatures and people would be put in their rightful place beneath him, or inside of him.

Meanwhile, Delilah watched the massive boy - not yet quite a giant - revel in his larger girth. Particularly since his pants barely contained his body, she could even see the hardened form in his crotch, even if she had only just begun to have the faintest idea what it was. She knew she should be horrified. She knew she should run from this monster. Every ounce of rational thought told her so. Instead, she felt glued to the spot. But after years of drawings, years of funny feelings, and all the impossibly bizarre and exciting events of today, she knew she was deluding herself.

Delilah loved this. It was terrifying and exhilarating, like leaning over the edge of a cliff. She was fascinated by massive bellies, gluttonous eating, and people growing to massive sizes. Now the very embodiment of those concepts sat before her, and he was clearly enjoying those very ideas himself. Delilah always tried to be such a good girl, tried to please everyone, and tried not to get in anyone's way. It was hard for her to admit that she wanted to willingly go along with something so obscenely at odds with rational, obedient behavior, but she craved it.

The dark, shameful part of her mind that enjoyed watching the ball python get fed was on fire with the knowledge that Ethan has swallowed a live creature due to her guidance, and that he clearly loved having swallowed it. She knew that if she didn't stop him - and if she didn't stop herself - he was going to swallow more and she was going to be there when it happened.

Being honest within her own mind was a relief, but the demand for rational behavior was not easy to silence. For now, her acceptance of Ethan's monstrous eating and her own monstrous feeding meant only that she did not leave his side.

As Ethan rose at last…
143333222222222223222222222111212231.title: Throw caution to the wind, let this boy grow!

1433332222222222232222222221112122311.content:
Ethan made it only a couple steps before his belly began to grumble violently. Ethan had come to recognize that particular sensation and grinned with pleasure and pride as the next round of growth hit him. His body shot upward and strained against his clothes. This time, his pants stretched past their limit and tore down the seams, sliding off of him in two nearly separated chunks. His shirt and his underwear were more flexible, and stayed on him for the moment, but they were beginning to reach their limits. His shirt now slid up and fully exposed his round and expanding stomach. That bigger belly sagged over his underwear, stopping short of fully hiding the stretched white material.

His most recent growth spurt brought him all the way up to eight and a half feet. He still had about a foot and a half before his head would hit the ceiling, but he now stood taller than all of the school's doors. Perhaps more problematically, his widened body was wider than the doors. He figured he could squeeze himself through them if he had to, but that wouldn't be realistic for much longer, at the rate he was eating and growing.

His belly once again felt emptier now that its capacity had expanded, and Ethan was eager to change that. There was no question what food he wanted to fill it with, but he wasn't sure it was possible yet. Still, he had to know. Looking at his forearms, he figured one of them would be comparable to another kid's legs now that his forearms had expanded. He stopped a moment to try. Having the impressive swallowing abilities that he did, he could get his hand into his throat, but not his forearm. While Ethan was disappointed, he knew how to solve that problem.

Just then, he felt someone bump into him. It was, of course, his loyal servant. She was looking shyly at the ground, but clearly had no plans of running away. She had picked up his shredded pants, clearly having been concerned about leaving behind evidence of his growth. He smirked; it was wonderful that one person in this school knew her place. He thought for a minute that she might be the one who deserved the honor of going into his belly first. Who knows, she might even enjoy it. Still, he wasn't sure he wanted to sacrifice such a dutiful worshipper. Either way, his test had just shown him that he didn't need to make the decision yet.

He opened his mouth to speak a new command when he heard the bell ring, signaling the end of first period. In a couple seconds, the halls would be swarming with students. As much as he wanted to subjugate (not to mention ingurgitate) everyone and everything in front of him, he knew it wasn't possible yet. He couldn't let them stop him in his rise to glory. It hurt his pride to do it, but Ethan knew he had to hide.

Ethan had to choose the nearest hiding spot: the boys' bathroom. Without thinking, he snatched up Delilah by her collar and dragged her with him. It was a tight fit through the door, but he forced himself forward with determination. He ducked into the more spacious handicapped stall and curled up on the toilet a little so his feet and head wouldn't show. The only way to reasonably hide Delilah, too, was to hoist her up and pin her against his belly.

When there was so little time for passing period, there was a nearly constant stream of boys coming in and out. Ethan could see them through the crack of the bathroom stall as they washed their hands. He was (somewhat) surprised to realize he was salivating as he watched them. They all seemed so puny, so vulnerable. He longed to burst out of the stall and grab them, overpower them, sit on them, pin them against the wall with his enormous belly, and slurp them down one by one.

Delilah's face was red as she felt herself sink into his squishy middle. Deep in his belly, she could still feel Fuzzy scampering around, now with more room to move. She felt Ethan's throat ripple against the back of her head as he swallowed the excess saliva. And her knees became weak as she felt his stomach growl and rumble while Ethan watched the boys hungrily. She had seen how much he enjoyed swallowing Fuzzy, and she knew he loved to bully other kids, but this was the first time she truly realized he wanted to swallow her peers. Had she guess it sooner? Had she wanted that to be true? Did she want to see it happen - help it happen? She wasn't sure, or at least she wouldn't let herself be sure.

The one-minute warning bell ran and the boys began to filter out. Both Ethan and Delilah watched them go with relief and slight, unfulfilled longing. Once the final bell rang and the hallways became silent, Ethan made his way back into the hallways, again forcing his way through the now-too-narrow door.

They had about an hour before the next class would let out, and Ethan fully intended to be big enough to pick at least a few students from the rushing crowd during the next passing period. He had to work fast. He also didn't want to leave behind any evidence until he knew he couldn't be stopped. He snatched up the torn jeans that Delilah had wisely retrieved. Without thinking, and eager to grow as big as possible, he stuffed them into his mouth and gulped them down. The jeans didn't taste good, and they scratched up his throat as they went down, but he was determined to grow bigger. Also, he had no plans of stripping his future victims, so whether it tasted bad or not, he knew he needed to get used to swallowing clothes.

Next, it was time to find more food and work his way up to a human-devouring size.
