Ethan knew exactly where he needed to go if he wanted a large supply of food in a short amount of time. There were still a few periods before lunch, but the cooks were already hard at work preparing it. Ethan had managed to sneak into the kitchen and steal discarded breakfast food before, but that was only a handful of food compared to the large quantities they were preparing for lunch. But there was one problem: four different cooks worked in the kitchen. There was no way he could steal all the food while they were in there, and he wanted all of it.

That's where Delilah came in. If she created enough of a distraction, and if he worked fast, he could eat everything they were preparing. Maybe even some of the unprepared food, too. He turned to her. His massive belly was now level with her eyes, and it was now almost three times as wide as she was.

"Alright, servant," Ethan said. "Here's the plan. Whether you want to or not, you're going to help me fill this big belly of mine and help me keep growing." Ethan patted his gut for emphasis. "I'm going to raid the kitchen over there, and I need you to distract the cooks."

Delilah couldn't help but nod. Ethan hadn't asked her if she was willing to undertake this task. It wasn't about what she wanted anymore. No more decision making, no more second guessing herself. All she had to do was obey. It felt wrong, and she felt ashamed, but it was also a relief.

"I need you to look scared and lost," Ethan continued. "You're going to pretend you don't know where your next class is. But the important part is that you need to act so scared that you need all four of them to help you. If that doesn't work, I'll have to use force." Ethan grinned, enjoying the idea a little too much. It would be simpler if Delilah drew them away from the kitchen, but Ethan was also eager to bully someone with his new body.

Again, not waiting for Delilah consent, Ethan headed off towards the cafeteria again. Ethan took some pleasure in the need to duck below the doorframes. Thankfully, the doorways in the hall were double wide, and he didn't get stuck. Once they got close to the cafeteria, Ethan sent Delilah on ahead while he waited just out of view in a pod of lockers.

The plan...

143333222222222223222222222111212231111.content:
Ethan grinned and his belly bubbled with excitement as he watched all four cooks walk away with the crying Delilah. Ethan was impressed by her commitment and acting abilities. She was a valuable servant indeed. Once they were all out of sight, Ethan waddled toward the kitchen and salivated at what he saw. Tray after tray was already laid out in the lunch line, and he saw more food being cooked. There were also shelves and shelves of food for future days.

His stomach roared, as if it was a predator declaring its supremacy over its prey. He lunged forward and began hastily devouring everything in front of him. He didn't know how much time he'd have before the cooks came back, so he had to work fast. He ate with the singular goal of being big enough to swallow his peers by the time the next passing period began.

First, he pulled out a hot tray of chili and chugged it down, not stopping to even catch his breath until the last of the meat and beans disappeared down his throat. Next was the cheese for topping the chili. That was harder to swallow quickly, but scooping with both hands helped it join the chili in his belly in good time. Ethan moved to the meatloaf, which was already cut into slices.

Rapidly grabbing a slice in each hand, he swallowed entire slices whole, one at a time, until it was all gone. Over the next five minutes, he cleaned out tray after tray of food in the lunch line. He even ate the healthy stuff he would usually avoid. Ethan always preferred sweet, salty, and meaty things over anything healthy, but he wouldn't pass up more sources of food to help him grow. After those five minutes, there was nothing left in the lunch line, so Ethan turned his attention to the kitchen.

In the kitchen, Ethan found bowls of nearly finished macaroni and cheese, two giant pots of mashed potatoes, a pot of gravy, and three pizzas. Since he was only interested in gluttony, and not flavor, he quickly grabbed all of the macaroni, potatoes, and gravy, and mixed them all together to slurp down. He then rolled up the pizzas and stuffed them down his throat - whole - one by one. His face and chin were covered with grease, chili, and gravy, but that didn't matter to him.

Ethan turned to the shelves and freezers of food, but his stomach had reached its limits. With perfect timing (as if it was cooperating with his mission) Ethan felt his body begin to vibrate and swell. He didn't stop to appreciate or even estimate his new size. He was still focused on eating as much as he could as fast as he could.

From the shelves, Ethan grabbed entire loaves of bread to stuff in his mouth, barely chewing to get them down. He tore into boxes of cereal, drank down can after can of soups and instant meals, and even guzzled down canned vegetables and condiments. As he dug through the pantry, he discovered a family of mice that had nested in the pantry. Using his flabby arms, he trapped them, and swallowed them all. The mice had grown fat on stolen school food, and Ethan could distinctly feel the 8 rodents wiggling about inside him. Unlike with Fuzzy, he didn't take the time to savor the feelings. He could enjoy struggling food later. For now he had to eat and grow.

As Ethan moved to the refrigerators, he felt another wave of growth ripple through his body, further expanding his belly's capacity and rapidly digesting what was already inside. In the fridge he found 24 packages of hotdogs, which he swallowed hotdogs half a dozen at a time. He devoured hamburger patties, chicken nuggets, breakfast sausages, and more. He washed it all down with cartons of milk that he mostly swallowed whole, bursting a few with his teeth to speed up the process. Ethan's furious eating quickly emptied out all of the refrigerators.

The last thing he spotted in fridge was a couple gallons of milk. Looking at them, he got a strange idea. It was a rough estimate, but he figured two gallons side-by-side would be similar to the width of the shoulders of a shrimpy student. Time for the second test. Putting the two together, he stuffed them into his mouth. The plastic didn't taste or feel good, but thanks to his new size he was able to force them to the back of his mouth and into his throat. After several forceful swallows, they slowly moved down Ethan's throat, creating oddly shaped bulges in his chubby neck. He felt them slide into his stomach and land on top of the pile of food that stretched his stomach to the limit. Running his hands over his belly, Ethan could easily feel and see the odd lumps of the gallons of milk.

Finally, all of the eating paid off as he was hit by the last wave of growth the kitchen food was going to give him. He belched as his body was stretched and expanded. Ethan felt his head touch the 10-foot ceiling of the kitchen and he began to laugh. He now had to bend over very slightly to fit in the room. He figured he now stood about 11 feet tall. His shirt tore and he used it to wipe his face before tossing it to the ground. Ethan's maniacal chuckle jiggled his insatiable globe of a stomach. If he could handle the two gallons of milk before his most recent growth, he was now sure he could fit someone down his throat. That realization sent shivers of joy down his spine. His overtaxed underwear struggled to contain the swelling excitement there. A gurgling grumble from his gut seemed to echo his laughter. He stroked his belly salaciously as he began to imagine all the new possibilities.

Until an hour ago, Ethan didn't even know he wanted to swallow someone. Now he realized it had been a fantasy of his for years, ever since he fully embraced his gluttony and his nature as a bully. He had always been bigger than all his puny victims, and their needs were completely insignificant compared to his desires. Even when he didn't want whatever his victims had - food, money, toys - it pleased him simply to take it away from them. His great mass had been a wonderful tool for overpowering and trapping the people he picked on. Now he could take away so much from them, trap them in a supremely dominating way, and satisfy his hunger for both power and food all at the same time.

Ethan couldn't wait until the bell rang and he could finally live out his long buried fantasy.

1433332222222222232222222221112122311112.content:
Ethan hobbled his enormous frame towards the outside. Although he had a tight squeeze as he tried to escape, he managed to get out without a hitch and without damaging the school. Although he wanted to make a rampage sooner than later, he figured it would be best to have a little fun before making his mark...

As he waddled outside, he could see a small gazebo with three small students hanging around it. He looked down to see Delilah, as she had noticed them too, then looked back up at Ethan, whose mouth was watering as he began to think of how it would be to eat a whole person. And Delilah began to think of the same idea too. Part of it scared her, but mostly it excited her.

"Alright wimp," Ethan whispered as he hunched down to her level, "Here's the plan: I want you to get one of them and have them come to me. Make up some sort of excuse; teacher in need of help, someone in need of the Heimlich maneuver, whatever you can. Just get one of them over here and I'll give you a show you'll never forget..."

Ethan patted his gigantic belly with pride as it began to growl with hunger again. The thought of eating a person built up his appetite again. And all Delilah could do was smile at the idea. Without another word, she dashed off towards the gazebo.

As she was off, Ethan began to rub his belly again, feeling how large and jiggly it was. It was amazing how he was able to eat so much and was even more incredible with what he was able to eat. Between the class guinea pig and some supplies from the cafeteria, all this did was excite him and fuel him to eat and grow more. This also brought in a few feeling of arousal to him...

His thoughts are interrupted when he felt a big smack upside his belly, as one of the kids from the gazebo bumped into his large belly. He looked down to see a small blonde haired kid, slightly dazed from the impact. But before the boy could do anything, Ethan grabbed him by his legs and hoisted him up in the air. The boy looked at his mouth opening up large enough to swallow him. But before he could even scream, Ethan placed him head first into his mouth, then heaved up to slurp him up and swallow him whole. The taste was different, but in a good way...

Delilah looked at this with sheer amazement and tremendous excitement, as she could see the boy's legs squirm from outside Ethan's mouth, then quickly slid inside his mouth. Then she stared at him with saucer eyes as Ethan made a tremendous GULP and saw the boy's figure slide down his fat neck, then could hear a faint splash inside his belly.

She rushed to his belly and could hear faint screams and poundings from inside, as the boy was screaming for help and was trying to get out. Ethan felt the poundings inside his belly, but it only tickled him. But before he could do anything else, the other two boys were walking in to see Ethan's massive size. Ethan looked at them in surprise, then began to smile a large wicked grin.

The two boys were about to run away, but were suddenly caught by Ethan's large fatty hands. To him they looked like action figures, only they were alive and very weak. And he brought the two of them close to his mouth...

The boys flailed their arms and legs as much as they could to escape, but they were too late. Ethan put both of them into his mouth. Their hands were peeking out of his lips, but he just sloshed them around inside his mouth and swallowed the two as hard as he could. Their figures appeared in a larger lump on his fat neck and both dropped down into his gut.

From inside, three boys were pounding and screaming for help, as they were in the belly of a bully. A bully who was more of a beast. And just a few feet away from them lies the skeletal remains of a guinea pig, who hardly survived the beast's gluttonous rampage and frequent digestions.

1433332222222222232222222221112122311112.content:
Ethan couldn't contain his excitement as his ran his hands across his bulging, lumpy, wriggling stomach. He had never been so stuffed in his entire life. His belly was stretched so far that it hurt, and each punch or kick from within gave more small waves of pain. His stomach was so massive that he couldn't reach his arms around it. And yet every moment and every minute sensation was worth every bit of the pain to be able to watch the moving forms of his classmates inside their fleshy prison.

He had finally done it.

Three of his peers were not being overpowered by his hands, not squished under his butt, not pinned against the wall by his stomach. They were trapped inside him and desperate to escape before his body went on its natural course and began digesting them. It was so delicious. He made sure to keep swallowing air and hold in his burps, so he could savor this wonderful achievement for as long as possible.

Research on bullying has pointed to a variety of reasons kids bully each other. The reasons include a desire to be noticed, a need to be adored or respected, a means to improve their self-esteem, a need to have power over other people, and a need to reinforce a big ego. Add a love of eating and food-fueled growth and you have an unstoppable monster.

All of these drives were satisfied to an obscene degree as Ethan stroked over the struggling, terrified lumps in his belly. He was being adored by his dutiful servant and worshiper, who had helped make this achievement possible. His ego and self-esteem were enlarged by the knowledge of the power he now held over these three lives. They desperately wanted to escape, wanted to live, and he had the power to grant them that wish. Their lives were in his hands - or, rather, his belly.

He could save them, and he wasn't going to. The three kids were now exactly where they belonged: at his complete mercy and being used to satisfy his desires. He would break them down to nothing but fuel for his growth and fat for his body. Then, as the last act of domination, he would shit them out, leaving them as a literal embodiment of their status in comparison to him. That's all their lives amounted to, all everyone's lives amounted to compared to him. Just morsels for him to consume, enjoy, digest, and discard.

As much as his stomach hurt, this was the greatest pleasure he had ever experienced. The lascivious satisfaction of his hunger and his lust sent jerking waves of pleasure through his body and his eyes rolled. He moaned. He had recently begun experimenting with masturbation, so he recognized this feeling for what it was. Despite the shivering ecstasy that momentarily took over all of his body's consciousness, his hands never stopped stroking over the fearful shapes wiggling in his gut.

Delilah, like Ethan, had just satisfied a fantasy that she, too, didn't know she had harbored before this day. And here it was before her, terribly real and immensely powerful. It was incredible to watch the students be reduced to moving morsels consumed by the swelling bully. Delilah looked up at Ethan as he shook in pleasure. The stories Delilah read as a guilty pleasure helped her understand what Ethan's rapture was.

Ethan's underwear finally snapped and every part of his body was revealed in the throes of his orgasm. Delilah's face became completely red as the sight inflamed the funny feelings Ethan usually gave her (which were already peaking after watching him carry out both their recently discovered fantasies). Delilah's own body shivered and her eyes rolled, though her ecstasy was less extreme than Ethan's and the waves passed over her silently.

She helped rub his belly, which more than covered his manhood from view. "Did it feel good?" she asked quietly, "when you ate them?"

That was the most Delilah had ever said to Ethan. He smirked down at her, poking and prodding his belly. "It was the greatest feeling in the world. Did you enjoy helping me? Did you enjoy watching me do it?"

She nodded silently.

"Speak up. I give you permission to speak. I want to hear you say it."

"Yes, Ethan," she all but whispered. "I loved it."

"Good. Because I'm going to eat more and more." He turned to look at the school and spoke in a somewhat lowered voice. "I'm going to eat them all."

Delilah followed his gaze and shivers tingled down her spine as she imagined it.

As he stood up, Ethan at last let out a tremendous belch, somewhat deflating his gut and fully revealing the detailed forms of those within. Their flailing intensified as their air slipped out and Ethan's digestion accelerated and his expansion began. And what an expansion it was. Ethan's face broke into an uncharacteristic expression of child-like wonder as his body ballooned upward and outward. His head burst through the roof of the gazebo, which fell broke in half and fell to either side of him. His belly extended out another foot, and he guess his height increased to about 16 feet. His belly was now more than 6 and a half feet in diameter, having shrunk and the food within was broken down.

He was disappointed that he no longer felt his prey moving. He had never wanted it to end. However, he licked his lips as he marched towards the school, realizing that it was still filled with so many people. The joyous wouldn't have to end for long.

Delilah, once again too shy to speak, took Ethan's massive hand and began to lead him to the back of the school where the backstage auditorium doors were big enough for him to fit through. She made a shushing gesture to him and ran around to go back inside the building. She snuck through the halls to reach the auditorium. First, she needed to see if anyone was in there. Second, she needed to open the doors to let him in.

Her service to Ethan went ever onward.

1433332222222222232222222221112122311112.content:
Connor took the bathroom pass and stealthily grabbed his spacious lunchbox on his way out. As he walked the halls and searched for a place he could be alone, he heard commotion from a few rooms he passed. He didn't stop to listen, but it sounded like people were scared or worried about something. It sounded like something went wrong in the lunch room. Talk of food just hastened Connor in his search.

Connor passed the darkened auditorium and found it empty, so he slipped inside. Moving up to the foot of the stage, he arrayed his food in front of him. The large lunchbox was stuffed with enough food to feed two people for a full day. Connor packed his own "lunches" every day because his parents were mostly absent in his life. The only affection they gave him was buying him copious amounts of food, no questions asked. Connor suffered from anxiety, and his only method of coping was to binge. Even before this habit started, he had been a chubby kid. Now he was morbidly obese after a couple years of rapid weight gain.

Connor had just been in math class - his weakest subject - and the teacher had told them about the high-stakes tests they needed to prepare for for the year. That had triggered Connor's anxiety and driven him to sneak away and binge. He wasn't hungry, but he was going to stuff himself beyond reason in an attempt to cope. He had too much food to sit in a chair, so Connor simply sat on the floor to lay out his food. He had packed a thermos full of soup, two PB&J sandwiches, a large bag filled with goldfish crackers, a full package of Oreos, a handful of tatter tots, a tuperware filled with spaghetti and meatballs, a personal pizza, and a 2 liter bottle of soda to wash it all down. Connor's adrenaline began to ease as he started eating.

He was so focused on eating that he didn't see Delilah come in. She saw his immense supply of food (not to mention his cubby body) and she knew they'd found a good place to begin. Looking at all that food made Delilah hungry too, but she didn't want to get on Ethan's bad side.

Delilah snuck past Connor, making sure to stick to the opposite side of the dim auditorium. She slipped onto the stage and behind the curtains to the back door. As quietly as she could, she unlocked the double doors and slowly opened them. Outside, she saw the tower Ethan in all his globular glory. She made a shushing gesture and waved him to come in. Ethan smiled and followed her direction. He squeezed through the double doors and entered onto the stage. He was still hidden by the curtain, but Ethan was heavy enough that he made a distinct creaking sound as he entered onto the wooden stage. Between that and the light from outside, he figured the time for secrecy was over, and he charged into the auditorium.

His expanded body helped him take quick strides into the auditorium where he stopped at the edge of the stage. The stage was four feet from the ground, and that helped Ethan soar to an apparent height of 20 feet as he towered over Connor.

Connor heard creaking and what sounded like heavy things falling on the stage, coming his direction. He looked up, startled, and beheld the largest person he'd ever seen. The boy was unbelievably huge - impossibly huge! As fat as Connor was, it looked like the boy's belly was so big two of him could fit in there. The giant boy cast a long, round shadow over Connor, but he could barely make out that the giant was wearing no clothes. That made Connor blush. Other than the blood running to his cheeks, he was frozen in place mid bite. For a moment, the only sound in the large auditorium was a gurgling, glorping sound from the belly that loomed over Connor's head.

"So," said a voice from somewhere beyond the belly, "you brought me a selection of food. How thoughtful of you."

With a mighty thump, the giant sat on the edge of the stage.

"How about you bring those gifts up here and give them to me personally?" He paused a moment. "Slave!" he called in the other direction, "help him give his gifts to me."

Connor saw a petite girl with dark hair and glasses move around from the other side of the giant. Without saying anything, she started scooping up Connor's food. Connor, terrified of this giant, started hurriedly doing the same. He walked up the stairs on the side of the stage with the girl in front of him. Connor could smell the collection of food in his hands, and as he took in the smell he heard small gurgles coming from the girl in front of him. It seemed seeing all this food made her hungry, too.

Once he'd mounted the stairs, Connor finally could see the entire form of the giant. He was massive in every way, and even his size aside, there was something scary about the look on the boy's face as he made eye contact with Connor.

"Like what you see?" the giant asked as he played with his belly, lifting it and dropping it a couple times. "My name's Ethan, and this school belongs to me. So everything you have is mine, too. Now it's almost lunch, so I'm hungry. Why don't you come and feed me?"

Ethan lay back and opened his mouth as Connor and Delilah approached. Delilah stood on Ethan's left while Connor stood on his right.

"Delilah, you begin and show this new servant how it's done."

Delilah smiled: partially due to her excitement for Ethan eating and growing more, and partially because this was the first time he had called her by name. She knew just how much Ethan could eat, so she didn't hesitate. Delilah started by unscrewing the lid to the thermos and pours its contents into Ethan's gaping mouth. She watched with glee as he swallowed it open-mouthed; she could see it get sucked down the dark passage of his throat in waves. His throat rippled and his belly shook as he chugged it down. Delilah felt funny as she thought about what the soup was splashing down on top in his belly.

Connor watched with wide-eyed terror as the soup disappeared in an instant. Once Ethan was done, the girl's belly growled again. Ethan turned to her and said, "You have served me well, so I'll give you a tiny scrap of this feast. You may eat some food of your choosing."

Delilah was taken aback by this. For the first time she felt the tiniest hint that Ethan might care about her if he'd give up some of the growth-fueling food. For a moment, she imagined goring on the food herself, like Ethan does, feeling her belly swell out and out and it was packed with food. The thought was gone as fast as it came, and she grabbed one of the sandwiches and reservedly ate it.

"And you," Ethan said to Connor, "you feed me until the food is gone. The last students who helped me learned just how much food it takes to fill my belly." He patted his belly and chuckled. He laughed more than Connor could understand, like someone with an inside joke.

Connor did as he was told and began feeding every bit of his food into Ethan's massive mouth. He started with the ziploc back of goldfish, which he poured straight into Ethan's mouth. Connor was surprised to see Ethan gulp them all down whole, not unlike how he had swallowed the soup.

Ethan burped once they were all gone. "Too bad those were just crackers," Ethan said, half directed at Delilah. "I just love feeling things struggle in my belly." The last comment was clearly directed at Connor. Remembering his immediate thought that Ethan's belly looked big enough to fit two kids Connor's inside it made his shiver.

With both hands Connor started scooping food up and dropping it in Ethan's mouth. Ethan didn't stop to chew anything. He didn't even close his mouth. He just kept swallowing anything they put inside him. Before long Delilah had returned to help.

Watching Ethan guzzle down all this food actually cracked through Connor's terror, and he began to marvel at it. It was an impressive feat. Connor thought he was able to eat a lot, but his skills were nothing compared to Ethan's. Thinking about it made Connor genuinely hungry now, instead of simply bring driven to binge out of anxiety. He wished he had eaten more before Ethan came in, because he dared not try and to keep anything for himself now.

However, Connor's awe had just begun. As they fed Ethan the last of the food, the giant's body began to quiver and his belly roared. That's when Connor got his second unbelievably sight of the day: Ethan's body actually stretched and grew! It wasn't a massive change, but Connor couldn't deny what he just saw. It seemed like the giant was now a foot or so taller. It was silly to think that a moment earlier he had envied Ethan's eating abilities. Well, he still was envious of that, but that feat was nothing compared to the ability to grow bigger!

Ethan moaned blissfully and played with his belly. Connor's awkward feelings increased when he saw Ethan's hardness pressing up into his massive stomach. Delilah, too, felt awkward at seeing the sight, but perhaps (or perhaps not?) in a different way than Connor.

"You both did well, but I'm still hungry. I told you to keep feeding me until all the food was gone. And I'm looking at one more morsel right here. You wanna know the food that fills me up best, Connor?" Ethan looked at him with half-lidded eyes over a mocking smirk, "people."

Ethan laid back again and opened his mouth.

1433332222222222232222222221112122311112.content:
Delilah took advantage of Connor’s momentary confusion to grab the fat kid and push him towards Ethan’s mouth. Conveniently, this caused Connor to trip and tumble face-first into Ethan’s waiting mouth. The bully immediately sealed his lips around Connors neck and began tasting him. Ethan wanted to savor this morsel more than the last three, which he had gulped down rapidly out of sheer excitement. Delilah’s face broke into a giddy smile as she watched Ethan’s lips seal around Connor. The bully began to slurp Connor further in, and Delilah eagerly tried to help by pushing more of Connor’s body into Ethan’s inescapable lips. Delilah had seen Ethan’s god-like power to turn her peers into stimuli for his miraculous growth. As his most dutiful worshipper, it was only right that she personally deliver her sacrifice unto him. For Connor, this experience was much less enjoyable than it was for the other two students. His head and then his shoulders were squeezed into the constricting tube of Ethan’s throat. Delilah kept feeding Ethan, and Ethan kept sucking Connor in. Seeing it all right in front of her face made her wonder what it felt like to be in Connor’s place. Or, maybe more enticing, to be in Ethan’s. On rare occasion she had drawn herself as one of the giant, fat characters, but that always seemed so impossible; how could someone as meek and uncertain as her be that powerful and assertive? Well, at least she got to see Ethan do what she could not.

Delilah could see Ethan’s tongue vigorously working Connor over as he slid in, even occasionally having part of his tongue peak out. She also saw how much he was salivating. Connor must taste good. As Delilah shoved the last of Connor into Ethan’s mouth, she and Ethan locked eyes while he slowly closed his lips around Connor’s shoes. Ethan smiled, and Delilah smiled back (if a little less sadistically). As Ethan prepared for the last swallow, he gestured to Delilah and rolled his head back. His neck was now particularly prominent and Delilah could see a distinctly Connor-shaped lump divided between Ethan’s neck and his belly. Ethan pointed at his throat and gave a might gulp. Then Delilah’s excitement and pleasure reached an explosive peak while she watched Connor slither down Ethan’s throat and plop, at last, into his swollen gut.

Connor felt the last wave of constriction force him down into the belly of the bully. His legs slid through the stomach’s sphincter and it closed behind him. Then his entire body was contained in the fleshy sack. The stomach was still bigger than he was, but the stomach walls shifted and pressed against him at irregular times. It took him a little bit to realize that it was because Ethan’s was massaging his Connor-filled belly. When he realized that, he let out a hopeless whimper and curled into a ball. In that position, he felt Ethan rub and press over his body. Those massaging hands were soon joined by a second, much smaller set of hands. When that happened, Connor heard Ethan moan erotically and rumble something to Delilah. Connor cried, thinking with bitter anger how much he’d enjoy imprisoning Delilah and Ethan in his own massive belly if their roles were reversed. That would show them!

But the roles weren’t reversed. He was the human trapped in the bully’s belly. He was the food.

On the outside, Delilah eagerly joined Ethan in massaging his fatty-filled middle. Having been so intimately close for the whole procedure made her appreciate this moment more than last time. She could feel Connor through Ethan’s skin, and she could feel that Connor was curled up in a ball. She could hear faint whimpering, but she couldn’t even muster sympathy. Jenna Asher circulated through her eighth grade home-ec class, keeping the rowdy teens on task for the last few minutes of class. Ms. Asher made her way to the front of the room and cleared her throat.

"Alright, we've got two minutes before the bell. Make sure you return your books up front and gather up your stuff to head to lunch."

The students jumped into action, eager to get out of class and go to lunch. The room instantly exploded into chattering conversation, rustling papers, and zipping backpacks. Ms. Asher's classroom was just down the hall from the auditorium, but it didn't touch any of the outside walls. It meant they had no windows, which was always an annoyance for Ms. Asher, but it at least meant it was quiet...except for the students. Over the racket, she swore she could hear some weird thumping up ignored it for the moment.

And then she couldn't ignore it anymore as something rammed into the door of her classroom. The old doorframe creaked and began to buckle. Then the door burst off its hinges, falling to the ground. Soon after, the doorframe tore out of the wall as a massive, naked boy squeezed through the widened opening. The boy hand to bend over even once he entered the classroom. Ms. Asher couldn't believe her eyes; it looked like he was close to 20 feet tall and close to half as wide! Oddly, at the boy's side, was a petite girl with long black hair and glasses. She looked scared, but there was a hint of something wild under the surface.

Ethan looked at the teacher in his arms and the students cowering before him, and he saw all the food he needed to stuff himself to the max. They didn’t realize how true that was. They were never going to get away from him; they were going to get much, much closer.

While everyone else was petrified by the drooling glutton, Delilah ran over to the cabinets and began stuffing her face with all of the food she could find. She couldn’t swallow big things like Ethan could (even at his normal size), so her progress was slower, but now that new possibilities were open to her she was as determined as he was. She began by munching on fruits and vegetables stored in the cabinet. Not only could she not swallow like Ethan, she also didn’t have the stomach capacity he did, so by the time she’d eaten five apples, two bananas, one tomato, and two full carrots, her belly was painfully stuffed. Still, she burned with drive to grow as big as she could as fast as she could.

Unlike Ethan, this desire had been building inside of her for years; he had just recently realized he wanted to be giants, where she had daydreamed about it for as long as she could remember. All of that built up desire fueled her determination, and Delilah found ways to pack more into her stretched belly. She found a bowl of creamy mashed potatoes and slurped it down. Then she stuffed a couple handfuls of sugar in her mouth. These smaller, more flexible piece of food squeezed into the gaps between the big chunks of food in her lumpy (if still petite) stomach.

Lastly, she grabbed a gallon of milk and chugged down about a third of it before the pain in her belly was too extreme for her to force anymore inside herself. What was once a lumpy belly was now rounded out: the milk and found its way into every unused milliliter inside her stomach. She fell onto her butt and made little whimpering sounds of pain as she gently rubbed her fiercely protesting middle. It was only then that she became away of the screams, and she realized they’d probably been going on for nearly all of her binge.

As soon as Delilah left his side, Ethan (barely aware of Delilah through the haze of his hunger) has open his mouth wide and engulfed the head of Ms. Asher. He was delighted to realize how easy it had become to fit someone in his mouth. Sure, there was more of her to go, but her head had been easier to swallow than Connor’s had been, let alone the three kids before that. Mmmming to himself, Ethan used both of his hands to shove more of her into his mouth as he let out a mighty gulp. He could actually hear her scream inside his throat. As the students around him also began yelling, he figured they could probably hear their teacher scream, too. Or maybe it was her outline that was barely visible through the chins of fat around his neck.

Ethan inhaled his most recent meal faster than any of the others, and it truly wasn’t far from simply inhaling. Once her shoulders were in his throat, he slurped up the woman’s body, gleefully sucking on her spit-soaked body. She tasted distinctly different than his peers. By the time Ethan’s lips were wrapped around Ms. Asher's toned, curvaceous rear, he felt her head pop through the sphincter and enter his stomach. He let out a pleased, beastial grumble. As the bell rings...

Sure, he'd never done anything to her, but she still deserved this for everything she'd gone through: for all the years of being silent, of being ignored, of being hurt. This made up for it all. She shivered with pleasure, and her chubby stomach quivered and gurgled.

She was finally becoming the kind of giant, fat, unstoppable person that had dominated her fantasies for as long as she could remember. She would never have believed this would happen, even if she could tell herself earlier this morning. But here she was, with a student-filled gut and towering over the rest of her peers (well, except for Ethan). Anything was possible now. If she could swallow this boy, and if she was still growing, this was going to be far from the end. She wanted to claim everything, dominate everything that she had been denied for all these years of being meek and powerless.

Both she and Ethan orgasmed as the powerless boy continued struggling inside the newly voracious girl.
1433332222222222232222222221112122311112.title: Delilah swallows the boy down...

choices: Someone's pulled the fire alarm, the school is emptied!
Someone's called the cops! Sirens are approaching!
1433332222222222232222222221112122311112.content:
Delilah took a few moments to play with her chubby, wiggling belly. It was incredibly painful to be stuffed so much, not to mention with food that was fighting back. Still, she barely registered the pain. She was still in blissful shock. It was surreal; she kept expecting to wake up, but that moment never came and she was still there, rubbing her fat belly, filled with a terrified boy.

Ethan, on the other hand, could believe every moment of it. He'd packed away nearly ten human beings at this point, and he had savored every moment of it. So instead of shock, Ethan watched Delilah's belly intently as it trapped and began to churn up one of their peers. He was so focused on her that he completely stopped thinking about his own meals (past or future). This spectacle pleased Ethan in a way distinctly different from his own meals. His body was gaining nothing from this digesting student, which meant malice was Ethan's only purpose in enjoying the sight of a student in Delilah's belly. He had forced his slave to eat someone, now that person was desperately struggling for survival while the inevitable digestion began. That student's life was so worthless to Ethan his only value was Ethan's entertainment.

They were both so absorbed in the moment that they didn't notice the remaining handful of students flee the classroom and begin calling for help. Despite the escapees' best efforts, anyone who investigated this site was sure to be ingested.

Ethan lumbered over to where Delilah sat and placed his massive hand on her stomach. He wanted to feel the student's last moments. Delilah looked up at Ethan adoringly, while Ethan was still soaking in all the sensational pleasure of watching her belly squirm. Delilah bit her lip and whispered, "It's starting. I feel my body shaking."

Ethan grinned and took a small step back as the process began. Nearly in sync, Ethan's body, too, began to rumble and quake. Like swallowing students, Ethan was used to this sensation, and instead focused on Delilah. Fat grew on her body like waves rippling out from her stomach. Delilah yelped a little bit through the pain, but it was not her first growth (and it wouldn't be her last if she had any say). She crept higher and higher until she stood at the impressive height of 18 feet.

This sent another spike of resentment through Ethan. She was still growing faster than he was. He hoped it would soon slow. She was a dedicated servant, and Ethan took great pleasure in having her around, but if she kept growing faster than he was, the option of eating her would be back on the table. Still, his own body was still growing, and he rose to a full 26 feet, which told him it would soon be impossible for him to move through the school at all. Particularly with his ever-fatter body, he was nearly reduced to crawling through the school to continue binging in his quest for complete dominance over the world, or possibly complete digestion of the world.

After they both finished growing…
1433332222222222232222222221112122311112.title: It's time to grow...!

143333222222222223222222222112.content:

Again, those were the thoughts he couldn’t help but thinking about himself so bad.

Alas, whatever happens to him, he knows where his only path would take, and that sinister look on his face tells the story about the boy, who’s only aim at this point wants to get bigger and better by any means.

“Huh, who cares about going to class anyway? I’m just here for food, and I wanna find anything that can make me humongous! Either way, nobody’s gonna stop me what I’m gonna do!”

With that confident expression and his hands on his wide hips, Ethan starts to waddle across the hallway, feeling so dominant over everyone if it was break time in between classes. Again, he couldn’t help but imagine it so badly, he would make any kid either his slave, or worse, squash them under his massive girth, big time! He would chuckle from that sense, and continued on through the hallway.

“Well, well! Just a little twerp I wanna talk to.” Ethan grinned, and waddled over to the kid, who is actually...

Kimi Mandella

Kimi is a rather naive young girl, despite being book smart. She knows how to handle her own schoolwork and then some, but she doesn't know when she's being treated like a patsy, especially considering how small and frail she is. And it shows when it comes to the friends she's made. Four students that are a few years older than her, larger than her, and a bit smarter than her. While not book smart like her, they're smart enough to trick her into doing things for them. Because of this, they practically control her without her even realizing it.

Theresa Thompson

Height: 6 feet tall
Weight: 126 lbs.

The ringleader of the group, also the head cheerleader of the school. With her hourglass figure (D-cups and hefty booty) and flirtatious behavior, she could practically manipulate any boy or even any girl to do whatever she wants. She and her group see how much potential they have in using Kimi as their own personal cheating device without getting in trouble. She feels the need to treat her like her own pet, but Kimi sees her like a sister she never had or even a second mother. This is where Theresa is able to use her manipulation well enough to have her do anything she wants...

Elizaveta "Elize" Vasquez
Age: 15
Race: Hispanic
Height: 5 feet 6 inches
Weight: 140 lbs.

As Theresa's childhood friend and second-in-command in both the group and the cheer squad, Elize is almost similar in nature to her friend as far as flirty behavior and manipulation. But the biggest difference aside from her own bigger booty was her own catty behavior and love for gossip, whether she would hear gossip from others or just cause the gossip itself. The drama was the one thing she loved to cause, especially at the misery of those she feels that deserve it. As for Kimi, there was something that she liked about her. Whether it was her small size or good-hearted nature she had, Elize felt the need to spoil her rotten even if it was too much for Kimi to handle. Of course part of that came from spoiling her own burly boyfriend, Martin, who she calls him her king-sized teddy bear.

"Massive "Martin Melrose
Age: 17
Race: Caucasian
Height: 6 feet 4 inches
Weight: 310 lbs.

A formal football player for the high school football team, Martin's size was one that couldn't be missed by anyone from his height to his girth. He used to be lighter and more muscular, but one major injury took him out of action and off the league. While recuperating, he found a new interest in cooking and baking. This new interest would affect his waistline, which excites his girlfriend Elize. Every time he would make food, he would end up eating some of it. Eventually, it became so much that he ended up accidentally making more than he would expect, trying to excel in his cooking craft. This meant that he would share some with his friends and family or basically stuff himself with the leftovers. Theresa tries to avoid eating so much of his food, even though that's part of the reason how she has her figure. Elize, however, doesn't mind eating some of his work, which is predominantly where her big booty comes from. But now they have a new patsy to try out his food, which holds for so many possibilities...

Reggie Thompson
Age: 13
Race: African-American
Height: 5 feet 3 inches
Weight: 119 lbs.

Despite being Theresa's younger brother, there's no form of animosity between the two siblings. In fact, they're both as wicked as they can be in their own right. And despite being younger than her or her friends, he gets along very well with all of them. But what makes Reggie special is his physique. Trained by Martin, Reggie has excelled in Phys. Ed. more than any of the other students in his grade level, which granted him a chance to be a future basketball star for the school. His popularity has gained the attention of young Kimi, who he thinks is a little cute but still enjoys messing around with her like the rest of the group does. Seems like they'll get along just fine...

So, here we are; a naive young girl mixed up with a group of bold, brash renegades. How far will the manipulation go?

You know exactly the cliched bully I'm talking about; a young woman with much more money and influence then she has life experience or parental guidance. Left to fend for herself by her wealthy but apathetic parents, Jane has always lacked a sense of identity or purpose in life, and has found herself basing her fragile ego on the superficial things; her fancy clothes, her trust fund, her stunning beauty, her charisma. In truth, all of it's just to distract herself from the crippling lack of purpose she feels in her life. Perhaps this is why she taunts and humiliates her less popular peers so relentlessly; she's managed to convince herself that she is superior to them, just to give herself something to be proud of, at least...

She's been moved around so much, she's never gone to the same school for more than a few months; thus, she has no interest in making friends, or even attending classes. On the occasions she does bother to attend school, she's considered a menace among her peers, with a particular hatred for the wealthier, more fortunate students. She constantly harasses, steals from, and even assaults them, perhaps out of a misplaced sense of envy. After all, they have everything she lacks; money, friends, a comfortable home, and a loving family...

Of course, while he's careful to never show them,

15.title: Furry Delinquents

152.content:
“You're missing the point!” The possum complained. “If you’re destroyed, but your molecules are reconstituted exactly somewhere else, is that the real you?”

Spending most of their days out on the street, far from the distractions of modern life, Ora and her friends have to entertain herself by discussing increasingly pointless topics. Currently, she has found herself debating Star Trek for some reason, despite having never watched it in her life. Ora takes one last drag on her cigarette before retorting. "No, the copy isn't the real you, because the real you is dead. Bam!" She said absentmindedly, dropping the spent butt and stomping on it with her black leather boots. "Man, these philosophical conundrums are really easy to solve. I should be, like... a professor or somethin’..."

Ora turns to her friend Sonya Adams, a scrawny little possum with only one good eye. She may be a bit boring, but she comes from a similarly ‘humble’ background. “Yeah, well, tell that to Derek Parfit,” Sonya shrugged. Ora smirked as she leaned up against the wall, enjoying the morning breeze rolling over her fur. She’s wearing the same things she always wears; a thick, gray hoodie, and similarly bland, torn-up jeans. Every outfit she has, she’s owned for years, and they’ve all gone through an incredible amount of wear-and-tear by now, barely protecting her from the elements. Technically, she’s supposed to be in school right now, but it’s not exactly uncommon for that to ‘slip her mind’. Especially given her complete lack of accountability.

Her current foster parents... she can’t even remember their names. Her dad’s Samuel, and his wife’s…. Rose, or something? Does it really even matter? Point is, they only took her in for the tax credit, and couldn’t be arsed to care about what kind of trouble Ora got herself into. She just stops by their house a few times a day to eat their food and sleep on their couch. Beyond that, she was on her own… and she kind of liked that. She liked to feel that she was in charge of her own life, like she could go anywhere and do anything she wanted. It helps that nobody cares enough to bother stopping her, though she’d had some close calls after harmlessly messing with the richer furs in class.

The sheltered brats tend to have powerful parents that go crazy when somebody messes with their ‘little angels’. Still, Ora finds ways to screw with them however she can. They all have big fancy houses, an endless supply of gaudy overpriced clothes, and trust funds and prestigious colleges waiting for them when they graduate… and what did they do to deserve any of it? Nothing! They’re the laziest people she’s ever met. Ora gets angry just thinking about it. While there’s not much she can do, she has pledged to make their lives as worse as possible, however she can…

Ora and Sonya hung out in the alleyway for hours, blathering about the kinds of inconsequential topics only bored teenagers can. Eventually, they notice the sun was about to go down, and Ora sighs. Seems like it’s time to make preparations for the night. “So… think I could hang out at your house tonight?” She asks, idly. Ora didn’t like relying on other people, but anything was better than sleeping at her foster parent’s dumpy little shack they call a home. Sonya grimaced at the question.

"I… don’t know if you should…" The possum says, almost whispering, avoiding eye contact. "My mom keeps saying you’re a… ‘negative influence’..."

“Well, she’s probably right!” Ora laughs, jabbing her in the side. “But so what? We hung out all day. What’s the harm in me sleeping over?” Sonya rubs her arm awkwardly, wincing at the raccoon's pestering. She’s well aware that Ora can be very… persistent, when it comes to getting something she wants. With a sigh, she relented.

"Alright, I’ll see what I can do…”

┅┅┅


Ora would wake up the following morning curled up on Sonya’s ratty bed, with only faint memories of the previous night. She sat up and stretched at the ringing of the alarm, weakly rubbing the sleep from her eyes. What time is it? Six? The two of them must’ve been up playing video games until at least three. Her mind still foggy with exhaustion, she looks around Sonya’s tiny room and noticed they’d made quite a mess, cans of soda and candy wrappers sprawled across the floor. The raccoon lays a hand on the spot in the bed where Sonya was sleeping, only to notice it’s empty. Her eyes darted around the room, realizing that she’s alone. Where could Sonya have run off to, at this hour?

Curiously, she climbs out of bed and creeps over to the door, only to hear a familiar sound booming from downstairs. Sonya’s mother was yelling at her, and she sounded furious. “You lied to me! You said you were in class yesterday!” The usually mild-mannered woman was practically screaming. “And now your teacher tells me you’ve skipped school five times this month! What is going on with you?” Ora rolls her eyes, knowing the frantic mother is just overreacting. Still, she feels a little guilty. Sonya sounds like she’s crying down there. Unable to listen any longer, she slides the door shut, and goes to work cleaning Sonya’s room, removing any evidence she was even there.

She spends the morning getting ready, changing out of her pajamas and donning one of Sonya’s clean outfits -- hopefully she doesn’t mind -- before reluctantly padding down the stairs. She sneaks quickly out the door, not wanting to be spotted, before waiting for Sonya outside. Eventually, the possum girl sulks miserably out the front door, the fur on her face matted, looking like she’d been crying. Sonya stares silently at the ground as the two of them walk to school, and Ora quietly watches the sunrise, unable to bring herself to say anything.

They split up when they made it there; Sonya heading for her classes, while Ora has something different in mind. She still felt terrible for what’s been happening. She has to make it up to Sonya somehow! She loitered around, trying to come up with ideas, until she noticed a couple of the rich kids fiddling excitedly with some new, overpriced gadget. Of course! Whatever they have, it must be incredibly expensive, since even they seem to be excited about it. All Ora had to do was snatch it -- whatever it is -- and she would have the perfect gift for her possum friend.

She snuck up behind the two of them, gliding silently through the bushes, quickly recognizing the two students; Elena Farmer, a doe in a pink turtleneck sweater, and her boyfriend Brett Douglas, a hyena in a leather jacket. The couple was a few years older, but remarkably unobservant; Ora was able to sneak up right behind the doe and snatch the device right out of her hands. "Yoink!" She yells, startling the couple, before sprinting away on all fours, laughing as she flees with the strange device.

“H-hey! You give that back!” The buff hyena loudly demanded, but he quickly lost track of the racoon as she darted away. Ora is practically rolling on the ground laughing by the time she collapses against the other side of the building, victorious.

"Okay, that was awesome," she smiles to herself, regaining her composure. "Now let’s see the loot!” She finally looks down at the fancy device she’s stolen, noticing that it resembles some kind of...
152.title: Strange Device

155.content:
Jay Evans
Age 13
Species: Wolf
Height: 5 foot 3 inches
