Jay and his friend, Benjamin, are, to put it simply... kleptomaniacs. They both come from poor families, and so they both grew to envy all the luxuries their richer peers seem to be entitled to. After getting sick of this lifestyle, they've decided to take matters into their own hands. Most people think they're upstanding young lads, but in reality, they'll steal everything they can at every opportunity; be it through simple shoplifting, to pocketing things at a house party, to even stealing candy from a baby. Benjamin has focused on stealing games, electronics, and other fun things, to make up for his boring childhood. However, Jay has a different focus altogether... candy, junk food, and all sorts of other tasty treats his parents couldn’t afford.
155.title: More Bullies

1551.content:
It was late in April, and in a darkened house, a pair of young lads were sneaking around...

“I don’t know about this one, Jay…” The two boys were creeping quietly along the unfamiliar house on the tips of their pawpads, trying their best to remain completely unheard. Jay, the taller and chubbier of the two, took the lead. Meanwhile, Benjamin, a much leaner fox boy, lagged behind, complaining quietly. “I mean, Oscar seems like nice… and what if we get caught?”

“Ugh! You know, you weren’t complaining this much when we stole that PSP you wanted,” Jay growled over his shoulder, and Benjamin lowered his gaze, knowing the wolf had a point. Benjamin always seemed to be more hesitant when they were going after food than when they were going after electronics. The hypocrisy annoyed Jay. “Oscar will be fine. All this food belongs to her parents technically, anyway.”

“Yeah, but… this is different!” The fox insisted. “Aren’t they going to think it’s a bit of a coincidence that this happened on the exact night we were sleeping over?”

“Not if we cover our tracks! After all, would they really assume we were responsible for clearing out the ENTIRE pantry, breaking windows, turning things over, and all that?” The wolf retorted. “Nah, man. Trust me, when I’m done with this place, they’re going to assume that bear MUST’VE done it.”

Now, Oscar was never a particularly popular or charismatic boy. Not really someone these two would normally be seen hanging out with. So why would the two of them agree to a sleepover at his house? Well, it’s simple; Jay saw an opportunity.

You see, Oscar’s garbage cans keep getting raided by some crazy ‘feral’ bear man who lives in the nearby woods - a ‘feral’ being someone who’s abandoned society, and gone to live in the woods as their ancestors did. Upon hearing about this, Jay quickly came up with a way to frame him…

They accepted the invitation to Oscar’s sleepover and humored him for a while, before sneaking downstairs the moment their host was deeply asleep. There, Jay was going to seize the opportunity to eat absolutely everything he can fit in his belly!

The poor wolf’s family had been very poor throughout his childhood, and he often couldn’t afford much to eat… so, as if to make up for all that, nowadays he has a huge appetite! While Benjamin was more fond of luxury items, Jay simply used his kleptomania as an opportunity to savor all the delicious treats he never got to eat before…

Of course, this has gone to his figure over time, giving him a sizeable potbelly and thicker hips, though he doesn’t mind the extra weight. All he could think of was all the delicious treats he got to eat. He licked his lips as he stepped into the pantry.

Oscar’s parents were upper middle class, so their pantry was an entire small room, complete with a window - which made this whole plan possible. All they had to do was find some sort of way to break the window without waking everyone in the house…

After the two plan for a while, Jay decides to cover the frame of the window with chunk of his own, pillowy fluff, before pressing a pillow up against the window and starting to gently, slowly tap away at it with a nearby club. Eventually, he’s cracked a sizeable enough hole in the window for someone to conceivably fit through, all while staying as quiet as possible.

The two spend some time quietly pushing things over and breaking fragile objects, until eventually, the pantry definitely looks like some feral bear tore through here. “Oh my gosh! This looks absolutely perfect!” Jay smiled a devious grin as he looked over his work. “Now, all that’s left to do is chow down…”

Benjamin nervously stood guard while Jay moved to claim his many prizes. The cheerful wolfy boy’s tail was wagging feverishly behind him as he grabbed some nearby chocolate bars, tearing off their wrappers and leaving them on the floor. The fluff around his lips was immediately smeared with chocolate as he shoved entire chocolate bars into his jaws, his lips loudly smacking as he chomped down.

His powerful jaws and sharp fangs made short work of everything that passed his lips. In the span of just a few minutes, the boy had gobbled down a little less than a dozen chocolate bars… and his belly was still growling, begging for more! He happily obliged, skipping over all the boring canned goods, and instead grabbing a bag of potato chips!

With a giggle, he savagely tore the top of the bag off with his teeth, sending dust all over the already filthy floor. With that, he leaned his head back, slid his jaws open as wide as he possibly could… and started dumping the chips directly down his throat! With gulp after gulp, he slurped up the chips like they were water, until the entire bag had been emptied into his stomach.

His stomach was starting to fill up, but he wasn’t about to stop until everything sweet in this pantry was gurgling away. He licked hips lips as he unwrapped a sleeve of oreos, and started sliding the entire sleeve into his jaws, chomping down and swallowing whenever he felt an oreo brush up against the back of his throat. Then he did the same for the next sleeve, and another…

The m&ms suffered the same fate as the chips - gulped down as easily as water. Then he got to work swallowing the chocolate chip cookies, one by one. Benjamin waited outside, nervously, as Jay lost himself in gluttony, gulping down twinkies, donuts, pretzels, twizzlers, snickers… before washing it all down with some coca cola…

Soon, the wolf boy let out an immensly satisfied sigh as he sat on the floor, surrounded by discarded wrappers. He rubbed his hands over his big, round, fluffy belly, which was now about the size of a basketball. He giggled to himself as he shook his belly, jostling his ‘food baby’ around. He was absolutely stuffed! He almost felt like he couldn’t eat another bite.

Meanwhile, Benjamin nervously kept watch, startled by every tiny sound or creaking of the house, certain they were going to be caught at any minute. The consequences of getting busted fill his mind. Not only did they eat everything in the pantry, but they wrecked the place and broke a window, too!

Suddenly, his chest seizes up, and he holds his breath as he hears a noise from upstairs. Footsteps. Apparently, one of Oscar’s parents was awake. Did they hear the commotion? Were they heading for the stairs? The fox boy strains his ears, desperate to know for sure…
1551.title: Kleptomaniacs

15512.content:
… Benjamin let out a sigh of relief as he heard a sink turn on upstairs. Apparently, they were just getting some water. A few moments later, Oscar’s parent returns to bed, apparently completely oblivious to what the two boys were doing downstairs.

After having gone hungry for much of his life, being so stuffed was always a wonderful feeling. Jay just wanted to sit here and just enjoy this sensation, forever and ever… but just as he leaned against a wall and started to rest his eyes, Benjamin nervously stepped in. “C’mon, man! We don’t have all night! You got what you wanted, right?”

“Ooohhh… look at this… belly...” The wolf boy muttered with a relaxed grin, patting and kneading at his fluffy gut. “I don’t think I can… walk...”

“Well, you’re gonna have to! You can’t sit here all night!” Benjamin retorted. Jay let out a little, annoyed groan as the fox boy grabbed him by the arm and forcibly pulled him to his feet, his belly jiggling as he was forced to stand. Jay had to rest his head on Benjamin’s shoulder as they walked, just to keep from losing his balance.

“You gotta… try this...” Jay sighed, still full of bliss after his meal. “Stuffing yourself… nothing’s better…”

Benjamin was always halfway unnerved and halfway happy to see his best friend in such a dazed, almost mindless state of euphoria. As he helped the wolf silently ascend the stairs, the wolf boy’s belly kept loudly growling and churning as it began to digest the food within. “No thanks, man. All that junk food is gonna make you soooo fat.”

Jay chuckled a bit. “Bein’ fat… doesn’t sound that bad...” He shrugged. “Having a… big belly all of the time? Sounds good to me...” Benjamin tried to ignore the dopey wolf, as he snuck back into the bedroom and set the wolf down on the bottom bunk, right below where Oscar was quietly sleeping. Luckily, Oscar was a heavy sleeper…

Immediately upon being set down on the soft mattress, the wolf collapsed back, feeling the weight of his huge, stuffed gut atop him. All the junk food he ate, most swallowed whole, jostled around in his tummy as he laid there, rubbing his paws over it. Even Benjamin seemed entranced by the sight. He always sort of liked how big, comfy and fluffy Jay’s belly could get, despite himself. “You… need a belly rub?” He whispered.

“I thought you’d… never ask...” Jay said with a big grin. After a moment’s hesitation, Benjamin pressed his hands up against the wolf’s stuffed gut, feeling his heart flutter as he felt just how warm, fluffy and soft his belly was. He ran his hands over it, enjoying the feeling, before getting to work.

Jay let out a quiet, satisfied sigh as the fox began expertly massaging his belly, kneading it with his palms and pressing down with his thumbs, in just the right spots to make the wolf boy’s tail wag. Even Benjamin couldn’t help but smile, enjoying the sensation.

Eventually, Benjamin’s own tail was wagging, and he couldn’t resist the urge to wrap his arms around his friend’s gut, pressing his cheek up against it as he immerses himself in the pillowy fluff, listening to its constant, pleasant gurgles. Before long, they both fell asleep like this, curled up and warm in the bottom bunk…

---

The next morning, they were awoken by a loud scream from downstairs, which sounded like Oscar’s mother. Jolted from their slumber, they both stared at each other. “Guess they found it...” Jay said, simply. It looked like it was now or never; they were going to figure out if their plan worked, or if they were busted.

Benjamin hurriedly helps Jay stand up with a groan. The wolf boy’s belly has already shrunk significantly, down to an almost unnoticeable but still fluffy paunch. Exchanging a nervous glance, they sneak quietly downstairs, ready to meet whatever fate has in store for them.

Oscar and his parents are standing around the pantry, gawking at the mess. Now that he thinks about it, Jay might’ve gone a little bit overboard. “W-what happened?” Benjamin nervously asked, feigning ignorance. Oscar’s mother turned to them, looking absolutely mortified.

“O-Our pantry!’ She cried. “It’s been destroyed! Cleared out! It’s like a tornado blew through…!”

“Who would do such a thing?” Jay asked.

Oscar’s mom gave them a weird look, before replying…
15512.title: Clearing the Pantry

155121.content:
The two boys let out a sigh of relief, realizing they were in the clear. “I KNEW we should’ve put bars on this window!” Oscar’s dad stomped his foot, frustrated by how much damage has been done. With a sigh, he glanced over at Jay and Benjamin. “Sorry, boys. No breakfast. That ‘feral’ psycho out there cleared out our pantry…”

“Oh, it’s okay, sir! I’m not very hungry, anyway!” Jay smiled smugly, patting his still slightly round belly. Indeed, in the eyes of most of the adults in town, Jay and Benjamin were the most courteous and polite boys you’ll ever meet. Nobody would’ve ever suspected them of having kleptomaniac tendencies…

Of the family, Oscar himself seemed most devastated by this turn of events… so much so that Jay and Benjamin almost felt guilty. “S-sorry… about… the bear thing…” The smaller, shy boy whimpered apologetically, looking like he was holding back tears. “The sleepover… it’s all ruined, isn’t it?”

Jay immediately spung forward to console him. “Oh, Oscar! It’s not ruined!” He smiled, patting the boy on the back. “That was, like, one of the top ten sleepovers I’ve ever been to in my life!” He was being honest about that, at the very least. Stuffing his belly last night had been a real joy.

“R-really?” Oscar looked up at him, amazed.

“Totally! We should do it again sometime!” He replied, although he was fairly certain he was never even going to speak to Oscar again, now that hes outlived his usefulness. Oscar perked up regardless, thinking hes made a couple of friends. “It’s been fun… but I think we should start headin’ back. Poor Benjamin here can’t go much longer without his breakfast…” The wolf boy laughs, patting Benjamin on the back.

“O-oh! Thank you!” Oscar smiled, his tail wagging, suddenly seeming very excitable. “This won’t happen again! I promise! The next time you come over… it’ll be awesome!” Poor lad didn’t know there wouldn’t be a ‘next time’. With a smug smirk, Jay nodded to Benjamin, and the two made their excuses and left.

“Ooooh! THAT was fun!” Jay chuckled as he patted his gut, as the two boys walked home. “I don’t think I’ve stuffed myself that full before! That was, like, a personal record or something!” He smirked at Benjamin. “And I bet you enjoyed getting your hands on my big, round tum, huh?”

Benjamin’s gaze lowered to the ground as he blushed. Jay laughed at his bashfulness, giving him a light, playful punch in the shoulder. “Welp, I’ll call ya when I need another belly rub. See ya, fox!” Benjamin was still blushing too much to reply, so he only gave a curt nod as the two of them parted ways, heading towards their own homes…

—-

Later that night...

“Ooo! Look at my growing boy!” Jay’s mother cooed. He used to be such a scrawny boy, and now, he was getting pretty heavyset, betraying all the scrumptious food he’s been getting his paws on. “One hundred eighty? Where did all this come from?”

His mother was always so concerned about him getting malnourished, as his family couldn't afford much in food. So seeing he’s apparently been eating like a king seems like a strange miracle. Jay chuckled as he stepped triumphantly off the scale. “The school lunches have been getting really filling lately,” Jay replied without skipping a beat. At this point, lying came easy to him.

“Well, I’m glad! You need everything you can get to grow up big and strong!” She smiled, apparently not concerned with how much weight he’s been putting on. “Now, brush your teeth and get some rest, okay? You have school tomorrow!”

“Yes, mama! Good night!” He smiled, leaning forward when she bent over and planted a kiss on his cheek. His mother was the person who believed in him the most. He couldn’t imagine how she’d react if she learned of his secret kleptomaniac tendencies. That was always the thing he feared most when he considered the consequences of getting caught…

As he brushed his teeth, he patted at his rounder paunch curiously, thinking about the previous night. When he said he wouldn’t mind getting fatter… he means it. Feeling his thighs getting thicker, his paunch getting rounder… compared to how scrawny he always used to be, it seemed like a major improvement!

As he settled in that night, he idly fantasized about life as a massive, fluffy ball of blubber, the constant, painful hunger of his childhood a distant memory. He licked his lips, imagining stuffing himself that full every day, putting on a few more pounds with every passing week. From now on, he was going to be working double time on stuffing his tummy with as many sweets as possible.

With that thought, under his blankets and curled up with his own warm, fluffy tail, the wolf boy drifted off to sleep...
155121.title: Scot-free

1551211.content:
It is now in late June, and by now, Jay is… almost difficult to recognize. Since that fateful sleepover two months ago, he’s gained over 20 pounds, and is now at a solid 185 lbs. For some reason, stuffing himself so full that night seemed to awaken something in the young wolf, and now he’s dedicated to stuffing his belly at every opportunity.

Over the last couple months, Jay’s schemes have kicked into overdrive, and he’s been pulling off three to five heists a week to steal as much candy and sweets as he can. Benjamin, despite pretending not to be interested in any of this, always reluctantly agrees to help him. After all, while he’d never admit it, he sort of liked watching his friend grow bigger and bigger…

The wolf boy’s face was still exactly the same; he hadn’t developed a double chin or anything. The rest of him, though, was hardly recognizable. He had a permanent round, fluffy potbelly even that jiggled when he walked, and hips thicker than Benjamin’s shoulders. No matter how much new clothing he bought, he couldn’t keep up with his weight gain, so his gut poked out under his t-shirt, and his butt barely squeezed into his jeans.

His mother’s enthusiasm for his weight gain has quickly turned into concern, now that he’s crossed over from ‘overweight’ to officially ‘obese’. She’s been trying her best to get him to exercise and eat better, but of course, being the natural liar that he was, he was always able to manipulate his way out of any serious workouts.

And now that summer vacation had started, he had more time than ever to come up with more plans to steal more sweets! And this one, he promised, was going to be their most ambitious heist yet! Benjamin nervously came along, even though he knew that if they get caught here, the consequences were going to be… severe.

You see, there’s a recently opened mom & pop store that focused on selling all the candy you can imagine. Security is lax, being such a small business - no alarms, no cameras, no LP. But when Jay walked in and realized just how much candy they had on offer, he realized he didn’t just want to shoplift some. No… he needed it ALL.

Thus, tonight, long after the shop has closed, the two boys were still there, hiding in a hollow alcove underneath one of the shelves. They were going to hide in the shop until the owner leaves for the night… and once he’s gone, they’ll have ALL this candy for themselves! Jay’s tummy growled hungrily at the very thought!

They both held their breaths as they heard the owner and a few employees restocking shelves, doing paperwork, chatting, and joking after hours. Everytime someone walked by the shelf they were hiding under, they tensed up, certain they’d be caught. But luckily, they evaded detection completely, and before long, the lights were shut off, and the employees walked out of the store.

They waited under that shelf for about 15 minutes, wanting to make 100% certain that the owners were gone. Once he was sure, the wolf boy triumphantly emerged from under the shelf, licking his lips as he looked over the brightly-colored shelves stuffed with candy, turning on the flashlight on his phone. “YES! Oh, I think we just hit the JACKPOT!”

Benjamin crawled out nervously after him, still shaking a bit, knowing that this was a heist far beyond anything they’ve done before. But there was nothing he could do to tame the wolf’s gluttony, now; Jay was already looking hungrily over the shelves, trying to figure out where to start. “Oh, this is gonna be the best night ever!”

“Are you sure about this, Jay?” Benjamin asked nervously, rubbing his arm. “I mean, what if our parents try calling for us?”

Jay rolled his eyes, seeing that his friend was still hesitant. “I told Oscar to tell them that we’re over at his house for a sleepover. He can keep a secret. Probably,” the wolf boy shrugged. “Now, don’t start complaining now! You are not going to ruin this for me! This is going to be the best night of my LIFE! Now, go make yourself useful and stand watch, okay?”

With a sigh, Benjamin nervously trotted over and hid next to the door, keeping a careful eye out for anybody walking by. Meanwhile, Jay’s eyes were wide with gluttony and excitement as he looked over the wares. Eventually, he came across a display of various candies in dozens of little straw bowls, and decided this would be the best place to start.

He started by taking a big handful of gummy bears, stuffing them in his mouth, and swallowing them down whole! In one or two gulps, the gummy bear bowl was empty, and he moved on to the next, gulping down candies he didn’t even recognize. He let out a coo as all sorts of flavors delighted his taste buds, as he shoved handfuls of random candies into his maw with greater vigor.

Eventually, all three dozen bowls of candy were now empty, and Jay’s belly was now stuffed to the size of a basketball. Two months ago, this would’ve been his limit… but now, he was just getting started! He let out a satisfied burp, patting his gut as he moved over to the shelves, starting to rip candy out of its packaging.

Benjamin glanced over just in time to see a whole poptart disappear down the wolf boy’s throat. Jay didn’t even recognize most of the candy here, but he chowed down on it all the same - so long as it was sweet, he wasn’t picky. He wasn’t even bothering to check what kind of candy he was eating, just grabbing a random package, ripping it open and emptying its contents down his throat.

Benjamin tried to keep watch, but he couldn’t help but sneak peeks at Jay, in awe as the wolf boy’s belly grew and grew right before his eyes. When he turned back to the window, his heart dropped when he realized… there was someone there! He squinted his eyes, as he tried to identify the silhouette of the unidentified person approaching...
1551211.title: Like a Cub in a Candy Store

15512112.content:
“See? I told you it would be closed!” A college aged bunny girl groaned as they walked up to the shop. She glared at the canine beside her, who, Benjamin deduced, was probably her boyfriend.

“Yeah, yeah. I figured…” The canine sighed, thinking for a moment before stomping his paw. “Damn! I was hoping we’d be able to stop by after our flight…” Benjamin held his breath as the two of them loitered around outside the store, talking amongst eachother… but eventually, the young couple decided to just come back tomorrow.

Benjamin let out a sigh of relief as they couple walked away. Little did they know that by the time they came back, this candy store would be cleared out! The fox turned back to Jay, only to find that the wolf had been so wrapped up in all the candy, he was completely oblivious to the fact that theyd almost been caught. At the moment, he was currently in the process of tearing the head off the stick of a giant, swirly lollipop, and swallowing it whole.

Benjamin was immediately stunned upon getting a better look at the wolf. The boy’s belly was about the size of a beach ball - so big, he had to sit down leaned up against one of the shelves, just to keep from falling over. The sight of his huge, round, fluffy gut was hypnotic for a moment. “Whew… urgh… I think I ate too much…” He groaned, waking Benjamin from his trance. Before the fox could say ‘I told you so’, Jay continued, pointing to another shelf.“Ben… hand me that oreo sleeve over there… would ya?”

Benjamin was stunned! “What!? Im not gonna feed you MORE! You’ve had enough!”

With a groan, the wolf boy tried futilely to stand… only suceeding in knocking some nearby candy off a shelf. He looked down at the packaging, and saw that this was some sort of candy based on the three little pigs… as evidenced by the picture of the big bad wolf with a huge belly on the wrapper, currently in the process of swallowing one of the pigs. He smiled at the sight. If only he could be like that wolf… “Get over here and stuff me, or Ill eat ya!”

Benjamin did a double take. “What? You can’t EAT me.”

“I can try!” Jay teased him, with a loud, sloppy, overdramatic lick of his lips. Even though he knew such a thing was impossible, Jay’s threat intimidated the fox boy somehow...

“Ugh, whatever. Fine, whatever! Its your funeral!” Benjamin rolled his eyes, stomping over and grabbing the oreos. Jay opened his jaws ride and stuck out his tongue, letting the fox boy just sort of stuff the oreos into his mouth, and watch in awe as they all disappeared down his throat, whole. Soon enough, Benjamin was feeling butterflies in his own stomach as he set about feeding the gluttonous wolf boy.

Candy of every shape and size seemed to disappear down the ravenous wolf’s throat with complete ease. Benjamin’s heart fluttered when, at one point, Jay swallowed too soon, and he felt his hand get pulled into the wolf’s throat. He shivered, feeling the tight, smooth throat muscles squeeze around his hand… and Jay cooed, almost as if he found him tasty. Disturbed by this, Benjamin pulled his hand away, which was now soaked in saliva.

Soon, the entire shelf of candy has been cleared, countless wrappers covering the floor. Jay let out a groan, rubbing his hands over his belly as he felt literally hundreds of delicious pieces of candy shift around inside. His belly was absolutely massive - it alone was almost as big as Benjamin himself was! “Oooh…” The wolf boy cooed, satisfied at having broken his personal record again. “This is… the best…”

Benjamin shook his head, trying to distract himself so hes not entranced by the sight of the wolf boys massive, bulging belly again. He glances over, and notices the clock. They should’ve left by now! Just by sticking around, they were testing their luck. “Ugh! How are we gonna get out of here when you’re like… this?” Benjamin groaned, starting to panic. When the owners arrive to find all the candy gone, and a stuffed wolf boy in its place… they’re going to flip!

“I don’t know. Look around in the back…” Jay shrugged lazily, resting his eyes as the feeling of having such a huge gut relaxed him. Benjamin wandered through some back rooms, wondering what he could possibly find back there that could help… only to return, wide-eyed, with a pallet jack! “See? Told ya!” Jay giggled with a smug grin.

Some time later, Benjamin managed to lift Jay’s huge, unbelievably heavy belly onto the pallet jack, sighing in exhaustion as he took the handles. “Ready?” He asked. Jay nodded with a satisfied sigh, rubbing his gut as Benjamin started rolling him down a hall. Eventually, they pressed open the back door…

… only for both boys to jump, startled, when a deafening alarm went off! “Oh no! No, no, no!” Benjamin started to panic. He tried to flee, but having to wheel the heavy wolf boy around made movement very slow. They emerged out onto a parking lot behind the store, the alarm muffled behind them as they moved towards a nearby alleyway. “Crap, crap, craaap…” Benjamin grit his teeth as the alarm rang on and on behind them, knowing they’ll probably be caught…
15512112.title: Big Bad Wolf

155121122.content:
At this point, Jay was just along for the ride, sitting wide-eyed on the jack as Benjamin frantically wheeled him around. Benjamin was practically hyperventilating. He had such a bright future! He was a good student, a beloved son… if they got caught here, it’d all go down the toilet! They’d go to prison… real prison! He wouldn’t make it in prison! That though drove him forward, driving him to keep pushing the heavy wolf boy around even as his exhausted muscles screamed for him to stop.

Just as he was getting exhausted, he heard poluce sirens in the distance far behind him, giving him a second wind. He cleared the distance like a marathon runner, trying to hide in the most obscure alleyways and tucked-away corners of the town… before finding himself deep in the forest. By now, he was panting and stumbling, his eyes rolling back, and Jay was worried he was gonna have a heart attack.

“Dude! Stop! We got away, okay? You can stop now!” Jay yells. Upon hearing these worlds, Jay freezes, as if waking from a trance… before collapsing to the ground once the adrenaline leaves him, and hes completely exhausted. Woth a sigh, Jay shifts himself off the palette jack, and lays on his back on the ground, patting his sore belly. “See? We got away scot-free! Just calm down…”

The two boys laid there on the forest floor for a while, recuperating, although every noise they heard made them tense up, as if it was the police coming to take them away. Eventually, Benjamin laid eyes on something different; the wolf’s huge, fluffy belly. Now that he was getting a better look at it under the moonlight, it was mesmerizing. “Do ya… do ya need a belly rub?”

Jay seems confused for a moment… before smirking. “I thought you’d never ask,” he says, just like he always does. With a deep breath, Benjamin forced himself to sit up, and raised his still sore arms to press his hands against the wolf boy’s gut. Soon, Jay let out a little sigh as his friend started expertly massaging his sore tummy once more. “Oooh… I couldn’t eat another bite! Being stuffed to the limit like this… it’s the best feeling ever!”

Well, Benjamin couldn’t relate to that feeling, but he was definitely a fan of the wolf boy’s sizeable gut. Feeling his fingers sink into the fluffy softness everytime he pressed down, and gawking in awe just how big it was… he just kept rubbing at it as time flew by, hearing his tummy loudly gurgle as the wolf boy digested his massive meal.

Before he even knew it, over and hour had gone by, as he’d completely lost himself rubbing his friend’s gut. Jay’s been resting his eyes, relaxed by the massage, but he cracks an eye open when he notices Benjamin letting out a little yawn. “Ya know, if you need somewhere to sleep, my belly’s pretty comfy…” Jay smiled.

The sleepy little fox gave him a weird look, his tired mind misinterpreting his offer. “Uh… you mean, like, inside? I don’t know if I’d fit in there…” He yawned, patting the wolf boy’s gut.

Jay laughed… although the thought of fitting someone in his belly was pleasant to him. “Now, ya doofus! I mean sleep ON my belly! Y’know, use it like a mattress!” Jay giggled.

Benjamin looked at the massive gut, feeling its pillowy-ness. It was certainly a lot comfier than the ground. “... okay…” He very slowly, gently climbs up on top of the wolf boy’s belly, feeling it squish slightly beneath his weight. Jay let out a little gasp at first, but he quickly got used to the feeling of all that weight on top of his gut, and even started to enjoy it. “Are you okay?”

Jay gave a thumbs-up… and with that, Benjamin curled up into a ball atop the wolf boy’s belly, realizing this was probably the most comfortable and relaxing thing he’s ever slept on. His bed at home seemed stiff and ratty in comparison. He felt like he could just sink into the fluffy flesh, and slip into the most relaxing sleep of his life…

Hey… Ben?” Jay said something, sounding a little more serious now. Benjamin was so tired he could hardly keep his eyes open, but he still let out a murmur in response, so Jay continued. “Just wanted to say… thanks for not leaving me back there. I know I was really heavy, so most people would’ve just let me behind… but betraying me didn’t even cross your mind. That takes loyalty. I… really appreciate it.”

Benjamin shivered a bit. He doesn’t really see Jay get all serious and sincere like this. As much as they didn’t like to admit it, the two of them did really appreciate each other's company. “Uh… no problem, man. I would’ve never just left ya there,” he shrugged.

With that, the two just settled in to get some sleep. Sure, sleeping on the forest floor wasn’t exactly comfortable… but feeling his belly stuffed to the brim, along with his friend lying atop it, filled Jay with relaxation. Meanwhile, Benjamin was currently enjoying the smallest, but comfiest and fluffiest, bed he’s ever slept on…

It didn’t take long for the two boys to slip into restful slumbers, filled with delightful dreams. In the morning, Benjamin’s belly will have been reduced to about the size of a basketball - which was still pretty big, but not as huge as it is tonight. With that, they will both part ways and head home, ready with stories they made up to tell their parents about their little ‘sleepover’...
155121122.title: Getaway Driver

choices: Benjamis staying over for the weekend
Its just the two of them
1551211221.content:
It is now a lazy day in August, and the smothering summer heat, combined with all the weight he's put on, is leaving Jay perpetually exhausted. His thick belly and thighs jiggled as he stumbled down the streets, his tongue hanging from his mouths as he pants, the horrid summer sun bearing down on him.

For the past couple months, even as he grew bigger and bigger, Jay has been wrestling with a strange sort of depression. Every time he stuffs himself full, he requires twice as much food to stuff himself again… so he’s found it increasingly difficult to relive that wonderful ‘stuffed to the brim’ sensation.

Like a drug addict, he’s always chasing that high, as no other sensation compares. He’s become obsessed with gulping down as much candy and sweets as he can every single day… but getting his paws on enough food to completely fill his massive, stretchy gut has been proving impossible.

Indeed, ever since that amazing night at the candy store, Jay has been miserable. Sure, he’s been able to keep his relentless hunger at bay most of the time… but he can never feel FULL! His belly is just too big for him to possibly stuff himself to any satisfying degree, at this point.

To make matters worse, his mother’s become severely concerned about his obesity, and has tried putting him on a ‘diet’ which has only required him to steal more and more just to sate his hunger. And to make matters worse still, for the past week or so, he’s been having to drag his annoying little cousin, Colin, around…

“Are we there yet?” Colin complained, the seven-year old wolf boy sipping on some capri sun as he followed along behind Jay. “Are we there yet?” Jay groaned and rolled his eyes, not in the mood to deal with this right now.

“I told you, it’s just going to be a few minutes! Just be a little patient!” Jay groaned, although he knew it wouldn’t put an end to his cousin’s relentless complaints. Here he was, hungry, overheated, exhausted, and constantly being badgered by some annoying cub. This is not how Jay imagined his summer going…

Ten minutes and three dozen “are we there yet”s later, they finally make it to the gas station on the curb right outside their neighborhood. Jay sighed as he stepped in, feeling the cool air flow over him. Just some soda and chips. That’s all he needs. He has to resist the urge to steal anything… with Colin around, its just too risky…

… or at least, thats what he thought, until he saw a limited edition copy of the Amazing Gulper on one of the shelves! As Colin continued deeper into the store, Jay froze and stared at the comic, his jaw just about touching the floor. He didnt think that there were any of these left for sale! He HAD to have it! But there was no way he could afford it with his allowance...

He glances around, making sure the cashier isnt watching, before slowly, quietly grabbing the comic book and slipping it into his hoodie… only to jump, startled, at the sound of a voice behind him! “You’re not gonna STEAL that comic book… are you, Jay?” Colin was standing right behind him, feigning curiosity!

Jays heart sunk, his hands shaking as he immediately tucked the comic book back onto the shelf. “N-no! I was just, uh… cleaning it! Yet! It looked a little messy!” Jay immediately stuttered, trying to come up with a convincing alibi. In response, the wolf cub simply giggled.

“If you say so!” Colin shrugged… although from then on, he stayed right by Jays side, as if keeping watch on him so he couldnt go shoplifting anything. Jay went about his business, buying some junk food with his regular allowance, cursing himself over getting sloppy and nearly getting caught over something so stupid…

… but still, he could not pry his mind off of that limited edition comic. This might be his only chance to ever get his greedy paws on it! Overwhelmed by this idea, he reluctantly turns to Colin. “Hey. Uh… here’s 5$,” he says, passing the cub a five-dollar bill. “Go buy yourself some, I dunno, candy or somethin’.” Colin eagerly ran off without question, and Jay scowled at the thought of being down five dollars. He'd be short a bag of chips… but itd be worth it.

Now that hes certain Colin is thoroughly distracted, he tucks the valuable comic book into his jacket in just the right way that even a thorough pat-down wouldnt even expose it. With that, he pays for the rest of his stuff and slinks out of the store, trying to hide a smug, satisfied grin.

Colin is happily chewing on a bag of candy he bought as they walk back to the house, chips and soda in hand. Jay’s mother was out this weekend, so the house was empty. Well, mostly empty...
1551211221.title: Shopping Trip

15512112211.content:
Jay let out a sigh of sheer relief as he finally stepped back into the nice, comfortable, air-conditioned house. It was a modest, one-story little home, so he spent most of his free time in the outdoors, or somewhere downtown. The only purpose of this humble little home is to host Jay’s prized and most valuable possession; his Gamecube!

Soda in hand, the pudgy wolf boy walked over to the living room, almost struggling to fit his hips through the door. There on the floor, controller in hand, is that familiar, comparatively scrawny wolf boy, in a simple t-shirt and shorts. “Hey, Jay!” Benjamin perked up when Jay’s loud, heavy pawsteps approached. “Did ya get the stuff?”

Jay presented his paltry earnings; a huge jug of coca cola. “Uh, just some soda. No chips,” he sighed. Benjamin seemed disappointed for a moment, but Jay soonsmirked. “But I did get my paws on something better…” Benjamin seemed intrigued, but Jay gestured to Colin, and the two immediately understood that Jay couldn’t show off his ill-gotten good while Colin was still around.

Speaking of which, the annoying cub perked up, taking another crunch of his hard candy. “And I got some candy!” He smiled, proudly showing it off. The two other boys rolled their eyes, as Benjamin sets the jug of soda on the floor beside him.

“Well, whatever! It’s good enough!” He shrugged it off with a smile. “C’mon, man! Let's play!” Jay’s tail started wagging in excitement as he laboriously lowered his heavy body onto the ground by Benjamin’s side, before grabbing a controller and getting ready to play…

Benjamin and Jay were planning on spending their saturday engulfed in a non-stop marathon of video games! They’ve been looking forward to it all week… but there was one factor putting a damper on their fun. Colin. Jay’s annoying cousin took a seat on the couch behind them, chomping on candy as he watched them play.

Jay prayed Colin had the good sense to keep his mouth shut… but of course not. The annoying cub always made annoying little suggestions at every opportunity, or asked some painfully obvious question, till he was just about driving Jay up the wall. Still, they both tried to ignore him, resolute to not let the brat ruin their saturday.

Still, more and more, Jay’s been noticing… changes to his body. The fatter he gets, the harder it is to climb out of bed in the morning, the harder it is to fit through doorways… everything is harder! And now, his fingers were so plump, even video games were harder! “Crap! Would you stop spamming the blaster?” He groaned in frustration as he lost for the umpteenth time.

Benjamin gave him an apologetic look, knowing the wolf boy was struggling with his weight. Meanwhile, behind them, Colin was just laughing uproariously at Jay’s misery, as if taking some sort of sadistic joy in it. “Maybe ya wouldn’t lose so much if ya didn’t have such fat fingers!” Colin teased.

Jay turned around as fast as his pudgier form was able, lifting up a clenched fist and showing off his sharp fangs. “Did you just call me fat!?”

“Maaaybe~” Colin taunted, sticking his tongue out. “Whatchya gonna do about it?” Jay gritted his teeth in frustration when the cub called his bluff. He knew he couldn’t actually do anything, or the little snitch would immediately run and tell on him. All he could do was turn back around and try to ignore the stupid little brat…

As the game drags on, they’re given a temporary reprieve from Colin’s constant rambling, as the cub starts to be mesmerized by the game itself, growing more fond of simply sitting back and watching. Of course, this doesn’t last forever. “This looks pretty fun...” Colin cooed. “Ya know, your mom said you have to let me play, too!”

Jay turned to him again, looking even angrier than before! “What? No she didn’t!” The wolf growled. “Besides, it’s a two-player game! Get lost!”

This only made Colin more smug. “Uh, yeah she did! And I wanna play RIGHT NOW!” He pouted, crossing his arms, before smirking. “If you don’t let me play, I’ll tell on you~” Colin said in that familiar, unbearable singsong voice. Jay twitched. The two boys looked at eachother, wondering what to do next...

Benjamin was just about to volunteer, but to his surprise, Jay did first! “Ugh! Fine! Little brat…” He grunted as he laboriously pulled himself to his feet, leaving the controller on the floor for Colin to eagerly run over and pick up. “Whatever. I got somethin’ BETTER to do anyway. Play all you want.” His cousin stuck his tongue out at him as he started playing, leaving Jay to stomp away with a frustrated grumble…

With a sigh, Jay sat down on his bed, glancing around to make sure he wasn’t followed. Wearing this hoodie during a heat wave had been miserable, but it was all worth it. Jay’s tail starts wagging again as he pulls the comic back out from under his jacket. He was wide-eyed as he looked down on his spoils, like he was looking at some priceless treasure.

It was a limited edition variant of issue 183 of the Amazing Gulper! Jay never understood this comic before, but over the course of the summer, as he’s gotten more and more gluttonous, he’s become a big fan of the series… mostly because of how much he relates to its protagonist! With an excited giggle, he sits back on his bed and starts reading.

The Amazing Gulper is about a young wolf boy who, at an eating contest, discovers he has a strange superpower; he can swallow ANYTHING! So, naturally, he decides to use his power to fight crime! Jay likes the series for its thrilling and dramatic storylines… but, to be honest, he also sort of just likes how the Amazing Gulper is able to swallow supervillains… whole! It almost makes Jay wish he could do the same…

As he eagerly reads through this issue, he finds it doesn’t disappoint! In it, the titular character is on a quest to save his friends from the evil Dieticians! He gulps down hired mook after mook, before finally coming across the Dieticians’ headquarters. The tension ramps up steadily through the comic, and the stakes have never been higher…

Jay is wide-eyed as he eagerly flips through pages, always desperate to see what happens next! The drama, the suspense… its killing him! But just as he’s about to reach the big payoff… he let's out a startled yelp when the comic is suddenly snatched from his hands! His head jolted up, to see the comic in the hands of… Colin!

His heart sunk when looked up, and realized Colin had snuck up on him while he was wrapped up in the comic! “Oooooh~” Colin cooed, recognizing this as that comic book Jay was considering shoplifting before. It didn’t take a genius to put two and two together here. “You stole a comiiic book~”

“W-what? N-no! I… I bought it!” Jay immediately stuttered out a lie, before reaching forward to try and grab the comic back. He HAD to know how it ends! Unfortunately, Colin’s much quicker than the pudgy wolf, and easily plays keep-away with the comic. “Give it back! Give it back!”

“You stole it! You stole it!” The cub chanted in a sing-song voice as Jay had to chase him through the house, huffing and panting as he slowly lumbered after him. “I’m telling! I’m telling!” Jay was starting to feel nauseous as the direness of his situation was starting to set in…

Colin was going to tell on him. The annoying little snith always did. And once it’s revealed that he’s a thief, the string of thefts and shoplifts around town over the years would all be traced back to him, and maybe even Benjamin too. He’d spend years in juvie for sure! His whole future… down the drain! He couldn’t let this… annoying brat ruin his entire life!

Soon, he managed to corner the giggling cub in the bathroom. Jay crossed his arms as he stood there at the door, his pudgy form completely blocking the exit. It would be impossible for Colin to slip by him without getting grabbed. “You’re not telling ANYBODY about this, okay?” Jay growled, sounding serious. “Just give me my comic back!”

Colin seemed a little disappointed to have gotten caught… but he wasnt about to just give up! “No! You’re a thief!” Before Jay could react, Colin stepped forward… and threw the comic book right into the toilet!

“NO!” Jay cried, immediately dropping to his knees in front of the toilet, gripping the sides of the bowl. It was too late. The comic was already soaked through, and all the pages were so wet, they were unreadable. His voice quivers as he realized he’ll never know how the cliffhanger is resolved. “T-that… that was a limited edition…!”

Colin stood smugly at Jay’s side, sticking his tongue out at him, seeming taking delight in his misery. “Well, ya should have gotten it fair and square!” He taunted, in that same, unbearable voice. “And when your mom get’s home, I’m telling her you stole it~”

Big mistake. Colin let out a startled yelp as Jay whipped around faster than he thought possible, suddenly gripping him by his sides! Colin whimpered as he was lifted into the air, seeing nothing but pure rage in the pudgy wolf’s eyes.“No, you’re not!” Jay roared, ready to...
15512112211.title: The Amazing Gulper

155121122111.content:
As Jay’s jaws spread incredibly wide right before Colin’s eyes, a million thoughts flew through both their minds. It almost seemed like time froze for a single, crystalline moment. Both of them wondered if what was about to happen could really… well, happen.

Jay loves swallowing his food whole - he finds it makes him feel fuller than ever, somehow. He’s gotten quite good at over the months, indeed; he’s even swallowed a watermelon recently, with little effort. He was fairly certain he could fit the cub’s shoulders down his gullet. And at this point, there was no moral concerns in his mind. He was going to make sure his secret couldn’t come out, no matter the cost…

Besides, he had just been enthralled in a thrilling issue of the Amazing Gulper, and the mindset of ‘just swallow everyone you dont like’ was still fresh on his mind. Besides, much as he didn’t want to admit it, he’s been fantasizing about this sort of thing for a while. Gulping people down, just like the wolf in his comics did... it seemed like the perfect way to stuff his belly to the brim again.

Meanwhile, all Colin was thinking about was just how much he regretted all those times he tormented his older cousin.

Soon, that single, frozen moment ended… and in a single instant, Colin was shoved headfirst into Jay’s maw! In that moment, the entire world went dark, and Colin found his head stuffed somewhere so incredibly tight and smotheringly warm. His snout was immediately soaked with saliva, and a blast of Jay’s meaty breath blew against his face.

Jay’s jaws spread so easily around Colin’s head, it filled him with confidence! He had completely forgotten that this cub was a living, breathing person - no, in his mind, Colin was just a simple piece of food, to be swallowed down like all the other food he gulps down on a regular basis.

With that mindset, taking the next swallow was easy. Colin’s shoulders were supposed to be the hard part, but his jaws stretched around them with ease, and Jay’s heart fluttered at the thought that he might actually be able to pull this off. All the while, Colin was a little too stunned to even react, gears grinding in his head as he tries to figure out if this is even real.

Of course, he comes to the conclusion that this is, unfortunately, very real… and starts struggling with all his might! Jay groaned a bit, reminded for a second that Colin wasn’t just a bite-sized snack, but another wolf who will scratch and bite in an attempt not to end up as lunch. His jaws were starting to feel sore, as Colin’s wriggles wore away at them.

He tried his best to restrain the cub, but of course, he was much too wriggly. So, he decided to just try and gulp him down as quickly as possible, and let his stomach restrain him. With that thought, he took gulp after gulp… and even with his impassioned struggles, Colin slid deeper and deeper in with every swallow Jay took…

It wasn’t long before Colin’s entire head was within Jay’s throat, and the wolf boy’s powerful throat muscles squeezed down around his head, his gullet pulling him ever deeper. Colin was quickly started to real there was a real danger of being swallowed whole, here… but his struggles were nothing compared to the strength of the pudgy wolf.

Inch by inch… Jay learned to celebrate every little bit of progress he made. After all, gulping down an entire cub was going to be a difficult task, no matter how you slice it. Still, he was making slow, but steady progress, and soon Colin was in up to his belly. Of course, this is when Jay noticed a problem.

He couldn’t breath! Colin was so big, he was completely blocking off his throat… and he just couldn’t swallow him fast enough! Jay groaned as his lungs started to beg for air, and he decides this might not have been such a great idea. It was too late to spit Colin back out, though… his throat muscles were clenched tightly around their meal, refusing to let go.

Just when Jay thought he was doomed, Benjamin walked in… and the fox boy’s jaw just about dropped to the floor when he walked in to see a pair of familiar, kicking legs dangling from Jay’s maw! “W-wha… what the...” He stuttered, seeing the bulge in Jay’s throat and gut as more of Colin was slipped inside. It didn’t take a genius to figure out what was going on. “J-Jay! Stop! You’re… you’re eating him!”

Benjamin immediately rushed forward to help. He didn’t know what was going on, but he didn’t like it! “Jay! Let… him… go! You can’t… swallow him!” He grabbed Colin’s legs and tried his best to pull him free… but the wolf boy’s throat was just too powerful. Meanwhile, from the sounds Jay was making, Benjamin realized he was choking! “Oh no, oh no, oh no…”

Benjamin quickly realized he had a difficult choice. Save Jay, but let Colin slip into the wolf boy’s belly… or save Colin, but let Jay croak. Neither seemed conscionable… but he was running out of time. When he looked into his best friend’s pleading eyes, he knew what he had to do. “Urgh… s-sorry, Colin...”

He was biting his lip, looking like he was just about holding back tears as he took hold of Colin’s legs again… but this time, instead of trying to pull him out, he just pressed the cub deeper! Combined with Jay’s regular gulps, Colin began to slide in with incredible ease, easily consumed by the much larger wolf boy.

Benjamin stepped back, feeling light-headed when he saw that all that was left of Colin was a pair of wriggling feet with white socks in Jay’s mouth. Soon, Jay closed his maw around them, and took one last gulp… before taking a deep inhale as the obstruction in his throat was finally cleared.

Benjamin almost fainted as he watched Jay’s belly grow bigger and bigger right before his very eyes, as poor Colin was unceremoniously deposited within. Jay’s belly was now absolutely HUGE - bigger than it’s ever been before! Not only that, but… it was… moving!

Colin was apparently not a fan of his new accommodations, as the moment he slipped into Jay’s stomach, he started squirming and kicking with all his might, his hands and feet leaving clear imprints in the wolf boy’s fluffy stomach. Benjamin took a few steps back, shivering at the display, his eyes wide.

Meanwhile, Jay was being barraged by sensations the likes of which cannot be described in language. Not only did he feel more FULL than ever… but his meal was MOVING! Feeling the cub’s hands and feet press against and stretch the sensitive, distended walls of his belly… it was like receiving the world’s best belly massage, but from the inside!

This was a new high for Jay, for sure. He was panting in ecstasy, his tail wagging excitedly behind him, as Colin squirmed and squirmed. Even Benjamin could not pry his eyes away; despite the fact he knew it was wrong, the way Jay’s belly bulged and churned to contain the person inside was hypnotizing.

Ultimately, Colin’s struggles only lasted a minute. There was obviously no oxygen in the wolf boy’s stomach, so it wasn’t long until Jay’s belly went eerily still, as the wriggling cub was reduced to a simple, filling lump of meat. Still, that single minute felt like it lasted a lifetime for Jay.

“Ooooh… oh my gosh...” Jay let out an ecstatic sigh, his voice quivering as he raised his shaky hands up and pressed them against his stomach. He’d never felt this FULL before! His belly was so stuffed with meat, it felt like he was going to burst at any minute! “Oooh! Aaah… ungh…”

Meanwhile, Benjamin was filled with a thousand emotions as he realized the full extent of what had just occurred. “H-he… he’s gone…” He pressed a hand against his head, trying to figure all this out. “Why… why did you…”

Jay sighed. He wanted to focus on enjoying his massive, stuffed belly, but… he knew Benjamin was probably upset. “Ben… he found us out…” He explained, inbetween exhausted pants. “I couldn’t let him… tell…”

“Y-yeah, but… you ATE him!” Benjamin stuttered. “Do you realize how much trouble we’re in?”

“Ben, we can talk about this… later!” Jay muttered back. “Right now… my belly feels like it’s… gonna burst…” Benjamin was stunned Jay could be so calm right now! All the wolf boy seemed to want to do was keep massaging his own belly. “Oh… I’m sooo stuffed… I never thought I’d be able to feel so full again… but this is actually the most full I’ve felt in my life!”

He looked over at Benjamin seeing his expression. “Oh, don’t give me that look! I could see it in your eye… you were fascinated, watching my big belly bulge like that. Admit it… you’re impressed!” He teases the fox, jiggling his own gut hypnotically. “But oooh… it’s so sore. I sure wish somebody would offer a nice belly rub…”

Benjamin stared at his friend’s massive, round belly, as if in a trance. Part of him was still scared… but another part of him thought that huge, fluffy tummy would be super fun to massage...
155121122111.title: Tasty Cub

choices: Jay's Mom Comes Home Early (4 Days Early)
Ben Gets Curious and Asked How Colin Taste
1551211221111.content:
Ben, while extremely terrified of what Jay had just done, was also extremely curious of how that big belly must feel.

He slowly made his way back over to Jay, stuck his hand out and started rubbing Jay’s cousin filled belly.

“Oh my god, this feels amazing, Ben” said Jay as Ben rubbed his belly.

To Ben, Jay’s belly felt like a mixture of an overly pregnant woman and a water balloon due to Jay’s fat.

“What are we going to do when your mom comes home and finds that your cousin is missing” asked Ben.

“Well,” started Jay, “mom is not going to be home for at least four more days yet, which give me time to turn Colin into pudge,” he said as he lick his lips getting some the flavor that was left.

“But why did you eat him, you could have just locked him the closet till your mom got back” stated Ben.

“Ben, he was going to snitch on me for taking a comic, which could lead them to more stuff that I stole and would lead them to the stuff you stole, as well” Jay explained again to Ben.

“So what do we say happened to him” asked Ben.

“We wait a day so I can digest Colin, so it’s not as obvious that I ate him, and then we call the cops saying we woke up and found the back door open and Colin was gone,” stated Jay.
1551211221111.title: Ben rubs his belly

15512112211112.content:
Ben continued to rub Jay’s over stuffed belly, when finally his curiosity and he asked Jay, “So how did he taste?”

Jay responded, “I wish I had a chance to get his clothes of because they covered a lot of his flavor, but take the best tasting steak you ever had and multiply it by 10.”

Then Ben had another curious question popped in to his head, “Would you do it again?”

Jay sat there and thought for a few moments, and replied, “Yes, I would. This is the most stuffed I have ever been and there is no way to get a bigger stuffing then to continue eating living things. But eating Colin was extremely difficult, I can eat a watermelon whole just find but nearly choked on him. I’m going to have to practice on critters, stray dog and cats, and bunnies so I can get use to eating thing that large.”

Ben had one last question for Jay, thinking about the night at the candy store, “Would you ever eat me if given the opportunity?”

Again Jay thought for a moment, more just to mess with Ben, but also thought about the night Ben’s arm slid down his throat at the candy store and his flavor, and answered, “Ben you’re far too skinny for me to eat.”

Then Jay got very serious, “But if you ever betray me or get fat enough that I want to eat you, then yes I will.”

Jay just stared at Ben while licking his lips at patting his belly.

This scared Ben a lot, he had never seen this side of Jay before and it wasn’t a side he want to stay on either.

“Well, you don’t have to worry about that, I’ll never betray you and my family doesn’t have enough money to for me the buy food for me to get fat off of,” chuckled Ben nervously as he still rubbed Jay’s belly starting to feel Colin break down as Jay’s stomach digested him.
15512112211112.title: Ben Gets Curious and Asked How Colin Taste

choices: Report Colin Missing, Then Go Practice Swallowing Critters
Mom Comes Home Before You Report And You Tell The Truth
155121122111121.content:
The next day Jay woke up and looked down to see that Colin had completely digested and Ben was using his fatter belly as a pillow.

Jay woke Ben up and told him that need to use the restroom.

Ben got up and moved over to the bed, while Jay went over to the toilet and disposed of what was left of Colin that his body had not absorbed.

Jay flushed the toilet and waved by to his cousin, “This was for the better Colin,” thought Jay.

As Jay was about to head to the room, Ben hollered at Jay, “So what damage did eating Colin do to your body?”

“I’m not sure yet,” Jay stated, “Heading over to the scale now, I know I was at 220.”

Jay walked over to the scale stepped on it and the dial spun and stopped at 275.

“Wow,” a surprised Jay said, “He added 55 lbs to my frame!”

Jay walked over to the mirror and looked at his body seeing that Colin had spread evenly over his body.

His arms, face, moobs, belly, thighs, legs and backside had gotten bigger.

Jay had said he wanted to get fatter, and it looks like vore was the way to achieve that goal.

He was also thinking of how he was also going to be like his hero, The Amazing Gulper, but still need more practice.

“That not all it looks like he added,” said Ben.

As Ben got closer to Jay, Jay could see what Ben meant.

Before the top Ben’s head came right to Jay’s eyes, now his head comes to the bottom of his chin.

“So it looks like you got taller from eating him as well,” stated Ben.

“Let go over to the living room, mom has a height record of me since I was a kid,” stated Jay.

They go to the living and find the chart.

The last height record was when he turned 13 at 5’3”.

They found a yard stick and laid it flat on Jay’s head.

Ben reached up and drew a line at the end of the yard stick.

They measured from the line to the floor and found Jay was now 6” taller, standing at 5’9”.

This made Jay even happier knowing that eating Colin caused him to grow 6” in one night.

This would make easier to swallow things whole but he still want to practice on animals before he tried people again.
155121122111121.title: The Next Day

choices: Jay Is Still Hungry, And Ben Go Get Something Bigger
A Kid Walks Up and Ask Jay Why He Ate The Raccoon
1551211221111211.content:
“Well, let’s go ahead and get this done, and report Colin missing,” said Ben extremely nervous.

“Yep, get this done so I can go find some critters to practice swallowing whole. Also let me do all the talking,” replied Jay.

Jay called to police and told them that he had woken up and found his little cousin gone, along with his backpack.

He told them that he had yelled at him for throwing his new comic book in the toilet and that he had sent him to his room for the rest of the night.

Before he had gone to bed, he looked in and he was still there sleeping and when he woke up he was gone and backdoor.

The police took a report and said he probably just ran away.

They asked if there was any place around here where he liked to go.

Jay told them that he liked to the park on the other side of town.

The police said they would go search the area but more than likely he would be nearby just trying give him a scare.

He thanked the police for coming and told them he would call if he came back before they found him.

With that the police left and Jay rushed to find close that still fit him.

Luckily enough for Jay, he found a pair of stretchy gym and a t-shirt that still fit after eating Colin.

“So where are you going to go to?” asked Ben.

“We’re going to the park on the other side of town. I know I’ve seen some pretty fat raccoons and possum back there,” explained Jay, “Plus it will also make it look like we’re searching for Colin.”

They arrived at the forest to find that it was pretty much void of people, which is surprising for a summer day.

They made their way back to a secluded area of the park that was hardly visited but still had benches for Jay to sit on.

“Ben, I need you to go find me a fat possum or raccoon,” demanded Jay.

“Why do I have to go hunt them down, why can’t you,” responded Ben.

“Because that burns calories and besides you don’t want get fat do you,” grinned Jay with an evil look in his eye as he looked at Ben.

This looked must have scared Ben, because he took off very quickly.

Soon Ben came back with a raccoon that looked like it had been feasting on a lot of scraps.

“This thing must weigh at least 40 lbs” examine Ben as he hand him off to Jay.

“Oh this one will do nicely for my first practice,” Jay stated with glee.

Jay lifted the raccoon to his mouth, opened his mouth wide and stuffed the raccoons head in his mouth.

The raccoon start trashing around but Jay was able to hold it still.

The first swallow Jay took, brought the raccoon a third of the way into his mouth, with the next two bring it all the way in except for it tail.

As Jay is working on the raccoon, Ben is watching in total shock as Jay has already finished off most the raccoon down.

With one last gulp and a slurp, the raccoon’s tail enters Jay’s mouth and a bulge traveled down Jay’s throat and landed in his belly with a bounce.
1551211221111211.title: Report Colin Missing, Then Go Practice Swallowi...

choices: They Return To Find Jay's Mom is Home
15512112211112113.content:
“Delicious,” declared Jay as he licked his lips, patted his belly and wagged his tail.

It had taken Jay only 30 seconds swallow the raccoon, thanks to the 6” growth spurt.

Ben walked over and put his hand on Jay’s belly, barley feeling the raccoon under Jay’s belly fat.

“Wow” was all Ben could say.

“That was amazing, but I’m still hungry,” Jay said.

“Ben, go get me another one, this time fatter than the first,” demanded Jay.

Ben still not wanting to get on Jay’s bad side, he complied and went to retrieve another critter.

As soon as Ben walked away, a lion cub came walking out of the woods.

The cub was little taller and chubbier, but not by much, than Colin was.

As soon as Jay spotted the cub, his mouth started to water and his belly started to growl.

As the cub walked towards him, Jay began thinking, “If my growth spurt made it easier to swallow that raccoon, I wonder if it I could make it easier for me to swallow this cub than it was for me to swallow Colin.”

As if to agree with this thought his stomach let out another growl, this one deeper than before.

The cub as soon as they saw Jay started walking over to him and asked “Excuse me mister but have you seen a raccoon come this way, he slipped out of his collar and ran in this general direction”

Jay was thankful that the raccoon had run out of air and wasn’t moving around anymore.

“Well that would explain why the raccoon was so plump” thought Jay.

As the cub got closer to Jay, Jay could start smell the cub’s scent, which made him start drooling even more and his belly growl even louder and deeper.

He stomach was so loud that the cub could hear it.

“Wow mister, you must be really hunger for your tummy to sound like that” stated the cub.

“Well, I just had little snack but I’d be lion if I didn’t say I could go for a meal right now,” replied Jay.

As soon as the cub was close enough, Jay grabbed the cub and pulled them close to his body.

“You know, I did see your raccoon and it was delicious,” said Jay with an evil tone,

“What do you mean,” questioned the cub with terror in their voice.

“I ate your raccoon and now I’m going to eat you, cause not only am I hungry but you smell really delicious,” replied Jay as he licked his lips.

Before the cub could have type of reaction, Jay opened his mouth as wide as he could and stuffed the cubs head in his mouth.

The cub frozen in fear didn’t dear move as Jay was licking all over his face to get a good taste of him.

Jay then took a gulp, bringing the cub’s shoulders into his mouth, but the same time getting a taste of the cub’s unfavorable shirt, he took a paw and ripped the shirt off of the cub, tossing it to the side.

Jay took another gulp, pulling the cub’s head into his throat, shoulders to the back of his mouth and chest to the tip of his tongue.

Jay was in ah at what he tasted, it was some much better than Colin did.

Jay took a might gulp and brought the cub’s belly in to his mouth.

The issues he had while swallowing Colin, weren’t being had.

His jaw wasn’t sore and he was able to breathe, it also it helped that the cub was still not moving.

Jay took another gulp bring the cub’s knees in his mouth, leaving only their paws and tail outside his mouth.

That gulp must have brought the cub out of his trance because they started wiggling and kicking what remained of their legs.

About this time Ben had returned carrying a possum that weighed at least 60 lbs.

He looked over at were Jay was sitting, just in time to see him slurp down the tail and a massive bulge slide down his throat and into his belly causing his belly to surge out two feet.

Ben ran over to Jay, while still carrying the possum, and asked, “Jay, what did you just swallow?”

“Give me a second, URRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPP,” respond Jay with a belch.

“Some lion club, which tasted very delicious, looking for a delicious raccoon, which was its pet” stated Jay while putting a hand on his withering belly.

Ben just stood there, thinking of what to say.

Yesterday he was choking trying to swallow his cousin, today he had swallowed a cub and a raccoon, had the 6" growth spurt helped that much.

“Oh, look you brought dessert” Jay said as he reached out and took the possum from Ben.

“Your still hungry,” exclaimed Ben as Jay was about to stuff the possum in his mouth.

“I still got a little space left in my belly.”

Jay then proceed the stuff the possum in his mouth and three gulps, sent the possum to his belly, as it jutted out another foot.

Ben starred in amazement at the movement from Jay’s belly.

“God, I never been so stuffed in my life,” Jay stated as he licked his lips, patted his belly and wagged his tail.

Ben placed his hand on Jay’s belly feeling the two meals that were alive still alive thrash under his skin.

Ben had not felt anything so amazing in his life.

Jay looked at Ben and belched really loud, “Urrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrpppppppppppppppppp”

“Ready to head home,” asked Ben.

“Yep, I need to go rest and turn this in to fat,” replied Jay patting his now still belly.
15512112211112113.title: Why Not Both?

choices: As The School Day Goes On Jay Notices Which Classmates Got Fat
That Night Jay Has A Wonderful Dream
That Night Ben Has A Horrible Nightmare
155121122111121133.content:
Before they had left the park that day, they had taken the shirt he ripped off the cub and wrote Colin’s name on the collar and planted in the woods in attempt to frame the Feral Bear that had been terrorizing the town.

It had worked, the police had informed Jay the next day that they found Colin’s shirt, torn to shreds in the woods.

The police had believed it to be the work of the Feral Bear, had hunted him down and ate Colin whole as a meal.

The police had already tracked him down and killed him, as he was deemed a threat to the town.

They apologized to Jay about not being able to get to Colin in time.

One Month Later

Jay was woken up by the sound of his alarm.

Today was the first day of the new school year, the start of 8th grade.

Jay got up out of bed and lumbers towards the bathroom.

He looks in the mirror and smiles, liking what he sees.

The day after his binge at the park he had gain nearly 80lbs, raising his weight to a whopping 355lbs.

Most of the weight had settled in his belly, making it look like an over inflated basketball.

He had a double chin, which was hinting at a third.

His moobs inflated to a large B cup.

His arms look like small tree trunks.

Both thighs are the size of medium tree truck and a backside looked like two soccer balls.

In addition to gaining 80lbs, he had gained another 7” in height; now bring him to 6’4”.

Jay hadn’t really had a chance to stuff himself with prey during this time.

Jay had been ground for the past month for yelling at his cousin causing him to “run away and be eaten by a feral bear”.

During that month he was not allowed to leave the property or allowed to have Ben come over, who was also in trouble for his part in not preventing Colin’s "death".

His mother was concern that Jay may be getting to heavy, but Jay explained to her it was because the growth spurt, his mother believed him and but still cut his food intake by half.

Luckily for Jay there were enough squirrels, birds, and rabbits around his house that he could snack on so he never truly was starving, but didn't have enough to cause him to gain weight.

But today his punishment came to an end and could hunt for filling prey again.

Jay got dressed, grabbed some breakfast, and head to the bus stop.

Jay soon got the school and meet up with Ben.

“So I see they let you out early,” teased Jay.

“Same to ya pal, how you been holding up for the last month,” retorted Ben.

“Hungry, mom believed me that the extra weight was due to my growth spurt but still put me on a diet” said Jay.

“Speaking of which looks like you put on a few during that month,” Jay commented as he patted Ben tiny, but noticeable belly.

“I know, Dad got a promotion at work and we can afford to have extra food in the house. Since I couldn’t do much in the last month, I did a lot of snacking,” stated Ben.

“Well it looks good on you, just don’t do too much or else you’ll make me a nice snack,” Jay said as he licked his lips at the thought.

"Dude, you scare me when you joke like that," replied Ben with a hint of terror in his voice.

"Well, keep it up if you want to see how much I'm joking," Jay said with a serious look in his eye as his stomach growled.

All Ben could do was chuckle nervously, as they head to first period.
155121122111121133.title: A Month Later

choices: That Night Ben Has A Horrible Nightmare
That Night Jay Has A Wonderful Dream
Friday Comes and It Feast Time for Jay
1551211221111211331.content:
The rest of the morning goes smoothly; a lot of Jay’s classmates were amazed at Jay’s growth spurt over the summer as he towered over them.

While his classmates Jay had kept mental notes on which of their classmates got fat over the summer.

He counted at least 70 out of the 200 in his class had gained weight.

Surprisingly it was Oscar; you looked like he had gained the most.

During lunch Ben and Jay go talk to Oscar to see how his summer was.

“Hey, Oscar how was your summer man,” asked Jay.

“Oh, hey Jay and Ben, I had good summer but I had broke my ankle to first day of break, so all I could do was sit around and eat till about two weeks ago,” replied Oscar as he took a bite of his burger.

“Man that sucks,” stated Ben as he took of his bite of his pizza.

“Well, Oscar what we want ask you was Ben and I are going to have a sleep over this weekend and want to know come,” asked Jay as he sat there watching both Ben and Oscar stuff their faces.

“Sure, mom will want me to get out of the house since I was cooped up all summer,” answered Oscar finishing the last of his burger.

“Okay then be at my house Friday after school,” replied Jay thinking of how great Friday will be now.

“Okay. Man that burger was good, I wish I had more money, cause I’m still hungry,” wished Oscar.

“Hey, I’m not really that hungry, so you can have mine,” answered Jay.

“Really, you’re not hungry at all,” question Oscar.

“Naw, mom got a nice raise at work so were going to a steak house tonight to celebrate,” replied Jay.

“Okay, thank you so much Jay,” as he took the money from Jay and went to get more food.

“That was nice of you to do, Jay,” said Ben as he finished off his pizza.

“I’m not doing it to be nice, I’m doing it to get him a little bit fatter for when I eat him on Friday,” stated Jay.

“What, why would you eat Oscar, he’s always been so nice to us,” Ben question.

“Did you not see how fat he’s gotten over the summer, dude must of gain 40lbs, he said he was laid up all summer with an injury, but he looks like he ate 24/7. I haven’t had a decent meal since the park and that fat boy is going to be it,” exclaimed Jay to the point he was scaring Ben again.

“Jay, I’ve known you since we were kids, but ever since you started gaining weight, you’ve had moments were I don’t know you anymore’” stated Ben.

Jay seeing the fear in Ben’s eyes, quickly apologizes, “Ben, I’m sorry to scare you like that. It just not having a filling meal in a month and on the first day I can leave the house to look for a proper meal, Oscar falls in to my lap. Ben, 70 of our classmates have gotten fat over the summer and Oscar is the fattest of them. I look at him and my mouth starts watering thinking about how tasty that boy is. Ben, he is going to be the best meal I have ever had,” Jay apologized and explained.

As Jay and Ben talked, Oscar was walking back with tray full of food.

He had gotten 5 bacon double cheese burgers, 3 large cheese fries, 2 slices of cheese pizza, and a large soft drink.

“You must be really hungry, huh Oscar,” asked Ben. “Well, like I said all I did was eat during the summer, so it takes a lot to fill me up,” replied Oscar while stuffing his face with a bacon double cheese burger.

Jay just watched as his next meal willing fattens himself up for him. Jay planned on giving Oscar more money tomorrow for lunch.

Oscar finished the tray of food and pats his belly, now sticking out another foot.

"Man, I'm full," declared Oscar, "I could do this all the time"

If Jay could get Oscar to keep stuffing himself like this rest of the week, then Friday could not come fast enough for him.

After school, Jay decided he rather walk home that way he could find him something to eat, besides a squirrel or bird.

He didn’t want anything too big that why his mom wouldn’t notice the change in his stomach size, and get suspicious of his weight gain.

It didn’t take long for a dog walking down the street to catch Jay’s eyes.

He spotted a corgi (think Ein from Cowboy Bebop) walking towards him, his belly dragging on the ground.

Jay walked up to the dog and started petting him.

Dog had no collar, but looked like it had been eating well.

Jay pulled out a peanut butter cracker sandwich of his backpack, which he used to lure critters to him to catch, gave one to him in hopes of it causing the dog to follow him as he walks away.

The plan works and the dog starts following him.

Jay ducks in to an alley way, with the dog following him.

Jay quickly looks around make sure that no one is around and picks the corgi up.

“Wow you are a heavy little thing, you must way 50lbs,” Jay says to the dog, “you’re a cutie but I’m just too hungry.”

Jay opens his jaws as wide as can and stuffs the dog half way in his mouth.

Jay takes one giant gulp, pulls the dog all the way into his mouth.

Jay takes one last gulp and sends the dog down to his stomach.

His belly bounces as the dog is deposited in to his stomach.

Jay pats his belly and wags tail as the dog trashes around.

The dog was just the right size to fill his stomach but not stretch it.

For the first time in a month Jay was full.
