15512112211112113311.content:
That night Ben laid in bed, his mind still was not at ease with Jay apology for the reason behind strange behavior as of recent.

Ben didn’t really think Jay would eat him but the seriousness and look in his eye when he said it told him otherwise.

Hell just the way Jay reacted at the thought of eating of Oscar scared Ben.

Ben continued to rack his mind around it, while drifting off to sleep.

Then Ben was jolted awake by Jay slapping him in the face.

Ben opened his eyes to see Jay standing there, he looked like he weighed nearly 600lbs and was standing at nearly 9 and ½ feet tall.

“Wakey Wakey, Ben,” Jay calmly said.

Ben tried to move only to find he’s been strapped to a metal chair.

“WHERE THE HELL AM I? WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON?,” screamed Ben as he was rudely awaken.

“It’s time to prepare you for to biggest meal, but right now your way to skinny. I need to fatten you up quite a bit to make you a satisfying meal, but don’t worry, with these quick gain shakes will help speed things up,” Jay said while licking his lips.

“WHAT THE FUCK JAY,” screamed Ben in full fear, “YOU SAID YOU WOULD EAT ME UNLESS I BETRAYED OR GOT FAT, AND NEITHER OF THING HAVE HAPPEN.”

“It’s true, I did say that but I’m just too hungry anymore. I don’t care who I eat, as long as my belly is fully and to prove that to you with my next meal,” chuckled Jay with malice in his voice.

Jay pulls back a curtain to reveal his own mother bound to a chair.

“You see Ben, mom walked in on me eating someone, no one important just some girl from school who was looking to become a BBW. When I told her that I was working on a shake that would cause you to gain as you drank it, she was more than willing to be guinea pig. It worked well too; she put on two hundred pounds just from drinking two jugs worth. The extra weight looked real cute on her, it also distribute the weight evenly around her body. If it wasn’t for the endless hunger, I would have asked her on a date. But alas the hunger won out and I told her I only gave her the shakes to fatten her up to eat, the look of terror in her eyes was amazing. But about half way through eating her, mom came home early and tried to stop me from having my meal,” explained Jay as he pick up a funnel.

Jay’s mom was balling her eyes out, trying to reason with her son not to do whatever he was thinking about that there would be no turning back if he did.

Jay took the funnel and stuffed it in her mouth and strapped it to her head.

“So since you found out about the secret to my weight gain and height gain, I couldn’t risk you exposing me. Since you’re going be nothing but fat out me soon, I guess I’d better tell you the truth. The feral bear didn’t kill Colin, I did. He found out that me and Ben are kleptos and was going to tell you, but I couldn’t let that happen, it would ruin my plans to become the fattest teen. So he had the pleasure of being my first living meal,” stated Jay as he prepped the first jug of shake.

His mom’s eye went wide as she started screaming and trashing in an attempt to escape the chair, but failed, as she stared with saddened that her son was going to eat her.

“He was just so tasty, that I just had to have more. Hell if I hadn’t accidentally swallowed Ben’s arm the night I ate the entire inventory at the candy shop, I guess it wouldn’t have happened,” continued Jay, “but it did and I could not be happier, if I never had gotten a taste, I never would have sped up my weight gain and never been able to enjoy being truly stuffed again.”

Jay picked up the first jug walked over to his mom and said,”Well, mother just remember, you did this to you by interfering.”

He started slowly pouring the shake in the funnel, so not to drown her.

She refused to swallow at first but soon she realized she couldn’t breathe and had taken a gulp.

That gulp caused her to realize that this shake was the best thing she had ever tasted and started swallowing faster.

Jay caught on to this and started pouring faster.

Ben watched in horror as Jay mother started expanding, she wasn’t really a small woman to begin with, but was already grown a third bigger with just the first jug.

He then picked up two more jugs and repeats the process again.

When Jay poured the last of the final jug in the funnel, his mom now weighed over 450lbs.

Jay couldn’t help but show his excitement as his tail was waging at full speed.

He took the funnel out of her mouth and licked the tears off her face.

“MMM, just delectable,” Jay said causing his mother to cry even more.

“YOU’RE FUCKING SICK, JAY,” Ben screamed.

Jay turns and looked at Ben, “Excuse me, I’m sick, what about you the night at Oscar or at the candy store, you were excited to see me stuff myself. In matter of fact you pushed Colin into my belly, and then proceed to rub my belly and asking how he tasted. In matter of fact a bet a part of you wants me to eat.”

Ben just stared as he couldn’t deny anything that Jay had said; he hung his head low in a sign of defeat.

“That’s what I thought,” said Jay as he turned back to his mother undoing the straps on the chair, “now as for you, it time to feed your baby boy.”

Jay lifts her out of the chair, opening his mouth as wide as possible and engulfing his mother head.

Jay starts licking her face, exploring every feature of her face with his tongue.

Her tears adding just the right amount of salt to her delectable flavor.

Jay takes as gulp sending her head to back of his mouth and pulling her sizable chest just outside his mouth.

Another gulp brings his causes his jaw to dislocate allowing for mom’s chest into his mouth.

He takes another gulp pulling her upper belly into his mouth and sending her head behind his chest and causing a bulge.

Jay lifts his head back and takes another gulp, and with the help of gravity, swallows his mom up to her large tree trunk thighs.

With another gulp Jay brings her feet into his mouth leaving only her tail outside his jaw.

With a loud slurp, Jay swallowed her tail sending her into his stomach causing it to stick out out five feet more than what it all ready was.

Jay turns to look at Ben who was staring at him in complete and utter shock, that his best friend, just ate his own mother.

“How could you, Jay? She was your mother and you ate her like she was nothing to you,” Ben said as Jay walked over to him, belly moving wildly.

“She was something to me, she was a belly filling meal,” Jay stated as he patted his belly, “I bet you’re enjoying looking at my belly, are you not?”

Jay takes his belly and slams it down on Ben’s lap, causing him to wake up in a cold sweat and terror.

Ben decided he needs a straight answer from Jay if he truly has intention of eating him or not.

Across town Jay was having a eerily similar dream, one that he was truly enjoying.

155121122111121133111.content:
Friday.

Today was the last day anyone at school would see Oscar not as fat on Jay.

Ben had tried to talk Jay out of it but to no avail.

Jay had been giving his lunch money to Oscar all week and Oscar took advantage of that.

Every day at lunch, he would buy more and more food, and stuff himself more.

Jay loved watching this; Oscar was willingly fattening himself without even knowing it.

It showed on Oscar, he looked like had gained another 10lbs since the beginning of school.

Ben sighed as he closed his locker door; it had been three days since he had that terrible dream.

Ben hadn’t work up the courage to confront Jay on if he would truly eat him.

Dream Jay had been right, it did excite Ben to see Jay stuff himself and have a big round belly.

Despite when Ben keeps telling himself about the Colin incident, deep down he knows that he pushed Colin in not to save Jay, but to see Jay belly get bigger and fatter.

Hell as much as he would deny it, dream Jay had been correct in assuming that a part of him wants to be fat on Jay.

Ben turns around still deep and thought walks right into Jay and bounce of his belly falling on his butt.

“You know Ben, you keep walking around with your head in the clouds, you’re gonna get hurt,“ chuckled Jay, “but it’s a good thing you ran in to my soft belly.”

“Sorry man I’m just thinking about things,” stated Ben.

“Anything you want to talk about,“ asked Jay.

Ben pondered for a second and replied, “There is but we’ll talk after you eat Oscar.”

“So, you finally agree that I should eat him.”

“Yes and no, my mind says I shouldn’t support you eating people, but my heart says to let you because it makes you happy.”

"Well thanks man, I knew you see it my way sooner or later.”

As they continued to talk, Oscar walked over and greets them.

“Hey Oscar,” said Jay with a smile, “you ready to go to lunch?”

“Sure am dude," replied Oscar

"Go ahead and get a table, me and Ben will go get your food,” replied Jay.

“Okay,” replied Oscar as he heads towards lunch room.

“So, what are you going to do when his parents come looking for him, you don’t have the feral bear to blame anymore,” question Ben.

“Don’t worry I got a plan for that when it comes up,” replied Jay.

Ben and Jay walk in to the lunch room, Ben goes and sits with Oscar while head to the lunch line.

There is no one in the line when they arrive.

Jay puts on his charm and sweet talks the lunch ladies into allowing him to pick up Ben and Oscars lunch as well.

While Jay was getting food, Ben was talking to Oscar, “If you don’t mind me asking how much weight did you gain during summer break?”

“I gain about 35lbs during the summer and another 10lbs just this week, thanks to Jay giving me his lunch money.”

“Well don’t look now but here come Jay with your lunch,” Ben said pointing at Jay with a tray loaded with food.

Jay sets the tray down in front of Oscar, “Here you go man. I was able to get you 9 double bacon cheeseburgers, 9 slices of pizza, 9 loaded fries, and a 64oz chocolate shake.”

“Damn dude, if I didn’t know any better I’d say you were fattening me up on purpose,” joked Oscar.

“Hey I just might be,” Jay joked back knowing the truth.

With that Oscar started scarfing down the food.

Oscar must have been hungry cause he cleaned the tray off in ten minutes.

Oscar leaned back and starts rubbing his tightly packed stomach, sticking out an additional 7”.

“So full but so worth,” moaned Oscar.

Soon the bell rang signaling it was time head back to class.

“Well, I’ll see you all tonight,” said Oscar as he somewhat waddled away due his stuffed belly.

“See you at 7, Oscar,” replied Jay.

Soon school was over, Jay and Ben were walking to Jay’s house and decided to stop at a thrift store where they liked to shop for used video games.

As they were walking around, a Jay caught an interesting book out the corner of his eye.

The book looked like it was over 100 years old and was called “Tome of the Eater”, Jay picks it up and starts looking at it.

The book had chapters on what food is the most fattening, how to fatten people quickly, and most interesting of all to Jay was a section on vore.

Jay quickly looks around to make sure no one is looking and the place doesn’t have any cameras.

He quickly stuffed the book in backpack and walked over to Ben, “See any good games?”

“Yeah, they got Mario Party 7 and a controller for $20”

“You find anything?”

“Yeah I did, I’ll show you when we get back to my place.”

Ben took the game up to the register and paid for it.

They soon get to Jay’s house, his mom is gone for the weekend again due to work.

Jay shows Ben the tome and tells him what he seen in it.

Jay wanted to study the book before he started using it.

Jay placed to book in a drawer, so Oscar would not see it when he came over.

With Oscar soon arriving, Jay was ready to chow down, when Ben chimed in with an idea,"Why don't we order pizza and stuff Oscar. That why he could be extra fattening to you with a massive belly full of pizza."

Jay thought about it and decided.....

1551211221111211331113.content:
“You know Ben that’s good thinking right there,” replied Jay.

“So we order a couple pizza, all extra cheese, we eat a slice or two, and give the rest to him,” schemed Ben.

Jay called the pizza place and ordered four of the largest pizza size they had.

Soon the pizza arrived and not long after so did Oscar.

Jay rushes to answer the door and opens the door to see Oscar, standing there with a belly that is a lot bigger than what it had been at lunch.

“Hey Jay,” said Oscar as Jay opened the door.

“Yo, Oscar, you ready to party, we got pizza,” replied Jay.

“You can cut the crap Jay, I know why I’m here,” said Oscar.

“What do you mean dude,” replied Jay.

“I’m not stupid man, there is no way you could gain nearly 200lbs since April without eating someone and my gut says you ate Colin, not the feral bear,”

“How did you figure it out,” asked Jay.

“Well, ever since I was a kid I had fantasized about being fatten up and eaten by a pred,” replied Oscar, “and when you arrived at school Monday, I could see in your eyes you was looking for someone to eat.”

“So when I gave you my lunch money you know I had chosen you,” question Jay.

”Yep, my parents were concerned about the extra weight I was putting on due to you buying me food. But when I told them why, they were mad at first, you know losing their son to a pred, but they knew that i had always dreamed about being eaten alive. So to help me be a little tastier for you when I got home from school, they said they want to give you a gift for helping make my fantasy a reality. They sat me down and had me drink three gallons of lard infused milk shakes, to help fatten me up for you. Dad also gave me the recipe to give to you, he said it was in a old family tome that uses to belong to his grandfather, but he sold it a few weeks back to the thrift store.”

“Was it called 'The ‘Tome of the Eater’, interjected Jay.

“Yeah that’s the one, let me guess, you bought it,” asked Oscar.

“More like stole it,” Jay said.

Oscar tells Jay the history of the tome, that his great great great grandfather wrote the tome studying the preds in his village.

He study the way the preds fatten their prey, what food worked best, i.e. the shake, and even the technique in which they use to swallow prey.

He guess telling Jay all this, its fate that one of his decedents would be eaten.

“Well, since we are spilling the beans on secrets here. Jay the other night, I had a dream that you had kidnapped me, told me you were giving end to your hungry and planned of force feeding me to fatten me up. You showed me how you were going to do it by force feeding your mom a shake that was instantly converted to fat. You said it was her punishment on walking in on eating someone from school, whom you used to test the shakes. You told her that you had eaten Colin, and then you looked at me after I called you sick. Dream you stating that I was the one that was sick cause I got excited by watching you stuff yourself full of food, and that I had pushed Colin in, not to save you from choking, but to see you get bigger and fatter, and that deep down inside I want to be eaten by you. Part of me does want get eaten by you while another part doesn’t,” spilled Ben.

“So that why you been acting weird around me all week,” answered Jay, “Well to let you know, I had a dream similar to yours except you were willing to let me fatten you up and eat you”

“So I have to ask do you want to eat me,” ask Ben.

“Just like you part of me does and doesn’t. I don’t want to lose my friend, but I’m pretty sure you’d be a tasty meal all fatten up.”

“If I may offer a solution to this dilemma, if you both can wait till Christmas. Ben you gain as much weight as possible before then, and Jay if you can hold out till then and come Christmas if that part of you that wants to eat Ben is still there, well Jay, Ben will be a nice and fat meal for you,” planned Oscar.

Ben and Jay look at each other and agreed on the plan.

The boys take a few hours to play video games while Oscar digests the lard shakes.

Jay tells Oscar about why ate Colin and how it also caused him grow height wise as well.

About three after arriving, Oscar had digested all of the shakes adding another 40lbs to him.

Jay suggests they weigh him before eating him.

Oscar states that he was 140lbs before his weight gain.

Oscar steps on the scale, the numbers on the digital read out spun to read 221lbs.

“Wow,” was all Oscar could say while patting his belly.

“You ready Oscar,” asked Jay.

“As ready as I can be. Jay I want you to eat me feet first,” ask Oscar.

“Sure, I can do that. It’ll be different then the way I have been,” Jay says as walk over to Oscar and licks him, “you taste scrumptious, Oscar. Now go lay on the kitchen table, meal”

Oscar rushes over to the table and lays down his back.

Jay comes in and pulls a chair up by Oscar’s feet.

“You know, Oscar, you’re going to be the first fattening meal that I’ve had since the weekend I eat Colin due to being ground for the past month, it been maddening,” Jay said as he opens his mouth and stuff Oscars feet in his mouth.

Ben comes in and sits off to the side of the table, where he can watch both Jay swallow Oscar and his belly expand as Oscar enters it.

Jay moans as he gets a taste of Oscar as he licks his feet.

As Jay licks his feet, Oscar starts laughing due to being tickled.

After about 30 seconds, Jay swallows and pulls Oscars feet into his throat, pulling his calves to his lips.

Jay takes a few more swallows bring Oscar’s thighs to his mouth and an issue; Oscar’s thighs were too wide to fit in his mouth.

Oscar need to be done.

Oscar had Ben help him sit up, he then puts his hands each side of Jay’s jaw just below his ear lobes and press.

Jay feels his jaw dislocate but it doesn’t cause him any pain.

“This should help you swallow me, once you swallow me just push your jaw back in place. Also from now own your jaw will dislocate on its own from now own when it reaches the size of my thighs,” explained Oscar.

Jay takes a massive gulp pulling in Oscar’s thighs and love handles.

Jay stops for a moment to lick Oscar’s love handles to get a taste and lets out a loud moan at how good they taste.

Ben watched with excitement wagging his tail.

Jay thinks to himself, “Having my jaw dislocated is making this so much easier.”

Goodbye you guys and Jay thanks for making my dream come true,” Oscar stated as Jay took another powerful gulp, pinning Oscar’s arm above his head, and pulling more Oscar into his mouth leaving only his elbow down left outside Jay’s mouth.

Jay lies down in his bed, he ask Ben to rub his belly him, as he feels Oscar doing the same from inside.

“When I wake up tomorrow, I’m going to be huge,” Jay sleepily says as he drift off to sleep.

choices: Jay's Mom Comes Home and Flips out
A Few Weeks Later and Jay Has The Shake Perfected
155121122111121133111311.content:
The next morning Jay wakes up to find Ben lying on top of him, having fallen asleep while rubbing Jay’s belly.

“Ben, you need to move so I can get up,” Jay said.

“Can’t, this bed is so soft,” chimed Ben.

“Either you get up or I’m not waiting till Christmas.”

“Okay, okay, I’m moving.”

Ben slides off of Jay on to the floor.

Jay gets up and the first thing he notices is his belly is now the size of a beach ball.

He lumbers into the bathroom and steps the scale, which soon reads 520lbs.

“Wow Oscar was fattening, I gained a lot of his weight,” Jay hollered at Ben.

Ben walked in and got a face full of belly, “Well that not the only thing you gain from him”

Jay walked over to the height chart and measuring from where he was last height measurement was, he had shoot up another foot to 7’4”.

“Nice,” Jay exclaimed happily.

“Your mom is going to freak out when she sees you,” worried Ben.

“Let’s not worry about that right now,” Jay said as he walked back towards his room and grabs the tome, “right now I want to study this thing. Also don’t you have something you need to be doing?”

“Already ahead of you,” replied Ben opening the first of the four 20” pizzas.

Jay walks back into the living room and sat on the couch, opens the tome and starts reading the section about what foods are fattening.

It listed the normal stuff, you know bacon, ham, sausage, lard, whole milk, heavy cream, foie gras (fatty liver from a duck or goose) and so forth.

It suggested using lard and bacon grease to cook your food in, so it can absorb the extra fat.

Next he section is about fattening people up, one of two sections he was excited to read.

Jay, having read most of the section only to find out the last page is missing.

“What the fuck, the last page of the fattening section is missing,” exclaimed Jay.

“What so important about it this page,” asked Ben.

“It has a recipe for a weight gain shake on it,” replied Jay.

“Isn’t that what Oscar’s dad had sent over,” Ben said as he stuffed another piece of pizza in his face.

“I total forgot about that,” Jay stated as he grabbed the paper from the coffee table.

As he reads the recipe notices that it only had to ingredients were melted lard and whole milk.

The notes say that a gallon will cause the drinker to gain about 15lbs in a few hours from drinking it.

As Jay reads the recipe, he starts wonder if he added more modern ingredients to it if it would have a more potent effect.

Jay continued to study the tome while Ben continued to stuff himself already having finished off one pizza.

A few hours later, Ben had finished off all the pizzas, his belly now looked like he was 4 month pregnant.

Ben got up from the table, unstable but still able to stay upright and walks into the living room and sits next to Jay.

“So learn anything from the tome,” Ben asked Jay, while rubbing what he could of his overstuffed tummy.

“Most of the stuff that would be useful to me, Oscar showed while I was eating him. But there are tips to help you gain weight,” Jay replied, reaching over and helping rub Ben’s belly.
155121122111121133111311.title: The Next Day

choices: Jay Asks His Mom to Help Fatten Ben
Jay Asks His Mom to Test the Improved Weight Gain Shake
1551211221111211331113111.content:
A few hours later Jay was watching TV and Ben had gone into a food coma when he hears his Mom’s car pull into the driveway.

“Oh crap, Ben wake up my Mom is home,” Jay said in a panic as he tried to figure out what he was going to say.

“What are we going to do,” asked Ben trying to sit up but couldn’t do to his over inflated belly.

As Jay was getting ready to answer, the door open and his mother walked in. “Jay, I’m home,” she hollered as she closed the door, not yet looking at the couch.

“Hi mom,” Jay said nervously.

“How was your weeke..,” she said and had stopped mid sentenced, having finally turning to see her now much larger son and his overly stuffed friend.

“Jaylin Kyle and Benjamin, what in God’s holy hell did you two do and don’t lie to me,” Jay’s mother screamed at them, extremely pissed off.

Jay started to respond but was interrupted by his mother, “You better think long and hard about your answer before you respond.”

Jay thought about what he should say to her.

He decided he better tell her the whole truth.

Jay told her everything that had happened.

How stuffing himself with stolen food made him gain weight, which made him want to get fatter.

It had also caused him to eat all the food at Oscar’s house at the sleepover and a candy store.

He told her he ate Colin out of rage due to him throwing his comic book in to toilet which unlocked a desire to eat people.

Jay tells her the height growth started after that.

He tells her about eating the cub and two raccoons.

He explains that he just digested Oscar, who fatten himself up for Jay.

Ben chimes in about the dream he had after Jay threaten to eat him if he told the truth about Colin, how that caused him to have a dream that made him realize he want to be eaten by Jay, that they came up with a plan to fatten Ben up as big as possible by Christmas.

Jay’s mom couldn’t believe what they just told her.

She was trying to wrap her head around the fact that her son ate her nephew and more, then there the fact that his best friend wants to be eaten.

She lets out a sigh and tells Jay to lower his head down to her.

Jay hesitates for a moment but lowers his head. She reaches out and slaps him across the face, “That’s for lying to me, Jay, now lower your head again,” she said.

Jay again is hesitant and lowers his again, this time she gives him a kiss on the cheek.

“But I forgive you,” she told Jay, rubbing the spot where she smacked him.

“So you’re not mad at me for eating people,” Jay asked.

“You’re my son and I just want you to be happy. If you eating people and getting fatter and taller makes you happy, then I’m okay with it, as long as you don’t eat me,” stated Jay’s mom.

“Deal,” replied Jay.
1551211221111211331113111.title: Jay's Mom Comes Home and Flips out

choices: Someone at School Ask Jay to Help Them Gain Weight (Next Meal)
15512112211112113311131112.content:
“So mom can I ask you a favor,” asked Jay.

“Sure honey, what do you need,” she asked.

Jay hands her a list of items that he need for the weight gain shakes.

“What are these for, Jay,” his mom question.

“Before I ate Oscar, I had been fattening him up by buying his school lunches for him. He told his parents that I was going to eat them, which was a dream to him. So his parents force feed him a couple gallons of a weight gain shake that had been in his family since the 1800’s. When he came over, he gave me the recipe for it but I want to see if I can make it more fattening for future meals instead of having to wait for them to slowly fatten up,” explained Jay.

“Okay,” she replied.

“Also, do you mind testing the shake for me,” asked Jay.

“W..w..why me, why not Ben since you’re going to eat him,” question his mother.

“Ben wants to fatten up using food only, so I figure I’d ask you. You don’t have to drink the whole blender full, just about 16oz. You should only gain 25lbs at the most,” Jay explain.

“If it makes you happy, then yes,” she replied as her son reached down and gave her a giant hug.

The next day, Ben had finished digesting the pizzas and had gained ten pounds forming a small little roll above his waist band and had gone home.

Jay’s mom had already been to the grocery store and had gotten the supplies Jay needs to work on the weight gain shakes.

He weighed his mom before having her drink the shake so he knew how much she had gained.

Her starting weight was 160 lbs.

Jay starts mixing the ingredients the blender and mixed it together.

After 5 minutes of blending, he poured the contents into a 16oz cup.

“Now in order to know if this is correct, I need you to drink it all, okay.”

His mother nodded her head in agreeance and took the drink from Jay’s hand; she took a whiff of the shake which smelled like a Reese’s
Cup.

She then took a small sip of the shake to get a taste of it and was amazed; it was the greatest shake she had ever tasted.

Not only did it smell like a Reese’s Cup, it tasted like one as well but only better.

Jay watched as his mom gulped down the shake as fast as she good.

As she drank down the shake her body to expand as the shake, like Jay had hoped, was converted to fat.

Soon she had finished the shake and with that Jay was ready to weigh her but first he had questions for her, “So how did it taste, mom?”

“Like a Reese’s Cup but better, the greatest shake I have ever,” replied his mom.

“Well, let’s get you weighed and see if the weight you gained was what I predicted it would be, too,” said Jay.

Jay went and got the scale from the bathroom and had his mom stand on it.

The numbers spun until it read 189.

Jay couldn’t have been happier, his shake worked better than he had hoped.

If that small amount was almost 30lbs then a whole gallon would cause the drinker to gain around 230lbs.

Jay couldn’t help but have that evil grin flash out thinking about his next meal.

1552.title: A Few More Furs

info.brief_description: You're a school bully/spoiled brat that intends to grow bigger than anyone! [WG/GT/GTS]
info.description:
Being a school bully or even a spoiled kid is never easy. You have to work your way to be that nasty or entitled, not to mention BIG. This is a story where you choose how big the bully/brat can be, whether they get fat, become a giant, or even a fat giant. Basically, they can grow bigger than anyone and do whatever they want, whether they're in school or not.

Now let's meet our two bullies to choose from:

Aaron Beltzer
Age 12
Race: Black
Height: 5 foot 3 inches
Weight: 135 lbs.

Aaron is a chubby student, but still, as mean as he can be. As a younger child, he used to be shy and inclusive, as well as frail and skinny. He was even mocked for being so scrawny. It wouldn't be until his parents made him eat more because of his small figure. His family has a long history of being overweight, but they saw it as a way of "growing up naturally". They downright spoiled him with food and attention, more than any other parent would. It wasn't long until Aaron became a bit fatter, even gaining a few extra inches in height. With his new outlook, he developed a new attitude, changing from a skinny shy student to a chubby and mean bully. He would do whatever it took to get whatever he wanted, even took up a few sports to help make him more effective as a bully. And this would make the students more nervous around him. And the more he would bully students for whatever he wanted, the more satisfied he felt. In fact, he can't help but feel different whenever he bullies and eats. Could this be the start of something new?

Olivia Carter
Age: 12
Race: White
Height: 5 foot 1 inch
Weight: 148 lbs.

Olivia has a unique family life. Her father is an obese individual with a heart as big as his waistline, working as an IT Tech for a computer company. Her mother, on the other hand, is a muscle-bound fitness nut, working at a local gym as a personal trainer. She has worked out for so long that she's developed muscles to put weight lifters to shame. How the two would end up being married is anyone's guess, but the two have raised Olivia with as much love as they could. Both have even spoiled their daughter equally, no matter what the cost. Even her mother lets her do almost anything she wants. As a result, she has become a chubby, spoiled brat. Other children have mocked her weight, but she knew how to stand up for herself. Eventually, she embraced her newfound image and her top-of-the-food-chain outlook among the other children. But how far will she take that role?

Will there be more bullies/brat along the way? Will other kids be able to handle these two? What will happen to them throughout this story? Who else could get involved with these type of misadventures? You'll either have to wait to find out or help add to their story.

RULES
- No death of the two main characters within their own chapters.
- No short paragraphs or instant endings. Flesh out your chapters.
- Have proper grammar when writing your chapters
- Vore is acceptable. Nothing gory though.
- NO SCAT
- NO SEXUAL ACTIVITIES (They're still kids, so no pedo/loli bullcrap)
- No instant growth (I.E. Gain 1000 lbs instantly or grow to 1000 ft. in a day)
- NEW RULE Shrinking is okay to do, but not with the protagonists. They can shrink their victims, but they cannot be shrunk themselves.
- NEW RULE Furry characters are allowed, but only in a separate storyline, do not combine it within the same storyline with human characters.
- NEW RULE The oldest age will be 17. No adults or young adults can grow. The minimum age will also be 6. No toddlers will grow either.
- You can choose to cross the two over in a chapter (No vore between the two unless I fully accept your ideas towards it)
- Family or friends of the characters can be axed off by the two, but again no gore.
- Try to be creative.

Aside from all of that, have fun!
